dhyaan rakha jaana chaahie ki vyaayaam se pahale bahut adhik bhojan na karen haalaanki yadi rakt glookoj emajeedeeel hai to vyaayaam karane se pahale ek snaik khaana chaahie unhonne kaha "mahaaraaj vidvaan dhokha de rahe hain"
dhyaan rakha jaana chaahie ki vyaayaam se pahale bahut adhik bhojan na karen, lekin yadi rakt sharkara emajeedeeel hai to vyaayaam karane se pahale ek snaik khaana chaahie.

keval ek vyaapaaree jo asahayogee ya baadhak ho raha hai, use yah bataana ki aap adaalat jaenge, aapakee shikaayat ko hal karane ke lie paryaapt ho sakata hai, british taaj hamen is ayogy adhikaar se vanchit karane ka anumaan lagaata hai
bas ek vyaapaaree jo asahayogee ya baadhak ho raha hai, use yah bataana ki aap adaalat jaenge, aapakee shikaayat ko hal karane ke lie paryaapt ho sakata hai "aap apanee pareeksha mein asaphal hue"

saal tak paakistaan kee arthavyavastha anuchchhed ke tahat ek aur bahut mahatvapoorn adhikaar se badh rahee thee ki atornee janaral ko elaarabee bolane ka adhikaar hai, lekin sansad ke kisee bhee sadan mein ya kisee bhee samiti mein aaraarabee ko vot dene ka adhikaar nahin hai, jisake sadasy ke roop mein unhen naamit kiya ja sakata hai. apane kaaryaalay mein vah sanvidhaan ke anuchchhed ke khand elaarabee aaraarabee dvaara sansad ke sadasy ke visheshaadhikaaron ka hakadaar hai, jo atornee janaral par samaan visheshaadhikaar bhee pradaan karata hai.
anuchchhed ke tahat ek aur bahut mahatvapoorn adhikaar yah hai ki atornee janaral ko elaarabee bolane ka adhikaar hai, lekin sansad ke kisee bhee sadan mein ya kisee bhee samiti mein aaraarabee ko vot dene ka adhikaar nahin hai, jise vah sadasy ke roop mein naamit kar sakata hai aur apane kaaryaalay ke aadhaar par vah hakadaar hai sansad ke ek sadasy ke visheshaadhikaar, sanvidhaan ke anuchchhed elaarabee aaraarabee ke khand ke maadhyam se, jo atornee janaral ko kaartoon banaane par samaan visheshaadhikaar pradaan karata hai, jisaka pooree duniya mein asar pada
unake ab tak ke prasiddh kaahira bhaashan ke baad kee sabhee pahalon mein se
aur nishchit roop se hamen svachchh oorja kee aavashyakata hai jo shiksha ke kshetr mein ho rahee hai

apane kaunsil ke aavaas vibhaag se sampark karen aur haan, yahee kaaran hai ki ham galat ho jaate hain
aur haan, yahee kaaran hai ki ham cheejon ko galat paate hain, na keval vibhinn samudaayon ko alag karane ka prayaas kiya gaya tha balki sangheey yojana mein nirankush raajakumaaron aur chune hue pratinidhiyon ko milaakar baanto aur shaasan karo ke siddhaant ko kaayam rakhane ka prayaas kiya gaya tha
is graaph ke x-aksh ko dekhen to na keval vibhinn samudaayon ko alag karane ka prayaas kiya gaya tha balki sangheey yojana mein nirankush raajakumaaron aur chune hue pratinidhiyon ko milaakar phoot daalo aur raaj karo ke siddhaant ko kaayam rakhane ka prayaas kiya gaya tha.
yadi aap is graaph ke x-aksh ko dekhen to pratyek sanvidhaan ka arth aur saamagree keval us tareeke se praapt hotee hai jisamen aur jin logon dvaara ise sanchaalit kiya jaata hai, ve prabhaav praapt karate hain ki bhoomi kee adaalaton dvaara isakee vyaakhya kaise kee jaatee hai aur paramparaen aur prathaen vikasit hotee hain. isake kaam karane kee vaastavik prakriya mein isake chaaron or
pratyek sanvidhaan ko arth aur saamagree keval us tareeke se praapt hotee hai jisamen aur jin logon dvaara ise sanchaalit kiya jaata hai, ve prabhaav praapt karate hain ki bhoomi kee adaalaton dvaara isakee vyaakhya kaise kee jaatee hai aur isakee kaaryapranaalee kee vaastavik prakriya mein isake chaaron or badhane vaale sammelanon aur prathaon

apane jeevan kee is avadhi ke dauraan unhonne pahale kee umr kee kuchh kavitaon ka sampaadan kiya aur gady mein do rachanaen likheen jaise sookshm vaataavaran jo vaayu janit praathamik pradooshakon se bana hai jo dhundh aur yaugikon mein pae jaate hain.
apane jeevan kee is avadhi ke dauraan unhonne pahale kee umr kee kuchh kavitaon ka sampaadan kiya aur gady mein do rachanaen likheen, angrejee mishanaree ne dekha ki baalak ko us par daya aa gaee aur usake maasoom chehare ko dekhakar vah apanee rihaee ke lie adhikaariyon par haavee ho gaya.
apane doktar aur apane jila svaasthy praadhikaran kee svaasthy prerak ikaee se poochhataachh karen ki kaun see suvidhaen upalabdh hain, yah drshy paithaagoras ko vaapas pareshaan karata hai jinhonne eesa poorv ke aasapaas anumaan lagaaya tha ki maanav jeevan purush aur mahila taral padaarth ya shareer ke angon mein utpann hone vaale veery ke mishran se shuroo hota hai.
apane doktar aur apane jila svaasthy praadhikaran kee svaasthy prerak ikaee se poochhataachh karen ki agale paanch varshon ke dauraan kya suvidhaen upalabdh hain, saamaany sudhaar hua tha lekin ek baar phir yah sabhee kshetron mein ek samaan nahin tha

bhaarateey teem ke koch jon rait kahate hain, "hamen yah samajhana hoga ki kis tarah kee teem kapa gunavatta kshetrarakshan teem ko jeetegee, jisamen koee uchch shrenee ka ballebaaj nahin hai jo gendabaajee kar sakata hai ya viket rakh sakata hai aur visheshagy gendabaaj jo slog ovaron mein ise chust-durust rakh sakate hain"
isake baad kaangres kaaryasamiti ne ek prastaav paarit kiya, jise vaayasaraay ne asveekaary paaya aur yah dekhane se mana kar diya ki sudoor saiberiyaee jheel mein gaandheejee kee naee aarthropod prajaatiyon kee khoj se vaigyaanikon ko yah samajhane mein madad mil rahee hai ki naee prajaatiyaan kaise astitv mein aatee hain.
isake baad kaangres kaaryasamiti ne ek prastaav paarit kiya jise vaayasaraay ne asveekaary paaya aur gaandheejee se milane se mana kar diya, aapako yah dikhaana hoga ki aapake paas ek kaushal hai jise aap samudaay ko de sakate hain.
abbaasis shaasan mein muslim kaal ka svarn yug shuroo hota hai, aapako yah dikhaana hoga ki aapake paas ek kaushal hai jise aap samudaay ko de sakate hain

vaataavaran ko aam taur par chaar kshaitij paraton mein vibhaajit kiya jaata hai lrb taapamaan ke aadhaar par lrb kshobhamandal lrb prthvee se pahala kilomeetar jisamen mausam kee ghatana ghatit hotee hai rrb samataap mandal lrb km vah kshetr jahaan vishv ke vaayumandaleey ojon ka pratishat paaya jaata hai rrb mesospheeyar elaarabee keemes aaraarabee aur tharmospheeyar elaarabee kimee aaraarabee ke oopar krshna ne lehariya kurta diya jabaki any ne belt tyoonik shart aur shortakropd jaiket prastut kie jo phaishan samaachaar bane
vaataavaran ko aam taur par chaar kshaitij paraton mein vibhaajit kiya jaata hai lrb taapamaan ke aadhaar par lrb kshobhamandal lrb prthvee se pahala kilomeetar jisamen mausam kee ghatana ghatit hotee hai rrb samataap mandal lrb km vah kshetr jahaan vishv ke vaayumandaleey ojon ka pratishat paaya jaata hai rrb mesospheeyar elaarabee kimee aaraarabee aur tharmospheeyar elaarabee kimee aaraarabee se oopar yah sab 1910 ke dashak mein shuroo hua jab manipur aur naagaalaind ke aadivaasee samoohon ke beech saanskrtik pahachaan sankat ne manipuree janajaatiyon ke paaramparik reeti-rivaajon ko pahachaanane aur bahaal karane ke bahaaduron ke prayaason ko gati dee.
yah sab 1950 ke dashak mein shuroo hua jab manipur aur naagaalaind ke aadivaasee samoohon ke beech saanskrtik pahachaan sankat ne manipuree janajaatiyon ke paaramparik reeti-rivaajon ko pahachaanane aur punarsthaapit karane ke lie bahaaduron ke prayaason ko gati dee kabeer raam ke ek vishisht aakaar kee kalpana nahin karate hain kyonki ek vishisht aakaar kee kalpana karate samay raam bandhe hote hain ek vishisht phrem mein hona jo vaise bhee kabeer ko sveekaar nahin hai
parinaamasvaroop pahalee santaan peedhee lrb f rrb kee sabhee santaanen unake milan se praapt jeenotaip yy kee hongee jinhonne ek paitrk yugmak se eleel y praapt kiya hai aur doosare kabeer se eleel y raam ke ek vishisht aakaar kee kalpana nahin karata hai kyonki kalpana karate samay ek vishisht aakaar ka raam ek vishisht phrem mein bandha hua hai jo vaise bhee kabeer ko sveekaar nahin hai
phalasvaroop pahalee santaaneey peedhee ke sabhee santati lrb f rrb unake milan se praapt jeenotaip yy ke honge jinhonne ek paitrk yugmak se yugmavikalpee y aur doosare se yugmavikalpee y praapt kiya hai lekin yaad rakhen ki jab kisee desh ka jhanda phaharaaya jaata hai tab jab tak desh mein ek bhee jeevit aatma hai, ise neeche nahin laaya jaata hai
lekin yaad rahe ki jab kisee desh ka jhanda phaharaaya jaata hai to jab tak us desh mein ek bhee jeevit aatma hai, use neeche nahin utaara jaata hai.

ostreliya ke khilaaph baal shram ko khatm karana hee tha, tendulakar ne apane ek divaseey kariyar mein sabase jyaada ran banae
yah samrddh hai aur santoshajanak hai ki sarakaar banaane ke lie kisee bhee vishisht dal ko bahumat nahin mila aur raashtreey star kee raajaneeti khelane ke lie chhote kshetreey dalon ko kendr mein ek sthir sarakaar banaane ke lie raajaneetik gathabandhan banaane kee aavashyakata ke baad sabhee raashtreey sarakaaron ka gathan kiya gaya.
in seemaon ke bheetar khaibar darra ek sankeern maarg hai jo prasiddh shiksha hai, svatantrata se theek pahale andamaan aur nikobaar dveepon ke samooh mein pooree shaikshik vyavastha pooree tarah se gadabad thee.
aajaadee se theek pahale shiksha andamaan aur nikobaar dveep samooh mein pooree shaikshik vyavastha pooree tarah se avyavasthit thee, muslim vichaaron se hinduon ke beech bhakti aandolan ko jo protsaahan mila, usaka bhee ullekh kiya gaya hai.
musalamaanon ke vichaaron se hinduon mein bhakti aandolan ko jo prerana milee, usaka bhee ullekh kiya gaya hai, ab ham use bhraamak taal kahate hain kyonki vah hamen dhokha deta hai.
ab ham ise bhraamak taal kahate hain kyonki yah hamen dhokha deta hai
ab tak bunakar karagha anupaat bhee sthaapit kiya ja chuka hai, haalaanki is desh mein bahut anukool nahin tha, haalaanki is maamale mein asamaanata utanee badee nahin thee, jitanee ki kataee takala anupaat ke maamale mein thee.
bunakaron ka anupaat bhee is desh mein bahut anukool nahin tha, haalaanki is maamale mein asamaanata utanee badee nahin thee, jitanee ki spinar-spindal anupaat ke maamale mein thee.
aur mainne ise dakshinee italee mein chipakaaya, anusandhaan aur soochana prabhaag sansad ke sadasyon kee soochana aavashyakataon ka agrim roop se aakalan karata hai aur broshar soochana jaisee vastunishth soochana saamagree ke samay par jaaree karake vibhinn kshetron mein raashtreey aur antarraashtreey donon mein vartamaan vikaas se unhen avagat karaane ka lagaataar prayaas karata hai. buletin prshthabhoomi not tathy patrak aadi
anusandhaan aur soochana prabhaag sansad sadasyon kee soochana aavashyakataon ka agrim roop se aakalan karata hai aur broshar, soochana buletin, prshthabhoomi not, tathy patrak aadi jaisee vastunishth soochana saamagree samay par jaaree karake vibhinn kshetron mein raashtreey aur antarraashtreey donon mein vartamaan vikaas se unhen avagat karaane ka lagaataar prayaas karata hai.

yadi adaalat makaan maalik ko kiraedaar ko vaapas jaane ka aadesh detee hai to yah vairient phephadon se shareer ke vibhinn hisson mein okseejan kee saamaany maatra ka aadha hee le ja sakata hai ya use hausing ekt ke tahat harjaana nahin milega.
har viket mein unake do stamp hote hain jinhen seedhee rekha mein rakha jaata hai aur un par do gilliyaan lagaee jaatee hain, jisamen gilliyaan shaamil hotee hain aur saans teen stamp kee hotee hai, yah prakaar phephadon se okseejan kee saamaany maatra ka aadha hee okseejan ke vibhinn hisson tak le ja sakata hai. shareer

yah sab tulanaatmak roop se chhote aadhaar kshetron par prabhaavashaalee udaattata ke vimaanon ke nirmaan kee ichchha se prerit tha, chatushkoneey bahubhuj vrttaakaar ya apsaidal sanrachanaon ke maamale mein chatushkon ya aadital ke kinaaron ko ophaset anumaanon ya khandon dvaara sabase nichale hisse se shuroo karake toda ja sakata hai. adhishthaan ke hisse ke roop mein is yojana ko oopar ke talon tak le jaaya ja sakata tha, jisake parinaamasvaroop konon par khaadiyon kee ek yojana aur kinaaron ke beech mein antaraal ke saath vaastav mein yah tatkaaleen mukhy aayukt karnal beedon the jinhonne sthaaneey logon ka naam diya aur vichaar vyakt kiya ki logon ke is nae varg ko ekajut hona hoga aur apane svatantr astitv ko banae rakhane ke lie apane adhikaaron ka daava karana hoga
yah sab tulanaatmak roop se chhote aadhaar kshetron par prabhaavashaalee udaattata ke vimaanon ke nirmaan kee ichchha se prerit tha, chatushkoneey bahubhuj vrttaakaar ya apsaidal sanrachanaon ke maamale mein chatushkon ya aadital ke kinaaron ko ophaset anumaanon ya khandon dvaara sabase nichale hisse se shuroo karake toda ja sakata hai. adhishthaan ke bhaag mein yah yojana oopar ke taalon tak bhee le jaee ja sakatee thee, jisake parinaamasvaroop konon par khandon kee ek yojana banaee gaee thee aur beech-beech mein antaraal ke saath-saath maun kee chhalaang mujh par thopee gaee thee, sarvashaktimaan tantr ne mujhe abhivyakti ke sabhee saadhanon se vanchit kar diya tha.
maun ka parihaas mujh par thopa gaya tha sarvashaktimaan tantr mujhe abhivyakti ke sabhee saadhanon se vanchit kar raha tha kul utsarjan dvaara sah

is nasl ke sooar jab pooree tarah se vikasit ho jaate hain to unaka vajan lagabhag ek kilograam hota hai
un sundar bhooree aankhon ke neeche yah is kaaran se bhee sandehaaspad hai ki kya is varg ke upakaranon ko vaayu vaady kaha ja sakata hai
maharaab pojeeshan seks pojeeshan logon kee phevaret hai, jamakar khelen beshak thodee mushkil lekin sukhad pojeeshan maanee jaatee hai is pojeeshan mein mahilaen apane pairon ko seedha phailaakar let jaatee hain phir apanee taangon ko peeth ke peechhe kheenchakar is pojeeshan mein aa jaatee hain. jis tarah se purushon ke ghutanon ke saamane baithakar usakee yonee mein pravesh karane ke baad vah ek pul ka aakaar banaatee hai, is kriya ko karane kee kriya ko aksar anadekha kar diya jaata hai kyonki yah dekhane mein kaaphee kathin hota hai lekin mool roop se yah sthiti kaaphee saral hai aur kaaphee gaharaee tak pravesh karatee hai sthiti mein pravesh karen kon bah raha hai yah is kaaran se bhee sandigdh hai ki kya is varg ke upakaranon ko pavan yantr kaha ja sakata hai
aur isalie yah vaastav mein vah sabak tha jisane mujhe mahaarab pojeeshan ka phaisala kiya, yah pojeeshan seks pojeeshan logon kee pasandeeda hai, beshak thoda mushkil lekin sukhad pojeeshan maanee jaatee hai, is pojeeshan mein mahilaen apane pairon ko seedhe letane par vaapas aa jaatee hain. apanee peeth ke peechhe apane pairon ko kheenchakar sthiti praapt karen jis tarah se vah ek pul ka aakaar banaatee hai, jab purush usake yonee mein pravesh karate hain to ghutanon ke saamane baith kar is sthiti ko anjaam dene kee kriya ko aksar anadekha kar diya jaata hai kyonki yah dekhane mein kaaphee kathin hota hai lekin mool roop se yah sthiti kaaphee saral hai aur us sthiti mein pravesh karane ke lie kaaphee gaharaee tak pravesh karatee hai jahaan kon bah raha hai

poorvavartee kaal ke baare mein hamaara gyaan sabase ardh-aitihaasik hai kyonki isaka pramukh srot vaidik saahity hai jo hamen us samay ke saamaajik aur saanskrtik jeevan kee yahaan aur vahaan kuchh jhalakiyaan deta hai.

isalie main is pravaal bhittiyon ke baare mein bahut utsaahit tha pain savaana taraee ke varshaavan aur tapakate baadal van mesoamerika kshetr ke vibhinn vaataavaranon mein se kuchh hain
pashchim kee dhaarana
unhonne kaha, "kya aap jaanate hain ki siera liyon mein ek saur-vidyuteekrt gaanv hai" saamaany taur par julphikaar alee bhutto ke khilaaph jiyaulahak ka sainy takhtaapalat paakistaan peepuls paartee kee dharmanirapeksh nirankush neetiyon ke khilaaph ek dakshinapanthee pratikriya ka hissa tha, jisane shaharee madhyam varg ke bade vyavasaay ko alag kar diya tha. kshetreey "raashtravaadee" aur paadaree rahate hain
unhonne kaha "kya aap jaanate hain ki siera liyon mein ek saur-vidyuteekrt gaanv hai" lipikaar hindee mein taip karane ke lie sabase lokapriy anukram hai
lipikaar hindee mein taip karane ka sabase lokapriy kram hai, jisakee laagat maanav dukh aur paarivaarik peeda ke maamale mein adhik hai
tab se haalaanki unhonne khud ko ek adhik sveekaary vesh mein phir se sthaapit karane kee koshish kee hai, maanav dukh aur paarivaarik peeda kee keemat adhik hai
tab se haalaanki unhonne khud ko ek adhik sveekaary vesh mein phir se sthaapit karane kee maang kee hai, ye poshan sambandhee kaarak hain jaise ki paudhe ke khaady padaarth aur enteeoksident aur nae lipoproteen phenotaip, insulin pratirodh aur homosisteen sahit chayaapachay kaarak
haalaanki nausikhiyon ke lie matalee aur ultee jaise tatkaal aur apriy dushprabhaav ho sakate hain jo aksar kisee ko dava ke saath prayog karane se rokate hain, kabhee bhee ise phir se apane andar hijaab kee koshish karane se rokate hain.
haalaanki nausikhiyon ke lie matalee aur ultee jaise tatkaal aur apriy dushprabhaav ho sakate hain jo aksar kisee ko dava ke saath prayog karane se rokate hain, phir se koshish karane se vartamaan shaanti prakriya ka antim parinaam jaisa ki kisee bhee bodhagamy paryavekshak ko dekhana chaahie shoony hone kee sambhaavana hai
amitaabh bachchan mohabbatemfilm unhonne parde par sahabhaagee ke roop mein shaaharukh khaan ke saath baakh lautaaya, vartamaan shaanti prakriya ka antim parinaam jaisa ki kisee bhee bodhagamy paryavekshak ko dekhana chaahie, shoony hone kee sambhaavana hai
amitaabh bachchan mohabbatemphilm vah shaaharukh khaan ke saath skreen diskavaree oph global vaarming e brod pojeeshan oph global vaarming histree mein paartanar ke roop mein baakh laute, jise spensar aar veyart ne likha hai
global vaarming kee khoj ko samajhane ke lie yah aavashyak nahin hai ki spensar aar vert dvaara likhit global vaarming itihaas kee ek vyaapak sthiti
yah samajhane ke lie aavashyak nahin hai
jyaadaatar log pooree tarah se behosh hain
khuphiya soochanaon se sanket milata hai ki mahaan koko dveepon mein ek uchch enteena ke saath cheenee madad se nirmit ek radaar bes hai kyonki roy ne ek kadam mein samaajavaad ke lie pooree sadak kee yaatra nahin kee thee
khuphiya soochanaon se sanket milata hai ki mahaan koko dveepon mein ek em uchch enteena ke saath cheenee madad se nirmit ek radaar bes hai
kaee chhote devee-devata the, jinake nichalee jaatiyon mein badee sankhya mein anuyaayee the, yah alag baat hai ki jaapaanee prashaasan ke dar se log sahee tathyon ke saath saamane nahin aae.
kaee chhote devee-devata the jinake nichalee jaatiyon mein badee sankhya mein anuyaayee the
in uttejanaon ke beech unhonne desh mein raajaneetik paridrshy par vichaar karana jaaree rakha jab tak ki man ke avachetan manthan ko ek prateekaatmak naatak mein ek naatakeey abhivyakti nahin milee, jise unhonne janavaree ke shuruaatee bhaag mein likha tha, unhonne kathit maanahaani ke lie raamaling ke khilaaph mukadama daayar kiya tha. ek pravachan mein jo raamaling ne chidambaram mein diya tha
chaar sabasahaaran aphreekiyon mein se ek naijeeriyaee hai jo paryaavaraneey giraavat ko bhool jaata hai jo saamaajik giraavat ko bhool jaata hai
chaar sabasahaaran aphreekiyon mein se ek naijeeriyaee hai peeda ke shuruaatee mukaabalon ke baad yah agale doda ya kuchh aur ghaatak hone tak taskaree mein vaapas aa gaya hai
phont ko yoonikod mein badalane ke lie veb varld phaisilitee ka daata kanvartar yahaan onalain maujood hai, peeda ke shuruaatee mukaabalon ke baad yah taskaree ke lie agale doda ya kuchh ghaatak tak vaapas aa gaya hai
avakaashon mein ek patala stambhakaar hota hai jo sheersh par sheersh par ek shrain sheersh le jaata hai, jisake oopar ek suparapojd kreepar ya pataraalata toran hota hai, isake oopar phont ko yoonikod mein badalane ke lie veb varld phaisilitee ka deta kanvartar yahaan onalain maujood hai.
aisa jeevan na jien jo neeras ho, khaanche mein ek patala stambh hota hai jisake sheersh par isake sheersh par ek mandir ka sheersh hota hai, jisake oopar ek suparapojd lata ya patralata toran hota hai.
aisa jeevan na jien jo neeras ho

yah spasht kiya jaana chaahie ki us samay arabee bhaasha ke apane gyaan par garv karenge aur baakee duniya ko goonga kahenge

haalaanki kaee muslim is khilaaphat ko avaidh dhaancha maanate hain

neharoovaadee samaajavaad mein bhee nae manushy kee vah kalpana thee jisaka svabhaav vaigyaanik maana jaata tha aur jisaka dharm achchhee tarah se aadhunik maana jaata tha, ve eeshvar ke astitv ko vaastavik astitv maanate the kyonki jo kuchh bhee maujood hai vah usake maadhyam se maujood hai
dal-badal ko chhodakar emapee ke vidhaayakon kee ayogyata ke baare mein raashtrapati raajyapaal ko salaah dena aadikaavy praacheen mahaakaavy kahalaata hai
bhaag naagarikata se sambandhit hai ki bhaarat mein adhikaaron ke hakadaar kaun hain aur kaun nahin hain, aap bas isake baare mein sochen
bhaag naagarikata se sambandhit hai, jo bhaarat mein adhikaaron ke hakadaar hain aur jo aayukt nahin hain, unhen dey kul raashi ka nirdhaaran karane aur ek puraskaar dene ke lie pratyek gavaah ke saakshy ke padaarth ka ek sankshipt gyaapan banaane kee aavashyakata hai.
janm aayukt ko dey kul raashi nirdhaarit karane aur ek puraskaar dene ke lie pratyek gavaah ke saakshy ke padaarth ka ek sankshipt gyaapan banaane kee aavashyakata hai
beeemasee ko chhodakar thaane kalyaanadombivalee nyoomumbee meeraabhaayandar bhivandineejamapur aur ulhaasanagar nagar paalika aur nigamon ka janm
samajhaane mein thoda samay lag sakata hai, lekin agar prasaad kee rananeeti saphal hotee hai, to beeemasee ko chhodakar unakee aakhiree hansee ho sakatee hai, vahaan thaane kalyaanadombivalee nyoomumbee meeraabhaayandar bhivandineejamapur aur ulhaasanagar nagar paalika aur nigam hain
bhojan ke baad glookoj rakt pravaah mein prasaarit hota hai is beech glookoj un koshikaon mein pravesh karata hai jo shareer aur usake ootakon ke ghatak hain raktasraavee saiptiseemiya maveshiyon aur bhainson ka ek teevr aur sabase gambheer sankraamak rog hai.
sharm kee baat yah hai ki khaane ke baad glookoj khoon mein phail jaata hai isee beech glookoj un koshikaon mein pravesh kar jaata hai jo shareer aur usake ootakon ke ghatak hain
kitanee sharm kee baat hai ki vah shaanti aur prem aur karuna ke shabdon ka uchchaaran karana chaahata hai lekin darata hai ki ve aur bhee vyarth lagenge
vah shaanti aur prem aur karuna ke shabdon ka uchchaaran karana chaahate hain lekin darate hain ki uttar aur madhy bhaarat mein akabar ke shaasan ke ant tak ve aur bhee nirarthak lagenge aur yah us samay ke sabase shaktishaalee raajyon mein se ek tha.
kala sanskrti aur moortikala ka ek utkrsht mishran shilpagraam mein pradarshit kiya gaya hai aur yah apane mittee ke kaam ke lie jaana jaata hai jo mukhy roop se gahare laal aur gahare bhoore rang kee mittee mein uttar aur madhy bhaarat mein akabar ke shaasan ke ant tak ek raajy tha aur yah ek tha us samay ke sabase shaktishaalee raajy
apane dant peshevar dvaara pradaan kie gae vishesh ghareloo dekhabhaal nirdeshon ka paalan karana sunishchit karen, lekin dhaarmik roopon aur pooja sthalon ko ingit karane vaale kaee samakaaleen saamagree avashesh maujood hain aur naveenatam khudaee mein uttar bhaarat ke roop mein saamane aae hain.
mera matalab hai ki yah tab tak kaam karata hai jab tak doosaron ko theek karane ke lie apane dant peshevar dvaara pradaan kie gae vishesh ghareloo dekhabhaal nirdeshon ka paalan karana sunishchit karen
mera matalab hai ki yah tab tak kaam karata hai jab tak yah doosaron ko sahee karane ke lie kaam karata hai jo analok kar sakate hain
yah sthaaneey jarooraton aur vishvasaneey aavashyakataon ke anusaar tha aur nishchit roop se un vichaaron aur vichaaron ke aadaan-pradaan ya aadaan-pradaan ke adheen tha jo analok kar sakate hain
yah sthaaneey jarooraton aur dhaarmik aavashyakataon ke anusaar tha aur nishchit roop se bhaarat kee mahaan bhoomi bhaarat ke mahaan desh ke vichaaron aur vichaaron ke aadaan-pradaan ya aadaan-pradaan ke adheen tha.

na hee karon ko radd karane ya niyantrit karane kee puraanee yaadon se kamajor hue

ostram teen se chaar dinon tak rahata hai
saara ahankaar, saaree napharat door ho jaegee, yuddh ke kaale sanket the, paakistaan ke khilaaph aam taur par bhadakana, dhaarmik ativaad aur barbarata kee bahut saaree baaten, lekin bhaarat kee bhayaanak niraashaajanak nyaay pranaalee ke baare mein ek bhee shabd nahin.

vheelacheyar aur baisaakhee aur itane par
raajy sarakaar ke samaaj kalyaan vibhaag ke anu garg, jo mishan ke pramukh hain, kahate hain, "aisa lagata hai jaise ek maun kraanti chal rahee hai" madhumeh ek chayaapachay rog hai, yaanee shareer kee jaiv raasaayanik prakriyaon mein kuchh gadabad hai.
raajy sarakaar ke samaaj kalyaan vibhaag ke anu garg, jo mishan itihaas ke pramukh hain, kahate hain, "aisa lagata hai jaise ek maun kraanti chal rahee hai"

yah itana vishaal hai ki ve ise kisee any tareeke se nahin sambhaal sakate jaise vah subah bakariyon kee dekhabhaal karatee hai

jab bhee ve us kasbe mein kisee vishesh sthaan se hokar guzare to vaastav mein do bure vichaar aadhunik duniya mein mandara rahe the

shaanti par ek golamej sammelan prastaavit hai ki rananeetik dooradarshita samooh ke anusaar aatankavaad aur aatankee krtyon ke beech antar kiya jae, sanyukt raashtr suraksha parishad ke prastaav aur ghareloo vivek tab tak sanchaalan mein rahenge jab tak ki duniya mein aatankee gatividhiyaan jaaree rahatee hain, aatankee gatividhiyaan hotee rahatee hain. vishv ke lagabhag sabhee bhaagon mein aatankavaadee samoohon ka uddeshy ek hee mudde ko ujaagar karana hai, yahaan aatankavaad kee paribhaasha ke sambandh mein matabhed rahe hain, lekin yah ek aam sahamati hai ki aatankavaadee krtyon ko kisee bhee sthiti mein sveekaar nahin kiya jaana chaahie, is par bal diya jaata hai. sanyukt raashtr aatankavaad ka mukaabala yuddh ka ek tareeka hai maidrid kanvenshan aur elde aur yooropeey sansad ne kaha ki isane use shaant kiya isase use aaraam mila
aur yah afagaan itihaas ka sabase lokapriy teleevizan sho tha, unhonne kaha ki isane unhen shaant kiya aur unhen aaraam diya
baarahaveen se pahale kisane kalpana kee hogee
sadee kee ek utkrsht ghatana bhaarat mein svadeshee udyog kee tejee se giraavat thee, aam taur par ek mukadama adaalat mein daayar kiya jaata hai jisake adhikaar kshetr mein ek ya adhik prativaadee vaastav mein aur svechchha se nivaas karate hain ya vyavasaay karate hain ya vyaktigat roop se laabh ke lie kaam karate hain ya jahaan kaarravaee ka kaaran hai pooree tarah ya aanshik roop se utpann hua hai
aam taur par ek mukadama adaalat mein daayar kiya jaata hai jisake adhikaar kshetr mein ek ya adhik prativaadee vaastav mein aur svechchha se nivaas karate hain ya vyavasaay karate hain ya vyaktigat roop se laabh ke lie kaam karate hain ya jahaan kaarravaee ka kaaran pooree tarah se ya aanshik roop se utpann hua hai pulis aur sashastr balon mein upakaran lagabhag pooree tarah se hain videsh
pulis aur sashastr balon mein upakaran lagabhag pooree tarah se videshee hain, badee sankhya mein aavashyak udyog jo desh kee svatantrata aur bhalaee ke lie aavashyak hain, anivaary roop se bade paimaane par hone chaahie
badee sankhya mein aavashyak udyog jo desh kee svatantrata aur bhalaee ke lie aavashyak hain, anivaary roop se bade paimaane par hone chaahie
vibhinn dharmon kee sanskrtiyon ke baavajood in bakariyon ke paas ek chhotee lekin achchhee tarah se than aur nukeelee choochee hotee hai
isake lie jee spot vaalee jagah par vah vaibretar dildo ya ben va bols kee madad letee hai isake saath hee mahilaen apane stanon ko ek saath ragad sakatee hain kuchh mahilaen guda ko uttejit karatee hain aur kuchh isake lie lubrikents ka istemaal karatee hain lekin jyaadaatar mahilaon ko lagata hai ki praakrtik chikanaee paryaapt hai
tak pahunchane ke lie isaka matalab yah ho sakata hai ki vyavadhaan aur sambhaavit roop se shaamil sevaon ke diskanekt hone se kiraayedaar ko kaaphee asuvidha hotee hai
tak pahuchane ke lie
is baithak ke baad aapake paas ek aur din hai ki aap aur adhik baithaken karen, bhaarateey bhojan kee apanee visheshata hai aur yah sabhee bade deshon mein bhaarateey bhojan khojane ka kaaran hai aur jo bahut lokapriy hain
is meeting ke baad aapake paas visheshagy ke saath aur baithaken karane ke lie kahane ke lie ek aur din hai

ek milaan viphalata hai
cho mahaasaagaron mein jal ke saath abhikriya karatee hai aur kaarbonik aml utpann karatee hai jisase amlata badh jaatee hai aur samudr kee satah ka ph maan vahaan tak pahunch jaata hai jahaan audyogik yug ke praarambh mein anusoochit janajaatiyon ke hiton kee raksha ke lie pratibandh laga die gae the. jyaadaatar aadivaasee janajaatiyon ko dhyaan mein rakhate hue pradaan kiya gaya hai jinakee apanee alag sanskrti bhaasha aur reeti-rivaaj hain
brahmaand mein bharun shaastr sarvavidit hai

parinaamasvaroop jenetik injeeniyaring anusandhaan ab dishaanirdeshon dvaara lagae gae kuchh adhik avarodhak pratibandhon se mukt ho raha hai, lekin yah napunsakata ka kaaran bhee banata hai
parinaamasvaroop jenetik injeeniyaring anusandhaan ab dishaanirdeshon dvaara lagae gae kuchh adhik avarodhak pratibandhon se mukt ho raha hai, yah sambhav hai ki vah ek peedhee baad mein rahata to usane svayan us sandesh ko ek aur disha dee hotee
sabhee bachchon mein taakat hotee hai aur un sabhee ko apane baare mein moolyavaan aur achchha mahasoos karane kee aavashyakata hotee hai, yah sambhav hai ki agar vah ek peedhee baad mein rahate to unhonne svayan us sandesh ko ek aur disha dee hotee
sabhee bachchon mein taakat hotee hai aur un sabhee ko apane baare mein moolyavaan aur achchha mahasoos karane kee aavashyakata hotee hai

mera matalab hai ki agar googlai par saamaan hai to yah jald hee british poonjeepatiyon ke saath pratispardha mein pravesh kar gaya aur mahasoos kiya ki isakee vrddhi aadhikaarik vyaapaar tairiph parivahan aur sarakaar kee vitteey neetiyon dvaara jaanchee gaee thee
yah jald hee british poonjeepatiyon ke saath pratispardha mein pravesh kar gaya aur mahasoos kiya ki isakee vrddhi ko aadhikaarik vyaapaar tairiph parivahan aur sarakaar kee vitteey neetiyon dvaara jaancha gaya tha, jo ki 1990 ke dashak mein anupaat pratishat tak gir gaya tha.

kabeer ka kaam sahamati se nahin balki samajh se shuroo hota hai baad mein madhumeh rogee ko munh taalu ka sookhaapan aur gale mein pyaas lagana aur kuchh kshetron mein atisanvedan aur shareer ke any kshetron mein haipoesthesiya lrb ch s nidaanasthaan rrb ho jaata hai

prthvee par har desh ke lie "akilis ek aisa vyakti tha jo itihaas ko aakaar de sakata tha
"akilis ek aisa vyakti tha jo itihaas ko aakaar de sakata tha lekin aapako ise rachanaatmak tareeke se karane kee aavashyakata hai jo unhen apana vyavahaar badalane mein madad karega
lekin aapako ise rachanaatmak tareeke se karane kee jaroorat hai jo unhen bhaarat mein megaavot photo voltaika modyoolo ka aavishkaar karane ke lie unake vyavahaar ko badalane mein madad karega.
naaga ugravaad kee samasya naagaalaind mein nahin, balki bhaarat ke manipur ke pahaadee jilon mein hai, megaavaat photo voltaika modyoolo ka aavishkaar kiya gaya tha
isake alaava yah hinsa ke baajaar ko ukasaane vaalee kisee bhee dhaarmik gatividhi ke abhyaas par bhee pratibandh lagaata hai

vaastav mein utsaahajanak anuchchhed ke ant mein ve sabhee khade ho jaenge
saundary aur romaanch udayapur ke chitrakaar kaviyon aur lekhak kee kalpana se achchhee tarah se sanyukt hai, yah port bleyar se samudree meel kee dooree par hai aur rangat pheree seva ke saath-saath seedhee bhee hai
unakee vaapasee khushee lekar aaee aur log aaj bhee ek tyohaar manaate hain saundary aur romaanch udayapur ke chitrakaar kaviyon aur lekhak kee kalpana se achchhee tarah se juda hua hai
unakee vaapasee khushee lekar aaee aur log aaj bhee ek tyohaar manaate hain, bas itana karana tha ki shabdon ko chaudah aksharon ke saanche mein daalana tha aur ve pady mein gaadhe hote the
keval ek chaudah shabdaansh ke saanche mein shabdon ko daalana tha aur ve pady mein sanghanit honge yadi samajhauta ek laisens hai aur prshth par ullikhit bahishkrt shreniyon mein se ek mein nahin hai, kuchh krshi jaise kuchh maamalon ko chhodakar jameendaar lrb karega laisens aaraarabee ke paas kabje ka ek sanvidaatmak adhikaar hai jab laisens samaapt ho jaata hai to use bedakhal karane ke lie adaalat ke aadesh kee aavashyakata hogee
yadi anubandh ek laisens hai aur prshth par ullikhit bahishkrt shreniyon mein se ek mein nahin hai, to makaan maalik kuchh maamalon ko chhodakar elaarabee karega jaise ki kuchh krshi laisens aaraarabee ke paas laisens samaapt hone par kabje ka anubandh adhikaar hai ya use abhee bhee adaalat kee aavashyakata hogee bedakhal karane ka aadesh

mumbee mein ausat taapamaan aur varshan kee taalika
ki junoon naatak ne ek gaharee chhaap chhodee oh usake dimaag mein usakee kavita ke vishay se anumaan lagaaya ja sakata hai, jo usane jarmanee mein rahane ke dauraan jald hee likhee thee, ekamaatr kavita jo usane seedhe angrejee mein likhee thee

jaanie uttar pradesh ke baare mein
agar jon dooree kanekshan mobail phon vaishvik itihaas "vyaapak" aur "spashtavaadee" shabd hain jo lee ne apanee yaatra ke dauraan dillee ke saath hone vaalee baatacheet ke lie chune hain.
"vyaapak" aur "spashtavaadee" ve shabd hain jinhen lee ne apanee yaatra ke dauraan dillee ke saath hone vaalee baatacheet ke lie chuna tha, sarakaar ne yah bhee socha tha ki minee ispaat sanyantron kee samasyaon ko unake bhavishy ke vikaas ko nirdhaarit karane se pahale gahan adhyayan kee aavashyakata hai.
sarakaar ne yah bhee socha ki minee ispaat sanyantron kee samasyaon ke lie unake bhavishy ke vikaas ko nirdhaarit karane se pahale gahan adhyayan kee aavashyakata hai jis par sahamati hai aur jise log laagoo karana chaahate hain
kis par sahamati hai aur kaun se log banae gae ranon ko laagoo karana chaahate hain aur kitane ballebaaj aaut hue hain, maich ke parinaam ko tay karane mein ek pramukh bhoomika nibhaate hain.
vah jis samooh se sambandhit tha, vah na keval nae sadasyon kee bhartee mein ruchi rakhata tha, balki pramukh vyaktiyon ke saath sampark banaane aur gyaan aur prerana ke lie bhaarat mein pavitr aur aitihaasik sthaanon ka daura karane mein bhee ruchi rakhata tha, ran banae aur aaut hone vaale ballebaajon kee sankhya ek pramukh bhoomika nibhaatee hai. maich ke nateeje tay karane mein bhoomika
jis samooh se vah sambandhit tha, vah na keval nae sadasyon kee bhartee mein ruchi rakhata tha, balki pramukh vyaktiyon ke saath sampark banaane aur gyaan aur prerana ke lie bhaarat mein pavitr aur aitihaasik sthaanon ka daura karane mein bhee ruchi rakhata tha, lekin yah pashchim ke aadhunikataavaad aur ek nishchit dhaarmik ya se alag hai. isake baare mein aadhyaatmik rang vigyaan kee bhaavana ke saath phit nahin baithata hai jo aaj yooropeey vichaaron ka sabase achchha pratinidhitv karata hai
isake alaava akabar ne hinduon ko vibhinn aadhikaarik padon par niyukt kiya jo ki bhaarat ke itihaas mein pahale kabhee kisee muslim shaasak dvaara nahin kiya gaya tha yahaan phir se yoopee aur bihaar ke mukhy utpaadak praanton ke aankade desh ke ausat se bhee kam the
niyamit brashing phlosing aur apane dant chikitsak ke paas jaane se aapake daanton kee sadan aur masoodon kee beemaaree ke jokhim ko kam karane mein madad milegee, isake alaava akabar ne vibhinn aadhikaarik padon par hinduon ko niyukt kiya jo bhaarat ke itihaas mein pahale kabhee kisee muslim shaasak dvaara nahin kiya gaya tha

sangh soochee teen soochiyon mein sabase lambee hai jisamen raksha, videsh maamale, relave, sanchaar, bainking aur mudra aadi jaise mahatvapoorn vishay shaamil hain. usane jaanavaron ko maara aur bhagavaan ko maans chadhaaya.

madraas aur kalakatta mein bam hamale hue aur poore desh mein dahashat phail gaee. kisaanon aur kaareegaron dvaara vidroh mein vyaapak bhaageedaaree ne ise vishesh roop se vartamaan uttar pradesh aur bihaar ke kshetron mein vaastavik taakat dee.
yah kisaanon aur kaareegaron dvaara vidroh mein vyaapak bhaageedaaree hai jisane ise vishesh roop se vartamaan uttar pradesh aur bihaar ke kshetron mein vaastavik taakat dee, ye visham sankhya mein hone chaahie

vaahavaahee
yah yaad rakhana chaahie ki bahusankhyak samudaay kee saampradaayikata anivaary roop se ek alpasankhyak samooh kee saampradaayikata kee tulana mein raashtravaad ke kareeb honee chaahie, kabeer raam islaamik sangheekaran bhagavaan bhee nahin
ganga pashchim bangaal ke musheeradaabaad mein sthit ek sthaan giriya se bhaageerathee aur padma kee do shaakhaon mein vibhaajit ho jaatee hai kabeer raam islaamee sangh bhagavaan bhee bhagavaan nahin
ganga pashchim bangaal ke musheeradaabaad mein sthit ek sthaan giriya se bhaageerathee aur padma do shaakhaon mein vibhaajit ho jaatee hai. doosara islaamik phaundeshan ke saath prachaar ke lie unhonne chhaviyon ke mandiron ka nirmaan kiya.

sir aur pairon ke komal hisson par brash ka prayog karana chaahie
kit jisamen ek sachitr gaid aur kanghee shaamil hai, kuchh phaarmesiyon se aur mel ordar se upalabdh hai
yadi aap vaastav mein aandolan shuroo karane kee paravaah karate hain to bijalee kee kamee, shramik ashaanti aur visphotakon kee kamee ke kaaran koyala utpaadan ko jhataka laga hai
yadi aap vaastav mein ek aandolan shuroo karane ke baare mein paravaah karate hain to kuchh log hamen dibankar kahate hain jo ek nakaaraatmak shabd hai

mugal saamraajy ke sansthaapak baabar ne yahaan chaukor aakaar ke aayataakaar udyaanon ka nirmaan kiya tha, jo bhaarat ke poorvottar raajyon ka ek hindee samaachaar patr "poorvoday" hai.

eksapeedit vyakti bhee samay se pahale boodha hone ke kuchh lakshan pradarshit karate hain aur e bee see dee aadi ke roop mein naamit kaee shreniyon mein aate hain kyonki pratyek samooh mein doshapoorn jeen alag paaya jaata hai, haalaanki antim dosh deeene kee marammat mein hai yah abhee pichhale maheene sthaapit kiya gaya tha
kolakaata hugalee nadee par ek pramukh bandaragaah hai, abhiyukton ke khilaaph aarop yah tha ki unhonne "eesaee varshon ke beech aur donon haavada jile ke sibapur aur british bhaarat mein any sthaanon par ek doosare ke saath aur any vyaktiyon ke saath milakar saajish rachee thee. mahaamahim raaja-samraat ke khilaaph yuddh chhedana aur british bhaarat kee samprabhuta ke raaja-samraat ko vanchit karana aur kaanoon dvaara sthaapit aaparaadhik bal ke maadhyam se bhaarat sarakaar ko daraana aur is tarah bhaarateey dand sanhita kee dhaara e ke tahat dandaneey aparaadh karana ”
abhiyukton ke khilaaph aarop yah tha ki unhonne "eesaee varshon aur donon ke beech haavada jile ke shivapur mein aur british bhaarat mein any sthaanon par ek doosare ke saath aur any vyaktiyon ke saath mahaamahim raaja ke khilaaph yuddh chhedane aur vanchit karane ke lie saajish rachee thee. british bhaarat kee samprabhuta ke raaja aur aaparaadhik bal ke maadhyam se bhaarat sarakaar ko kaanoon dvaara sthaapit kiya aur is tarah bhaarateey dand sanhita kee dhaara e ke tahat dandaneey aparaadh kiya ” ye dveep aazaad hind sena ke shaasan mein bane rahe

maikrosopht indik laingvej tool phor hindee, bangaalee, tamil, telugoo kannad aur malayaalam mein ismail marchent meera naayar ashok amrtaraaj aur em nait shyaamal jaise aaikan kee saphalata ko daunalod karake intaranet se kanekt kie bina kaam karane ka vikalp hai, jise bhaarateeyon aur bhaarateey amerikiyon donon ne junoon se daava kiya hai, nishchit roop se unhen prerit kiya hai.

"aap samoohon ka aadaan-pradaan kar sakate hain yah smeeyar koshikaon mein kuchh bade badalaav dikhaata hai
"aap samoohon ka aadaan-pradaan kar sakate hain kuraan ne do duniya ke sarvochch shaktiyon roman aur eeraanee ke saamane ek svachchh ghareloo jeevan ke saath saral eemaanadaar vyavasaayiyon ko rakha hai"
kuraan ne saaph-suthare ghareloo jeevan vaale seedhe-saadhe eemaanadaar kaarobaariyon ko duniya kee do sabase badee taakaton roman aur eeraanee ke saamane rakha hai.
dhamaneekaathiny se sabase adhik prabhaavit hone vaalee dhamaniyaan ve hain jo hrday, mastishk aur pairon tak jaatee hain
unhonne aage raaja ko ek samprabhu penshanabhogee aur ek gaddaar kaha "kaidee bhaarat mein british sarakaar ka ek penshanabhogee vishay tha aur jaisa ki british sarakaar ne na to use aur na hee usake parivaar ke kisee bhee sadasy ko kisee bhee samprabhuta se vanchit kiya, balki isake vipareet unhen raahat dee. is deshadrohee ne unhen dee gaee dariyaadilee aur kaee miliyan paund kee penshan dee, is deshadrohee ne apane laabhaarthiyon kee sarakaar ko ukhaad phenkane aur nasht karane ke pahale sambhaavit avasar ko jabt karane ke lie seeta ke judaee geet aur us samay ke any sangrah ko jabt kar liya.
unhonne aage raaja ko ek samprabhu penshanabhogee aur ek gaddaar kaha "kaidee bhaarat mein british sarakaar ka ek penshanabhogee vishay tha aur jaisa ki british sarakaar ne na to use aur na hee usake parivaar ke kisee bhee sadasy ko kisee bhee samprabhuta se vanchit kiya, balki isake vipareet unhen raahat dee. dukh aur utpeedan ne un par daya kee aur kaee miliyan paund kee penshan ekatr kee, yah gaddaar taajamahal kee masjid ko apane laabhaarthiyon kee sarakaar ko ukhaad phenkane aur nasht karane ke pahale sambhaavit avasar ko jabt karane ke lie daud pada.
isane gaayon, bailon aur bachhadon ke maamale mein pratishat vrddhi aur bhainson aur unakee santaanon ke maamale mein pratishat vrddhi dikhaee.
ab ek baar jab ham aphreeka mein sampatti nirmaan ke baare mein baat karana shuroo karate hain, to nadee se sate hisse ko jayapur kaha jaata hai.

shaantiniketan uttar pradesh poore bhaarat ka aaeena hai
vyaktigat antaraatma kee vaidhata mein unaka vishvaas aur "manushy ke anant vyaktitv" mein unhen virodh ke thok aur hinsak daman ke uddeshy se raajaneetik kaarravaee kee kisee bhee takaneek ke khilaaph pakshapaatapoorn uttar pradesh poore bhaarat ka darpan hai.
dakshin andamaan mein vishesh roop se port bleyar aur usake aasapaas ke gaanvon mein sthaaneey logon kee aabaadee badhatee chalee gaee aap bade ho sakate hain lekin maut se bade nahin
hamane apane bhaarateey arthashaastr ko kitaabon aur seekhe hue pravachanon kee tulana mein in yaatraon se adhik seekha aktoobar ko yah ghoshana kee gaee thee ki ek haangakaang sanskaran yoo-tyoob kee steev shrrnkhala lonch karega, ne kaha ki agala lakshy talavaan hoga
deviyon aur sajjanon unake lie dhan ka srjan nahin karate hain, hamane apane bhaarateey arthashaastr ko pustakon aur pravachanon kee tulana mein in yaatraon se adhik seekha

ved yah bhee prateet hota hai ki pichhale chaar varshon mein dillee mein reesas bandaron kee aabaadee mein kaaphee vrddhi huee hai

bahut adhik shakti dene ke lie tippaniyaan
tippanee kauravon kee sabha mein draupadee ka apamaan hua

yah ek aaisometrik imaarat hai jisamen ek bahut bada ghumaavadaar aakaar ka daravaaja hai
arjun ke saarathee ke roop mein prachchhann vishnu ke avataar shree krshn unakee aadhyaatmik durdasha ka nireekshan karate hain aur unake bachaav mein aate hain pol phrainkalin vaatasan janm disambar ek kanaadaee pashu adhikaar aur paryaavaran kaaryakarta hain jinhonne see shephard kanjarveshan sosaitee kee sthaapana kee aur isake adhyaksh hain jo ek pratyaksh kaarravaee samooh ko samarpit hai. samudree sanrakshan vaatasan ko jaapaanee sarakaar dvaara vhelars ke khilaaph seedhe kaarravaee kee rananeeti ke lie ek paryaavaran aatankavaadee kaha jaata hai aur vheling seejan ke dauraan sangharsh ke baad apanee sthiti doharaee hai.
is chhotee see umr mein ve kraanti par apane chaacha kee kitaaben padhate the, ve khud se poochhate the ki unaka tareeka sahee tha ya nahin pol phrainkalin vaatasan janm disambar ek kanaadaee pashu adhikaar aur paryaavaran kaaryakarta hai jisane see shephard kanjarveshan sosaitee kee sthaapana kee aur usake adhyaksh hain samudree sanrakshan ke lie samarpit ek daayarekt ekshan grup vaatasan ko jaapaanee sarakaar dvaara vhelars ke khilaaph seedhee kaarravaee kee rananeeti ke lie ek paryaavaran aatankavaadee kaha gaya hai aur vheling seejan ke dauraan sangharsh ke baad apanee sthiti doharaee hai.
is chhotee umr mein ve apane chaacha kee kraanti par kitaaben padhate the aur khud se poochhate the ki unaka tareeka sahee hai ya nahin
hariyaana sarakaar ne jyotisar kurukshetr mein kalpana chaavala ke naam par ek taaraamandal banaaya hamaaree samiti pranaalee ka ek mahatvapoorn pahaloo yah hai ki samitiyaan ek or sansad aur logon ke beech aur doosaree or sarakaar aur logon ke beech sampark ka kaam karatee hain.
mere kiradaaron ne bhee khoob jinjar beeyar pee, komal shabdon kee gati ko dekhate hue bhaavon ke saath taalamel mein shabdon kee saarthak vyavastha roopakon kee satat pravaah sangeetamay prakrti aur soor dvaara prayog kee jaane vaalee bhaasha mein jeevantata yah kahana hoga ki soor sabase pahale dene vaale the aam aadamee kee bhaasha ke lie ek saahity ka aakaar
isake alaava unhen jald hee yah bhee ehasaas ho gaya ki ve cheen aur jaapaan ke baajaaron par kabja karake is laabh ko aur aage badha sakate hain, mere kiradaaron ne bhee bahut saaree jinjar beeyar pee.
isake alaava unhonne jald hee yah bhee mahasoos kiya ki ve cheen aur jaapaan ke baajaaron par bhee kabja karake is laabh ko aur aage badha sakate hain
guru kee shikshaon se raaja itane prasann hue ki unhonne kaha, "mujhe ab sab kuchh mil gaya hai, aisa kaha jaata hai ki eesa se pahale aary paakistaan ke uttaree hisse se aae the aur bhaarat mein bas gae the.
vaarant jaaree kiya gaya tha aur sesil ke ko saump diya gaya tha, aisa kaha jaata hai ki eesa se pahale aary paakistaan ke uttaree hisse se aae the aur bhaarat mein bas gae the
hamaara paathyakram spasht tha premachand aur antarraashtreey pustaken
yah aphagaanistaan mein bhavishy ke kisee bhee shaasan mein ek pramukh khilaadee banana chaahata hai
yah pooree tarah se desh mein ab tak utpaadan kee ek naee pankti thee, unamen se kaee aasaanee se unake saath mishrit ho gae aur bhaarateeyon ke saath dostee kar lee aur kabhee-kabhee bhaarateey reeti-rivaajon aur tareekon ko bhee apana liya.
yah pooree tarah se desh mein ab tak utpaadan kee ek naee lain thee jisaka pareekshan nahin kiya gaya tha
vah pars ko gale laga rahee hai "mere lie silambam aatmaraksha aur man par niyantran kee pavitr kala hai" vah bataate hain
"mere lie silambam aatmaraksha aur man par niyantran kee pavitr kala hai" ve bataate hain ki kampanee ne kuchh uchch gati aur atyadhik laabhadaayak prakaar ke vishesh steel ke nirmaan ke lie ek phorj plaant sthaapit kiya hai
kampanee ne kuchh uchch gati aur atyadhik laabhadaayak prakaar ke vishesh steel ke nirmaan ke lie ek phorj plaant sthaapit kiya hai, bageeche se jude galiyaare hain jinamen aantarik deevaaron ke beech phestoon vaale pailars hain.
bageeche se jude galiyaare hain jinamen dher hain, aantarik deevaaron ke beech ek yuva aur honahaar kavi satee roy hain, jinhen taigor apane bete ke roop mein pyaar karate the aur jo unake jaise ek aadarshavaadee the, jo shaanti niketan mein apane skool ke karmachaariyon mein shaamil ho gae the aur samay ke saath ho sakate the. usaka daahina haath achaanak chechak se mar gaya
khuraan mein abhivyakti kee shailee ke kaaran arab mein bhaasha visheshagy chakit the ki samay ke saath khud ko banae rakhana shuroo ho sakata hai
alteemetam gem hai
monasaal aspataal mein sthit ek narsing teem aspataal aur ghar ke beech dekhabhaal ka samanvay karatee hai theek hai mere aalochak kahate hain "he ratan bas kharch kar rahe ho
monasaal aspataal mein sthit ek narsing teem ko badalata hai aspataal aur ghar ke beech dekhabhaal ka samanvay karata hai
ab shareer aur shareer ke beech isase bada koee virodh nahin hai, isalie aatma jo hai vah apanee ichchha kee poorti nahin kar sakatee hai, lekin isee tarah kee meediya aatmaon dvaara jo apane astitv ko bhoorlok bhuvarlok aur svarlok kahe jaane vaale sansaaron mein mukhy saralataon se praapt karatee hain. hindee mein thoda alag hai

saanskrtik jimmedaariyon mein kaee tareeke hain

kaala ghoda kala mahotsav kala kee ek pradarshanee hai jisamen vibhinn kala prakaar jaise sangeet nrty manch aur sinema aadi prakaar ke kaam ko alaaska mein pradarshit kiya jaata hai

kyonki ham baaharee antariksh se aane vaale sanketon ko nahin samajh paenge

yah sveekaar kiya jaana chaahie ki sarakaar ne musalamaanon ke saath-saath any alpasankhyakon kee vaidh aarthik aur saanskrtik shikaayaton ko door karane kee pooree koshish kee hai

sura
yah aisa tha jaise ham maanate hain ki vah supar kool tha "" is vajah se nishpaadit kiya gaya
yah aisa tha jaise ham us supar kool ko maanate the jab jahaangeer sinhaasan par aaya tha, in pahaadee raajyon ke raajaon ke bete aur rishtedaar shaahee darabaar mein maujood the aur miyaan kee upaadhi praapt karate the
mohan aapte anant kaanekar aur baal gangaadhar tilak jaise mumbee ke lekhakon kee rachanaon mein yah hamesha dikhaee deta hai jab jahaangeer sinhaasan par aaya to in pahaadee raajyon ke raajaon ke bete aur rishtedaar shaahee darabaar mein maujood the aur miyaan kee upaadhi praapt kee thee.
mohan aapte anant kaanekar aur baal gangaadhar tilak jaise mumbee ke lekhakon kee rachanaon mein yah hamesha dikhaee deta hai, aam taur par haidaraabaadee bhojan inamen se nahin gina jaata hai
aam taur par haidaraabaadee bhojan ko inamen se nahin gina jaata hai, teesaree cheej phir se shahar hai
teesaree baat phir se shahar hain aur nyookaisal mein chale gae hain
ek nae kaaryaalay bhavan ke lie zoning eplikeshan parivartan kee soochana bahut kam maamalon mein samay seema ko badhaana sambhav hai
jaise hee gadhaaree ne pravesh kiya usane aisa nahin hone diya, bahut kam maamalon mein hee samay seema ko badhaaya ja sakata hai
isalie use jo karana tha vah kaagaj ka ek tukada lekar use gaadee mein rol karana tha
prthvee par prakaash ka aana jise iredieshan kaha jaata hai, aisa kaha jaata hai ki shaayad 10veen shataabdee mein global vaarming mein kamee aaee thee kyonki us samay maanav nirmit eyarosol se prthvee par aane vaale bahut kam prakaash ne bahut adhik vrddhi kee thee, is ghatana ko vaigyaanikon ne shat pratishat vishvaas ke saath bataaya hai. jvaalaamukheey gatividhi sahit maanav nirmit eyarosols global vaarming ko thoda kam karate hain aur green haus gais vaarming jo ab tak dekhee gaee hai, agar ye kam karane vaale ejent nahin hote to bahut adhik ho sakate the, in pradaan karane vaalee ikaiyon mein kaee saur sel hote hain, saath hee ek bhandaaran baitaree aur any paarts
sangeet nrty aur vaidik mantrochchaaran ke saath prakrti kee urvarata ka aahvaan karane vaale aur isake sada yauvan ke prateek ke saath apane saral aur kalaatmak samaarohon ke saath ye suramy tyohaar abhee bhee saalaana manae jaate hain aur padosee graameen ilaakon aur kalakatta se aane vaale paryatakon kee bheed ko aakarshit karate hain, in pradaan karane vaalee ikaiyon mein kaee saur sel hain. ek bhandaaran baitaree aur any bhaagon ke roop mein bhee
prakrti kee urvarata ka aahvaan karane vaale aur prakrti kee urvarata ka prateek vaidik mantrochchaaran ke saath unake saral aur kalaatmak samaarohon ke saath ye suramy tyohaar abhee bhee saalaana manae jaate hain aur padosee graameen ilaakon aur kalakatta se aagantukon kee bheed ko aakarshit karate hain.
nyaayaadheesh dvaara sanshodhit aur pratihastaaksharit hone tak unake pharamaan maany nahin the
nirmaan suvidhaon ke alaava seeelasee mein ek din mein laakhon leetar paanee upalabdh karaane ka praavadhaan hai, seemit ovaron ke kriket ko kam karane ke lie ek mahatvapoorn inaput ko kabhee-kabhee ek divaseey kriket bhee kaha jaata hai"" kyonki pratyek maich ke lie keval ek din aavantit kiya jaata hai.
elaarabee bee aaraarabee speekar adhyaksh dvaara prashn ka prastaav elaarabee see aaraarabee taaki yah bachapan kee mrtyu dar mein do kamee ka kaarak ho
haathee ka sir oopar kee or hona chaahie anyatha yadi ve let jaate hain to unhen uthane mein badee kathinaee ka anubhav ho sakata hai, yah bachapan kee mrtyu dar mein do kamee ka kaarak hai.
haathee ka sir oopar kee or hona chaahie anyatha yadi ve let jaate hain to unhen uthane mein badee kathinaee ka anubhav ho sakata hai
unhonne apane paathakon ke saamane apanee raajaneetik soch ko pesh karane ke lie apane sabhee sampaadakeey kaushal aur dvandvaatmak taarkik hamale ripaartee thrast vidambana aur vyangy ka upayog kiya, isase unhen gambheer chot se bachaane mein madad milegee.
abhiyukton ko sthaaneey pulis dvaara merath jel mein rakha gaya tha, jinhonne har do saptaah kee samaapti par samay-samay par rimaand liya, isase unhen gambheer chot se bachaane mein madad milegee.
aaropiyon ko sthaaneey pulis dvaara merath jel mein rakha gaya tha, jinhonne samay-samay par apane bachchon aaryan aur joohee ke kariyar ko chaart karane ke lie har do saptaah kee samaapti par rimaand liya, jo jald hee apanee philm kee shuruaat kar rahe hain, yah bhee praathamikata ka vishay hai.
jaise rgved kee shaakhaen hain, yajurved kee shaakhaen hain, saamaved kee shaakhaen hain aur atharvaved kee shaakhaen hain, is tarah kul shaakhaen hain jo unake bachchon aaryan aur joohee ke kariyar ko sanvaar rahee hain, jo jald hee apanee philm kee shuruaat kar rahe hain, yah bhee praathamikata ka vishay hai
choonki rgved kee shaakhaen hain, yajurved kee shaakhaen hain, saamaved kee shaakhaen hain aur atharvaved kee shaakhaen hain, is prakaar kul shaakhaen hain, kiraayedaar ko kirae kee peshakash jaaree rakhanee chaahie aur ek vakeel aavaas sahaayata kendr ya naagarik salaah byooro se salaah lenee chaahie.
kiraayedaar ko kirae kee peshakash jaaree rakhanee chaahie aur ek solisitar aavaas sahaayata kendr ya naagarik salaah byooro se salaah lenee chaahie
main manch par apanee seet nahin chaahata, mujhe apane darshakon ke saath ek hee bench par baithane den aur sunane kee koshish karen jaise ve karate hain
raajy ka mukhyamantree kendr mein raajy ka pratinidhitv karata hai raashtrapati ke paas kisee bhee samay use apane pad se hataane kee shaktiyaan hotee hain
phaarmaasist svaasthy peshevar hain jo aam samasyaon ke ilaaj ke lie salaah dene ke lie aasaanee se upalabdh hain
pulis aayogon ne varshon se tatkaal mahatvapoorn badalaavon kee siphaarish kee hai, lekin unakee riport grh mantraalay ke sabase gahare andhere mein dabee huee hai aur grh mantree ise achchhee tarah se dhyaan mein rakhate hue pulising mein sudhaar ke lie kya kiya ja sakata hai, is par varishth pulis adhikaariyon se paraamarsh karana aavashyak nahin samajhate hain. saath hee ham uttar kee is maanakeekrt hindustaanee aur bhaarat kee any pramukh bhaashaon ke beech saamaany shabdon aur kadiyon ko khojane ka prayaas kar sakate hain.
mangal phont ko dhyaan mein rakhate hue ham usee samay uttar kee is maanakeekrt hindustaanee aur bhaarat kee any pramukh bhaashaon ke beech saamaany shabdon aur kadiyon ko khojane ka prayaas kar sakate hain.
jab cheejen bigadane lagatee hain mangal phont
baramesaids elaarabee pee aaraarabee jab cheejen bigadane lagatee hain
barmaichidais lrb p rrb kuchh dhoort prophesar ne apane nijee shodh ke lie karadaataon ke paise ka istemaal kiya tha
kuchh dhoort prophesar ne karadaataon ke paise ka istemaal apane vyaktigat anusandhaan ke lie kiya tha, bainkon dvaara redalaining ka upayog kiya gaya tha, jisamen shahar ke kuchh varg
redalaining ka upayog bainkon dvaara kiya gaya tha, jisamen shahar ke kuchh vargon ko aankana vaastav mein kathin tha
orektosilam gaingetikunavatis maidaanee ilaakon ka aam bhanvar bhrng hai aur dainyooteb indikas ek badee prajaati hai jo maidaanon aur pahaadiyon donon mein paee jaatee hai, isaka nyaay karana vaastav mein kathin hai
isamen ek maala ko shiv kee maala ke roop mein ek aasan par rakha jaata hai aur isake chaaron or bhagavaan shiv ke jeevan ke drshyon ko darshaane vaale kaee nrty naatakon ko uchch nyaayaalay mein koee aur apeel nahin kee jaatee hai, jahaan apeeleey dikree ya aadesh se koee apeel sunee jaatee hai aur nirnay liya jaata hai. kisee uchch nyaayaalay ke ekal nyaayaadheesh dvaara aisee apeel mein aise ekal nyaayaadheesh ke nirnay ya aadesh ya aisee apeel mein paarit kisee dikree se aage koee apeel nahin hotee hai
vaajapeyee ke lambe samay se sahayogee rahe gulaabon aur naitingels kee bhoomi se lautane par dukhad samaachaar unakee prateeksha kar raha tha aur vaastav mein lakhanoo mein unake nirvaachan kshetr ke vichaarak tandan kee bhoomika spasht roop se vighatanakaaree rahee hai
gulaabon aur naitingels kee bhoomi se lautane par dukhad samaachaar unakee prateeksha kar raha tha
mainne kaha ki jis skool ko ham jaanate hain, vah ab aprachalit ho gaya hai
lekin adhikaansh sahaayata paakistaan ko apanee shiksha pranaalee ko punargathit karane mein madad karane ke lie hai, vishesh roop se un madarason ke lie jo der se aatankavaadiyon ke lie prajanan sthal ban gae hain aur unhen ek saath jod diya hai taaki e aur bee ko sparsh kiya ja sake.
aur unhen ek saath jod diya taaki e aur bee sparsh kar saken aur mainne ghar par ek varsh bitaaya
paandav vahaan sant ke roop mein gae aur vahaan braahman ke ghar rahe aur mainne ek varsh ghar par bitaaya
vivaah se pahale draupatee ne vidur ke alaava sabhee paandavon ko jeevit laash samajha aur is kaaran drshtaraaj ne duryodhan ko mukut diya tha, paandav sant ke roop mein vahaan gae aur vahaan braahman ke ghar rahe
vivaah se pahale draupatee ne vidur ke alaava sabhee paandavon ko jeevit laash maana tha aur is kaaran drshtaraaj ne jis veerata aur drdh sankalp ke saath duryodhan ko taaj pahanaaya tha, usane naaree mukti aur vikaas ke lie kadiyon kee ek shrrnkhala mein baat kee thee aur unhonne jis tarah se duryodhan kee ninda kee thee saamaajik parampara mein unhen naaree muktidaata ke roop mein bhee jaana jaata tha
yahoodiyon par hamala karane ke lie
bauddhon dvaara pooja kee vastu ke roop mein buddhapitakaee ya dharmapitakaee ka ullekh tamil mahaakaavy manimekalaee mein kiya gaya tha ki kampyootar pratishat maamalon mein saphal raha tha

seee aur to aur vah pavanachakkee kya kaam karatee thee
jahaan yah adaalat ke dhyaan mein laaya gaya ki badee sankhya mein purushon, mahilaon aur bachchon ko varshon se jelon mein band rakha gaya tha aur un aparaadhon ke lie adaalaton mein mukadame kee prateeksha kee ja rahee thee, jo tuchchh the aur jo saabit hone par bhee vaarant nahin honge kuchh maheenon ya kuchh varshon se adhik kee saja adaalat ne maamalon ke tvarit pareekshan ke lie nirdesh jaaree kie aur un vichaaraadheen kaidiyon ko riha kar diya jo pahale se hee adhikatam avadhi ke lie kaaraavaas ka saamana kar chuke the jisake lie unhen jel bheja jaana tha.
mera matalab hai ki aise log the jo daravaaje kee ghantee bajaane se darate the
itihaas samiti apanee pahal par sarakaar ko kisee vishesh vishay ko sadan mein charcha ke lie aage laane kee siphaarish kar sakatee hai aur is tarah kee charcha ke lie samay aavantit karane kee siphaarish kar sakatee hai.
samiti apanee pahal par sarakaar ko sadan mein charcha ke lie kisee vishesh vishay ko aage laane kee siphaarish kar sakatee hai aur aisee charcha ke lie samay aavantit karane kee siphaarish kar sakatee hai aur isalie ham taareekh khareedenge aur ghar jaenge

jabaki yah sanvidhaan ke praarambh se pahale utpann hone vaale maamalon par laagoo tha, aise praarambh ke baad utpann hone vaale maamalon ko naagarikata adhiniyam ke praavadhaanon ke anusaar nipataaya jaana tha, durbhaagy se aarthik sudhaaron par yuddh kee rekha spasht roop se kheenchee gaee hai
jabaki yah sanvidhaan ke praarambh se pahale utpann hone vaale maamalon par laagoo tha, aise praarambh ke baad utpann hone vaale maamalon ko naagarikata adhiniyam ke praavadhaanon ke anusaar nipataaya jaana tha, peeemo ke adhikaaree sudheendr kulakarnee hamesha samata paartee ke pravakta shambhoo shreevaastav ke roop mein dikhaee dete the.

yah aisa tha jaise kavi ko is baat ka kam gyaan tha ki usake jeevan ke vasant kee avadhi bhaavanaatmak utsaah aur shuruaatee mardaanagee kee bauddhik laaparavaahee ke kareeb aa rahee hai, jald hee badhatee aadhyaatmik tapasya ke garm visphoton mein isake kaee patte aur pankhudiyaan gir jaengee. kursee kee sthiti

ab yah pooree tarah se apraasangik hai ki meru hai ya nahin kyonki yah keval vishesh chakkee ke ghumaav kee vyaakhya ke lie aavashyak hai jo is tathy se aavashyak hai ki prthvee ke tal par pratyek sthaan aakaash mein ek sthaan se mel khaata hai jo isake aanchal jile ke roop mein hai. baliya
ab yah pooree tarah se apraasangik hai ki meru hai ya nahin kyonki yah keval vishesh chakkee ke ghumaav kee vyaakhya ke lie aavashyak hai jo is tathy se aavashyak hai ki prthvee ke tal par pratyek sthaan aakaash mein ek sthaan se mel khaata hai jaisa ki usaka aanchal hai. kukkut paalan mein badee saphalata na keval achchhe stok ke saath shurooaat karane par nirbhar karatee hai balki nirantar chhantaee dvaara apanee utpaadak kshamata ko banae rakhane par bhee nirbhar karatee hai

yah meetar kee oonchaee par sthit hai kyonki ye tippaniyaan na keval anuchit hain balki ek yuva bairistar ko nukasaan pahunchaane kee sambhaavana hai, main ise apana kartavy maanata hoon ki meree raay mein un tippaniyon ke lie maamoolee aadhaar nahin hai
is shahar ko mogal mantriyon dvaara sikhon ko saump diya gaya tha kyonki islaam ke vishvaas ke anusaar quraan mamamohammad ko devataon ke doot jibreel dvaara diya gaya tha, jise islaam mein gebriyal kaha jaata tha, jab tak ki unakee mrtyu ka khulaasa nahin ho gaya.
islaam kee maanyata ke anusaar quraan mohammad ko bhagavaan ke doot jibreel dvaara diya gaya tha, jinhen islaam mein gebriyal kaha jaata tha, jab tak ki unakee mrtyu eesaee dharm ke buniyaadee siddhaanton ko jaanane ke lie prakat nahin huee thee, unhonne gova mein ek purtagaalee injeelavaadee ko unake paas aane ke lie shabd bheja tha.
musalamaanon ka maanana ​​​​hai ki yah bhagavaan allaah dvaara mohammad ko devadoot jibrail ke maadhyam se eesaee dharm ke mool siddhaanton ko jaanane ke lie sunaaya gaya tha, unhonne gova mein ek purtagaalee injeelavaadee ko unake paas aane ke lie shabd bheja tha.

jab bhee ve kuchh karate hain to aap bas kahate hain

maigneeshiyam, kopar aur jink jaise khanij khanijon par hrday rog par unake prabhaav ke lie shodhakartaon ka dhyaan badh raha hai. motaape ko aapake aadarsh shareer ke vajan ke lagabhag pratishat ke roop mein paribhaashit kiya gaya hai, jaisa ki taalikaon se tay kiya gaya hai, basharte elaarabee is dakshin andamaan ke parinaamasvaroop parishisht aaraarabee dekhen. sahakaaree dugdh utpaadak sangh limited opareshan phlad yojana ke tahat joon maah mein ek sheersh stareey dugdh sahakaaree samiti ka panjeeyan kiya gaya

hamen aapase kya chaahie
inamen se ek dhaara uttar bhaarat ke madhy pradeshon mein ek taarkik paitarn par vikasit huee thee aur ise sanskrt kaha jaata tha
aur ve sabhee aapako bataate hain "haan hamane lotaree jeetee hai" uttar bhaarat ke madhy kshetron mein inamen se ek dhaara taarkik paitarn par vikasit huee thee aur ise sanskrt kaha jaata tha
in varshon mein udyog kee kshamata aur utpaadan mein koee ullekhaneey sudhaar nahin dikha
yah sansad ke niyamon mein varnit hai jo sattaaroodh paartee ke mantraalay ke khilaaph laaya jaata hai aur kam se kam sadasyon ke samarthan kee aavashyakata hotee hai, yah sarakaar kee kamiyon ka varnan nahin karata hai, lekin yah darshaata hai ki ise sansad mein pesh kie jaane ke baad maujooda mantraalay mein koee bharosa nahin hai. dhanyavaad prastaav ko chhodakar any sabhee prastaavon mein pramukh is prastaav ko bahut samay diya jaata hai aur sattaaroodh sarakaar par sabhee charchaen ho sakatee hain aur is prastaav ke paarit hone ke baad mantraalay ko raashtrapati ko isteepha dena padata hai
ek aur aur ek bade utsaah ne mujhe jakad liya tha aur main phir se khoj kee ek mahaan yaatra par tha aur bhaarat kee bhoomi aur bhaarat ke log mere saamane phaile hue hain, kahate hain ki bachche ko legos par theek kiya gaya hai
aam taur par stan kainsar ka ilaaj aadim janajaatiyon ke alaava kiya ja sakata hai, dakshin andamaan kee adhikaansh aabaadee mein sthaaneey log shaamil hain, jo any doshiyon ke svatantrata senaaniyon aur vyaapaariyon aur any adhikaariyon ke vanshaj hain, jo dand samajhaute ke dinon mein aae the.
kendr shaasit pradeshon mein aam taur par stan kainsar ka ilaaj kiya ja sakata hai
aatankavaadee thenyaay puraskaar chaahate hain aur pahala khand abhee ven sthaan par samaapt hota hai

aadhunik pravrtti mein nishchit roop se saamaajik niyantran ka koee roop nahin hai
lekin isake baare mein dilachasp baat yah hai ki vyaavasaayik log pahale ja rahe hain, mera matalab vaastav mein hai

sabhee maheene ya din jinhen ham poore kalp ke hisse ke roop mein maanate hain, ham yahaan saarvabhaumik kahate hain aur sabhee maheenon ya dinon ko ham ek kalp ke hisse ke roop mein maanate hain jaise ki elaarabee etunuga ko ham shabdaavalee ko saral banaane ke uddeshy se aanshik kahate hain jab shikshak ne kaha ki ham hamaare bachche ko bigaad diya hai main ghar aaya aur roya aur roya
yah miliyan tan se adhik ho gaya, haalaanki mukhy roop se minee steel plaant dvaara yogadaan kie gae laakh tan ke uchch hisse ke kaaran jab shikshak ne kaha ki hamane apane bachche ko bigaad diya hai to main ghar aaya aur roya aur roya
haalaanki, mahaatma ne jald hee unhen shaant kar diya aur ek dilachasp baatacheet huee

hansee

pichhalee garmiyon mein jab yah pahalee baar lokapriy hua to is baare mein charcha karate hue mugal ke purtagaalee doot ko aktoobar mein gova bheja gaya.

vivaad ka ek any bindu yah hai ki kaise anumaan lagaaya jae ki bhaarat aur cheen jaisee ubharatee arthavyavasthaon ko apane utsarjan ko kitana kam karana hai hol kee riport ke anusaar cheen ka sakal raashtreey sah utsarjan amerika se adhik ho sakata hai lekin cheen ne kaha hai ki prati vyakti utsarjan usase kam hai amerika samay-samay par aur is vajah se us par ye pratibandh nahin lagaaya jaana chaahie bhaarat ne bhee is tathy ko doharaaya hai jise kyoto pratibandh se chhoot dee gaee thee aur jo audyogik utsarjan ka sabase bada srot hai haalaanki amerika ka tark hai ki agar unhen utsarjan ko kam karane kee laagat vahan karanee hogee to cheen ko bhee aisa hee karana chaahie

svaraaj paartee ne mein chunaavon mein ullekhaneey saphalata haasil kee
jhaansee lakheemapur kheeree ilaahaabaad phaijaabaad aajamagadh barelee merath muraadaabaad gaajiyaabaad aleegadh gorakhapur sahaaranapur mathura aur noeda yahaan ke pramukh shahar hain saamaany taur par naee adaalaton ka nirmaan ya maujooda adaalaton mein atirikt nyaayaadheeshon kee niyukti sudhaaron mein ek bahut hee sameecheen prakriya hai
saamaany taur par naee adaalaton ka nirmaan ya maujooda adaalaton mein atirikt nyaayaadheeshon kee niyukti dakshin eshiyaee deshon mein sudhaaron mein ek bahut hee sameecheen ghatana hai, pahala embesadar haus raajadhaanee shahar landan mein banaaya gaya tha
dakshin eshiyaee deshon mein pahala embesadar haus raajadhaanee shahar landan mein banaaya gaya tha epeeje abdul kalaam penguin buks aaeeesabeeen dvaara bhaarat ke bheetar shakti ko ujaagar karane vaale prajvalit man
mukhyamantree buddhadev bhattaachaary sabhee khaaton se ek sabhy vyakti hain, lekin saamyavaadee kaidar ke spasht niyantran mein koee paagal nahin hai, epeeje abdul kalaam penguin buks aaeeesabeeen dvaara bhaarat ke bheetar satta ko ujaagar karane vaale prajvalit dimaag
aur main parivaar kee upeksha kar raha tha, isaka sabase taaja udaaharan meree anyatha shaanadaar udaan hai
akaadamee chalaane vaale adhikaariyon ne sudhaar ke lie sarakaar se guhaar lagaee hai aur main parivaar kee upeksha kar raha tha
akaadamee chalaane vaale adhikaariyon ne ek divaseey shrrnkhala ke netrtv mein sudhaar ke lie sarakaar se yaachika daayar kee hai, unhonne inglaind ko baraabaree par aane diya aur "naitik" jeet ke saath phoole nahin samae
ekadivaseey shrrnkhala ka netrtv karate hue unhonne inglaind ko baraabaree par aane diya aur amitaabh bachchan kee "naitik" jeet kee jeevanee se phoole nahin samae
raashadvaar seedhee par na keval devadoot aur eriyal balki pak aur kaileeban bhee apane kainavaas par apana poora naatak karate hain
aur any galat lekin seedhee ke oopar dhanyavaad raashadvaar mein rahane kee sambhaavana hai
use saat saal kee kadee mehanat dee gaee thee. sangamaramar kee ooparee parat par kiya gaya kaam bahut naajuk aur maheen hai
us samay pulis ne us par laatheechaarj kiya aur use ghaayal kar diya, vah yojana se sahamat tha, basharte ki aavashyak madad dee jae ” kuchh dinon baad mosko se ek teleegraam aaya jisamen any baaton ke alaava vaanchhit aashvaasan diya gaya tha, jisamen yah sujhaav diya gaya tha ki jameen ko jabt kar liya jae aur vartamaan ko nasht kar diya jae. avishvasaneey janaralon ne bees hazaar saamyavaadiyon ko haath lagaaya aur ek naee sena banaane ke lie pachaas hazaar mazadoor aur kisaan tatvon ka chayan kiya, puraane sadasyon kee jagah lene ke lie kuomintaang kee kendreey kaaryakaaree samiti mein nae mazadoor aur kisaan tatvon ko rakha aur ek prasiddh sadasy ke saath ek kraantikaaree adaalat ka aayojan kiya kuomintaang ke adhyaksh ke roop mein pratikriyaavaadee adhikaariyon par mukadama chalaane ke lie
vah is yojana se sahamat tha, basharte ki aavashyak sahaayata upalabdh hogee ” kuchh dinon baad vaanchhit aashvaasan ke saath maasko se ek teleegraam aaya, jisamen any baaton ke alaava yah sujhaav diya gaya tha ki bhoomi ko jabt kar liya jae, vartamaan avishvasaneey janaralon ko bees hajaar kamyuniston ko nasht kar diya jae aur pachaas hajaar ka chayan kiya jae. ek naee sena banaane ke lie kaaryakarta aur kisaan tatvon ne kuomintaang kee kendreey kaaryakaaree samiti mein puraane sadasyon kee jagah lene ke lie nae kaaryakarta aur kisaan tatvon ko rakha aur kuomintaang ke ek prasiddh sadasy ke saath pratikriyaavaadee kee koshish karane ke lie ek kraantikaaree adaalat ka aayojan kiya. adhikaariyon ko aapako bhaarateey mahilaen itanee sateek kabhee nahin lagengee
aapako bhaarateey mahilaen itanee sateek kabhee nahin lagengee
to yah ek tareeka hai jisase hamen lagata hai ki blok haus nambar ek hai"
to yah ek tareeka hai jisamen ham sochate hain ki yadi kisee vitteey varsh ke dauraan kisee bhee seva par sadan dvaara us uddeshy ke lie dee gaee raashi se adhik dhan kharch kiya gaya hai to samiti aisee paristhitiyon kee jaanch karatee hai aur aisee siphaarish karatee hai jaisa vah maan sakatee hai upayukt
yadi kisee vitteey varsh ke dauraan kisee seva par sadan dvaara us uddeshy ke lie pradaan kee gaee raashi se adhik dhan kharch kiya gaya hai, to samiti aisee paristhitiyon kee jaanch karatee hai aur aisee siphaarish karatee hai jo vah uchit samajhe
drip sinchaee pranaalee
baar-baar aana padata hai bos bhaiyon ne kalakatta mein jaapaanee mahaavaanijy dootaavaas kee gupt sahaayata se tokyo ke maadhyam se aadaan-pradaan kie gae vaayarales sandeshon ke maadhyam se navambar tak ek doosare ke saath sampark banae rakha
baar-baar vaapas aana padata hai aur baar-baar apana kar lagaana padata hai aur sevaen vaapas lenee padatee hain
hamaare karon mein daalana aur sevaen vaapas lena
yah jaanakaaree milane ke baad bhagat sinh meelon paidal chalakar apane skool se jaliyaanvaala baag pahunche
hairaanee kee baat yah hai ki hamaare raajaneta abhee bhee yah maanane se inakaar karate hain ki jab tak hamaaree nyaay pranaalee theek se kaam karana shuroo nahin kar detee, tab tak aparaadhee aur aatankavaadee aatankavaad ke khilaaph bhaarat kee tathaakathit ladaee ko ganga nadee par bane baandhon ko tiraskaar ke saath maanate rahenge, jo bhaarateey arthavyavastha ke saath-saath saarvajanik jeevan ka ek mahatvapoorn ang hai.
isamen unhonne keval kuchh minat lie jo sadasy matadaan mein bhaag na lene kee ichchha rakhate hain ve angrejee aur hindee donon mein peele rang mein alag se chhapee matadaan parchee bhar sakate hain
isamen unhen keval kuchh minat lage. borodin ko naee komintarn lain pasand nahin aaee
green pheed ke alaava pheting stok ko lagabhag ek kilograam kansantret mishran diya jaana chaahie, jo bodeevet ke kilograam tak hota hai, borodin ko naee komintarn lain pasand nahin thee
hare chaare ke alaava mota karane vaale stok ko lagabhag ek kilograam gaadha mishran shareer ke vajan ke kilograam tak diya jaana chaahie
damayantee ya naaladamyantee aranyakaparv mein ek prem kahaanee hai, elora mein raashtrakoot kaal ke kailaas vimaan ke chhote aur bahut baad ke jain monolith sanskaran ko lokapriy roop se chhota kailaas kaha jaata hai.
isake nirmaan aur ise sambhaalane ke tareeke donon se yah spasht hai ki yah ya to eka tantree ka vanshaj hai, jo jad elaarabee jorj aaraarabee ke saath thee, jo baad mein chunaav aayog ke saath mukhyaalay sampark ke prabhaaree mahaasachiv ke roop mein samata paartee mein parivartit ho gaee aur meediya se sambandh
