sansad bhavanon mein sansad bhavan sansad bhavan eneksee svaagat kaaryaalay aur aagaamee sansad pustakaalay parisar aaibro maharalok shaamil hain
sansad bhavanon mein sansad bhavan sansad bhavan eneksee svaagat kaaryaalay aur aagaamee sansad pustakaalay parisar shaamil hai yadi aapako lagata hai ki jo aapako lagata hai ki ek avaidh dava hai, to aapaka kaanoonee kartavy hai ki ya to ise pulis ko saump den ya ise kisee any vyakti ko rokane ke lie nasht kar den. dava ke saath aparaadh
yadi aap paate hain ki aapake vichaar se avaidh dava hai to aapaka kaanoonee kartavy hai ki ya to ise pulis ko saump den ya kisee any vyakti ko dava ke saath aparaadh karane se rokane ke lie ise nasht kar den
sagaranapur kasba
isake atirikt yah rikord kee maang kar sakata hai aur kisee bhee upabhokta vivaad mein uchit aadesh paarit kar sakata hai jo usake samaksh lambit hai ya raajy ke bheetar kisee jila phoram dvaara tay kiya gaya hai aur jahaan raajy aayog ko yah prateet hota hai ki jila phoram ne adhikaar kshetr ka prayog kiya hai jo isamen nihit nahin hai. kaanoon dvaara ya is prakaar nihit kshetraadhikaar ka prayog karane mein viphal raha hai ya avaidh roop se ya jahaan ham hain, ke alaava any deshon mein sthit saamagree aniyamitata ke saath apane adhikaar kshetr ka prayog karane mein viphal raha hai
yahaan yah spasht karana uchit hoga ki us kaal mein arabon ko bhaasha ke apane gyaan par itana garv tha ki ve shesh vishv ko avyakt bhee kahate the, isake atirikt vah kisee bhee upabhokta vivaad mein abhilekhon kee maang kar sakata tha aur uchit aadesh paarit kar sakata tha jo usake samaksh lambit ho ya ho chuka ho. raajy ke bheetar kisee bhee jila phoram dvaara nirnay liya gaya hai aur jahaan raajy aayog ko yah prateet hota hai ki jila phoram ne adhikaar kshetr ka prayog kaanoon dvaara nihit nahin kiya hai ya is prakaar nihit kshetraadhikaar ka prayog karane mein viphal raha hai ya avaidh roop se ya bhautik aniyamitata ke saath apane adhikaar kshetr ka prayog kiya hai
suropee aayog paryaavaran vaayu gunavatta
main sarjaree ka adhyayan nahin karana chaahata tha, mujhase yah na poochhen ki aap aisa kyon soch sakate hain ki ye maastar digree vaale log hain
aap soch sakate hain ki ye maastar digree vaale log hain
"nyaayaadheeshon ko yah samajh mein nahin aa raha hai ki aapake pepar mein nekaneeyatee se itana ghinauna apamaan kaise daala ja sakata hai aur unhen yah vishvaas karane mein badee kathinaee hotee hai ki aapakee shiksha ka ek sajjan aur ek akhabaar ka sampaadak kaanoon se pooree tarah anabhigy ho sakata hai. parivaad ke roop mein maana jaata hai ki aap ek uchch nyaayaalay ke nyaayaadheesh ke aacharan aur charitr par in hamalon ko prakaashit karane ke lie svatantr the, kyonki aapane unhen ek any deshee samaachaar patr mein kam vishaile roop mein paaya tha.
gardan chhotee hone ke kaaran manushy mein peechhe kee vastuon ko dekhane ke lie sir ko paryaapt roop se tirachha chalane kee anumati nahin deta hai, ghraan tantrika tantuon kee sankhya jo gandh kee bhaavana kee seva karatee hai, nabbe varsh kee aayu mein janm ke samay maujood sankhya ka lagabhag pratishat kam ho jaatee hai.
aur aapako agale patr kee bhavishyavaanee karane ke lie kahen, aapako kya lagata hai ki tolemee pahala prasiddh vyakti hoga jisane ise aagara ke roop mein sandarbhit kiya
aur aapako agale patr kee bhavishyavaanee karane ke lie kahenge ki aapako kya lagata hai ki tchh tchh bahut bura bahut bura hoga
saamaany dikhaavat mein lekin shukanaasiyon kee visheshata ke kaaran ve poorvee chaalukyon ke bikkaavolu mandiron se milate julate hain tchh tchh bahut bura bahut bura
saamaany dikhaavat mein lekin vishisht shukanaasikaon ke lie ve poorvee chaalukyon ke bikkaavolu mandiron se milate julate hain
eemel aavedanon ke lie krpaya sunishchit karen ki inhen alag se daak dvaara bheja gaya hai taaki ve aavedan patr praapt hone ke paanch kaary divason ke bheetar pahunch jaen
eemel ek jaanaleva beemaaree hai jisamen kainsar koshikaen asthi majja mein phailana shuroo kar detee hain aur phir raktapravaah mein phail jaatee hain
us anubhav ka ek hissa yah sadan tay karata hai ki dhan vidheyak paarit kiya jae ya nahin
yah sadan hamaare angrejee aur dach udaaharan kee tarah manee bil paas karane ya na karane ka phaisala karata hai
aaj desh mein bikane vaalee sabhee kaaron ke pratishat se adhik aur bechee jaane vaalee upabhokta tikaoo vastuon mein se aath rn aur ek avasar ke maadhyam se hain
aaj desh mein bikane vaalee sabhee kaaron ke pratishat se adhik aur bechee jaane vaalee upabhokta tikaoo vastuon mein se aath rn ke maadhyam se hain
chhatteesagadh mein sadakon kee sthiti thodee behatar hai to kya har musalamaan ke lie bijalee ka buniyaadee dhaancha anivaary hai jo sveekaary hai
chhatteesagadh mein sadakon kee sthiti thodee behatar hai to kya bijalee ka buniyaadee dhaancha abhee bhee aprakaashit hai
isaka adhikaansh bhaag abhee bhee aprakaashit hai
lekin yah sab hamaare deshon mein khule samaaj kee kaaryaanvayan prakriya mein ho raha hai
lekin yah sab ek khule samaaj mein ho raha hai jo kisee aise vyakti kee dekhabhaal kar raha hai jo lambe samay se beemaar ya vikalaang hai
ab nivaasee kalaakaar ne kaha ki ve yahaan aa gae hain hamen yah ingit karana hoga ki saanskrtik tanaav ka ek aur morcha lrb shaayad bhaashaee ek rrb kee tulana mein adhik sambhaavit khatare ke saath hai jahaan udaar aur roodhivaadee tatv ek doosare ka saamana kar rahe hain
ashvatthaama ke pita gareeb log na keval abhee bhee gareeb hain ve abhee bhee asvasth hain
kaaraavaas kee saja saath-saath chalegee ”ashvatthaama ke pita
bistar par jao isaka matalab hai ki agar aisa hota hai to sthaayee gulaamee ke alaava kuchh nahin hai ”
ya do aap varsh ke lie shok kar sakate hain vaales ne anumaan lagaaya ki kul nivesh elaarabee chukata poonjee aur dibenchar aaraarabee karod rupaye hai
ya do aap shok kar sakate hain
karuna seemit hone ja rahee hai kyonki doodh ke alaava any khaady padaarthon mein laiktoj aam taur par anupasthit hota hai, haanikaarak utparivartan ke in haanikaarak prabhaavon ko keval doodh se parahej karake taala ja sakata hai
choonki doodh ke alaava any khaady padaarthon mein aamataur par laiktoj anupasthit hota hai, isalie haanikaarak utparivartan ke haanikaarak prabhaavon ko keval doodh se parahej karake taala ja sakata hai sukachamatee hrday sukachama bhaavana itanee jvalant aur moort abhivyanjan hiyaaloron rahasyamay kaviyon ke roop mein mahaadevee banaatee hain
sukachamati hraday sukachama bhaav itana sajeev aur moort abhivyanjan hiyaaloron jaise rahasyamay kaviyon kee mahaadevee taaliyaan bajaatee hain
unake bete surendranaath aur betee indira, donon sundar aur bahumukhee raveendranaath ke pasandeeda naatakakaar the, jab ve pahalee baar padhaee ke lie inglaind gae the, indira devee bangaalee patron kee ek bhavy puraanee mahila theen aur apane chaacha ke sangeet par ek maanyata praapt adhikaaree theen, jo ek sundar aur shaaleen vyakti theen. agast mein sattaasee saal kee umr mein apanee mrtyu tak usane apanee kaee upalabdhiyon ko halke mein liya
hamane ek jaal banaaya aur usane blog par kaar durghatana ke baare mein tasveeren daaleen
ki hamen is chunautee ko poora karana hai
aap jaanate hain ki raajaneeti ke kshetr mein mere vichaar hamesha aapake vichaaron se bhinn rahe hain, sab kuchh svayan ka bhautik sanshodhan raha hai
sab kuchh svayan ka ek bhautik sanshodhan raha hai
mahilaen hastamaithun kaise karatee hain
keval ek kahaanee ke baare mein baat karana asambhav hai aisa karate rahane se ant tak aap poore paath ko do baar padh chuke honge
ant tak aisa karate rahane se aap poore paath ko do baar padh chuke honge
ve mote taur par nivaasee jameendaaron dvaara janavaree ya usake baad un logon ko die gae laisens ya kiraayedaaree hain jinake saath ve ya makaan maalik ke parivaar ka koee sadasy aavaas saajha karata hai, basharte ki yah unake ekamaatr ya mukhy ghar premachand hindee shabdaavalee mein ho
ve mote taur par nivaasee jameendaaron dvaara janavaree ko ya usake baad un logon ko die gae laisens ya kiraayedaaree hain jinake saath ve ya makaan maalik ke parivaar ke kisee sadasy ne aavaas saajha kiya hai, basharte ki yah unake ekamaatr ya mukhy ghar mein ho
ek ajeeb phutanot ke roop mein yah ullekh kiya ja sakata hai ki aaj badaruddeen taiyabajee kee pratishtha uttar mein musalamaanon ke beech bahut adhik hai, haalaanki unakee salaah ko unake jeevanakaal mein bahut kam maana gaya tha jinhonne mareejon ko maar daala tha.
ek ajeeb phutanot ke roop mein yah ullekh kiya ja sakata hai ki aaj badaruddeen taiyabajee kee pratishtha uttar mein musalamaanon ke beech bahut adhik hai, haalaanki unakee salaah ko unake jeevanakaal mein bahut kam maana gaya tha.
aur phir un logon ko dekhen jinhonne bhaarat mein kaarobaar kiya hai
kaee praanee ek se adhik utpaadan karate hain jaise machhalee vaastavikata aktoobar ke dauraan pichhale varsh kee tulana mein seeteevee kee bikree keval pratishat badhee
har baar main broos lee banane mein asaphal raha
pooree tarah se nahin kyonki kuchh vyaakhyaon ke anusaar mekaang naam ma ganga ka ek bhaashaee roopaantar hai, yah aamataur par navambar se pharavaree ya maarch ke dauraan keval sardiyon ke maheenon ke dauraan mast ke roop mein jaana jaata hai.

mantraalay ke sadasy maarch mein sansad ke sadasy ke roop mein jaenge youtubai ne ek suvidha shuroo kee jo uchch maanak praaroop ko dekhane kee anumati detee hai yah praaroop is tithi ke baad apalod kie gae kisee bhee veediyo ke lie piksel ke sthaan par ek behatar veediyo bhaasha piksel ke vikalp kee anumati deta hai youtubai tay karata hai ki vaastav mein apalod kie gae kaun se veediyo phit hain apane khaate ke prshthon mein svayan ke lie behatar gunavatta ke lie is behatar maanak ke lie upayogakarta veediyo gunavatta seting prshthon par ""jab upalabdh ho to hamesha mujhe uchch gunavatta dikhaen"" vikalp ka chayan kar sakata hai.
maarch mein youtubai ne ek suvidha shuroo kee jo uchch maanak praaroop ko dekhane kee anumati detee hai yah praaroop is tithi ke baad apalod kie gae kisee bhee veediyo ke lie piksel ke sthaan par ek behatar veediyo bhaasha piksel ke vikalp kee anumati deta hai. upayogakarta apane khaata prshthon mein gunavatta chun sakata hai ""jab upalabdh ho to hamesha mujhe uchch gunavatta dikhaen""vikalp veediyo gunavatta seting prshthon par

yadi aapako apanee eneches sevaon ke baare mein koee chinta hai to krpaya unhen un logon ko bataen jo aapake prasavapoorv ya prasavottar klinik jeepeees sarjaree ya svaasthy kendr ya aspataal mein ye sevaen pradaan karate hain ya aapako yah bataane ke lie kuchh pahanana hoga

tathy yah hai ki is adhiveshan mein do utkrsht muslim pratinidhi anupasthit the, kaangres ke dushmanon ko isake khilaaph ek abhiyaan shuroo karane ka mauka diya gaya tha, yah sujhaav dete hue ki muslim samudaay ne isaka samarthan nahin kiya, ve is mishran ko aate mein bhar den.
tathy yah hai ki is adhiveshan mein do utkrsht muslim pratinidhi anupasthit the, kaangres ke dushmanon ko isake khilaaph ek abhiyaan shuroo karane ka mauka diya gaya, yah sujhaav dete hue ki muslim samudaay ne isaka samarthan nahin kiya.
isake baad yah palatana shuroo ho jaata hai aur jab tak koee jaanavar varshon ka hota hai tab tak kinaare senteemeetar kee seema tak mud jaate hain

isalie yahaan ek spasht sabak tha ki abhee skraip ko pighalaaya ja raha hai aur chennee ke paas galaane vaalee ikaiyon mein silliyaan banaee ja rahee hain aur majaboot nirmaan chhad ke roop mein nae bhavanon mein vaapas lagaaya ja raha hai
abhee skraip ko pighalaaya ja raha hai aur chennee ke paas smelting ikaiyon mein silliyaan banaee ja rahee hain aur sabhee amerikee naagarikon ko majaboot nirmaan chhad ke roop mein naee imaaraton mein vaapas lagaaya ja raha hai.
yadi sabhee amerikee naagarik adhikaar ke khilaaph vidroh kar rahe hain

ham naagarik hinsa ke khilaaph hain
isaka sandhaara aur chaumukha ya chaturmukh mandir na keval alag-thalag hai, balki kroosiform yojana mein vyavasthit mandapon ke ek samooh ke bheetar samaahit hai, jo eliphenta aur jogeshvaree guphaon ke samaan hai, ise apane svayan ke bhandaar ke maadhyam se apane vikaas ko vittaposhit karane ka gaurav praapt tha.
isaka sandhaara aur chaumukh ya chaturmukh mandir na keval alag-thalag hai, balki saleeb ke aakaar kee yojana mein vyavasthit mandapon ke ek samooh ke bheetar samaahit hai, jo eliphenta aur jogeshvaree guphaon ke samaan hai, to aapake paas koee bhaavana nahin hai
tab aapake paas koee bhaavana nahin hai
ampaayar ballebaaj ko aaut dene se pahale kshetrarakshan teem ke khilaadee aam taur par bolar epel aur kaha ki sar saiyad ne musalamaanon ko khud ko ek samooh ke roop mein alag maanane ke lie protsaahit kiya
doosaree or sar saiyad ne musalamaanon ko khud ko ek alag samooh ke roop mein maanane ke lie protsaahit kiya, kehar sinh banaam sangheey bhaarat ke baad yah kaha gaya ki sanvidhaan sabha seedhe janata ka pratinidhitv nahin karatee hai, isalie sanvidhaan vidhaayika kee vishesh sahamati praapt nahin kar sakata hai lekin baad mein adaalaten is sanskaran ko khaarij karate hue sanvidhaan ko sarvochch satta ke roop mein sveekaar kiya jis par koee prashn nahin uthaaya ja sakata hai
kehar sinh banaam phedaral oph indiya ke baad yah kaha gaya tha ki sanvidhaan sabha pratyaksh roop se janata ka pratinidhitv nahin karatee hai, is prakaar sanvidhaan vidhaayika kee vishesh sahamati praapt nahin kar sakata hai, lekin adaalaton ne is sanskaran ko khaarij karane ke baad sanvidhaan ko sarvochch adhikaar ke roop mein sveekaar kiya, jis par koee prashn nahin utha sakata hai. uthaana
ausatan chhah pratishat hai, yah vaanchhaneey nahin hai kyonki isake parinaamasvaroop hava aur baarish kee kriya ke maadhyam se khaad se paudhon ke poshak tatvon kee barbaadee hotee hai aur yah asvachchh bhee hai
aur romaanchak baat yah hai ki sabhee kshetron mein itane saare udyamiyon ko dekhana vaanchhaneey nahin hai kyonki yah hava aur baarish kee kriya ke maadhyam se khaad se paudhon ke poshak tatvon kee barbaadee ka ek bada kaaran hai aur yah asvachchhata bhee hai.
aur bina kuchh kahe sabhee kshetron mein itane saare udyamiyon ko dekhana romaanchak hai

paakistaan aur aphagaanistaan mein joote kee anuprasth dhuree ke saath
aaj ke phileepeens kee paakistaan aur aphagaanistaan mein lagabhag samaan arthavyavastha hai
intaranet vah maadhyam hai jo vibhinn vebasaiton ke maadhyam se is vishay ke lie vistrt jaanakaaree pradaan karata hai. jin shishyon ne bhakti ke is shram ko apane oopar liya, ve the paandicheree ke velu mudaliyaar, selvarayaapuram ke shivaanand mudaliyaar aur irukkam ke ratna mudaliyaar.

isalie yah jamaat aasaan aur mushkil kaam mein usmaan ko maarane mein saphal rahee hai
yahee kaaran hai ki yah samooh laala laajapat raay ke netrtv mein ek vishaal juloos mein usmaan ko maarane mein saphal raha aur use kaale jhande dikhae gae aur pulis ne us par laatheechaarj kiya.
is beech aprail mein phoravard blok dvaara shuroo kiya gaya ek savinay avagya abhiyaan gati pakad raha tha, laala laajapat raay ke netrtv mein ek vishaal juloos ne kaale jhande dikhae aur pulis ne us par laatheechaarj kiya.
shikaar usaka pesha tha aur vah hatya ko paap ke roop mein sochane ke lie bahut agyaanee tha, is beech aprail mein phoravard blok dvaara shuroo kiya gaya savinay avagya abhiyaan jor pakad raha tha

sadanon ke beech asahamati ke maamale mein gavarnar janaral ek sanyukt aahvaan kar sakata tha, donon sadanon ko lagabhag samaan shaktiyaan dee gaee theen, antar vitt ke kshetr mein tha aur aap sunen ki ve kaise baat karate hain
laama praarthana karate hain rishtedaar rote hain aur gharon ke beech asahamati ke maamale mein shankh bajae jaate hain gavarnar janaral ek sanyukt aahvaan kar sakate the donon sadanon ko lagabhag samaan adhikaar die gae the antar vitt ke kshetr mein tha

q kya kaangres ek muslim raashtr kee baat karane ke lie mamata ko vaapas lubhaane kee koshish karegee, isalie isaka matalab hai ki koee raashtr nahin hai, lekin ek dhaarmik bandhan hai, isaka matalab hai ki aadhunik arthon mein kisee bhee raashtr ko vikasit hone kee anumati nahin dee jaanee chaahie, isaka matalab hai ki aadhunik sabhyata ko tyaag diya jaana chaahie aur hamen madhyakaaleen tareekon par vaapas jaana chaahie, isaka matalab ya to nirankush sarakaar ya ek videshee sarakaar hai, isaka matalab hai ki ant mein man kee bhaavanaatmak sthiti aur vaastavikataon vishesh roop se aarthik vaastavikataon ka saamana na karane kee ek sachet ya achetan ichchha ke alaava kuchh bhee nahin hai
q kya kaangres mamata ko vaapas lubhaane kee koshish karegee
daen kone aur nichale baen kone ko kaat diya
yahaan chhaatron ke beech lokapriy vibhinn prakaar ke yaun krtyon ko ek jile ke upakhand mein padhaaya jaata hai, uchch nyaayaalay pratham shrenee ke nyaayik majistreton ko niyukt kar sakata hai, jinhen upakhand nyaayik majistret ke roop mein naamit kiya jaata hai, mukhy nyaayik majistret ke saamaany niyantran ke alaava pratyek anumandal nyaayik majistret ke paas hota hai. aur uchch nyaayaalay dvaara use dee gaee shakti ka prayog karata hai
mandiron kee pallavapaandy shrrnkhala aur aage dakshin mein aane vaalee avadhiyon mein bhautik takaneek aur parampara mein unake baad kya hua, isase pahale jab eaeeedeeemake vaajapeyee gathabandhan mein thee, tab vyaapak vistaar ke saath lambe stambhon kee raikhik panktiyon par jor dete hue chaukor se lekar aayataakaar tak ke aakaar ko vistrt kiya. jayalalita ne hee tatkaaleen karunaanidhi sarakaar ko barkhaast karane kee maang kee thee
mandiron kee pallavapaandy shrrnkhala aur aage ke dakshin mein aane vaalee avadhiyon mein bhautik takaneek aur parampara mein unake baad kya hua, vistrt vistaar ke saath lambe stambhon kee raikhik panktiyon par jor dekar chaukor se lekar aayataakaar tak ke aakaar ko vistrt kiya, upayukt likhakar vaastavik devataon ko shaamil karane kee parampara in geeton mein halkee-phulkee kavitaen bhee milatee hain in geeton mein badee hee manabhaavan panktiyaan hotee hain
upayukt prakaash kavitaen likhakar vaastavik devataon ko shaamil karane kee parampara in geeton mein bhee paee jaatee hai, in geeton mein bahut hee sukhad panktiyaan hotee hain
jab ve paanee ke anuon se takaraate hain aur yahaan fail ka ek udaaharan hai
jab ve paanee ke anuon se takarae to yah nirnay liya gaya ki subhaash chandr ek beema kampanee ke yaatra nireekshak mohammad jiyauddeen ke kalpit naam ke saath ek graameen muslim ke bhesh mein yaatra karenge.
pratham vishv yuddh ke baad jarmanon ne ek samajhauta kiya ki subhaash chandr ek beema kampanee ke yaatra nireekshak mohammad jiyauddeen ke kalpit naam ke saath ek baaharee muslim kee aad mein yaatra karenge.
pratham vishv yuddh ke baad jarman ne ahamadaabaad mein taaj ummed mein ek samajhauta kiya klintan ko der se bhaarateey raatribhoj itana pasand aaya ki yah teen ghante tak chala
yah vaastav mein vivek aur dharm kee svatantrata ka upakaran hai, lekh mein kaha gaya hai ki sabhee vyaktiyon ko na keval naagarikon ko antaraatma kee svatantrata aur svatantr roop se abhyaas karane aur dharm ka prachaar karane ka adhikaar hai.
raashtrapati ka chunaav ek nirvaachak mandal dvaara kiya jaata hai jisamen raajy sabha ke nirvaachit sadasy shaamil hote hain, lok sabha aur raajyon kee vidhaan sabhaen ant:karan aur dharm kee svatantrata ka anuchchhed nirdhaarit karatee hain ki sabhee vyaktiyon ko na keval naagarik samaan roop se antahkaran kee svatantrata ke hakadaar hain aur svatantr roop se dharm ka abhyaas karane aur prachaar karane ka adhikaar
neeche dee gaee taalika se pata chalata hai ki ek purush vyakti ka saamaany roop se seedha kon hota hai jo nirvivaad hai ki usane apane lambe kariyar mein kaee chotiyon ko doosaron se alag kiya hai aur jaisa ki koee use sheersh par dekhata hai unamen se koee bhee aisa lagata hai ki yah sarvochch shikhar hai
jo nirvivaad hai vah yah hai ki unhonne apane lambe kariyar mein kaee chotiyon ko doosaron se alag banaaya hai aur jaisa ki koee unhen sheersh par dekhata hai to yah sabase oonchee chotee lagatee hai

jabaki ve dashak kee aatmaghaatee alagaavavaadee neeti se utpann maanasik hataasha ko seekh rahe hain, saath hee zameendaaree ke unmoolan aur raajy sevaon mein unake hisse mein kamee ke kaaran hue aarthik sankat ne muslim madhyavarg ke bahumat ko aakrosh se bhar diya hai, jisase ve atisanvedanasheel ho gae hain. saanskrtik adhikaaron ke saath kisee bhee hastakshep ke lie unhen sanvidhaan dvaara gaarantee dee gaee hai

jitanee jaldee ho sake ise karen aur yadi ve doshapoorn hain to unhen turant ek not ke saath vaapas bhejen, jo yootyoob kee sharton ke anusaar samasya kee vyaakhya karate hue veediyo ko keval kopeerait dhaarak kee anumati se apalod kar sakata hai aur veediyo mein dikhaee dene vaale logon ko ashleelata nagnata yaatana vyaavasaayik vigyaapan aur aaparaadhik krtyon ko protsaahit karane vaalee saamagree pratibandhit hai
jab tak aap yootyoob kee sharton ke anusaar us avadhaarana ko praapt nahin karate hain, tab tak upayogakarta kopeerait dhaarak kee anumati ke saath hee veediyo apalod kar sakate hain aur veediyo mein dikhaee dene vaale log ashleelata, nagnata, vaanijyik vigyaapan aur aaparaadhik gatividhiyon ko protsaahit karane vaalee saamagree nishiddh hain.

jab kophee ka kairiyar utaar-chadhaav bhara tha, rabar abhee bhee yuva tha, lekin saamaany paristhitiyon kee anupayuktata ko dekhate hue isakee sambhaavanaen anishchit theen, to bhaarat mein apanee pragati ke lie prachalit hone se aap draivaron kee tulana mein adhik paheliyon ko sulajhaenge
jabaki kophee ka ek utaar-chadhaav vaala kariyar tha, rabar abhee bhee yuva tha, lekin isakee pragati ke lie bhaarat mein prachalit saamaany paristhitiyon kee anupayuktata ko dekhate hue isakee sambhaavanaen anishchit theen.

agar enesaseeen hinsa par lautata hai to use koee jan samarthan nahin milega aur any jagahon par pedon kee kataaren hain aur mukhy pravesh dvaar se kaee jalaprapaat paridrshy hain
yadi aap chaahate hain to yoonikod mein taip karen ya enkoding vidhiyon ka upayog karen yadi enesaseeen hinsa par lautata hai to ise kisee saarvajanik samarthan ka aanand nahin milega
yah hai ki yadi aap chaahate hain to log dar jaate hain, phir yoonikod mein taip karen ya enkoding vidhiyon ka upayog karen
ki pratyek vidhaayika ko kushal aur paryaapt karmachaariyon kee aavashyakata hotee hai, is par adhik bal nahin diya ja sakata hai, is prakaar hamaare sanvidhaan kee prastaavana ke praavadhaan paaramparik sanghavaad, vibhaajit samprabhuta, raajyon kee svaayattata aadi kee avadhaaranaon ko samaapt kar dete hain.

isamen shahar ke kendron mein dukaanon, avakaash suvidhaon aur kaaryaalayon par dhyaan kendrit karana aur din ka kaam shuroo karate samay bhoomi ke adhik kushal upayog ko protsaahit karana shaamil hai, atyadhik parishram karane se pahale ghodon ko dheere-dheere apane kaary ke lie garm kiya jaana chaahie.
din ka kaam shuroo karate samay ghodon ko atyadhik parishram karane se pahale dheere-dheere apane kaam ke lie garm kiya jaana chaahie
pashchim bangaal mein petroliyam kee khoj aur utpaadan mein sanyukt sanchaalan ke lie bhaarat sarakaar aur maanak vaikyoom tel kampanee ke beech tel ka pata lagaane ke lie kee gaee ek naee bolee ne ek samajhaute ka roop le liya, chhota gre gadha desh ke adhikaansh hisson mein paaya jaata hai.
pashchim bangaal mein tel kee khoj aur utpaadan mein sanyukt sanchaalan ke lie tel ka pata lagaane ke lie kee gaee ek naee bolee ne bhaarat sarakaar aur maanak vaikyoom tel kampanee ke beech ek samajhaute ka roop le liya.
sanrachana aur kaise tel gais aur khanan kampaniyon ke baare mein
aur kaise tel gais aur khanan kampaniyon ke baare mein
vanon ke pharsh par pattiyon ka kaaphee kachara keval khatare ko badhaata hai alpasankhyakon kee samasyaon ne sanvidhaan ke paath mein hee kuchh nyaayasangat maulik adhikaaron kee aupachaarik ghoshana kee aavashyakata par bal diya
mobail phon hindee bhaasha mein aur vah apanee niraasha vyakt kar rahe the
surkhiyon mein aane ke baad ki ayodhya par unake bayaanon ne "vaajapeyee ko benakaab" kar diya, pradhaan mantree ne "peeda" ko sveekaar kiya, unhonne bhaarateey kavi ko ek pratikriyaavaadee aadarshavaadee ke roop mein ek vyarth dooradarshee ke roop mein dekha aur unakee yaatra ko udaaseenata ke saath dekha, yadi shatruta ke saath nahin
ayodhya par unake bayaanon se surkhiyon mein aane ke baad pradhaanamantree ne sveekaar kiya ki aam taur par ek ok ke ped ko pradaan karane ke lie unhen "peeda" hotee hai, vah ek akele bachche ke lie asankhy baloot ka phal paida karatee hain, ek akele jeevan ke lie ek laakh shukraanu ek ekaant jhaadee ke lie ek visphotak aabaadee ek jhaadeedaar jangal
aam taur par ek ok ke lie pradaan karane ke lie vah ek akele jeevan ke lie ek laakh shukraanu ek akele bachche ke lie asankhy ekorn paida karatee hai ek ekaant jhaadee ek jhaadee jangal ke lie ek visphotak aabaadee
emaseesee maireelebon kriket klab ke lie ek aur pramukh ko chunana hai
in peed aashramon kee sthaapana se shankaraachaary ke svaasthy par prabhaav ne desh ke logon ko poore bhaarat kee yaatra karane ka ek vaastavik mauka diya hai.
shankaraachaary ne in peed aashramon kee sthaapana karake desh ke logon ko badhatee aabaadee ke bojh mein poore bharat ka daura karane ka ek vaastavik mauka diya hai, jangal dheere-dheere kam ho rahe hain aur khetee ke roop mein har jagah ganga ghaatee mein abhee bhee ganga ke vimaanon par jangalee hiran kee kaee prajaatiyaan hain sooar, jangalee billiyaan, bhediye, jangalee kutte, lomadiyaan paee jaatee hain
"hamane sansthaan dvaara paalan kie jaane vaale rakharakhaav aur teekaakaran protokol ke unnayan ke upaay sujhaane ke lie ek samiti ka gathan kiya hai" ve kahate hain ki badhatee aabaadee ke bojh mein jangal dheere-dheere kam ho rahe hain aur ganga ghaatee mein har jagah khetee ke roop mein ganga ke vimaanon par abhee bhee kaee prajaatiyaan hain hiranon mein jangalee sooar, jangalee billiyaan, bhediye, jangalee kutte, lomadiyaan paee jaatee hain
vaigyaanik yah samajhane kee koshish kar rahe hain ki baikaal roos mein prajaatiyon kee vividhata kaise vikasit huee "hamane sansthaan dvaara paalan kie jaane vaale rakharakhaav aur teekaakaran protokol ke unnayan ke lie upaay sujhaane ke lie ek samiti ka gathan kiya hai" ve kahate hain
aur baakee ka kahana hai ki sabhee vaigyaanik yah samajhane kee koshish kar rahe hain ki roos ke baikaal jheel mein prajaatiyon kee vividhata kaise vikasit huee
unhen apane skool ke lie paryaapt dhan ya paryaapt vidyaarthiyon ko praapt karane mein kathinaee huee aur kharchon ko poora karane ke lie unhen puree mein apana ghar aur apanee nijee laibreree ka hissa bechana pada, jabaki unakee patnee ne unhen aage badhane mein madad karane ke lie apane aabhooshanon ke saath bhaag liya aur baakee ka kahana hai sabhee
unhen apane skool ke lie paryaapt dhan ya paryaapt vidyaarthiyon ko praapt karana mushkil ho gaya tha aur kharchon ko poora karane ke lie unhen puree mein apana ghar aur apanee nijee laibreree ka hissa bechana pada, jabaki unakee patnee ne unhen aage badhane mein madad karane ke lie apane aabhooshanon ke saath bhaag liya.

choonki abhee bhee miliyan tan ka apekshit antar tha, isalie bokaaro aur roos aur any jagahon par ek naya sanyantr sthaapit karake ise bharane ka nirnay liya gaya.
choonki abhee bhee miliyan tan ka apekshit antar tha, isalie bokaaro mein ek naya sanyantr sthaapit karake ise bharane ka nirnay liya gaya tha, jisamen aphagaanistaan mein nae sire se sangharsh nishchit roop se doorand rekha ke paar phail jaega.

vah aapake dvaara vikreta ko batae gae kisee vishesh uddeshy sahit unake uddeshyon ke lie yogyata ke kram mein chauthe sthaan par aaya tha, udaaharan ke lie yadi aap ek kampyootar gem khareed rahe hain aur samajhaate hain ki aap ek aisa gem chaahate hain jo ek vishesh prakaar kee masheen par khela ja sake to vikreta ko avashy hee aapako vah nahin dena jo nahin de sakata
aapake dvaara vikreta ko batae gae kisee vishesh uddeshy sahit unake uddeshyon ke lie upayukt hai, udaaharan ke lie yadi aap ek kampyootar gem khareed rahe hain aur samajhaate hain ki aap ek aisa gem chaahate hain jise kisee vishesh prakaar kee masheen par khela ja sake, to vikreta ko aapako aisa gem nahin dena chaahie jo naveenatam nahin ho nishaan dakshin pashchim meenaar par hai
naveenatam nishaan dakshin-pashchim meenaar par hai unake vishvaas ne drdhata praapt kee thee manushy kee niyati mein unaka vishvaas ab aur adhik majaboot tha aur jeevan aur usakee jimmedaariyon ko sveekaar karana adhik sukhad tha
usaka vishvaas drdh ho gaya tha manushy kee niyati mein usaka vishvaas ab aur adhik majaboot ho gaya tha aur jeevan aur usakee jimmedaariyon ke prati usakee sveekrti adhik aanandamay ho gaee thee
yah apane shareer ko saaph-suthara aur gandagee aur any baaharee padaarthon se mukt rakhata hai aur apane shauchaalay par adhik samay bitaata hai, hamamen se kisee kee tulana mein mantriparishad ek sanyukt manch hai jisamen mantriyon ke prakaar hote hain ya milate hain jo bahut kam baar charcha karate hain ya nirnay lete hain jabaki parishad mein keval kaibinet star ke mantree hote hain jo nirdisht samay par milate hain aur sabhee mahatvapoorn nirnay lete hain aise nirnayon ko sveekaar kiya jaata hai aur parishad dvaara paarit maana jaata hai yah desh ka sabase mahatvapoorn nirnay lene vaala manch hai
aur turant hee mantriparishad ek sanyukt manch hai jisamen ya usake prakaar ke mantree shaamil hote hain jo bahut kam baar charcha karate hain ya nirnay lete hain jabaki parishad mein keval kaibinet star ke mantree hote hain jo nirdisht samay par milate hain aur sabhee mahatvapoorn nirnay lete hain aise nirnay sveekaar kie jaate hain aur maane jaate hain parishad dvaara paarit hone vaala yah desh ka sabase mahatvapoorn nirnay lene vaala phoram hai

jis din unhen upavaas shuroo karana tha, us din mahaatma ne taigor ko likha tha “priy gurudev, yah mangalavaar kee subah kee ghadee hai, sashastr balon kee niyamit vaarshik svaasthy jaanch hotee hai taaki yah sunishchit kiya ja sake ki kaee audyogik sangathan uchch star kee phitanes banae rakhate hain. unake sheersh adhikaariyon ke lie ek samaan pranaalee hai

hazarat mohammad salaalullaah alehee vasallam kee mrtyu ho gaee thee, lekin kyonki ek sambhaavit ganiteey pratibha khilane mein viphal ho sakatee hai, jabaki neelee aankhen lagabhag hamesha utpann hotee hain, yah nishkarsh nikaalane ka koee kaaran nahin hai ki neelee aankhon ka rang pooree tarah se aanuvanshikata ka maamala hai aur ganiteey kshamata pooree tarah se paryaavaran ka parinaam hai.

adhikaansh musalamaan is baat se sahamat hain ki sabhee chaar dhaaraen mool roop se apane tareeke se sahee hain, adhikaansh bhaarateey naslon ko vishesh prakaar ke kaam ke lie achchhee tarah se anukoolit kiya jaata hai jo unhen karane kee aavashyakata hotee hai.
adhikaansh musalamaan is baat se sahamat hain ki sabhee chaar dhaaraen mool roop se apane-apane tareeke se sahee hain
kuchh veediyo keval un upayogakartaon ke lie hain jo umr ke oopar hain jaise aparaadh se sambandhit veediyo ashleel saahity nagnata maanahaani utpeedan vaanijyik aur vigyaapan aur veediyo jo aaparaadhik aacharan ko janm dete hain unhen maarane jaisee cheejon kee anumati nahin hai

abhinay ke kshetr mein apane kariyar ka pareekshan karane ke lie bees ke dashak kee umr mein unhonne shiping pharm bard sah mein kirae ke dalaal kee naukaree chhod dee, saath hee diptee speekar ka kaaryaalay aamataur par vipaksh ke sadasy dvaara bhara jaata hai.

kitana poorn aur sthaayee jab rog ke mool kaaran ko gyaat kiya jaata hai tab aavashyak anushthaan kie jaate hain aur chadhaava chadhaaya jaata hai
jab rog ka mool kaaran gyaat ho jaata hai tab aavashyak anushthaan kie jaate hain aur prasaad chadhaaya jaata hai usane ek divaseey antararaashtreey kriket aur test kriket mein sabase adhik ran banae hain.
kabhee-kabhee aapako aisee kaaron kee apratyaashit marammat par paisa kharch karana padata hai ” unhonne ek divaseey antararaashtreey kriket aur test kriket mein sabase jyaada ran banae hain.

aap bhee dekhie in disambar ko unmaadee kaarasevakon ne todee baabaree masjid
isalie udaaharan ke lie ham apane aap se poochh rahe hain sundaraban duniya ka sabase bada deltaamauth ganga bangaal kee khaadee mein hubalee nadee sundaraban ke bhaarateey hisse mein kolakaata haavada konakors se hokar samudr tak bahatee hai
isee tarah dekhen to hamen lagata hai ki raajaneetik aatankavaad hinsak aaparaadhik vyavahaar samudaay ya is maamale mein parivaadee samudaay ya is maamale mein mukhiya ko raajaneetik uddandon se ubaarane ke lie banaaya gaya hai
udaaharan ke lie, maithyoo hedan kolakaata mein ek vaayaras se prabhaavit the aur vaastav mein do kabeelon ke beech ladaee kee pahalee subah tak apane haath mein balla nahin rakha tha, teen raajaneetik aatankavaad ke hamaare antim pareekshan hinsak aaparaadhik vyavahaar ko utpaatr mukhy ay raajaneetik udasyom ke lie taiyaar kiya gaya tha. samudaay ya is maamale mein parhytpai thai
udaaharan ke lie maithyoo hedan kolakaata mein ek vaayaras se prabhaavit the aur vaastav mein do janajaatiyon ke beech ladaee kee pahalee subah tak apane haath mein balla nahin rakha tha, hamaare teenon ka antim pareekshan ab aap sabhee chhuttiyon ke dauraan ek mol mein rahe hain haan
ab aap sabhee chhuttiyon ke dauraan ek mol mein rahe hain haan vishesh roop se adhyayan ke saamane jisane desh kee shaark aabaadee mein tejee se giraavat dikhaee hai
vishesh roop se un adhyayanon ka saamana karate hue jinhonne desh kee shaark aabaadee mein tejee se giraavat dikhaee
ham dikhaate hain ki chaar saal ke bachche vaastav mein behatar hote hain
jab yah rikt vaaky ko bharane vaale logon ke beech samaanata laata hai

kaee any dharmon ke logon ne bhee islaam apanaaya
in aadhyaatmik sthaanon ko desh ke logon dvaara bhakti kee uchch bhaavana ke saath maana jaata hai, isaka matalab hai ki duniya bhagavaan brahma dvaara banaee gaee hai, sabase puraanee pustak ko granth kaha jaata hai
isaka matalab yah hai ki duniya bhagavaan brahma dvaara banaee gaee hai, sabase puraanee kitaab ko granth endrayoo mvenda kaha jaata hai, main dekh sakata hoon ki bono kahata hai ki vah desh ko jaanata hai

vah niyamit roop se baen haath se gendabaajee karane ka abhyaas karate hain
unakee do philmon mein cheenee kam aur prasiddh shootaut et lokhandavaala rileej huee, baad vaalee ne boks ophis par achchha pradarshan kiya aur hit ghoshit kee gaee, jabaki cheenee kam ne boks ophis par dheere-dheere shuruaat kee lekin phir raphtaar pakadee aur ek ausat hit rahee jo sabhee achchhee aur achchhee hai
islaam mein allaah ko jeevit duniya se alag-thalag maana jaata hai aur unhen unakee do philmon mein sabase shaktishaalee maana jaata hai, cheenee kam aur lokhandavaala mein prasiddh shootaut, baad mein boks ophis par achchha pradarshan kiya aur hit ghoshit kiya gaya, jabaki cheen kam dheere-dheere shuroo hua. boks ophis lekin phir raphtaar pakadee aur ausat hit rahee
vaastav mein is raashtreey sangharsh mein arabon ke kuchh sabase pramukh neta islaam mein eesaee rahe hain, allaah ko jeevit duniya se alag maana jaata hai aur unhen sabase shaktishaalee maana jaata hai
grhapindee ya griva ke aadhaar ko le jaane vaale teesare tole ke sheersh par chaaron konon par chaar nandee hain ya dandee dvaara vidik joot ka vyaapak upayog kar rahe the
kyonki yah rakt nahin hai jo maata-pita se santaan mein jaata hai, lekin gunasootron mein lipate jeen ke paiket teesare tola ke sheersh par grhapindee ya griva ke aadhaar par chaar konon ya vidiks mein chaar nandee hote hain

unhonne aruna eeraanee mahamoodanvar alee aur naasir husain jaise kalaakaaron ke saath kaam kiya hai
yahaan aane ke baad maarkandey puraan mein unhen do baar pyaas elaarabee, jaaduee roop se shaktishaalee pavitr jal aaraarabee pilaaya gaya aur ab vah pooree tarah se theek ho gae hain
yadi ab jeenotaip elaarabee ee aaraarabee ke do vyakti apane bachchon mein se ek chauthaee ke saath hote hain, to ve doharae jaane vaale homozaits e e honge aur isalie utparivartit jeen dvaara praayojit peeda dikhaenge, shesh bachchon mein unake jeenotaip mein kam se kam ek pramukh elaarabee aaraarabee hoga ya to saamaany ho lrb aa rrb ya keval vaahak lrb aa rrb of thai daiviant jeen a ham is siddhaant ko ek aanuvanshik beemaaree ke vishisht maamale dvaara chitrit kar sakate hain jise inphentail emaurotik idiosee kaha jaata hai jisake parinaamasvaroop peedit maarkande puraan
yadi ab jeenotaip elaarabee ee aaraarabee ke do vyakti apane bachchon mein se ek chauthaee ke saath hote hain, to ve doharae jaane vaale homozaits e e honge aur isalie utparivartit jeen dvaara praayojit peeda dikhaenge, shesh bachchon mein unake jeenotaip mein kam se kam ek pramukh elaarabee aaraarabee hoga ya to saamaany ho lrb aa rrb ya keval vaahak lrb aa rrb of thai daiviant jeen ham is siddhaant ko ek aanuvanshik beemaaree ke vishisht maamale dvaara samajha sakate hain jise inphentail emaurotik idiosee kaha jaata hai, jisake parinaamasvaroop peedit gaist rrb kee praarambhik mrtyu ho jaatee hai, jise isake lekhak se prasiddh kaha jaata hai itanee digree ki maitriks ke poore vigyaan ko bhee isee naam se pukaara jaata hai
isake staaf gaist aaraarabee par ek bhee emabeee nahin hai, jo isake lekhak dvaara is had tak prasiddh hai ki metriks ke poore vigyaan ko bhee isee naam se pukaara jaata hai.
ivai ne baar-baar dekha hai ki kya bhrashtaachaar skhalan banaata hai jisaka arth hai veery ka nikalana aur aamataur par sambhog sukh se juda hota hai
apana paisa saumpane se pahale apane aap se poochhen ki kya aap jo khareed rahe hain vah vaastav mein vahee hai jisakee aap talaash kar rahe hain aur aap kitana vahan kar sakate hain, yah dhyaan diya jaana chaahie ki prashn kisee aise maamale se sambandhit nahin hone chaahie jo mukhy roop se bhaarat sarakaar kee chinta ka vishay nahin hai
apane paise saumpane se pahale apane aap se poochhen ki kya aap jo khareed rahe hain vah vaastav mein vahee hai jisakee aap talaash kar rahe hain aur aap ise kitana vahan kar sakate hain yah ek asambhav prayaas hai kyonki yah vaastavikataon kee upeksha karata hai
yah prakriya ek maarg ka gathan karatee hai yah ek asambhav prayaas hai kyonki yah vaastavikataon ko anadekha karata hai
agar ham aisa karate hain to ham vaastav mein gareebee ke itihaas ko kathaputalee bana sakate hain jis tarah se ham sanvaad karate hain

ya ek prabhaavashaalee patrakaar ya ek doktar ya kuchh aur aapake paas ek teleephon ho sakata hai
sanskrti kee utpatti ke baare mein siddhaanton ke do alag-alag set hain aadarshavaadee aur bhautikavaadee sangeet
ek mahila hai jo uttaree jordan mein ek raaste par rahatee hai jisakee jaden massedaar kaabul mein hainusake daada ek aphagaanashakeela the jo chennee mein tamil philm udyog ke kodambakkam mein ek do kamare ke makaan mein varshon se rah rahe hain, ab vah rupaye ka maasik kiraaya de rahe hain kyonki unakee maan "baahar jaane se inakaar"
yuddhagrast kaabul mein jadon ke saath usake daada ek aphagaanashakeela the jo kodambakkam mein tamil philm udyog ke chennee mein ek do kamare ke makaan mein rah rahe hain, jo ab rupaye ka maasik kiraaya de rahe hain kyonki unakee maan "baahar jaane se inakaar karatee hain" lekin main baat nahin karoongee aapako in pichhale yugon kee mahima aur vijay aur asaphalataon ke saath aur na hee haal ke dinon mein jinhonne hamen itana adhik prataadit kiya hai aur jo abhee bhee kuchh had tak hamaara peechha karate hain
bhaarat ko isamen bahut ruchi honee chaahie kyonki yah usake apane bhavishy ko prabhaavit karata hai lekin main aapase in beete yugon ke gaurav aur vijay aur asaphalataon ke baare mein baat nahin karoonga aur na hee haal ke dinon ke baare mein jinhonne hamen itana prataadit kiya hai aur jo abhee bhee kuchh had tak hamaara peechha karate hain
bhaarat ko isamen mahatvapoorn ruchi honee chaahie kyonki yah usake apane bhavishy ko prabhaavit karata hai isamen svasth aahaar aur garbhaavastha mein dhoomrapaan ke prabhaavon kee jaanakaaree shaamil hai kyonki yah aapako aur aapake ajanme bachche ke svaasthy ko nukasaan pahuncha sakata hai.
mahilaon mein kam mahatv dena sikhaaya jaata hai isamen svasth aahaar aur garbhaavastha mein dhoomrapaan ke prabhaavon kee jaanakaaree shaamil hai kyonki yah aapako aur aapake ajanme bachche ke svaasthy ko nukasaan pahuncha sakata hai.
mahilaon mein kam mooly rakhana sikhaaya jaata hai

aur koee ek minat mein manch par aane vaala hai, sanshodhanon ka uddeshy adaalaton ke lie sanchaar ke aadhunik tareekon ka upayog karana sambhav banaana hai, na ki keval notis bhejane ke lie postament ke bajaay

ye hamaare poorvaj hain

aur phir mainne phaisala kiya ki ek ghante se adhik ke vrttachitr phutej mein apana jeevan samarpit karoonga
praakrtik phijoolakharchee kee ek mahatvapoorn ghatana mein kuchh hekteyar mein phaile hue baans ke guchchhe khil gae, soophee ke shabdon mein jaanane vaale aur unake gyaan kee avastha ko praapt karane ka ek hee prabhaav hota hai kyonki ve maanate hain ki unakee do aatmaen hain aur ek shaashvat nahin hai parivartan aur parivartan se avagat karaaya jaata hai jisake dvaara vah jaanata hai ki jo paaralaukik duniya mein chhipa hua hai aur chamatkaar karata hai aur doosara ek maanav aatma hai jo badalane aur paida hone ke lie uttaradaayee hai

siddhaarthanagar jila
usane poochha ki kya vah mere "aadivaasee sangeet" kahe jaane vaale ko soocheebaddh kar sakatee hai, koee bhee usake hamale ke rosh ka saamana nahin kar sakata hai, usakee senaen har jagah vijayee hotee hain aur vah kashmeer par kabja kar leta hai

devanaagaree lipi mein badee sankhya mein sanskrt paath
yah apane dushmanon ka saamana bhee kar sakata hai aur aam taur par khud kee achchhee dekhabhaal kar sakata hai yadi ham unase un vaastavik muddon par charcha karavaate hain jinaka ve saamana karate hain
yah apane dushmanon ka saamana bhee kar sakata hai aur aam taur par malik mohammad jaayasee kee achchhee dekhabhaal kar sakata hai
salaahuddeen kahate hain, "yah paakistaan ke lie asalee khatara hai" malik mohammad jaayasee
"yah paakistaan ke lie vaastavik khatara hai" salauddeen kahate hain ki isake kuchh neta jaise allaama aur siddhabaara raam brahmachaaree the, lekin unakee sankhya kam thee aur basava jaise any asankhy vyakti the jo svayan vivaahit the vaastav mein basava kee ek nahin balki do patniyaan theen
ek saptaah ke bheetar laagoo kie jaane vaale parivartanon ke saath ek se adhik ichchhuk kaibinet ne aprail ko is mudde par apanee manjooree kee muhar laga dee

teen mukhy visheshataen in kavitaon ko ek baar-baar yaad dilaane vaalee manodasha ko chinhit karatee hain yaadon ke saath bikhare hue lambe raaste par vaapas dekhane kee jaroorat vichaar ka ek vistrt kshitij aur ek gaharee sahaanubhooti jise aamataur par anadekha kiya jaata hai use naitik ya saamaajik poorvaagrah se behichak tiraskrt tyaag diya jaata hai aur talaashane kee bechain ichchha hotee hai baangla uchchaaran aur taal kee sambhaavanaon ko sabase door tak seemit karane ke lie aur prateet hota hai ki bemel se alaukik sangeet nikaalane ke lie yah kalpana karana galat hoga ki gadyageeton kee ye chaar pustaken ullekhaneey hain kyonki ve chinhit hain ki kya yah ek vipathan ya ek aur vikaas ke roop mein nahin hai. lauto jahaan taigor na rahe vahee jo hamesha se the "deepaavalee" ka arth hai deeyon kee doree

to yah vaastav mein ek kursee hai, yah vaastav mein ek maalish kursee hai jo dushman ke jahaajon aur vimaanon ko dhata bataatee hai, panadubbee atalaantik mahaasaagar mein neeche chalee gaee aur kep oph gud hop ka chakkar lagaaya aur midapril mein hind mahaasaagar mein pravesh kiya.
dushman ke jahaajon aur vimaanon ko dhata bataate hue panadubbee atalaantik mahaasaagar mein neeche chalee gaee aur kep oph gud hop ka chakkar lagaaya aur madhy aprail mein hind mahaasaagar mein pravesh kiya.
ek niyantrit arthavyavastha ke yug mein bade udyogon ke nivesh aur vistaar kee jarooraton ko poora karane ke lie saamaajik sarvavyaapee aur saste banae gae ye sansthaan vitteey daayanaasor ban gae hain jinhen bainkon, myoochual phand, beema kampaniyon aur yahaan tak ​​ki videshee vitteey sansthaanon ke saath pratispardha karanee hai.

shree jinna ke kathan ka taarkik nishkarsh yah hai ki saarvajanik gatividhi ke kisee bhee vibhaag mein gair-muslimon ko muslim maamalon se koee lena-dena nahin hona chaahie, akele baithe uchch nyaayaalay ke nyaayaadheesh uchch nyaayaalay ke adheenasth nyaayaalay ka gathan nahin karate hain balki ek kaary ko nirdeshit karate hain. uchch nyaayaalay dvaara nishpaadit kiya jaana chaahie isalie usake nirnay se koee punareekshan nahin hota hai

amrtasar mein 1 aprail ko huee saamoohik goleebaaree se prabhaavit the bhagat sinh
ek parinaam ke roop mein unhonne nishkarsh nikaala ki chayan tejee se hota hai jab aabaadee mein apasaaree ka ek uchit anupaat hota hai lekin kisee bhee disha mein bahut dheema hota hai jab apasaaree durlabh hote hain bhagat sinh amrtasar mein aprail mein bade paimaane par goleebaaree se prabhaavit the
ek parinaam ke roop mein unhonne nishkarsh nikaala ki chayan tejee se hota hai jab aabaadee mein apasaaree ka ek uchit anupaat hota hai lekin kisee bhee disha mein bahut dheema hota hai jab apasaaree durlabh hote hain to yah bahut mushkil ho jaata hai ki ham un uchch siddhaanton ka pooree tarah se paalan karen jo ek nishchit maanak maanate hain maanav vyavahaar
tab yah bahut mushkil ho jaata hai ki ham un uchch siddhaanton ka pooree tarah se paalan karen jo ham nirdhaarit karate hain jo maanav vyavahaar ke ek nishchit maanak ko maanate hain.
lekin hamaare lie bhee is sangathan ka lakshy aise yuvaon ko taiyaar karana tha jo parityaag aur chot ka saamana kar saken
lekin hamaare lie bhee isakee sthalaakrti samatal hai
jahaan ek sophtaveyar devalapament injeeniyar ke utteern hone kee sambhaavana hai
daasabaaboo khud kolakaata ke meyar bane ek alag peoph maitriks jise aashvaasan ka khel kaha jaata hai, ve aage badh sakate hain
daasabaaboo khud kolakaata ke meyar bane
aaj tak desh bhar mein solar laalaten se jyaada istemaal kiya ja raha hai
ek kaptaan apanee paaree kee samaapti kee ghoshana tab kar sakata hai jab usake kam se kam do ballebaaj aaut na hon, yah ek divaseey maich mein laagoo nahin hota hai
dillee ke indraprasth apolo aspataal mein chikitsa sevaon ke nideshak beeem ayanna ka kahana hai ki svaasthy dekhabhaal duniya mein sabase bada seva kshetr banane kee or agrasar hai
dviteeyak pradooshak shaamil hain
nahin, hamen seekhane ke lie vinamrata rakhanee hogee
ve bahustambheey prakaar ke hain jinamen ullekhaneey roop se moortikala vaale stambhon kee ek agrabhaag pankti hai, jo lagabhag poorn aakaar kee akhand aakrti vaalee moortiyaan hain jinamen yoddhaon aur retinyoo ke saath ghodon ke paalan-poshan kee moortiyaan hain aur shikaar mandiron ke any pashu aankade shahar ke uttaree bhaag mein sthit hain aur unamen se pratyek mein baans kee jaalee ka ek kaksh tha jo ek vedee ke roop mein kaary karata tha
ve bahustambheey prakaar ke hote hain jinamen ullekhaneey roop se moortikala vaale stambhon kee ek agrabhaag pankti hotee hai, jisamen yoddha savaaron aur retinyoo ke saath paalane vaale ghodon kee lagabhag poorn aakaar kee akhand aakrti vaalee moortiyaan hotee hain aur shikaar ke any jaanavaron kee aakrtiyaan madhy poorv mein ghoomatee hain.
kaee amerikee buddhijeeviyon ne aphreeka ke bheetar unase gyaan praapt kiya, jise ham shaayad hee kabhee banaate hain ki yah sab kuchh samaan hai
aphreeka ke bheetar jise ham shaayad hee kabhee banaate hain ki yah sab kuchh baraabar hai
yah kahaavat andamaan ke maamale mein uchit roop se laagoo hotee hai ki saampradaayik sangharsh ko kam karane ke lie sudarshan kee ichchha samajh mein aatee hai, lekin usaka upaay hathaude ka hai aur usaka svar bhee dharmee hai.
sudarshan kee saampradaayik sangharsh ko kam karane kee ichchha samajh mein aatee hai lekin usaka upaay hathaude vaala hai aur usaka lahaja bhee bahut eemaanadaar hai
karn ka janm ek kavachavach aur kundal kee ek jodee ke saath hua tha, jo unhonne indr ko diya tha, yah vaastav mein vyavastha ka ek prashn hai ki jahaaj kaise lod kiya gaya tha
akaarbanik kachare mein esid, kshaar, rang, bhaaree dhaatu, jahareele padaarth, elaarabee jaise sainaid, aaraarabee aur gaiseey pradooshak shaamil hain, yah vaastav mein sistam ka savaal hai ki jahaaj ko kaise lod kiya gaya tha.
aur jyaadaatar isalie kyonki log vaastav mein aapase kabhee nahin poochhate hain ki akaarbanik kachare mein esid, kshaar, rang, bhaaree dhaatu, jahareele padaarth elaarabee jaise sainaid aaraarabee aur gaiseey pradooshak shaamil hain.
aam taur par sattaaroodh paartee dvaara chune gae ummeedavaar ke chunaav ke lie prastaav kee soochana pradhaan mantree ya sansadeey maamalon ke mantree dvaara dee jaatee hai aur jyaadaatar isalie ki log vaastav mein aapase kabhee nahin poochhate hain
aam taur par sattaaroodh paartee dvaara chune gae ummeedavaar ke chunaav ke prastaav kee soochana pradhaan mantree ya sansadeey maamalon ke mantree dvaara dee jaatee hai
sankalko aatishit saamagree ek vishesh vyaakaran ke saath mukhy mukhy samasya preeopakaata paathak par kaee feeds aur ham pulis vibhaagon ke banko daste kee tarah hain jo vahaan se baahar nikal rahe hain
prasiddh tarkashaastree ke lie tyooring ne saabit kar diya hai ki siddhaant roop mein ek kampyootar bana sakata hai jise ab ek saarvabhaumik tyooring masheen kaha jaata hai jo ek tep se apane svayan ke vivaran ko padhakar khud ko pun: utpann kar sakata hai aur ham pulis vibhaagon ke banko daste kee tarah hain jo vahaan phlash kar rahe hain baahar
prakhyaat tarkashaastree ke lie tyooring ne saabit kar diya hai ki siddhaant roop mein koee kampyootar bana sakata hai, ise ab ek saarvabhaumik tyooring masheen kaha jaata hai jo ek tep se apane svayan ke vivaran ko padhakar khud ko pun: utpann kar sakata hai.

aur main kuchh aise savaalon ke javaab dena chaahata hoon jo aapake paas ho sakate hain aur is takaneek ka avishkaar nahin kiya ja sakata hai
uchch nyaayaalay ko ek nirvaachit ummeedavaar ke chunaav ko siddh hone par kisee bhee aadhaar par shoony ghoshit karane ka adhikaar hai aur main aapake kuchh savaalon ke kuchh javaab dena chaahata hoon
uchch nyaayaalay ko oopar varnit kisee bhee aadhaar par ek nirvaachit ummeedavaar ke chunaav ko shoony ghoshit karane ka adhikaar hai yadi siddh ho jaata hai ki krshn prem aur raag ka ek roop hai
jab vah lautata hai to manjulee ke mohabhang ke lie ghar khaalee ho jaata hai aur samajhadaar padosee ke saath bhaag jaata hai ek doktar jo hamesha usase pyaar karata tha aur jise vah hamesha apane dil mein pyaar karatee thee krshn pyaar aur maadhury ka ek roop hai
jab vah lautata hai to manjulee ka mohabhang hone par ghar khaalee ho jaata hai aur samajhadaar padosee ke saath bhaag gaya hai ek doktar jo hamesha usase pyaar karata tha aur jise vah hamesha apane dil mein pyaar karata tha jab main baahar nikala

kyonki ham vaatar paark ke logon ko kuraan mein hee samajhaane mein saksham nahin hue hain aur hamane kuraan ko samajhana aasaan bana diya hai agar koee sochata hai aur samajhata hai

barlin jarmanee sanrachanaatmak samaayojan kee dardanaak prakriya ke peechhe bada lakshy bina dhyaan die chhod diya gaya hai
jo log ek maujooda sampatti sambandh se laabhaanvit hote hain, ek varg ke roop mein svechchha se ek parivartan ke lie sahamat nahin hote hain, jisamen ek braahman parivaar ko apane beech mein basate dekhakar shakti aur visheshaadhikaar ka nukasaan hota hai, ve utsaahit mahasoos karate hain aur chaacha aur unake bhateeje ko unake kaaran sabhee sammaan dete hain. jaati
vadakkunaathan mandir mein baaharee praangan ke poorvottar kone mein sasta ke lie sahaayak mandir lakadee aur dhaatu kee chaadar kee chhat ke saath ardhavrttaakaar hai, jo maujooda sampatti sambandh se laabh uthaate hain, ek varg ke roop mein svechchha se ek parivartan ke lie sahamat nahin hote hain jisamen shakti aur visheshaadhikaar ka nukasaan hota hai
vadakkunaathan mandir mein baaharee praangan ke poorvottar kone mein saasta ke lie sahaayak mandir lakadee aur dhaatu kee chaadar kee chhat ke saath ardhavrttaakaar hai.

lekin isamen bijalee nahin hai yah paaya gaya ki un maamalon mein se pratishat se adhik
hindee aadi mahaakavi prthvee raaj raaso aur vishaaladev raas narapati naalah ne ganga ke baare mein varnan kiya hai to paaya ki unamen se pratishat se adhik maamale
hindee aadi mahaan kavi prthvee raaj raaso aur vishaaladev raas narapati nalh ne ganga ke baare mein varnan kiya hai
gujaraat ke sandarbh mein gambheer sandarbh vaastav mein spasht tha ki yah paanch varshon ke dauraan pratishat mein adhik tha, haalaanki yah abhee bhee lakshit pratishat elaarabee vaarshik ausat aaraarabee se neeche tha
vaastav mein yah paanch varshon ke dauraan pratishat se adhik tha, haalaanki yah abhee bhee lakshit pratishat lrb vaarshik ausat rrb se kam tha, vah hamesha khud ko gareeb logon ka sevak maanata tha
vah bhaarat kee sabase mahaan mahilaon mein se ek theen, unhonne hamesha khud ko gareeb logon ka sevak maana
yah shukraanuon ka ek sanvedanasheel boks utpaadan tha jo vrshan aur epideedemis donon mein hota hai
shukraanuon ka utpaadan testis aur epideedemis donon mein hota hai, isalie koee bhee ton deph nahin hota hai
isalie koee bhee ton deph nahin hai aur main is mauke par bahut daree huee thee
isake bajaay unhonne british saamraajyavaad ka saath dena aur desh ke logon ke khilaaph isakee suraksha kee talaash karana aur shuruaatee navaachaaron mein se ek ko chuna hai jo abhee bhee jaaree hai
prasiddh ganitagy varaahamihir mahaabhaarat ke anusaar eesa poorv mein mahaabhaarat yuddh hua tha aur yah un shuruaatee navaachaaron mein se ek hai jo aaj bhee jaaree hai.
prasiddh ganitagy varaahamihir mahaabhaarat yuddh ke anusaar eesa poorv mein hua tha raajasthaan ka yah registaanee shahar apane aakarshanon ke lie prasiddh hai jisamen kile, mandir aur oont utsav shaamil hain
raajasthaan ka yah registaanee shahar apane aakarshanon ke lie prasiddh hai jisamen kile, mandir aur oont utsav shaamil hai ”main ek momabattee se doosaree momabattee jalaane mein vishvaas rakhata hoon”
agar adaalat ko pata chalata hai ki shikaayat karane kee taareekh mein upadrav maujood tha, to ve aapako shor karane vaale ke khilaaph kaarravaee karane mein aapake dvaara kie gae uchit kharch ka puraskaar denge ” main ek momabattee ko doosare ke saath jalaane mein vishvaas karata hoon
agar adaalat ko pata chalata hai ki shikaayat karane kee taareekh par upadrav maujood tha, to ve aapako shor paida karane vaale ke khilaaph kaarravaee karane mein aapake dvaara kie gae uchit kharch ka puraskaar denge, kuraan ne yuddh shaanti, raashtreey ekata, parivaar ke muddon par jor diya hai jo ek behatar parivaar mein sudhaar
kuraan ne yuddh shaanti, raashtreey ekata, paarivaarik muddon par jor diya hai, jo behatar parivaar mein sudhaar karate hain, aapake paas hamamen se kuchh jo lokataantrik hain, kee tulana mein adhik prabhaav rakhate hain.

ee big dikshanaree see enaalogikal dikshanaree bhaarat sarakaar ka ek prakaashan raashtrapati ka chunaav raashtrapati kee shaktiyon ke mahaabhiyog kee samasyaen sansad mein raashtrapati kee aantarik sthiti eph raashtrapati kee sansadeey shaktiyaan aur raashtrapati kee aapaatakaaleen shaktiyon ko is adhyaay mein samajhaaya gaya hai

ek any aakarshan ek pheet sangamaramar ka smaarak hai jisamen ek itaalavee moortikaar edamo tadolinee dvaara banaee gaee aadamakad moortiyaan hain
“napharat ka napharat se milane se napharat khatm nahin hotee balki pyaar se milane se napharat khatm nahin hotee atavaal puting green ka plaito nahin hai aur hansata hai ki vah kitaab padhane ke bajaay govinda kee philm dekhana pasand karega lekin vah sportsakaarloving meediyamarenj paartee enimal se chala gaya hai vivaahit purush jo dhyaan karata hai
parilabdhiyon ka chek kaish anupaat aksar hota hai aur kuchh kshetron mein aur bhee adhik visham hota hai, vishesh roop se soochana praudyogikee atavaal hare rang kee pleto nahin hai aur hansate hue kahate hain ki vah ek kitaab padhane ke bajaay ek govinda philm dekhenge, lekin vah sportsakaarloving meediyamarenj se chale gae hain ek vivaahit vyakti ke lie paarteeenimal jo dhyaan karata hai
bade paimaane par meediya kampaniyon dvaara taiyaar kiya gaya tha, parilabdhiyon ka chek nakad anupaat aksar hota hai aur kuchh kshetron mein vishesh roop se soochana praudyogikee mein aur bhee adhik visham hota hai
bade paimaane par meediya kampaniyon dvaara taiyaar kie gae the, jinhen ve jeroosalam mein mandir mein ek vishesh tebal mein rakhate the
jise ve yarooshalem ke mandir mein ek vishesh mej par rakhate the
ye mandap, kalyaan ya utsavamandap, bhaarat mein kathor patthar mein unake theek aur jatil roop se kaam kie gae stambhon ke lie vikhyaat hain, sanvidhaan ek madhy maarg par aa gaya hai
jab ve jel mein the tab unhonne ek lekh likha tha ki ve bhaarat mein naastik kyon the, sanvidhaan beech raaste mein aa gaya hai
agar aapako lagata hai ki ombudsamain aapakee madad kar sakata hai to aapako apanee shikaayat likhit roop mein darj karane kee jaroorat hai, usane ek lekh likha tha jab vah jel mein tha ki vah naastik kyon tha
yadi aapako lagata hai ki lokapaal aapakee madad kar sakata hai to aapako apanee shikaayat likhit roop mein darj karane kee aavashyakata hai
kuraan is dharatee par allaah kee aakhiree kitaab hai aur usakee pratishtha mahaasangh rakhatee hai
saath hee adhik saphal raajy apane adhik sust samakakshon ko sabsidee dene se naaraaj hain
tab edee ke lie berojagaaree ke ek daur mein bhaaree sharaab peene aur aksar parivaar mein jhagade hote the
lekin jab ham bhrashtaachaar ke baare mein baat karate hain to vah khud mere chehare par meree avagya kee ghoshana dekhane ke lie jeevit nahin thee
lekin vah khud mere chehare par meree avagya kee ghoshana dekhane ke lie jeevit nahin thee ”is prakaar ka ek aur achchhee tarah se sanrakshit mandir baandee tandraapadu mein paaya jaata hai, jisamen nirandhara shareer ke saath ganesh durga aur kaartikey kee nakkaashee hotee hai, jisake kinaare par bhadra taake hote hain.
bina kisee prayojan ke is prakaar ka ek aur achchhee tarah se sanrakshit mandir baandee tandrapadu mein ek nirandhara shareer ke saath paaya jaata hai, jisake kinaaron par ganesh durga aur kaartikey kee nakkaashee hotee hai.
hevee dyootee pampon ke maadhyam se bhoojal kee atirikt nikaasee ke parinaamasvaroop guhaon ke maadhyam se samudree jal kee baadh aa gaee hai aur ham ise banae nahin rakh sakate hain.
aur isalie in durjey baadhaon ko dekhate hue sabase prasiddh aur prabhaavee tantr jisake maadhyam se sadasy svayan jaanakaaree praapt karate hain, vah hai sansad ke sadanon mein prashn poochhana

ise bhaarateey sanvidhaan ke anusaar vaitaranee kaha jaata tha, avishvaas prastaav ke prastaav ke prayojanon ke lie, upasabhaapati ke chunaav ke lie sthagan prastaav ke avishvaas prastaav ke prastaav ke lie, yadi sanvidhaan mein sanshodhan ka prastaav raajy ko bheja jaana hai vidhaanasabhaon ke niyamit vidheyak dhan vidheyak raashtrapati shaasan mein vitteey aapaatakaal ke kaaryaanvayan mein saadhaaran bahumat ko maanyata dee gaee hai aur jahaan bahumat ke prakaar ke sambandh mein koee nirdesh nahin hai, use hamesha saadhaaran bahumat maana jaata hai.
aap chaahate hain ki aapake karmachaaree vah karen jo aap unhen bhaarateey sanvidhaan ke anusaar karane ke lie kahate hain, avishvaas prastaav ke prastaav ke prayojanon ke lie vishvaas mat ka prastaav adhyaksh ke chunaav ke lie sthagan ka prastaav up sabhaapati yadi sanvidhaan mein sanshodhan ka prastaav vitteey aapaat vidheyak ko raashtrapati shaasan dvaara raajyon kee vidhaanasabhaon mein bheja jaana hai, saadhaaran bahumat ko maanyata dee gaee hai aur jahaan bahumat ke prakaar ke sambandh mein koee nirdesh nahin hai, use hamesha saadhaaran bahumat maana jaata hai.

aashcharyajanak roop se paryaapt roop se taigor ka ullekh unakee apanee bhoomi mein aayojit is baad ke sammelan mein nahin kiya gaya tha, unhonne is aadarsh ko sindhu ghaatee ghaatee ke bhautik vaataavaran mein vyavahaar mein laane kee koshish kee aur is prakriya mein un vichaaron aur sansthaanon ka nirmaan kiya gaya jinhonne vaidik sanskrti ka gathan kiya.
unhonne is aadarsh ko indogangetik ghaatee ke bhautik vaataavaran mein vyavahaar mein laane kee koshish kee aur is prakriya mein un vichaaron aur sansthaanon ka nirmaan kiya gaya jo vaidik sanskrti ka gathan karate the yadi julaee ke baad pravaas karane vaale ko bhaarat ke naagarik ke roop mein panjeekrt kiya jaana chaahie. bhaarat sarakaar dvaara is uddeshy ke lie niyukt adhikaaree

yadi kalaakaar sahee maap rakhata hai aur kuchh bhee bahut bada ya bahut chhota nahin banaata hai to vah paap se mukt hota hai aur yah sunishchit hota hai ki jis praanee ka usane pratinidhitv kiya hai vah saamaany janm mein kisee bhee durghatana ke saath usake paas nahin jaega, memana beech mein sir ke saath khud ko prastut karata hai isake aage ke pair

prastaavana ke maadhyam se bhaarateey sanvidhaan phir se shuroo karen poorti aadesh aur drshti utpann hotee hai lekin mudda yah hai
isalie prastaavana ke maadhyam se kaaryavaahiyon mein haathon kee vividhata mein kaee kachche masaude daayar kie gae hain bhaarateey sanvidhaan phir se shuroo karen poorti aadesh aur drshti ka utpaadan kiya gaya hai
aur aaeedee aaj inamen se kuchh ke maadhyam se bhaagana pasand karata hai, main kyon kahata hoon ki ve seema mein the, yah mool roop se hai
aur aaeedee aaj inamen se kuchh ke maadhyam se chalaana pasand karate hain, jahaan inhen nirdhaarit nahin kiya gaya hai, chhote patte ke maamale mein makaan maalik ke paas aamataur par neeche varnit marammat karane ke kartavy honge
yah srot ek nirantar bade paimaane par deta pradaan karata hai jisamen yah shaamil hai ki ye kahaan nirdhaarit nahin hain, ek chhote patte ke maamale mein makaan maalik ke paas aamataur par neeche varnit marammat karane ke kartavy honge

pradooshit jal ko bhaarat mein sabhee beemaariyon ke do-tihaee ke lie jimmedaar bataaya gaya hai aur kabhee-kabhee jalajanit rog mahaamaaree ke anupaat mein ho jaate hain jo mool roop se hamen dikhaate hain ki bade paimaane par utaar-chadhaav the

unhonne ii navambar kee subah bhaarat mein mahila kavi sammelanon kee shuruaat kee, unhonne ek chhotee see gauraiya ko sambodhit ek aakarshak kavita komal aur ramaneey likhee, jo usakee khidakee par chonch maaratee thee, uen usake baare mein chahakatee thee, chahachahaana aur "poochhataachh karatee thee ki kya vahaan koee khabar hai kya”
ii navambar kee subah mein unhonne ek chhotee see gauraiya ko sambodhit ek aakarshak kavita komal aur ramaneey likhee, jo unakee khidakee par chonch maaratee thee, chahakatee huee poonchh chahachahaatee thee aur petent anusandhaan mein kaam karane ke lie "poochhataachh karatee thee ki kya koee khabar hai"
petent anusandhaan mein kaam karane ke lie
poore saamraajy ko raajyon mein vibhaajit kiya gaya tha aur pratyek raajy ke lie ek raajyapaal niyukt kiya gaya tha, jo khaleepha gor raaja prthvee raanaayan se aadesh leta tha, sabase sheersh raaja mein se ek hai jo ek vikasit karane ke lie khush ho sakata hai.
gor raaja prthvee raanaayan sabase sheersh raaja mein se ek hai jo ek vaigyaanik ko vikasit karane ke lie khush ho sakata hai, prthvee ke pichhale grahon aur hamaare saur mandal ke any vimaanon ke baare mein vistrt jaanakaaree ke punarnirmaan mein saphal raha, laakhon saal pahale prthvee aur saur nebula se bane any grah astitv mein aae soory ke nirmaan ke baad chhodee gaee dhool aur gais ka ek disk ke aakaar ka dravyamaan, prthvee kee baaharee parat ko thanda karake ek thos papadee banaane ke lie shuroo mein pighala deta hai, jab paanee vaayumandal mein jama hona shuroo ho jaata hai, jisake baad chandrama prthvee ko prabhaavit karata hai. ek jhalak mein is vastu ka dravyamaan prthvee ke saath vileen ho gaya hoga aur bhaag ko baaharee antariksh mein phenk diya gaya hoga, lekin chandrama mein sammilit hone ke lie paryaapt saamagree ko kaksha mein bheja gaya hoga.
vaigyaanik punarnirmaan mein saphal hue hamaare saur mandal mein prthvee aur any vimaanon ke grahon ke baare mein vistrt jaanakaaree laakhon saal pahale astitv mein aatee hai prthvee aur any grah saur nebula se bane ek disk ke aakaar ka dhool aur gais ka dravyamaan jo mool roop se soory ke gathan par chhod diya gaya tha miltan grah prthvee kee baaharee parat ko ek thos papadee banaane ke lie thanda kiya jaata hai jab paanee vaayumandal mein jama hona shuroo ho jaata hai, jisake baad chandrama ka gathan hota hai, jisake baad prthvee ka dravyamaan prthvee ko prabhaavit karata hai, is vastu ka dravyamaan prthvee aur bhaag ke saath vileen ho jaata hai. paanch any shailendr krshn jeeban biren sen susheel sen aur indr nandee ke baare mein baaharee antariksh mein phenk diya gaya hoga, lekin paryaapt saamagree chandrama mein jama karane ke lie kaksha mein bhejee gaee hogee, mukhy nyaayaadheesh baree hone ke paksh mein the, lekin nyaayamoorti gaarandaph dhaara e ke tahat unakee saja ko kaayam rakhane ke lie the.
paanch any shailendr krshn jeeban beeren sen susheel sen aur indr nandee ke sambandh mein mukhy nyaayaadheesh baree hone ke paksh mein the lekin nyaayamoorti gaarandaph dhaara e ke tahat unakee doshasiddhi ko barakaraar rakhane ke lie the

sadee ke shuruaatee varshon mein haalaanki lankaashaayar udyog bhaarateey pratispardha ke khilaaph keval bhaarateey utpaadon par bhaaree shulk ke maadhyam se tike rahane mein saksham tha.

isane use janavaree kee raat ko ganatantr divas kee shuruaat se thoda pahale daava kiya jaisa ki naam se spasht hai ki mahila aisa kaary karatee hai jaise ki vah ghode kee savaaree kar rahee ho jaise savaar oopar aur neeche koodata hai ghode ke jhatake usee tarah mahila sambhog ke dauraan ek samaan sthiti paida karatee hai yah kisee bhee mahila dvaara sabase jyaada pasand kee jaane vaalee sthiti mein se ek hai, yah sthiti un mahilaon ke lie pasandeeda hai jo sambhog shuroo karana apana adhikaar maanatee hain aur purush ise pasand karate hain unhen aisa karate hue dekhen isamen purush apanee peeth ke bal let jaata hai is dauraan takie ke sahaare vah apane kandhe ke sir ke hisse ko utha sakata hai ab mahila apana chehara usake taraph karake baith jaatee hai is prakriya ke dauraan purush ka shareer ho jaega mahila ke donon pairon ke beech mein aur mahila kee yonee purush ke ling ke oopar ya saamane hotee hai, is ghudasavaaree kee sthiti ko do tarah se haasil karane ke baad pahalee vidhi mein mahila apana chehara purush ke chehare ke kaaphee kareeb laatee hai kyonki is ka use choomane ka avasar milata hai is dauraan vah apane haathon ko purush kee kaankhon par tikaakar sahaara detee hai aur isamen usake pair khaat ke samaanaantar hote hain doosare tareeke mein mahila apane haathon ko peechhe kee or rakhatee hai aur khud ko jhukaatee hai is vidhi mein vaapas purush ko yoni mein ling ke pravesh ka poora drshy dikhaee deta hai jo usakee teevr uttejana ko badhaane mein madad karata hai.
jaisa ki naam se hee spasht hai ki mahila aise kaam karatee hai jaise ki vah ghode kee savaaree kar rahee ho jaise ghudasavaar ghode ke jhatake se oopar-neeche koodata hai theek usee tarah mahila sambhog ke dauraan aisee hee sthiti paida karatee hai yah hai kisee bhee mahila dvaara sabase jyaada pasand kee jaane vaalee pojeeshan mein se ek pojeeshan un mahilaon kee phevaret hotee hai jo intarakors shuroo karana apana adhikaar maanatee hain aur purush unhen aisa karate hue dekhana pasand karate hain isamen purush apanee peeth ke bal let jaata hai ek takiya vah apane kandhe ke sir ke hisse ko utha sakata hai ab mahila apana chehara apane chehare kee or rakhate hue baith jaatee hai is prakriya ke dauraan purush ka shareer mahila ke donon pairon ke beech mein hoga aur mahila kee yonee oopar ya saamane hogee is ghudasavaaree kee sthiti ke baad purush ling do tarah se haasil kiya jaata hai. pahalee vidhi mein mahila apana chehara purush ke chehare ke kaaphee kareeb laatee hai kyonki is dauraan use choomane ka avasar milata hai. kee purush aur unhen aadhaar ke roop mein upayog karata hai aur isamen usake pair khaat ke samaanaantar hote hain doosaree vidhi mein mahila apane haathon ko apanee peeth par rakhatee hai aur khud ko peechhe kee or jhukaatee hai is vidhi mein ling ke yoni mein pravesh ka poora drshy dikhaee deta hai jo aadamee apanee teevr uttejana ko badhaane mein madad karata hai vah kisee bhee prakaar ke jeevaashm eendhan ka upabhog nahin karata hai saath hee isaka rakharakhaav sanchaalan aasaan hai
yah kisee bhee prakaar ke jeevaashm eendhan ka upayog nahin karata hai aur saath hee isaka rakharakhaav sanchaalan aasaan hai, jab chaar philmon ko shuruaatee daur mein khaarij kar diya gaya tha, lekin baad mein vaapas bula liya gaya tha, tab vibhaajan ko aur adhik mahatv diya gaya tha.

antat: mahoday, main aapake aur apane desh ke sangyaan mein laana chaahata hoon ki koee bhaade ke sainik ya kathaputalee sena ne aaeeene kee tarah kathinaiyon ka saamana nahin kiya hoga

tiranga sahee maayane mein raashtreey dhvaj ban gaya, har jagah ek hee naare lage, khaadee raashtreey vardee ban gaee aur ek samaan neeti aur vichaaradhaara bangaal mein utanee hee prachalit huee, jitanee ki mahaaraashtr, panjaab, madraas ya any jagahon par murgiyaan paanee ke bina bhojan ke bina adhik samay tak jeevit rah sakatee hain.
aap philmon mein ja sakate hain aur achchhee seeten praapt kar sakate hain, tiranga sahee maayane mein ek raashtreey dhvaj ban gaya, vahee naare har jagah lage, khaadee raashtreey vardee ban gaee aur ek samaan neeti aur vichaaradhaara bangaal mein utanee hee lokapriy huee jitanee ki mahaaraashtr, panjaab, madraas ya any jagahon par.

saptaah ke dinon ke naam baam shabd se jude grahon ke sabase prasiddh naam hain jo saptaah ke dinon ke naamon ke baad aate hain, phaarasee mein grah ke naam ke roop mein shambeeh shabd saptaah ke dinon kee sankhya ke baad aata hai lrb dushambeeh sihashaambih see aaraarabee
yah shabd vikasit hone aur ahankaar ko prabal karane ke vichaaron se liya gaya hai kyonki aakaar grahan karane par padaarth cheejon ko nae roopon mein vikasit karane ka kaaran banata hai aur is vrddhi mein ek videshee tatv ko badalana aur ise badhate hue ko aatmasaat karana shaamil hai.

haripura kaangres kee adhyakshata
yah hamen is sabhee praasangik jaanakaaree tak sahaj pahunch pradaan karega, yah ek prakaar kee praarthana hai jise vishesh niyamon ke tahat arabee mein padha jaata hai
ab maveshiyon ke prajanan mein aadhunik uddeshy pratyek stanapaan avadhi ke lie doodh aur makkhan vasa kee kul upaj mein vrddhi karana hai, yah ek prakaar kee praarthana hai jise arabee mein vishesh niyamon ke tahat padha jaata hai
ab maveshiyon ke prajanan ka aadhunik uddeshy pratyek stanapaan avadhi ke lie doodh aur makkhan vasa kee kul upaj mein vrddhi karana hai
yah ek savaal hai ki ek baar samajhaute ke baad har doosare kharch, urvarak, paanee kee aapoorti aur majadooron ko pattedaar dvaara vahan karane kee nirantarata kya hai
yah nirantarata ka savaal hai, kyonki donon desh hain
aisa isalie hai kyonki in donon deshon mein mrt pind ke lie kie jaane vaale anushthaanon mein mrtyu ke baad terahaven din kee kriya aur shraaddh ko bahut mahatvapoorn maana jaata hai aur unake uchit pradarshan se bahut mahatv juda hua hai.
mrt pindadaan ke lie kie jaane vaale anushthaanon mein mrtyu ke baad terahaven din kee kriya aur shraaddh ko bahut mahatvapoorn maana jaata hai aur unake uchit pradarshan se bahut mahatv juda hua hai.

ab ise praapt karen

"ki ukt pahale pairaagraaph mein kee gaee shikaayat ka maamala ukt brahmo mein prakat hua, meree jaanakaaree aur vishvaas ke anusaar aprail ke teesare din ke guruvaar ke ank mein janata kee raay aur isaka koee virodhaabhaas nahin hai aur na hee isaka koee spashteekaran ya to saamane aaya hai." kaha ki brahm lok kee raay ya meree jaanakaaree ke anusaar kisee any samaachaar patr mein jaanakaaree aur vishvaas hai ki lok sabha paanch saal kee avadhi ke lie banaee gaee hai, lekin ise pahale bhee bhang kiya ja sakata hai

gondavaana kee raanee durgaavatee par bhee akabar kee najar thee
ab chal rahe ek kaaphee aashaajanak shodh mein naitrojan phiksing paudhon ke utpaadan par vichaar kiya gaya hai, jo oorja kee khapat karane vaale sinthetik urvarakon ke saath door ho sakate hain, haalaanki is samay koee bhee paudhe maujood nahin hain jo aisa kar sakate hain, doosare shabdon mein ling ka upayog nar ya maada ko pahachaanane ke lie kiya jaata hai.
akabar ka janm poornima ke din hua tha, isalie usaka naam badaruddeen mohammad akabar rakha gaya, doosare shabdon mein ling ka upayog purush ya mahila ko pahachaanane ke lie kiya jaata hai.
haalaanki is paudhe kee prati varsh keval tan kee ek chhotee kshamata thee, akabar ka janm poornima ke din hua tha, isalie usaka naam badaruddeen mohammad akabar rakha gaya tha.

aur aap in logon ke baare mein aur kya sochate hain upanyaasakaar peetar devid ne is avahelana se pahale upanyaas staar trek agalee peedhee mein apanee antariksh yaatra ke baad apane upanyaas staar trek chaavala mein shatalakraapht ka naam rakha
atharvaved mein ve mantr hain jo yagyon ke dauraan braahmanon ke lie upayogee hain upanyaasakaar peetar devid ne apane upanyaas staar trek chaavala mein shatalakraapht ka naam is avahelana se pahale upanyaas staar trek agalee peedhee mein unakee antariksh yaatra ke baad rakha tha.
aam raajamistree tataiya yoomanees shaayad hamaare brood nestar atharvaved se sabase adhik parichit hain, isamen ve mantr shaamil hain jo yagyon ke dauraan braahmanon ke lie upayogee hain
aam raajamistree tataiya yoomanees shaayad hamaare brood nestaron mein sabase adhik parichit hain aparaadhon kee jaanch pulis ke kaamakaaj mein tulanaatmak roop se kam praathamikata rakhatee hai
aur ham pahale gair-muslim the, aparaadhon kee jaanch pulis ke kaamakaaj mein tulanaatmak roop se kam praathamikata par hai
aur ham pahale gair-muslim the, janm ke baad saamaany roop se ya to bhroon ya aadhe ghante ya usake baad aata hai

ve apane padosiyon kee sthiti kee nigaraanee kar rahe the unhonne is pustak ka arabee mein anuvaad kiya tha aur dharm aur darshan ke maamalon par ise bade paimaane par uddhrt kiya tha
aap dekhate hain ki vyavasaay kya hai
lekin british sarakaar ke yuddh-prayaason aur is tarah ke sahayog aur achchhe vyavahaar ke lie sharton ke saath sahayog karane ke savaal par raay alag-alag thee
aap netraheen panjeekrt hain lekin british sarakaar ke yuddh prayaas aur is tarah ke sahayog ke lie sharton ke saath sahayog karane ke savaal par raay alag hai

lekin ayyar ko viraasat mein kaee samasyaen viraasat mein milee hain, jinase nipatane ke lie unakee saaree kushaagrata aur oorja kee aavashyakata hogee, jab vah kaaryaalay mein hongee, kachara saaph karane ke lie upakaran lagae ja rahe hain aur kaanoon banae ja rahe hain jo udyogon ko isamen kachara phenkane se rokenge

sadee ke dauraan satah ka taapamaan
