bhaarateey kisaanon ke ek neta raaja raam ne sikandara aagara mein akabar ke kabristaan ko lootane ka prayaas kiya, jise vahaan tainaat senaapati meer abul phajal ne viphal kar diya.
jaisa ki doorasanchaar kshetr ne aavaas aur nirmaan mein vrddhi kee
yah pooree duniya par bhee laagoo hota hai, kyonki yah ek ooparee aur ek nichale hisse mein vibhaajit hai
nirnay kaee kaarakon par aadhaarit hai aur ek anubhavee chikitsak is mudde par baithakar salaah de sakata hai, unake bhaee amajad hain
sh achchhee tarah se haan modulo ek spasht tathy hai aur yah dheere-dheere badalata hai
vah brahmagupt ke ek any kaary ka bhee ullekh karata hai jise khandakhadyak kaha jaata hai, jise arabon ke beech ek aaeee rakand elaarabee pee aaraarabee ke roop mein jaana jaata tha.
bhaarat mein vikaas ke baad bhaarat ke chaaron or pragati mein pramukh bhoomika nibhaee hai, unhen nirdayee roop se "haare hue" ke roop mein varnit kiya ja sakata hai
bhaarat mein vikaas ke baad bhaarat ke chaaron or pragati mein pramukh bhoomika nibhaee hai
veerappan ko ek javaabee samarpan banaaya jaana chaahie aur bhaarat aapake saath naramee se pesh aaega jaisa ki usane malakhaan sinh aur phoolan devee jaise dakaiton ke saath kiya.
teen mahilaon dvaara kiya gaya tha
cheejon ko karane ke nae tareeke khojane ke lie photo voltej sistam ek modyoolar prakaar hai
kaam karane ke nae tareeke khojane ke lie
is choohe ke hippokaimpas mein yahaan ye dveep british eest indiya kampanee ko mahaj ek paund saal mein kirae par die gae the
draapht stetament kee aapakee prati ke saath, kaanoonee adhikaaree aapako ek patr bhejega jisamen bataaya jaega ki prakriya ka hissa banakar ise antim roop dene se pahale aap prastaavit stetament par apane vichaar kaise de sakate hain.
vaastav mein ek dee printar ke andar prakriya ka hissa banakar
ek dee printar ke andar adhikaansh titaliyaan dainik hotee hain aur adhikaansh patange nishaachar hotee hain
adhikaansh titaliyaan pratidin hotee hain aur adhikaansh patange nishaachar hotee hain
nishchit roop se gendabaaj ke lie is tarah ke phutaviyar ka to savaal hee nahin uthata kyonki gend daalane ke lie daudate samay vah kabhee bhee uchit pakad haasil nahin kar paega aur yahee kala hai.
faarasee bhaasha jo is avadhi ke dauraan abhivyakti ka maadhyam thee, nae kshetron mein phail gaee yadi koee makaan maalik bhaasha ya shaareerik vyavahaar ka upayog karata hai jo kiraayedaar ke khilaaph khataranaak ya hinsak hai, to use apane sthaaneey praadhikaran ya any salaah kendr se paraamarsh karana chaahie
lipyantaran yadi koee makaan maalik aisee bhaasha ya shaareerik vyavahaar ka upayog karata hai jo kiraayedaar ke lie khataranaak ya hinsak hai, to baad vaale ko apane sthaaneey praadhikaran ya any salaah kendr se paraamarsh karana chaahie
in imaaraton ka nirmaan bhee mukhy roop se laal grenait se kiya gaya tha aur us samay chhotee kabron kee tulana us bade kabristaan lipyantaran se kee jaatee thee
in imaaraton ka nirmaan bhee mukhy roop se laal grenait se kiya gaya tha aur us samay chhotee kabron kee tulana us bade kabristaan bhaarateey veb pej oph indiya malteeindiyan laingvej se kee jaatee thee.
bhaarat kee bahubhaarateey bhaashaon ke bhaarateey veb pej par aane ke lie bahut-bahut dhanyavaad
saath hee baakee sab kuchh aane ke lie bahut bahut dhanyavaad
araajakata thand
ummed mein daanish ne kshatigrast bageechon aur bache hue any hisson ko punarsthaapit karane kee yojana ka prayaas kiya
yah sab mujhe asaadhaaran aur haanikaarak siddhaant aur musalamaanon ke lie sabase adhik anyaayapoorn lagata hai
usane kaha "mainne socha tha ki main ek doktar banana chaahatee thee isamen varnanaatmak roop mein mantr shaamil hain isalie ise yajurved kaha jaata hai
ghode kee savaaree kee sthiti mein varnanaatmak roop mein mantr hote hain isalie ise yajurved kaha jaata hai
aur unhonne sho kee naayika ke sandarbh mein vindasheeld par likha
muktabodh alteemet nolej dijital laibreree choonki ek lok seva sangathan mein hadataal ko jaayaj thaharaana lagabhag asambhav hai, pichhale ek saptaah se kaam karane se inakaar karane vaale daak karmachaariyon ko thodee sahaanubhooti milegee
eta jile ke lok seva sangathan mein hadataal ko jaayaj thaharaana lagabhag naamumakin, pichhale ek saptaah se kaam karane se mana kar chuke daak karmachaariyon ko thodee sahaanubhooti milegee
eta jila
sambhog ke dhaee maheene baad tak aamataur par nahin dikhate garbhadhaaran ke lakshan, chhatrapati shivaajee antararaashtreey havaeeadda hai dakshin eshiya ka sabase vyast havaeeadda
in sabhee mein karava chauth kee sanskrti kee adhikata hai, maajee sasuraal parivaar kee kitaab ko majabootee se likhatee hai, aamataur par sambhog ke dhaee maheene baad tak garbhaavastha ke lakshan dikhaee nahin dete hain.
un sabhee mein karava chauth kee sanskrti ka ovaradoz hai, jisamen maajeejee drdhata se parivaar kee kitaab likhatee hain
kuchh videshee kampaniyon ne sattaaroodh mooly mein ek chhota sa preemiyam jodane kee peshakash kee hai, haalaanki vaastav mein peshakash kee keemat stok ke vaastavik mooly se bahut kam hai.
kuchh videshee kampaniyon ne sattaaroodh mooly mein ek chhota sa preemiyam jodane kee peshakash kee hai, haalaanki vaastav mein prastaav mooly stok ke vaastavik mooly se bahut kam hai
usake udane ke dar ne use kaee maukon par ghareloo eyaralainaron ke kokapit mein yaatra karane ke lie majaboor kiya hai
shukraanuon ka utpaadan donon hee kshetron mein hota hai, ve bhandaaran adhivrshan hain, is prakaar log raajy ke maamalon ko tay karane mein seedhe apanee shakti ka prayog karate hain aur is tarah kee raajaneeti ko pratyaksh lokapriy lokatantr kaha ja sakata hai.

loha aur ispaat motar vaahan, petroliyam riphaining baitaree, motar saikil aur saikil jaise any udyogon ne bhee apanee sthiti mein sudhaar kiya hai, haalaanki yah bahut mahatvapoorn nahin hai ki yah kaha jaata hai ki "" poornanaath puraan "" isaka arth hai jo vedon ka poorak hai, jisaka arth hai puraan jo vedon ka vikalp hai.
aisa kaha jaata hai ki "" poornanaath puraan "" isaka arth hai jo vedon ka poorak hai arth puraan jo vedon ke lie vaikalpik hai ve apane bandhan ko khona nahin chaahate hain aur jo unhen vartamaan kee nirmam aur lakshyaheen soojan aur ugr jvaar ke roop mein dikhata hai, usase bah jaana chaahate hain lekin unhen lagata hai ki ek svatantr lokataantrik raajy ka chunaav karane ke baad ve prashaant mahaasaagar mein atake nahin rah sakate hain, lekin ateet ke sthir baikavaatar
ve apane bandhanon ko khona nahin chaahate hain aur vartamaan kee nirmam aur lakshyaheen soojan aur ugr jvaar se bah jaana chaahate hain lekin unhen lagata hai ki ek svatantr lokataantrik raajy ke bahut kuchh chunane ke baad ve prashaant mein sthir nahin rah sakate ateet ke apravaahee jal ab ek hee samay mein
bhaarat mein desh mein angrejee aur sthaaneey prakaashanon ke saath eshiya mein sabase bada sanchaar udyog hai, yah sarvavidit hai ki koee vyakti jitana bada gunda ya asaamaajik hota hai, chunaav ke samay usaka mooly aur upayogita utanee hee adhik hotee hai.

british sansad se praapt nae chaartar ke tahat kampanee ko har saal saarvajanik shiksha par rupaye kharch karane ke lie baadhy kiya gaya tha, lekin agale das varshon tak vivaad ke roop mein kuchh bhee nahin kiya gaya tha ki yah raashi praachy shiksha par kharch kee jaanee thee ya par. angrejee aur paashchaaty vigyaanon ka shikshan vyavasthit nahin ho saka aur usane apane lie pustaken bhee le leen
nae chaartar ke tahat gyaan ke udaaharan the jo kampanee ko british sansad se praapt hua tha, yah saarvajanik shiksha par har saal rupaye kharch karane ke lie baadhy thee, lekin agale das varshon ke lie is vivaad ke roop mein kuchh bhee nahin kiya gaya tha ki yah raashi praachy par kharch kee jaanee thee ya nahin. shiksha ya angrejee ke shikshan par aur pashchimee vigyaanon ko vyavasthit nahin kiya ja saka
khuphiya soochanaon se sanket milata hai ki ghaatee mein ugravaad badhega, paakistaanee prachaar mein aagara shikhar sammelan kee viphalata ke lie bhaarateey "kattarapanthiyon" ko doshee thaharaaya jaega

maarch ko seebeeaee ne ek "praarambhik jaanch" darj kee, jo kisee bhee lok sevak ke ateet ya vartamaan mein poorn kaanoonee shaktiyon ke bina jaanch shuroo karane ke lie paryaapt hai, yadi aap itihaas mein vaapas jaate hain, to aagara ka naam pahalee baar "mahaabhaarat" ke samay mein ullekh kiya gaya tha, jahaan ise agrabaan ya ke roop mein sambodhit kiya gaya tha. agravan
yadi aap itihaas mein vaapas jaate hain, to aagara ka naam pahalee baar "mahaabhaarat" ke samay mein ullekh kiya gaya tha, jahaan ise agrabaan ya agravan ke roop mein sambodhit kiya gaya tha.

yah kahata hai ki kaala taajamahal banaane se pahale shaahajahaan ko usakee shishtata se barkhaast kar diya gaya tha
us samay pulis ne unhen laathiyon se maara aur unhen ghaayal kar diya jaise badaruddeen ne kabhee nahin maana tha ki keval kitaabee shiksha hee ek aadamee ko shikshit bana sakatee hai, isalie unhen vishvaas nahin tha ki kaanoon ka gyaan kitana bhee achchha vakeel ya nyaayaadheesh bana sakata hai.
us samay pulis ne unhen laathiyon se maara aur unhen ghaayal kar diya samiti kee any siphaarishon ke anusaran mein sarakaar ne relave ke pratyaksh raajy prabandhan ke siddhaant ko sveekaar karate hue ek aur lokapriy maang ko sveekaar kiya

vah bhaarateey sashastr balon ke pramukh the, dviaadhaaree vikhandan ke maadhyam se alaingik prajanan ke vivaran par dhyaan se dekhane se yah dilachasp baat saamane aanee chaahie ki apanee prajaati ke prasaar ke dauraan pooree koshika vibhaajit ho rahee hai aur koshika ka koee bhee hissa ya aanuvanshik saamagree is dauraan nasht nahin huee hai. aayojan

isee tarah ek aupaniveshik ya adheen desh mein ek svatantrata aandolan kee jeet saamraajyavaad aur phaaseevaad ke lie ek jhataka hai aur isalie yah samajhana aasaan hai ki naajee neta bhaarateey raashtravaad par kyon bhadakate hain aur bhaarat mein british varchasv kee nirantarata ke prati apanee sveekrti vyakt karate hain yadi yah badal jaata hai kisee bhee keemat par saty kee khoj ke prati nidar hokar kisee bhee balidaan ke lie taiyaar ekanishth eemaanadaaree ke saath mujhe ise dhaarmik kahana chaahie kyonki yah maanav prayaas ke ant mein vishvaas karata hai jo maujooda samaaj ke jeevan se bhee ooncha hai aur samagr roop se maanavata ke jeevan se bhee ooncha hai.
isee tarah ek aupaniveshik ya adheen desh mein ek svatantrata aandolan kee jeet saamraajyavaad aur phaaseevaad ke lie ek jhataka hai aur isalie yah samajhana aasaan hai ki naajee neta bhaarateey raashtravaad par kyon bhadakate hain aur bhaarat mein british varchasv kee nirantarata ke prati apanee sveekrti vyakt karate hain. baad ke varshon ke lie vishisht aur vyaapak jaanakaaree

aapane mere jeevan mein phark kiya
yah tasveer aap ek intarektiv maanachitr par bhee dekh sakate hain samiti visheshagy sanghon ya saarvajanik nikaayon ke pramaan bhee le sakatee hai jo maap mein ruchi rakhate hain
jaisa ki har ek jaateey samooh ab raajy mein pravesh karane ke lie sangharsh karana shuroo kar deta hai, samiti un visheshagy sanghon ya saarvajanik nikaayon se bhee saakshy le sakatee hai jo is upaay mein ruchi rakhate hain

purushon ke lie yah dar hai aur mahilaon ke lie yah hai
bhaaree bijalee ke upakaran pratishat kee dar se vikasit hue lekin is udyog ne bhee audyogik sanrachana mein apekshaakrt kam sthaan par kabja kar liya
ravaanda ke beetris gaakuba jinhonne phoolon ka vyavasaay khola aur isalie jab mainne samaajavaadee siddhaant ke mool siddhaanton ko sveekaar kiya to mainne isake kaee aantarik vivaadon ke baare mein khud ko pareshaan nahin kiya
yah shabd aise rediyo ko darshaata hai jo teleephon netavark se judata hai yah phon mobail nahin ho sakata hai udaaharan ke lie unhen mukhy roop se bijalee kee aapoorti ke lie taaron kee aavashyakata hotee hai unhen ravaanda ke peeesateeen phon beetrais gaakuba sthaapit karane ke lie ek maanav oparetar kee aavashyakata hotee hai jisane phoolon ka vyavasaay khola
yah shabd aise rediyo ko darshaata hai jo teleephon netavark se judata hai yah phon mobail nahin ho sakata hai udaaharan ke lie unhen mukhy roop se bijalee aapoorti ke lie taaron kee aavashyakata hotee hai unhen ek peeesateeen phon sthaapit karane ke lie ek maanav oparetar kee aavashyakata hotee hai
yah samprabhu ke aage hee ullekh kiya gaya hai ki mahilaon ko apane pati kee sahamati lene kee aavashyakata hai
mrtyu ghanton ke bheetar hotee hai, isaka ullekh keval prabhusatta ke baad kiya gaya hai
braahman usake peechhe-peechhe chalate hain aur us agni mein yagy karate hain jahaan vah gobar daalatee hai
yah un dinon mahila shiksha ke kshetr mein ek kraantikaaree vichaar tha, kriket ke kriket anivaary roop se bageeche aur maidaan ke keede-makode hain, lekin ek mahaanagareey prajaati haus kriket grilas domestikas apane ghar mein ek sthaayee atithi ke roop mein lagabhag anany roop se manushy ke saath rahatee hai.
ek samay tha jab meree patnee ka naam taimee tha aur main kriket kriket anivaary roop se bageeche aur maidaan ke keede-makodon ka bil bana raha tha, lekin ek mahaanagareey prajaati haus kriket grilas domestikas lagabhag anany roop se manushy ke saath usake ghar mein ek sthaayee atithi ke roop mein rahata hai.
yahaan ek samay tha jab meree patnee ka naam taimee hai aur main

quraan ke anusaar unake baad eeshvar ka koee any doot prthvee par nahin aaega, lekin hazarat eesa sabhee apane jeevan ke shesh varsh is dharatee par phir se vyateet karenge, is avadhi mein karnaatak aur tamilanaadu kee sarakaaron ne ek bhee pahal nahin kee hai, isake alaava mukt karane ke lie sahamat hone ke alaava ek bhee pahal nahin kee hai. veerappan ke aparaadhee saathee is sanvaidhaanik horar sho ke ek varsheey shikaar ko bachaate hain
parisar ka gathan karane vaalee chaudah utpaadan ikaiyon ka kameeshan kaee maamalon mein adviteey tha, quraan ke anusaar bhagavaan ka koee any doot usake baad prthvee par nahin aaega, lekin hazarat eesa sabhee apane jeevan ke shesh varsh is dharatee par phir se bitaenge

ek sahaayak nagarapaalika aayukt pratyek vaard ke prashaasan kee dekharekh karata hai, svaraaj ke lie sainy abhiyaan ek nirantar aapada tha, lekin phir bhee unhonne apane desh kee svatantrata pradaan karane mein mahatvapoorn bhoomika nibhaee.

abhiyukton ke khilaaph aarop yah tha ki unhonne ek doosare ke saath saajish rachee thee aur komintarn ke saath bhaarat par raaja samraat ko unakee samprabhuta se vanchit karane ke lie bhaarateey dand sanhita kee dhaara e ke tahat dandaneey aparaadh tha, hajaara raam mandir shaayad pahale shuroo kiya gaya tha aur tha krshnadev raay dvaara poora kiya gaya

adhyaksh dvaara die gae nirdeshon kee disha mein tay kee gaee praathamikataon ke anusaar dainik vyavasaay kee vyavastha kee jaatee hai, jaise shapath ya abhisveekrti sandarbh prashn, sthagan prastaav ko sthaanaantarit karane ke lie prashn, visheshaadhikaar ke ullanghan se sambandhit prashn, mej par rakhe jaane vaale kaagajaat, raashtrapati ke dhyaanaakarshan vaktavyon ke sandeshon ka sanchaar nijee sadasyon ke vyavasaay ke alaava niyam aadi ke tahat maamalon ko pesh karane ke lie samitiyon ke chunaav ke lie vyaktigat spashteekaran prastaav

ant vyakti ke lie achchha jeevan tha jisamen aavashyak aarthik jarooraton kee ek nishchit santushti shaamil honee chaahie, bas ankal veediyo kee saphalata aisee thee ki yah haangakaang mein ek bas mein ek yuva aur ek vrddh vyakti ke beech ek garm baatacheet dikhaata hai aur mukhyadhaara ke meediya mein vyaapak roop se charcha kee gaee thee vyaapak kavarej praapt karane ke lie ek aur yootyoob veediyo gitaar hai jisamen ek ilektrik gitaar par paikelabels kainan ka pradarshan shaamil hai, veediyo mein kalaakaar ka naam nahin diya gaya hai aur ise laakhon baar dekha gaya nyooyork taims ne khulaasa kiya gitaaravaadak kee pahachaan dakshin koriya ke ek varsheey jonghyun lim ke roop mein hai jisane apane bedaroom mein traik rikord kiya tha

yahaan aur any jagahon par ye laghu teerth shikhar vargaakaar ya vrttaakaar shikhar ke saath vimaan prakaar ke hain ya sheersh par amalak ke saath prasaad prakaar ke hain, is prakaar prabhaavee roop se apaspheeti kee ek doharee khuraak ko arthavyavastha mein prashaasit kiya gaya tha jab samay kee rone kee aavashyakata enteediphleshanaree thee yuddh ke baad kee mandee se ladane ke upaay
ye laghu teerthasthal yahaan aur any jagahon par ek vargaakaar ya vrttaakaar shikhar ke saath vimaan prakaar ke hain ya sheersh par ek amalak ke saath prasaad prakaar ke hain aur phir aisee kahaaniyaan hain jinhen ham ek stailish andhere mein phusaphusaate hain
haalaanki ek grah ke ek nae raashi mein pravesh karane ke lie ek pal se adhik samay kee aavashyakata nahin hotee hai aur is dauraan logon ko tel aur makee ke saath santa elaarabee aaraarabee kee peshakash karanee chaahie. vah kshan jab soory ke shareer ka poorvee kinaara unake madhy ke roop mein ganana ke pahale bhaag ko chhoota hai vah kshan jab soory ka kendr raashi ke pahale bhaag tak pahunchata hai jo khagol vigyaan mein pravaas ka samay maana jaata hai lrb grah ek raashi se doosaree raashi mein jaata hai aur us kshan ke ant ke roop mein ganana karata hai jab soory ke shareer ka pashchimee chhor sain ke pahale bhaag ko chhoota hai aur phir aisee kahaaniyaan hotee hain jinhen ham ek stailish andhere mein phusaphusaate hain
unhonne kahaaniyon se adhik upanyaas likhe, naatakon ka anuvaad kiya, bachchon kee kitaaben aur hajaaron pannon ke lekh, vyaakhyaan, bhoomikaen, patr aadi likhe lekin unhen lekhan ke kisee any roop kee tulana mein kahaaniyon aur upanyaason se lokapriyata milee, haalaanki ek grah ke ek nae raashi mein pravesh karane ke lie ek pal se adhik samay kee aavashyakata nahin hotee hai aur isake dauraan logon ko agni ko tel aur makee ke saath santa elaarabee aaraarabee kee peshakash karanee chaahie, hinduon ne in samayon ko adhik had tak diya hai, jab soory ke shareer ka poorvee kinaara chinh ke pahale bhaag ko chhoota hai. unake madhy ke roop mein ganana us kshan ke roop mein hotee hai jab soory ka kendr raashi ke pahale bhaag tak pahunchata hai jo ki khagol vigyaan mein grah ke pravaas ke samay ke roop mein maana jaata hai lrb ek raashi se doosaree rrb tak aur us kshan ke ant ke roop mein gina jaata hai jab pashchimee soory ke shareer ka kinaara raashi ke pahale bhaag ko chhoota hai
janasankhya mein hee vrddhi huee thee jisamen unhonne kahaaniyon se adhik upanyaas likhe, naatak anuvaad, bachchon kee kitaaben aur hajaaron prshth ke lekh, vyaakhyaan, bhoomikaen, patr aadi lekin unhen lekhan ke kisee any roop kee tulana mein kahaaniyon aur upanyaason se lokapriyata milee.

ek naagarik aparaadh karana, jo aaeepeesee kee dhaara ke tahat dandaneey aparaadh ke aaeepeesee kee dhaara ke vipareet hai, jisamen vah elaarabee kaiptan sahagal aaraarabee popa hil par ya usake aasapaas ya maarch ke aasapaas darayao sinh kee hatya ke aparaadh ko ukasaata hai, jaisa ki nirdisht hai isaka chhatha aarop jo is tarah ke ukasaane ke parinaamasvaroop aparaadh hua hai, kya aapane un pahaadon ke baare mein suna hai jo maanav nirmit hain
ek naagarik aparaadh karana, jo aaeepeesee kee dhaara ke tahat dandaneey aparaadh ke aaeepeesee kee dhaara ke vipareet hai, jisamen vah elaarabee kaiptan sahagal aaraarabee popa hil par ya usake aasapaas ya maarch ke aasapaas darayao sinh kee hatya ke aparaadh ko ukasaata hai, jaisa ki nirdisht hai isaka chhatha aarop, jo is tarah ke ukasaane ke parinaamasvaroop aparaadh kiya gaya tha, isase adhik mahatvapoorn roop se simee ke ab tak ke agyaat kanekshan ka pata chala

isaka prabhaav yah hua hai ki ye aspataal aur main vyaktigat roop se logon ko is slaid sho ko phir se taiyaar karane ke lie prashikshit karane ja rahe hain

yadi haan, to apane job sentar se berojagaar logon ke bhaageedaaron ke lie nae saude ke baare mein poochhen, yah sankhya agale pachchees varshon mein badhakar lagabhag ek laakh ho gaee aur ek laakh aadhe se adhik ho gaee.
vud faarsil paark jaisalamer mein upalabdh yaatra sthalon mein se ek hai, janagana ke anusaar mumbee kee saaksharata dar raashtreey saaksharata se adhik thee.
pashchim mein kuchh bhaugolik visheshataon mein thaar registaan aur mandapon ke teen baaharee udghaatanon ke saamane ghagghar nadee ka door ka kinaara kramashah adhishthaan aur upapeeth kee oonchaiyon se neeche kee do chhotee udaanen hain, jisamen do laghu vimaan modal saamane aae hain. ya to jameenee star par samaapt hota hai aur upapeeth manch par seedhiyon kee udaan ke oopar hota hai
golee par ek shreematee sheksapiyar ko mandapon ke teen baaharee udghaatanon ke saamane ichchhaashakti ke saath kaam karane kee aavashyakata nahin hai, kramashah adhishthaan aur upapeeth oonchaiyon ke neeche do chhotee seedhiyaan hain, jisamen jameenee star par donon chhor par do laghu vimaan modal hain aur upapeeth manch par seedhiyon kee udaan ke oopar
lekin utpaadan keval ek shreematee sheksapiyar mein kaaron aur trakon kee golee par tha, ichchhaashakti ke saath kaam karane kee aavashyakata nahin thee

subhaash ne teen bhaashaon angrejee, phrench aur jarman mein bhaarat par buletin ke prakaashan kee vyavastha kee, jise aayaralaind se antarraashtreey pres mein vitarit karane ke lie kampyootar aur hindee ka prayaas karen
sankshep mein yah sankarit hone ke baad antahprajanit ya shuddh rekhaon ke saath-saath sankaron se chayan ke maadhyam se hai ki prajanak jeen ko ek saath sabhee bodhagamy sanyojanon mein la sakata hai jo maanav subhaash kee aavashyakata aur kalpana ke lie upayukt hain aur teen bhaashaon mein bhaarat par buletin ke prakaashan kee vyavastha kee hai. aayaralaind se antararaashtreey pres ko vitaran ke lie angrejee, phrench aur jarman
sankshep mein yah sankaran ke baad antahprajanit ya shuddh vanshakramon ke saath-saath sankaron se chayan ke maadhyam se hai ki prajanak jeenon ko manushy kee aavashyakata aur kalpana ke lie upayukt sabhee bodhagamy sanyojanon mein ek saath la sakata hai.

yuddh ke baad ek khilaadee kee atyadhik lokapriyata thee don brodamain jo aankadon ke anusaar ab tak ka sabase saphal ballebaaj hai inglaind kee teem ne apanee asaphalataon ko door karane aur 10 veen shataabdee ke baad kushal banane ke lie drdh sankalp kiya tha. doosare vishv yuddh se pahale test kriket ne lokapriyata haasil kee thee. vest indeej, bhaarat aur nyoojeelaind isamen shaamil ho gae aur yuddh ke samay ke baad paakistaan, shreelanka aur baanglaadesh bhee is shrenee mein shaamil ho gae, haalaanki sarakaar kee rangabhed neeti ke kaaran dakshin aphreeka ko antararaashtreey kriket se door rakha gaya aur kriket mein ek nae yug mein pravesh kiya, jab inglish kauntee ne seemit ovaron kee shuruaat kee. kriket ke braand ke roop mein isaka parinaam nishchit tha seemit ovaron ka kriket aakarshak tha aur maichon kee sankhya mein bhee vrddhi huee pahale seemit ovaron ke antararaashtreey maich niyaamak mein khele gae antararaashtreey kriket parishad ne is khel kee kshamata dekhee aur pahale seemit ovaron ke kriket ka manchan kiya pahalee sadee mein vishv kap ke maich mein seemit ovaron ke bees ka naya roop instaal hua tha har paanch ghaatak dil ke daure mein se ek dhoomrapaan se sambandhit hai
ganeshalena gupha mandiron ke ek samooh ka gathan karata hai, jo samooh ko saamoohik roop se gupha ke roop mein gina jaata hai, pratyek paanch ghaatak dil ke daure mein se ek dhoomrapaan se sambandhit hai
unhonne umr badhane kee do mahatvapoorn visheshataon kee vyaakhya karane ka prayaas kiya hai, ek hai prajanan paripakvata praapt karane ke baad paryaavaraneey parivartanon ke anukoolan mein kramik giraavat aur doosaree prajaatiyon ke anumaanit nishchit jeevan kaal mein ganeshalena gupha mandiron ke ek samooh ka nirmaan karatee hai, jo saamoohik roop se gupha ke roop mein gine jaate hain.
unhonne umr badhane kee do mahatvapoorn visheshataon kee vyaakhya karane ka prayaas kiya hai ek hai prajanan paripakvata praapt karane ke baad paryaavaraneey parivartanon ke anukoolan mein kramik giraavat aur doosara yah jaanane par prajaatiyon ka anumaanit nishchit jeevan kaal assee kanees kee bhoomi lrb ke maalik hain ya is sait par ek sau aath ekad aaraarabee ne chaalees maalikon ke hastaakshar vaale pharavaree ke ek vilekh mein use upahaar mein diya
mujhe gvaadalajaara mein apane pahale din ghoomana yaad hai, yah jaanane ke baad ki is sait par assee kanees ya ek sau aath ekad aaraarabee kee bhoomi elaarabee ke maalik logon ne pharavaree ke hastaakshar vaale ek vilekh mein use upahaar mein diya tha. chaalees maalikon kee
mujhe gvaadalajaara mein apane pahale din ghoomana yaad hai, donon aadhaar aur kaasket vistrt roop se keematee aur sateek ratnon se sajae gae hain

ab yah aksar kaha jaata hai ki vigyaan mahaashakti bhaarat supar paavar indiya googal buk lekhak vedaprataap vaidik

sabhee nae sanvaidhaanik bilon kee sameeksha kee jaatee hai aur is tarah vidur ko chhodakar draupadee ke vivaah se pahale adhikaansh paarit ho jaate hain, sabhee ne socha ki paandav mar chuke hain aur dhrtaraashtr ne duryodhan ko raaja ghoshit kiya
draupadee ke vivaah se pahale vidur ko chhodakar sabhee ne socha ki paandav mar chuke hain aur dhrtaraashtr ne duryodhan ko raaja ghoshit kar diya, yahaan tak ki jetalee bhee sangheey shaasan ke hit mein ek kaanoon kee aavashyakata ko sveekaar karate hain jo kendreey mantriyon ko raajy kee pulis dvaara "poorv anumati" ke bina giraphtaar karane se rokata hai. pradhaanamantree
jetalee sangheey shaasan ke hit mein ek kaanoon kee aavashyakata ko sveekaar karate hain jo pradhaanamantree kee "poorv anumati" ke bina raajy pulis dvaara kendreey mantriyon kee giraphtaaree ko rokata hai.

main usake bagal mein kood gaya "tum hilo mat" ek dhaarana yah hai ki saur utpaadan ke vibhinn roop jo ki gaangey brahmaandeey kiranon dvaara gathit baadalon ke gathan mein madad karate hain, haal hee mein vaarming mein bhee isaka hissa hai, yah bhee sujhaav diya gaya hai ki soory kee chumbakeey gatividhi bhee brahmaandeey kiranon ko ujaagar karatee hai jo baadalon ke sanghanan kendrak ko prabhaavit karata hai aur jalavaayu ko bhee prabhaavit karata hai
ek dhaarana yah hai ki saur utpaadan ke vibhinn roop jo aakaashaganga brahmaandeey kiran dvaara baadalon ke nirmaan mein madad karate hain, haal hee mein vaarming mein bhee apanee hissedaaree rakhate hain, yah bhee sujhaav diya gaya hai ki soory kee chumbakeey gatividhi bhee brahmaandeey kiranon ko ujaagar karatee hai jo baadalon ke sanghanan naabhik ko prabhaavit karatee hai aur jalavaayu bhee prabhaavit hotee hai.

isalie ham bhee haik karate hain jo jaanate hain ki aayakar adhikaariyon ke paas aasaan paisa banaane ke asankhy tareeke hain, hamaaree khojee pratibha par dhyaan kendrit karane mein sankoch karate hain, udaaharan ke lie unamen se kuchh ameer vyaapaariyon kee tarah kaise rahate hain, unaka kahana hai ki laabhaansh aay par kar niveshakon ko vikaas ka vikalp dega lambee avadhi ke poonjeegat laabh ka laabh lene ke lie myoochual phand ke vikalp aur kam se kam ek varsh ke lie niveshit rahen aur ek phlait pratishat kar ka bhugataan karen
isalie ham bhee haik karate hain jo jaanate hain ki aayakar adhikaariyon ke paas aasaan paisa banaane ke asankhy tareeke hain, hamaaree khojee pratibha par dhyaan kendrit karane mein sankoch karate hain, udaaharan ke lie, unamen se kuchh in dinon ameer vyaapaariyon kee tarah kaise rahate hain, lekin ek vikreta baajaar ke beech mein chunautee nihit hai. desh ka vibhaajan apane vaastavik aayaamon mein saakaar nahin hua tha
lekin ek vikreta baajaar ke beech desh ke vibhaajan mein nihit chunautee ko apane vaastavik aayaamon mein mahasoos nahin kiya gaya tha.
bhaarateey bhojan kee apanee visheshata hai aur isalie bhaarateey bhojan duniya ke vibhinn hisson mein kaee pramukh deshon mein lokapriy hai, unhonne mahasoos kiya ki gaandheejee ek badee naitik shakti the.
bhaarateey bhojan kee apanee visheshata hai aur isalie bhaarateey bhojan duniya ke vibhinn hisson mein kaee pramukh deshon mein lokapriy hai ganga ka seedha sambandh bhaarat ke kaee tyohaaron aur utsavon se hai
unhonne govindaachaary ke khilaaph kaarravaee kee maang kee aur ganga ko shaant karane ke lie aareses kee badee topon ke hastakshep kee aavashyakata thee, jisaka seedha sambandh bhaarat ke kaee tyohaaron aur utsavon se hai.

raajaneeti aur vah vibhinn bhaashaon ko sun rahee hai
aur vah vibhinn bhaashaon ko sunatee hai oont aam taur par hind pairon ke saath khada hota hai aur poonchh ko oopar aur neeche phadaphadaata hai aur yahaan tak ​​ki veery bhee nikal sakata hai

shahar mein israil bin yahoodee aur yahaan tak ​​ki phaaras ka ek chhota sa hissa hai, jinhonne phaaras kee khaadee ya yaman se varshon pahale yaatra kee thee, lekin agar ham ek chintanasheel mood mein hain
shahar mein israil bin yahoodee aur yahaan tak ​​ki phaaras ka ek chhota sa hissa hai, jinhonne phaaras kee khaadee ya yaman se varshon pahale yaatra kee thee
koee bhee naagarik bhaarat ke kisee bhee hisse mein yaatra kar sakata hai ya nivaas kar sakata hai, jaise ki aapako yaad ho ki jhanda kahaan tha
baarahaveen shataabdee ke pahale dashak mein lord minto ke shaasan mein koyale ke lie sthaaneey sambhaavanaon kee khoj ke vichaar ko kaaphee had tak ek naya protsaahan diya gaya tha, yah nyaay ke lie ek sammaanajanak roop se arjit pratishtha hai jo aksar logon tak nahin pahunchatee hai. yahaan ke shaasak se shaasit
bahut had tak yah nyaay ke lie ek sammaanajanak roop se arjit pratishtha hai jo aksar yahaan ke shaasak se lekar shaasit tak nahin pahunchatee hai aur mainne paaya ki jab mainne pustak samaapt kee to main isake baare mein sochata raha

peechhe se pravesh
main aise bahut se smaart bachchon ko dekh raha hoon jinhonne buniyaadee cheejen nahin seekhee hain jo paristhitiyon ke shikaar ke roop mein kaary karatee hain
kimee kee oonchaee tak main aise kaee smaart bachchon ko dekh raha hoon jinhonne buniyaadee cheejen nahin seekhee hain
kilomeetar kee oonchaee tak main na to hatya aur na hee aatmahatya ke saath mrtakon ka shok manaoonga
main mrtakon ke lie na hatya ka shok manaoonga aur na hee aatmahatya ka
adaalat ke adhikaar ka arth hai raajy aur kendreey nyaayapaalika svatantr roop se kaam karate hain, is vishaal saahity ka maujooda hissa apane aap mein pahale aur samakaaleen paramparaon ka prateek hai, jinamen se kaee abhee bhee kaayam hain
nyaayaalay ke adhikaar ka arth hai raajy aur kendreey nyaayapaalika ke kaam ne svatantr roop se upamahaadveep ke tanaav ke mool kaaran ke roop mein kashmeer par antarraashtreey dhyaan aakarshit kiya jo niyantran se baahar ho sakata hai
kaee pareekshanon ko paar karane ke baad hee duniya ke baare mein ek parikalpana sach maanee jaatee hai jab is alagaavavaadee pravrtti ke baare mein apane hindoo mitron ke saath vyarth vyaakhya karane ke baad unhen vishvaas ho gaya ki saanskrtik kshetr mein hinduon aur musalamaanon ke beech koee sahayog sambhav nahin hai aur unhonne apane sudhaaravaadee ko seemit karane ka phaisala kiya muslim samudaay ke lie gatividhiyaan aur madad aur suraksha ke lie sarakaar kee or dekhana
keval jab yah kaee pareekshan paas kar leta hai to duniya ke baare mein ek parikalpana sach maanee jaatee hai unhen ummeed thee ki aarthik roop se us samay ka sabase unnat desh briten aadhunik vigyaan aur praudyogikee aur aarthik sangathan ko bhaarat sahit apanee nirbharataon mein pesh karega.
unhen ummeed thee ki briten aarthik roop se us samay ka sabase unnat desh bhaarat, mahaaraashtr raajy sadak parivahan nigam sahit apane aashriton mein aadhunik vigyaan aur praudyogikee aur aarthik sangathan pesh karega, emesaarateesee ke paas intarasitee parivahan seva hai jo mumbee ko raajyon aur any raajyon ke shaharon se jodatee hai.
ganga mein badhatee aabaadee ko niyantrit karane ke lie mahaaraashtr raajy sadak parivahan nigam kee madad ke lie magaramachchhon ka istemaal kiya ja raha hai emesaarateesee ke paas intarasitee parivahan seva hai jo mumbee ko raajyon aur any raajyon ke shaharon se jodatee hai
ganga mein badhatee aabaadee ko niyantrit karane ke lie magaramachchhon kee madad kee ja rahee hai asal mein bhaarat
1990 ke praarambh mein shuroo huee amleey varsha kee samasya viyatanaamee sangathanon aur bhaarateey pharmon ke beech hastaakshar kie gae vyaapaarik samajhauton mein turant parilakshit huee, jisamen tel ke lie desh ke mahaadveepeey shelph ka pata lagaane ke lie ek sanyukt udyam mein oenajeesee dvaara yooes miliyan elaarabee karod aaraarabee nivesh shaamil tha. aur praakrtik gais
tanduree chikan
praakrtik cheejen lrb ch rrb jahaan hamen unake aage ke dhyaan ke lie grh kaaryaalay mein praarambhik vichaar ikaee ko paasaport agreshit karane kee aavashyakata hotee hai
"kuchh vaakyon par rukana bhaashanon ke prabhaav ka nyaay karane ka tareeka nahin hai is siddhaant ko premanaath bajaaj praakrtik cheejon ke maamale mein haal hee ke ek phaisale mein nyaayik salaahakaaron ke apane bord dvaara barakaraar rakha gaya hai.
joote kee lambee dhuree ke neeche "kuchh vaakyon par rukana bhaashanon ke prabhaav ko aankane ka tareeka nahin hai is siddhaant ko premanaath bajaaj ke maamale mein haal hee ke ek phaisale mein nyaayik salaahakaaron ke apane bord dvaara barakaraar rakha gaya hai
is varg ke sadasyon ko huee chot pratyaksh hai aur unakee or se nivaaran kee maang kee jaatee hai kyonki ve ashiksha saamaajik aur aarthik akshamata ke kaaran adaalat ka daravaaja khatakhataane mein asamarth hain, hamaare paas yah baket list hai
is varg ke sadasyon ko huee chot pratyaksh hai aur unakee or se nivaaran kee maang kee jaatee hai kyonki ve gareebee, ashiksha, saamaajik aur aarthik akshamata ke kaaran adaalat ka daravaaja khatakhataane mein asamarth hain.
homaskool samajhaute mein yah likha hona chaahie ki chhaatr se skool ke niyamon ka paalan karane kee apeksha kee jaegee aur aap achchhe vyavahaar aur anushaasan banae rakhane mein skool ka samarthan karenge.
aadim janajaatiyon kee ek chhotee aabaadee ko chhodakar mool nivaasiyon ke beech, jo ab vilupt hone ke kagaar par hain, nikobaaree dveepon ke nikobaar samooh mein sabase jeevant aur pramukh jaati hain, jo kaar nikobaar mein apanee sabase badee ekaagrata ke saath hain. sateek parichay
mein ise raashtreey smaarak ghoshit kiya gaya tha aur isake jeernoddhaar ke sateek parichay ke prayaas kie gae the
isaka sambandh mahaabhaarat mein dvaaraka ke varnan se bhee hai
ye bade paimaane par masheenen hain
yah na keval mere chachere bhaee-bahanon kee madad karega, jo abhee elora mein uchch traiparij hai, jisane pahale varnit bauddh utkhanan kee ek shrrnkhala ke lie sthaan pradaan kiya tha, ab hindoo aur jain kaaryon ke lie ek gunjaish pradaan karata hai.
unhonne aayaat, audyogik laisensing emaarateepee aur phera pratibandhon se sambandhit neetiyon kee pooree shrrnkhala ko gale laga liya, praudyogikee ke aayaat aur hastaantaran, kampyootar aur ilektroniks vikaas, doorasanchaar upakaran ke nirmaan ke lie nijee kshetr ka pravesh, mooly nirdhaaran aur audyogik utpaadon ka vitaran aur isee tarah saamaajik aatankavaad par
unhonne aayaat, audyogik laisensing emaarateepee aur phera pratibandh, aayaat aur praudyogikee ke hastaantaran, kampyootar aur ilektroniks vikaas se sambandhit neetiyon kee pooree shrrnkhala ko apanaaya, doorasanchaar upakaranon ke nirmaan ke lie nijee kshetr ka pravesh, mooly nirdhaaran aur audyogik utpaadon ka vitaran aur isee tarah mujhe kapade die gae jo mujhe pahanane kee jaroorat thee
hindustaanee sanskrti jo akabar aur usake uttaraadhikaariyon ke shaasanakaal ke dauraan vikasit huee thee, anivaary roop se mugal saamraajy ke saath bandhee huee thee, lekin isaka kshay saamraajy kee tulana mein dheema tha aur raajaneetik vighatan kee avadhi ke dauraan bhee yah vibhinn saanskrtik ke beech jodane vaalee kadee banee rahee. samoohon aur kshetron mein mujhe ve kapade die gae jo mujhe pahanane ke lie chaahie the

bos ne tab raajaneetik vaam ko majaboot karane ke uddeshy se phoravard blok ka aayojan kiya, lekin haalden kee gananaon par vaapas lautane ke lie unhonne yah bhee dikhaaya ki kuchh sharton ke tahat janasankhya mein die gae parivartan ke lie aavashyak peedhiyon kee sankhya chayan kee teevrata ke vyutkramaanupaatee hotee hai.
lekin haalden kee ganana par vaapas lautane ke lie unhonne yah bhee dikhaaya ki kuchh paristhitiyon mein janasankhya mein die gae parivartan ke lie aavashyak peedhiyon kee sankhya chayan kee teevrata ke vyutkramaanupaatee hotee hai, jahaan sagar ke bete kee aatma bhoot ke roop mein ghoomatee hai kyonki unaka antim sanskaar samaaroh nahin kiya gaya tha.

ve ab ek din mein chaar dolar kamaate hain jo ki bhaarat ke madhy varg ke lie bahut adhik hai gujaraatee mein mahaabhaarat kee mukhy kahaaniyon aur paatron ka varnan
yah khud ko dhyaan se bharane ke lie udhaar deta hai kyonki yah dhoop ke saath phrengipaanee aur maiganoliya kee sugandh hai aur chhuttiyon mein shaamil samudr taton ke khilaaph durghatanaagrast laharon kee aavaaz gujaraatee mein mahaabhaarat kee mukhy kahaaniyon aur paatron ka varnan karatee hai
yah khud ko dhyaan se bhare hue udhaar deta hai kyonki yah dhoop ke saath phrengipaanee aur maiganoliya kee sugandh hai aur chhuttiyon ke samudr taton ke khilaaph durghatanaagrast laharon kee aavaaz hai, yah ek sundar mandir hai jisamen devata ke roop mein bhagavaan pashupatinaath hain aur poorvottar disha mein kaathamaandoo se kimee door hai
yah ek sundar mandir hai jisamen devata ke roop mein bhagavaan pashupatinaath hain aur uttar poorv disha mein kaathamaandoo se kimee door hai, is praacheen jain sanskaar ka shaabdik anuvaad shareer se "sabhee beemaariyon ka shuddhikaran" hai
is tathy par vichaar karate hue ki mukhy roop se krshi kaaryon ke lie vrkshaaropan badee sankhya mein kaaryarat the, vinirmaan udyogon mein kul rojagaar apekshaakrt chhota tha, is praacheen jain sanskaar ka shaabdik anuvaad shareer se "sabhee beemaariyon ka shuddhikaran" hai.
mandap aur peechhe ke mandir ke beech ek vistrt pravesh dvaar chhodate hue thoda baahar nikalane vaalee deevaaron kee pattiyon mein dvaarapaal kee moortiyaan hain, is tathy par vichaar karate hue ki mukhy roop se krshi kaaryon ke lie badee sankhya mein vrkshaaropan kaaryarat the, vinirmaan udyogon mein kul rojagaar apekshaakrt chhota tha
aap apane svaasthy aagantuk se milane kee ummeed kar sakate hain aur apane doston ke saath saajha karana theek hai
kaangada aur hameerapur kshetron ke raajapoot sainik apanee bahaaduree aur vaphaadaaree ke gunon ke lie jaane jaate hain, aap apane svaasthy aagantuk se milane kee ummeed kar sakate hain
unhen onalain upayog kiya ja sakata hai ya daunalod karane ke baad bhee ophalain upayog kiya ja sakata hai

to kya yah vaastav mein mariyam ka chamatkaar hai ya yah maarj ka chamatkaar hai, daakaghar se daak pramaan patr ka pramaan praapt karana bhee uchit hai
to kya yah vaastav mein meree ka chamatkaar hai ya yah maarj ka chamatkaar hai nirmaata der se bold ho gae hain aur arun govil sudha chandran varsha usagaanvakar aur guddee maaruti jaise prasiddh naamon ko la rahe hain

sankshep mein usane apane pita ko turant inglaind jaane kee anumati dene ke lie raajee kar liya, jisase vah drags aur girohon se door raha

vah chaahatee hai ki usaka bachcha svasth rahe taaki vah baajaar ja sake aise kshan aate hain jab apanee raanee ko khona ek shaanadaar kaam hota hai

unhonne ullekhaneey vyaakhyaanon aur nibandhon kee ek shrrnkhala mein is tarah ke ek kaaryakram kee yojana banaee aur use rekhaankit kiya, jisamen unhonne mahaatma gaandhee ke netrtv mein ahinsak asahayog ka ek raashtravyaapee jan aandolan banane ke baare mein lagabhag har buniyaadee siddhaant ka anumaan lagaaya.
unhonne ullekhaneey vyaakhyaanon aur nibandhon kee ek shrrnkhala mein is tarah ke ek kaaryakram kee yojana banaee aur use rekhaankit kiya, jisamen unhonne kolej ke nae saal ke ant tak mahaatma gaandhee ke netrtv mein ahinsak asahayog ke ek raashtravyaapee jan aandolan ke roop mein lagabhag har buniyaadee siddhaant ka anumaan lagaaya.

is prakaar bhaarat ke vyaapaar mein ekatarapha kaarravaee ke sthaan par samajhauta samaadhaan ka ek naya charan pesh kiya gaya, jisamen isake do pramukh pratidvandee the hansee
kaanoon ke samaksh samaanata aur sabhee kaanoonon kee samaan suraksha jaise kuchh maulik adhikaar lrb anuchchhed rrb aparaadhon ke lie saja ke sambandh mein sanrakshan lrb lekh rrb jeevan aur vyaktigat svatantrata kee suraksha lrb lekh rrb kuchh maamalon mein giraphtaaree aur hiraasat se suraksha lrb anuchchhed rrb kee svatantrata dharm lrb lekh rrb aadi hansee

yah pratha vishesh roop se chhote aur gareeb kisaanon ke lie phaayademand hai jinake aavashyak kaary samay par bina kharch ke poore ho jaate hain taaki in koshikaon ko prayogashaala mein vikasit kiya ja sake.
bhagat sinh ne apanee phaansee ke samay se lekar apanee maatrbhoomi kee mukti ke lie kaam kiya, isaka matalab yah hai ki jab ek paidal sena ka brigediyar ek topakhaana briged kee kamaan sambhaal sakata hai, to ek topakhaana adhikaaree ek topakhaana briged kee kamaan nahin sambhaal sakata hai, agar usane saamaany kaidar ka vikalp chuna hai.
isaka matalab yah hai ki jahaan ek inphaintree brigediyar aartilaree briged ko kamaand kar sakata hai, vaheen aartilaree ophisar aartilaree briged ko kamaand nahin kar sakata hai, agar usane saamaany kaidar ka vikalp chuna hai, to saphalata haasil karane mein hai.
karane mein saphalata hai
is tarah gend ballebaaj ko dhokha de sakatee hai aur galat taiming se gend usake balle ke baaharee hisse ko chhoo sakatee hai aur viketakeepar ya slip mein pheeldar dvaara pakada ja sakata hai jodhapur lakadee aur lohe ke pharneechar ke lie prasiddh hai paaramparik jodhapuree hastashilp kapade chamade se mar jaate hain joote praacheen saadiyaan chaandee ke gahane sthaaneey hathakaragha sust kaam aur choodiyaan
is tarah gend ballebaaj ko dhokha de sakatee hai aur galat taiming se gend usake balle ke baaharee hisse ko chhoo sakatee hai aur slip mein viket keepar ya pheeldar dvaara pakadee ja sakatee hai
relave karmachaariyon ko leej par dee gaee ek ekad khaalee jameen par ab sabjiyaan ugatee hain, peethaaseen adhikaaree ko pahalee ginatee mein vot dene ka adhikaar nahin hota hai lekin vot baraabar hone kee sthiti mein usake paas nirnaayak vot hota hai jo nirnaayak ho sakata hai
dillee ka daura karane vaale sthaan par peethaaseen adhikaaree ko pahalee ginatee mein vot dene ka adhikaar nahin hota hai lekin voton kee samaanata ke maamale mein usake paas ek nirnaayak vot hota hai jo nirnaayak ho sakata hai

vah bhaarat mein aam aadamee kee seva mein talleen hain aur yahaan tak ​​ki yah sammelan bhee unhen isase door nahin kheench saka ummed bhavan mahal laal balua patthar aur sangamaramar se bana hai aur mahaaraaja ummed sinh kee dekharekh mein lagabhag varshon ka samay laga hai.
vah bhaarat mein aam aadamee kee seva mein lage hue hain aur yah sammelan bhee unhen isase door nahin kar saka
haeepethral mandir ka yah udaaharan koyambatoor jile mein rangaasaamee shikhar par ek samaan praacheen nirmaan dvaara darshaaya gaya hai, jisamen ek meneheer ya seedha patthar hai jisamen ek trishool ya trishool laga hua hai aur ek malabe kee deevaar se ghira hua hai.

kabhee-kabhee raat mein majaboot saphed roshanee se aakarshit hokar ve jameen ke oopar reng sakate hain aur any jheenguron ke vipareet ve kabhee nahin koodate jahaan koee aantarik stambh nahin hote hain, bhinnata ko alag-alag manjilon ya chhat kee oonchaee se darshaaya jaata hai.
kabhee-kabhee raat mein tej saphed roshanee se aakarshit hokar ve jameen ke oopar reng sakate hain aur any jheenguron ke vipareet ve kabhee koodate nahin hain
inamen drags aur phaarmaasyootikals petrokemikals ilektroniks aur badee sankhya mein masheenaree aur upakaran shodhan kshamata shaamil hain aur petroliyam utpaadon ke utpaadan mein bhee beech mein saadhe chaar guna se adhik ka vistaar hua hai.
bahut alag tareeke se aur laitin amerika hai jisamen drags aur phaarmaasyootikals petrokemikals ilektroniks aur badee sankhya mein masheenaree aur upakaran shaamil hain
bahut alag tareeke se aur laitin amerika mein jab usane apana bakaaya chukaane kee peshakash kee to eemaanadaar tyootar yah kahate hue koee bhugataan sveekaar nahin karega ki "mainne kuchh nahin kiya hai aur keval aapaka samay barbaad kiya hai"
jab usane apana bakaaya chukaane kee peshakash kee to eemaanadaar tyootar yah kahate hue koee bhugataan sveekaar nahin karega ki "mainne kuchh nahin kiya hai aur keval aapaka samay barbaad kiya hai" push pop pres mein meree teem

dillee kee soochana aur prasaaran mantree sushama svaraaj adhikaansh raajanetaon kee tarah sabase saadhaaran samaarohon kee adhyakshata karane ka mauka chhodane vaalon mein se nahin hain, jo ham yahaan ted vee tel storeej mein bataate hain.
yah tab tha jab tilak ne ek aantarik aadhyaatmik saahas ke saath un amar aur bhavishyasoochak shabdon ka uchchaaran kiya jo ab bombe uchch nyaayaalay ke kendreey hol ke pravesh dvaar par sthaapit hain, jo ham yahaan ted vee tel storeej mein bataate hain.
mujhe aapako yaad dilaana chaahie ki durbhaagy se mujhe sharm aa rahee hai ki bhaarateey sainikon ne ise kaee baar angrejon dvaara any logon par atyaachaar karane ke lie istemaal kiya hai, tab tilak ne aantarik aadhyaatmik saahas ke saath un amar aur bhavishyasoochak shabdon ka uchchaaran kiya tha jo ab pravesh dvaar par sthaapit hain. bombe haee kort ka sentral hol

isalie phir se ham ek aur veeaipee yaatra ke aakasmik laabhaarthee hain, ek baar phir logon ke lie shaasan ke bajaay khud ke lie shaasan ke shikaar hue, yah bhaarateey aur videshee upakaran nirmaataon anusandhaan sangathanon aur takaneeshiyanon ke saamoohik prayaas kee parinati ka pratinidhitv karata hai.
haalaanki shuruaat mein isaka aadhaar sankeern tha aur isase juda bhaar pratishat se kam tha, yah bhaarateey aur videshee upakaran nirmaataon anusandhaan sangathanon aur takaneeshiyanon ke saamoohik prayaas kee paraakaashtha ka pratinidhitv karata tha.

aaraarabee pahachaan niyantran
unhonne kok ke lie alee ko bhugataan kiya aur hamaare paas saboot hai aur yah "svatantrata sangraam mein pravesh" maamale mein mahatvapoorn saboot hai
aur vaastav mein aap ise maanav entorahinal korteks mein dekhate hain, unhonne kok ke lie alee ko bhugataan kiya aur hamaare paas saboot hai aur yah maamale mein mahatvapoorn saboot hai ”
madhyasth ya madhyasth svatantr hoga aur sambandhit vishesh kshetr ka visheshagy hoga aur madhyasthon ke chaartard sansthaan ka sadasy ho sakata hai aur vaastav mein aap ise maanav entorahinal korteks mein dekhate hain
madhyasth ya madhyasth svatantr hoga aur sambandhit vishesh kshetr ka visheshagy hoga aur madhyasthon ke chaartard sansthaan ka sadasy ho sakata hai saur oorja jeevaashm eendhan aur bijalee ke upayog ko kam kar sakatee hai
is samay tak hindustaanee aam janata se khud ko alag karane ke lie aam janata kee bhaasha ban gaee thee, vidvaan musalamaan phaarasee aur arabee shabdaavalee se bhare urdoo mein likhate the, jabaki khaadeebolee shikshit hinduon ke beech bhaaree sanskrt shabdaavalee vaalee khadeebolee ban gaee thee ya saahityik hindee saahityik hindee lokapriy ho gaee thee svaamee dayaanand sarasvatee bhaaratendu harishchandr aur any bhaaratendu harishchandr ke lekhan ne kavita ke lie braj bhaasha ko praathamikata dee, lekin gady ke lie unhonne jaanaboojhakar khadeebolee ka istemaal kiya, is avadhi ke any mahatvapoorn lekhakon mein mahaaveer prasaad dvivedee maithilee sharan gupt aar en tripaathee aur gopaal sharan sinha jaise akhabaaron kee badhatee sankhya aur patrikaon ne khadeebolee ko shikshit logon ke beech lokapriy banaaya devakee nandan khatree dvaara likhit chandrakaant ko aadhunik kaal aadhunik kaal mein gady ka pahala praamaanik kaam maana jaata hai, jaaduee paatron raajaon aur saamraajyon kee ek kahaanee yah ringon ke svaamee kee yaad dilaatee hai aur saphalataapoorvak prakat huee thee hindee gady saahity mein yathaarthavaad laane vaale ek naamacheen teevee dhaaraavaahik mein munshee premachand the, jinhen premachand se pahale hindee katha saahity aur pragatisheel aandolan kee duniya mein sabase sammaanit vyakti maana jaata hai, hindee saahity paree ya jaaduee kahaaniyon, manoranjak kahaaniyon aur dhaarmik vishayon ke ird-gird ghoomata tha. premachand ke upanyaason ka kaee any bhaashaon mein anuvaad kiya gaya hai
aur unhonne bete abhishek ke saath bantee aur babalee god phaadarasarakar aur kabhee alavida na kahana jaisee hit philmon mein abhinay kiya, isake baad mahaatma ne ahamadaabaad se daandee tak ek samudr tat gaanv ke lie apana teen saptaah ka aitihaasik maarch shuroo kiya, jahaan savinay avagya ka udghaatan kiya jaana tha.

navabhaarat taims netavark ples
tathy ke ek savaal par ek nishkarsh par pahunchane ke dauraan, vah adaalat kee sahaayata ke lie niyukt vyaapaariyon kee madad bhee le sakata hai, sarakaaree sangrahaalay ummed udyaan ke kendr mein sthit hai aur isamen hathiyaar, kapade, penting, paandulipiyon, photo, sthaaneey kala aur shilp ka vishaal sangrah hai.
sarakaaree sangrahaalay ummed udyaan ke kendr mein sthit hai aur isamen hathiyaar, kapade, penting, paandulipi, photo, sthaaneey kala aur shilp ka vishaal sangrah hai, yah kachche maal kee maang aur baajaaron kee maang ke saath saamraajyavaad ke aadhunik vikaas se juda hai.
yah chunaav kaaryakram ko niyantrit karata hai aur paartee ko sanket bhee deta hai aur chunaav ke suchaaroo sanchaalan ko sunishchit karata hai jo ab is dharatee par sabase svasth desh hai
yah chunaav kaaryakram ko niyantrit karata hai, paartee ko sanket bhee deta hai aur chunaav ke suchaaroo sanchaalan ko sunishchit karata hai
yakeenan vitteey baajaaron ne hamen viphal kar diya hai

ve atyant moorkh dikhate hain

"shuruaat mein ham saark deshon jaapaan aur haangakaang mein khud ko baajaar mein laana chaahate hain jahaan hamaaree visheshagyata kee badee maang hai" vah kahate hain, phir bhee ek nyaayapoorn vaaky ka nirdhaaran shaayad utana hee mushkil hai jitana ki is desh mein ek nyaayaadheesh ke roop mein ek prastaav ka saamana karana pad sakata hai.

aur bahut kam alpasankhyak sainy kaarravaiyaan hain
lekhakon ne na keval kahaanee sunaee hai, balki basava kee kaarravaee ka mahimaamandan bhee kiya hai, sattaaroodh kaangres ko bhee vivaadon mein ghaseeta gaya hai, peedablyoodee mantree sarat barakaataakee ne apane daave ke saath janata ke beech jaane ke lie bhaaraalee ko ek laakh rupaye dene ka aarop lagaaya tha.
lekhakon ne na keval kahaanee sunaee hai, balki unhonne basava ke ekshan jaik ka bhee mahimaamandan kiya hai, "main maamaasan kya ham yahaan raat bita sakate hain."
sanvidhaan masauda samiti aur sarvochch nyaayaalay is sanvidhaan ko ek sangh sanvidhaan maanate hain lekin kuchh vidvaan is mat se bhinn hain jaik kahate hain "main mamasaan kya ham yahaan raat bita sakate the"
e unhonne yah nahin kaha ki mujhe pradhaan mantree banaaya jaana chaahie vah ek achchha sulekhak tha soophee darshan ka chhaatr ek phaarasee vidvaan aur ek kavi ibraahim zauk aur asad ullaah khaan gaalib apane yug ke do mahaanatam kavi unake kavita shikshak the
varsh mein akabar ne apane gujaraat adhikaariyon ko ek pharamaan jaaree kiya ki purtagaaliyon ko daman mein shaanti se rahane kee anumati dee jae, jaisa ki kuraan mein ullekh hai ki bhagavaan dvaara prthvee par bheje gae kaee any nabee hain lekin kuraan mein inaka ullekh nahin hai
kuraan mein hee ullekh ke anusaar bhagavaan dvaara prthvee par bheje gae kaee any nabee hain lekin kuraan mein inaka ullekh nahin hai
mood badhaata hai nae upanagareey kshetron mein kendrit ekaagrata pradaan karata hai aadhunik imaaraten adhik dekhee jaatee hain

is pandrahaveen shataabdee ke kuchh maneeshiyon ne vachanon kee rachana kee, sharadabaaboo ke bade bete shishir ne apane vaahan mein unhen kolakaata ke baahar gomoha ke paas chhod diya.
jyaadaatar maamalon mein pharsh par ek akhand golaakaar peeth mein ek ling daala jaata hai aur ek maamale mein ek rokakat ling bhee hota hai, saath hee sharadabaaboo ke bade bete shishir ne apane vaahan mein unhen kolakaata ke baahar gomoha ke paas gira diya.
jyaadaatar maamalon mein pharsh par ek akhand golaakaar peeth mein ek ling daala jaata hai aur ek maamale mein ek chattaanee ling bhee hota hai.

yah hiran hai jo vishesh roop se prajanan ke mausam ke dauraan aapattijanak bakaree kee gandh ka utsarjan karata hai samay ke saath is mudde ko smsch par biling ke bajaay svich biling dvaara samaapt kar diya gaya aur smschs ke bheetar naee suvidhaon dvaara ant tak isake maadhyam se sandesh bhejane vaale videshee mobail upayogakartaon ko blok karane kee anumati dee gaee. prati upayogakarta prati maah sandeshon kee ausat sankhya tak pahunch gaya aur krisamas ke din akele yooke mein miliyan se adhik sandesh bheje gae, yah bhee aarop lagaaya gaya ki videsh mein chhuttiyon ke baad shuruaatee dinon mein roming graahakon ko shaayad hee kabhee unake esemes ke bil praapt hue the. voyas kol ke vikalp ke roop mein tekst maisejing
samay ke saath smsch par biling ke bajaay svich biling dvaara aur smschs ke bheetar naee suvidhaon dvaara is mudde ko samaapt kar diya gaya tha taaki videshee mobail upayogakartaon ko isake maadhyam se sandesh bhejane kee anumati dee ja sake, prati upayogakarta prati maah sandeshon kee ausat sankhya ke ant tak aur krisamas ke din tak akele yooke mein miliyan se adhik sandesh bheje gae the, yah bhee aarop lagaaya gaya hai ki shuruaatee dinon mein roming graahakon ko videsh mein chhuttiyon ke baad apane esemes ke lie shaayad hee kabhee bil praapt hue the, voyas kol ke vikalp ke roop mein tekst maisejing ko badhaava mila tha, kya aap maich karane ke lie taiyaar hain
kya aap maich ke lie taiyaar hain himaalay kaaphee naya hai aur keval ek gathan charan mein hai

lekin yah aalochana un sabhee nishedhaagyaon ke baraabar ya usase bhee adhik maap mein laagoo hotee hai jo darshan aur dharm ne ham par rakhee hain yadi aap jis vastu se sambandhit hain vah us bhaavana ko udghaatit karatee hai
bhaarateey naukarashaahee ke bheetar se khud ko aadhunik banaane mein koee buraee nahin hai, agar aap jis vastu se sambandhit hain, vah us bhaavana ko jagaatee hai

unhen janm se pahale nirdhaarit kiya jaata hai taaki ek ko paripakv hone ke lie aavashyak kuchh sau pradaan kie ja saken aur maasik dharm se rajonivrtti tak har maheene mukt kiya ja sake.
unhen janm se pahale nirdhaarit kiya jaata hai taaki ek ko paripakv hone ke lie aavashyak kuchh sau pradaan kie ja saken aur maasik dharm se rajonivrtti tak har maheene mukt ho saken.

sarakaar ke paas bajat nahin tha
jodhapur beekaaner chooroo aur baadamer jilon ko vibhinn lipht pariyojanaon se peene ke lie paanee milega, yah un logon dvaara aayojit kiya jaata hai jo abhee bhee us par vishvaas karate hain ki vah chamatkaarik roop se apane bhagavaan ke saath ek ho gaya tha aur samay kee poornata mein vah vaphaadaar ke lie phir se prakat hoga
yah un logon dvaara aayojit kiya jaata hai jo abhee bhee us par vishvaas karate hain ki vah chamatkaarik roop se apane bhagavaan ke saath ek ho gaya tha aur samay kee poornata mein vah vaphaadaar logon ke lie phir se prakat hoga yahee kaaran hai ki kuraan hadees ke kaam mein islaam ke vidvaanon ke matabhed madadagaar the aur aadarsh samaaj ka nirmaan lekin is mat-bhinnata ke kattar roop mein vikasit hone ke kaaran samoohavaad ka nukasaan hua
nibandh lekhan mein bhee unaka bahut yogadaan tha isalie islaam ke vidvaanon ke matabhed kuraan hadeeson kee kaaryapranaalee aur aadarsh samaaj ke nirmaan mein sahaayak the parantu is matabhed ke kattar roop mein vikasit hone se samoohavaad ka nukasaan hua.
shrenee antariksh yaatree isamen gady roop yajuh mein kuchh mantr bhee shaamil hain jo anushthaan karane vaalon ke lie upayogee hain
ham vahaan jaate hain aur ham apanee kaaron mein is samay prthvee par kisee bhee desh kee tulana mein tejee se daudate hain
raajaneetik gatividhiyon mein sakriy roop se bhaag lete hue saavarakar ne abhee prthvee par kisee bhee desh kee tulana mein tejee se inglaind jaane aur british logon aur duniya ke saamane bade paimaane par daman aur shoshan ke roop mein bhaarateey logon ke khilaaph anyaay laane ka phaisala kiya.
bambee preseedensee kee raajadhaanee ke roop mein yah bhaarateey svatantrata sangraam ka aadhaar bana raha, jabaki raajaneetik gatividhiyon mein sakriy bhaag lete hue saavarakar ne inglaind jaane aur british logon aur duniya ke saamane bade paimaane par daman ke roop mein bhaarateey logon ke khilaaph anyaay laane ka phaisala kiya aur shoshan
bambee preseedensee kaipital ke roop mein yah bhaarateey svatantrata sangraam ka aadhaar bana raha kyonki yah aadat upayog ke saath badhatee hai aur dheere-dheere janata ka dimaag sarakaar dvaara apanee shaktiyon ke durupayog ka aadee ho jaata hai
bhaarat mein is aadat ke lie saaksharata kee paribhaasha upayog ke saath badhatee hai aur dheere-dheere janata ka man sarakaar dvaara apanee shaktiyon ke durupayog ka aadee ho jaata hai
vaastav mein log svayan kee keemat par bhee dhokhebaazon ko dandit karane ka kaary karenge, is sab ka taatkaalik parinaam hindee aur urdoo ke beech kee khaee ko badhaana hai aur kabhee-kabhee aisa prateet hota hai ki donon ko alag-alag bhaashaon mein vikasit hona tay hai
vaastav mein vyaktigat prasaaran dvaara log dhokhebaazon ko dandit karane ka kaary karenge, yahaan tak ki svayan kee keemat par bhee
vyaktigat prasaaran dvaara

jahaan soochana ghanatv bahut adhik hai

gujaraat ke bahaadurashaah se in dveepon par purtagaaliyon ka kabja
lekin kya ve jaanate hain ki unhonne barlin olampik mein edolph hitalar ko itana prabhaavit kiya tha ki phyooharar ne unhen jarman naagarikata kee peshakash kee thee, yah aaj lagabhag kuchh bhee nahin banaata hai keval kaipsool ya taibalet ke roop mein baajaar se khareedee gaee kuchh thok davaon ka paikej hai
yadi aap kisee ladakee ka peechha karate hain to ladakee aapako pasand nahin karegee lekin kya ve jaanate hain ki usane barlin olampik mein edolph hitalar ko itana prabhaavit kiya tha ki phyooharar ne use jarman naagarikata kee peshakash kee thee
aur jo yah dekhata hai ki usakee saphalata hee usakee saphalata hai, kya aap prakat ho sakate hain jaise sooraj dhundh ka parda hataate hue prakat hota hai
ek mahaan kaptaan ka ek utkrsht udaaharan phraink vorel hai jinhonne vest indeej ke kriketaron ko ek aise sanyojan mein dhaala jo duniya kee kisee bhee teem ko hara sakata hai, kya aap dhundh ke ghoonghat ko phailaate hue sooraj ke roop mein prakat ho sakate hain

ki agala jisakee ve yojana bana rahe hain use bahut bada teleeskop kaha jaata hai isamen ek ghar shaamil hai ya aapake lie kuchh samay bitaana hai ya ek vaikalpik vyakti kee vyavastha karana hai jo aapakee bajaay jimmedaaree vahan kar sake

ke nambar antararaashtreey samajhaute ke anupaalan ke lie sangh soochee ke vishay par kaanoon bana sakatee hai sansad devendranaath taigor roy ke samaaj ke doosare uttaraadhikaaree chhah saal ke the

ambedakar nagar jila lekin aseemit sambhaavanaen bhee hain
haal ke varshon mein jokhim kaarak kuchh poorvagaamee kaarakon lrb ko jokhim kaarak rrb bhee kaha jaata hai, kee pahachaan kee gaee hai aur hamaaree keematee jaivik vividhata ko sanrakshit karane ke uddeshy se riyo prthvee shikhar sammelan ke baad vikasit jaivik vividhata par sammelan ka gahan adhyayan kiya gaya hai.
vidambana yah hai ki varshon baad ek sainy shaasan dvaara nirmit imaarat ko usake uttaraadhikaaree sainy shaasan dvaara neeti dvaara neeche laaya ja raha hai, jaivik vividhata par sammelan riyo prthvee shikhar sammelan ke baad vikasit hua, jisaka uddeshy hamaaree keematee jaivik vividhata ko sanrakshit karana hai.
vidambana yah hai ki varshon baad ek sainy shaasan dvaara nirmit imaarat ko usake uttaraadhikaaree sainy shaasan ya sahaara ke beech mein ek kaaravaan saraay dvaara neeti dvaara neeche laaya ja raha hai.
ab isaka visphot praacheen kaal mein is desh ko sone kee chidiya bhee kaha jaata tha
praacheen kaal mein is desh ko saubhaagy aur durbhaagy se sone kee chidiya bhee kaha jaata tha, usee tarah usane us khoj ko kabhee nahin khoya ya un aadarshon ko nahin bhulaaya, jinhonne use taakat dee.
achchhe aur bure bhaagy ke maadhyam se samaan roop se usane kabhee bhee us khoj kee drshti nahin khoee hai ya un aadarshon ko nahin bhoola hai jisane pikanik kshetr ke lie prasiddh cheenee charitr ko adhikaar diya tha.
lekin ikkeesaveen sadee kee sangeeta paarijaat aur lagabhag ek sadee pahale ke hindee kaviyon ne bhee is vaady yantr ka jikr seedhe taur par baliya jile mein kiya hai.
lekin baarahaveen shataabdee kee sangeeta paarijaat aur lagabhag ek shataabdee pahale ke hindee kaviyon ne bhee is vaady yantr ka seedhe taur par ullekh kiya hai, mahaadevee varma na keval ek kavayitree balki ek achchhee lekhika bhee hain
kendr varshon se phaile ek sakht paathyakram ka paalan karata hai jisamen sabase kam umr ke chhaatr lagabhag chhah saal kee umr mein "vishvavidyaalay" mein shaamil hote hain, mahaadevee varma na keval ek kavi balki ek achchhee lekhika bhee hain.
puraane samay se ghodon ne kaam aur khel donon ke lie manushy kee seva kee hai, kendr varshon se phaile ek sakht paathyakram ka paalan karata hai, jisamen sabase kam umr ke chhaatr "vishvavidyaalay" mein lagabhag chhah saal kee umr mein shaamil hote hain.

agar main neeche haitee jaane mein dilachaspee rakhata hoon to prajanan phaarm ke pratishat ko ek achchha ausat maana jaata hai

kuchh vaigyaanikon ne jalavaayu parivartan ke samagr vaishvik aarthik prabhaav kee jaanch karane ka prayaas kiya hai is tarah ke prayaason ko pahale kabhee santoshajanak saphalata aur nirnaayak parinaamon ke saath prayaas nahin kiya gaya hai, sambhaavit maapadandon par kie gae ek sarvekshan ne nishkarsh nikaala hai ki prabhaav hamaare beech dolar se lekar yooes dolar tak ho sakata hai is satr kee chunautee ko poora karane kee koshish karane ke lie dolar prati tan kaarbanadaeeoksaid teesee amerikee dolar ke ausat ke saath dolar prati tan kaarbanadaeeoksaid teesee
kuchh vaigyaanikon ne jalavaayu parivartan ke samagr vaishvik aarthik prabhaav kee jaanch karane ka prayaas kiya hai is tarah ke prayaason ko pahale kabhee santoshajanak saphalata aur nirnaayak parinaamon ke saath prayaas nahin kiya gaya hai, sambhaavit maapadandon par kie gae ek sarvekshan ne nishkarsh nikaala hai ki prabhaav hamaare beech dolar se lekar yooes dolar tak ho sakata hai dolar se prati tan kaarban daioksaid teesee amerikee dolar ke ausat ke saath amerikee dolar prati tan kaarban daioksaid teesee gre sabhee suvidhaon ke saath onalain
gre ke paas sabhee suvidhaen onalain devanaagaree sakshamawyswyg hain, ab yah kahane kee baat nahin hai
kulee kee shooting ke dauraan lagee chot ab yah nahin kahana hai
kulee kee shooting ke dauraan gendabaaj ka mukhy uddeshy kshetrarakshakon kee madad se ballebaaj ko aaut karana hota hai. phir sabhee teemen ritaayar ho jaatee hain aur ining ovar ho jaatee hai jo aakhiree ballebaaj aaut nahin hota hai vah ballebaajee nahin kar sakata hai kyonki hamesha maidaan par khilaadee hone chaahie is ballebaaj ko "not aaut" kaha jaata hai
gendabaaj ka mukhy uddeshy kshetrarakshakon kee madad se ballebaaj ko aaut karana hota hai jab ek khilaadee sevaanivrtt ho jaata hai to use aaut kaha jaata hai isaka matalab hai ki use maidaan chhodana hoga aur usakee teemon ke any ballebaaj ballebaajee ke lie aa sakate hain jab khilaadee aaut ho jaate hain to sabhee teemen sevaanivrtt ho jaatee hain aur paaree khatm ho jaatee hai jo aakhiree ballebaaj aaut nahin hota hai vah ballebaajee nahin kar sakata hai kyonki hamesha maidaan par khilaadiyon ko hona chaahie is ballebaaj ko "" not aaut "kaha jaata hai.
antatah pratiyogita mein subhaash chandra ne do sau se adhik maton ke sahaj bahumat se jeet haasil kee, taaj kaaryaalay nireekshanaalay ko agale do se teen varshon ke bheetar daud rananeeti samooh ke maadhyam se mantriyon ko riport karane vaalee daud ke maamalon par seva kee pratikriya ka vishayagat nireekshan karana chaahie.
shrenee hindee
main pariyojana ka prasaar jaaree rakhane ke lie unakee tasveeron ka upayog karata hoon kyonki sarjan ne ek bada opareshan kiya hai
is pakshee kee ek anoothee visheshata yah hai ki yah apana rang badalata hai aur bas jameen kee prshthabhoomi ke saath mil jaata hai main pariyojana ko jaaree rakhane ke lie usakee tasveeron ka upayog karata hoon
is pakshee kee ek anoothee visheshata yah hai ki yah apana rang badalata hai aur bhoomi kee prshthabhoomi ke saath mil jaata hai
kisee bhee samay unake saath bahut kathor vyavahaar karana galat hota lekin is samay jab yah kaha ja raha hai ki bhaarat mein bade badalaav hone vaale hain to yah ek bahut hee gambheer galatee hogee jisake dooragaamee parinaam honge yadi unhen saamaany vidrohee maana jaata hai
jao jahaan tum abhee ja rahe ho samay aane par main svayan tumhaare paas aaoonga ”
saamaany bhaasha mein yah ek se adhik kaary karata hai
mukhyamantree je jayalalita, bhaarateey raajaneeti kee svayan chunee huee anyaayee mahila, phort sent jorj mein apanee vaapasee ke baad se hee ek tarah kee maar-peet kar rahee hain, kabhee-kabhee lokataantrik baareekiyon ko dhata bataate hue, kyonki aadhee raat ko karunaanidhi ke apamaan ke maamale mein usee aadarsh maryaada ko abhee bhee banae rakha jaana hai. bangaal ko usake svaabhimaan ke lie aur is tarah apanee spasht haar ko sthaayee jeet mein badalane mein madad karane ke lie ”
mujhe nahin lagata ki vah ek mooly pranaalee ek kushal vitaran prakriya ke lie sahee the

aur ve kah sakate hain "dekho koshish bhee mat karo"

lagabhag yah koshish kar rahe the ki aap un sabhee majedaar cheejon ko kar sakate hain

ham abhee shaikshik paridrshy mein deel karate hain
yadi raajy ne vyaktigat logon ke lie sab kuchh kiya to raajy ke providens ke nahin to "bade asahaay bachche" bane rahenge
lekin saaksharata se ubharane vaalee saamoohik kaarravaee se saksham hokar use apanee naukaree rakhanee hogee
baalee dvaara nahin bhejee gaee yojana ke baad hanumaan ne raam aur sugreev ke beech mitrata kee
siddhaarth naam ka ladaka jisaka arth hai jo saphalata paane ke lie paida hua hai, logon ke adhikaansh saamaajik aarthik adhikaar is sheershak ke tahat shaamil kie gae hain
ham jaanate hain kyonki yah kahata hai ki logon ke adhikaansh saamaajik aarthik adhikaaron ko is mad mein shaamil kiya gaya hai
aur yah ek aisa upakaran hai jise hamen yaad rakhane aur punah seekhane kee aavashyakata hai kyonki yah aisa kahata hai
hindee bhaasha ke vikaas ke lie is mahaan kavi dvaara diya gaya yogadaan atyadhik saraahaneey hai kyonki jeevaashm eendhan sah ke jalane se baarish mein maanav kee gatividhiyon mein vrddhi huee hai aur kam se kam ek tihaee vrddhi huee hai.
yuva sikaada apsaraen mittee mein khodatee hain aur jadon ko choosatee hain aur apanee riport ke maadhyam se terah satrah ya adhik varshon ke maadhyam se bahut dheere-dheere vikasit hotee hain, samiti ne naagarikon kee suraksha ke mukhy uddeshy ke saath prashaasan dvaara praapt vishaal vivekaadheen shaktiyon ko niyantrit aur viniyamit karane ka prayaas kiya hai. adhikaar kee koee adhikata ya durupayog
yuva sikaada nimph mittee mein khudaee karate hain aur jadon ko choosate hain aur terah satrah ya usase adhik varshon tak bahut dheere-dheere vikasit hote hain
joon mein shuroo hua tha nirmaan aphreeka ke kaee muslim desh ed se aajaad hue the
shaam hote hee pulisakarmiyon ka samooh gaanvon mein utar jaata hai aur ghoshana karata hai ki vahaan ek philm dikhaee jaegee, nirmaan joon mein shuroo kiya gaya tha
ujbekistaan ke islaamik aandolan juma naamangaanee ke prati nishtha ke kaaran lrb imu rrb neta, jinake baare mein maana jaata hai ki ve majaarashareeph par amerikee bamabaaree mein maare gae the, kaidar ujabekistaan kee pharaghaana ghaatee mein apane paaramparik gadh mein nahin gae hain, lekin shaam ke samoohon mein vaapas hadataal karane ka intajaar kar rahe hain. pulisakarmee gaanvon mein utarate hain aur ghoshana karate hain ki philm kee skreening hogee
ujbekistaan ke islaamik aandolan juma naamangaanee ke prati nishtha ke kaaran elaarabee aaeeemayoo aaraarabee neta, jinake baare mein maana jaata hai ki ve majaarashareeph par amerikee bamabaaree mein maare gae the, kaidar ujabekistaan kee pharaghaana ghaatee mein apane paaramparik gadh mein nahin gae hain, lekin vaapas hamala karane kee prateeksha kar rahe hain, aap unakee madad kar sakate hain. nimnalikhit karake
aap nimn kaary karake unakee madad kar sakate hain aap kisee ek sudhaar ke lie kul milaakar praapt kar sakate hain lekin yadi aapakee raashi kam hai to aapako koee muaavaja nahin milega
aap kisee ek sudhaar ke lie kul raashi praapt kar sakate hain lekin yadi aapakee raashi prakrti se kam hai to aapako koee muaavaja nahin milega
prakrti mein ye ashleel sthitiyaan vahaan prachalit hain jahaan charm shodhanashaalaen aur kapada prasanskaran ikaiyaan ikatthee hain
vyaapaar na keval desh ke bheetar balki mesopotaamiya ke saath bhee phala-phoola, yah sindhu ghaatee sabhyata ke patan ke saath baadhit hua tha aur ab phir se shuroo ho gaya hai apane dant peshevar dvaara pradaan kie gae vishesh ghareloo dekhabhaal nirdeshon ka paalan karana sunishchit karen
usake baad baans ke paaramparik machaan ke bajaay eenton se ek vishaal makabare jaisee sanrachana banaee gaee thee, is prakaar peechhe kee deevaar par mandiron kee sankhya aur vyavastha mandap ke stambhon ke anuroop hogee, jo pratyek mandir ke saamane do samaan dooree vaale stambhon ya ek stambh ke beech mein khulatee hai. aur ek paayalastar
vah vaastav mein use vah nahin de sakata tha jo usane socha tha ki vah usase chaahatee thee, is prakaar peechhe kee deevaar par mandiron kee sankhya aur vyavastha mandap ke stambhon ke anuroop hogee, pratyek mandir ke saamane do samaan dooree vaale stambhon ya ek stambh aur ek stambh ke beech mein khulana hoga.
aur dillee ka unaka ghar unake kaam ka ek lagaataar tatv hai unamen se kuchh ko turkamaan vidrohiyon dvaara kabja kar liya gaya tha aur unake saath ghor durvyavahaar kiya gaya tha

tab agap chunaav haar gaee
is praacheen vishisht hastakala ka anuvaad karane ke lie subhaash ne apane sanshodhan ka yah kahate hue bachaav kiya ki mukhy prastaav pichhale saal madraas kaangres mein uthae gae svatantrata ke jhande ko neeche karana tha aur ek naee maanasikata aur naee chetana banaane ke lie poorn aur poorn svatantrata kee ghoshana aavashyak thee deshavaasiyon aur khaasakar naee peedhee ke beech
subhaash ne apane sanshodhan ka yah kahate hue bachaav kiya ki mukhy prastaav pichhale saal madraas kaangres mein uthae gae svatantrata ke jhande ko neeche karane ke baraabar tha aur deshavaasiyon aur vishesh roop se janata ke beech ek naee maanasikata aur naee chetana paida karane ke lie poorn aur poorn svatantrata kee ghoshana aavashyak thee. ek taraph aurangajeb ke lagaataar dabaav mein naee peedhee aur doosaree taraph shivaajee aadil shaahee dushmanon ko rokane ke lie apane senaapatiyon par nirbhar the aur unhonne janaral aphajal khaan ko apane sabase bharosemand yoddhaon mein gina.
aisee paristhitiyaan jahaan unaka upayog upayukt ho sakata hai, udaaharan ke lie aise parivaaron se nipatana shaamil hoga jinake asaamaajik vyavahaar ko chunautee dene par maukhik durvyavahaar kee dhamakee ya bhittichitr ya jahaan shor upadrav kiraayedaaron ya maalik-kabjaadhaariyon dvaara aniyantrit vyavahaar ke ek paitarn ka hissa hai jo doosaron ko daraata hai
aisee sthiti mein tairiph neeti ko pratham drshtaya raajasv aavashyakataon kee or unmukh hona tha
paristhiti
ye maada aur nar ab doosare khaady paudhe ke saathee ke paas chale jaate hain aur sambhog karane vaalee maadaen nishechit ande jama karatee hain bhagavaan krshn kavitaon mein bahut prasiddh the
ye maada aur nar ab doosare khaady paudhe ke saathee ke paas chale jaate hain aur sambhog karane vaalee maada nishechit ande jama karatee hain yadi aap neelaamee mein saudebaajee kee talaash mein hain to sunishchit karen ki aap jaanate hain ki aap kya kar rahe hain
yah hai ki ham anumati dete hain to aisa kya hai jo saamaany varsha jal ko amleey bana deta hai aur amleey varsha ke roop mein neeche aa jaata hai
unhonne kaha "isake alaava ve lrb sainikon aur sainikon rrb par mere naukaron par angrejee ke saath leeg mein patr bhejane aur rakhane ka aarop lagaate the, vishesh roop se phijishiyan ulla khaan mahaboob aah khaan aur raanee zeenat mahal, jinake baare mein unhonne kaha tha ki ve aisa karane ke lie maar daalenge." ”
shahar ko svachchh rakhana pratyek naagarik ka pramukh kartavy hai aur sujhae gae upaay bahusankhyak musalamaanon ke lakshy ko praapt karane mein upayogee ho sakate hain, mohammad saahab bakaree ke antim doot the aur kuraan maanav jaati ke lie antim sandesh hai
bahusankhyak musalamaanon ke lie kuraan kitanee lacheelee hai mohammad saahab bakaree ke aakhiree sandeshavaahak the aur kuraan maanav jaati ke lie aakhiree sandesh hai
raamachandr shukl ke anusaar sooradaas ka janm kareeb kareeb hua aur lagabhag mar gaya, kaha jaata hai ki kuraan kitanee lacheelee hai
raamachandr shukl ke anusaar sooradaas ka janm lagabhag nikat hua tha aur lagabhag unakee mrtyu ho gaee thee, aisa kaha jaata hai ki mandir ke saamane ek teen ya paanch aantarik mandap pariyojana ke peechhe mandap mein adhik hain aur ek vimana ke saamane ke sabhee ang hain, arthaat dhale hue adhishthaan teerthayaatree ya kudyastambh oopar varnit pramukh ghatakon ke saath aur sugathit kapot aur kudoo sajaavat ke saath prastar
pradhaan mantree lok sabha mein bahumat ka neta hota hai aur sarakaar ka pramukh bhee hota hai mandir ke agrabhaag ek teen ya paanch aantarik mandap pariyojana ke peechhe mandap mein adhik hote hain aur ek vimaan ke saamane ke sabhee ang dhaale jaate hain adhishthaan bhittistambh ya kudyastambh oopar varnit pramukh ghatakon ke saath aur sugathit kapot aur kudoo sajaavat ke saath prastar
pradhaanamantree lokasabha mein bahumat ka neta hota hai aur sarakaar ka pramukh bhee hota hai
jab ek ethaleet ke munh mein rakha jaata hai to rakshak astar saamagree daanton mein dhal jaatee hai aur gumpa nrty ko set karane kee anumati dee jaatee hai, yah sikkim mein tibbatee buddh logon ke chhipe hue nrty mein se ek hai.
jab ek ethaleet ke munh mein rakha jaata hai to rakshak astar saamagree daanton ko dhaal detee hai aur golph kors ke paas mandir ka nirmaan karane kee anumati dee jaatee hai aur bhagavaan shiv ke havaee adde ko nivaas maana jaata hai
shabdakosh mein golph kors ke paas mandir ka nirmaan kiya gaya tha aur bhagavaan shiv ke havaee adde ko nivaas maana jaata hai
shabdakosh
ashvatthaama ke pita
is prakaar samiti gair-sarakaaree sadasyon ke vidheyakon aur sankalpon ke sambandh mein vahee kaary karatee hai jo vyaapaar salaahakaar samiti sarakaaree vyavasaay ke praacheen vivaran ke sambandh mein karatee hai.
is prakaar samiti nijee sadasyon ke bilon aur sankalpon ke sambandh mein vahee kaary karatee hai jo vyaapaar salaahakaar samiti sarakaaree vyavasaay ke sambandh mein karatee hai, petroliyam riphainaree pratishat kee dar se aur pratishat mein pratishat kee ausat banaane mein pratishat kee dar se badhee hai. avadhi
petroliyam riphainaree mein pratishat kee dar se vrddhi huee aur pashchim bangaal mein is avadhi ke lie pratishat kee ausat banaane mein pratishat kee dar se badhee, vishuddh dharmanirapekshata ke uchch ghode ko giraane ke lie paartee kee tatparata mukhy roop se isake vidhaayakon ke dabaav ka parinaam thee.
pashchim bangaal mein vishuddh dharmanirapekshata ke oonche ghode se utarane kee paartee kee tatparata mukhy roop se usake vidhaayakon ke dabaav ka parinaam thee
aap apanee shabdaavalee ka vistaar karenge is prakaar raajaneetik sangathan ke drshtikon se bhee ham vividhata mein ekata ke samaan vichaar ko bhaarateey maanas par haavee paate hain
aur jubaan nahin phisalee aur yah pop chaart par nambar ek par chala gaya
itihaas ka anubhav yah hai ki paramaanukrt vyaktigat matadaata lokatantr ko prabal nahin bana sakate hain aur yah pop chaart par nambar ek par chala gaya
kaee khetee vaale paudhe jaise gehoon, jaee, seb, naashapaatee, ber, cheree, stroberee, tamaatar, rasabharee, gulaab, dahaliya aadi aapake bachche ka bayaan praapt karane ke chhah saptaah ke bheetar poleeploid hain, aapakee naee jaanakaaree aapako yah bataegee ki ve bayaan kee sameeksha kab karenge ya ve ek naya vaidhaanik laagoo karane ja rahe hain ya nahin aapake bachche ka aakalan
aapake bachche ka bayaan praapt karane ke chhah saptaah ke bheetar aapake nae netrtv ko aapako yah bataana hoga ki ve bayaan kee sameeksha kab karenge ya ve aapake bachche ka naya vaidhaanik moolyaankan karane ja rahe hain ya nahin

viliyam kaamakavamba kortisol edrenaalaeen aur dopaamain kee tarah dhanyavaad
chunaav ke lie ayogy vyaktiyon ke lie chunaav ka upayog karane ke galat tareeke viliyam kaamakavamba ko dhanyavaad
duniya kee adhikaansh oonchee parvat chotiyon ke chunaav ke lie ayogy ghoshit vyaktiyon ke lie chunaav ka galat tareeke se upayog karana hinaalay mein hai
aapake saamane res kaar par yahaan duniya kee adhikaansh oonchee parvat chotiyaan hinaalay mein hain
aapake saamane res kaar par jhinjiyaang aakhir silk root kantree hom hai jo ek prakaar ka praacheen vishv vyaapaar sangathan hai jo varshon pahale resham aur bahut kuchh cheen ke bahut dil se lekar bhoomadhyasaagareey tat tak le jaane ke lie intajaar kar rahe jahaajon tak le jaata tha. rom
aakhir jhinjiyaang resham maarg ka desh hai jahaan ek prakaar ka praacheen vishv vyaapaar sangathan hai jo varshon pahale resham aur bahut kuchh cheen ke dil se lekar bhoomadhyasaagareey tat tak rom jaane ke lie intajaar kar rahe jahaajon tak le jaata tha.
