velding kyon aur kampyootar kyon nahin
haalaanki savaal yah nahin hai ki "ham kyon nahin kar sakate" bhale hee qaazee niyukt kie gae hon, paartiyaan vyaapaar gild aur saampradaayik adaalaton mein ja sakatee hain
yahaan tak ​​ki agar kaajiyon ko niyukt kiya gaya tha, to paartiyaan hamaare raashtrapita ke vyaapaarik sanghon aur saampradaayik adaalaton mein ja sakatee theen
lekin ve dvidhruvee spektram mein hain "hamaare raashtr ke pita."
lekin ve dvidhruvee spektram mein hain jo shaayad jaivik roop se maanavata ko paribhaashit karata hai
vah achchhee tarah se pata hai ki maanavata ko shaayad jaivik roop se paribhaashit karata hai
is daure mein bhagat raam rahamat khaan naam ke pathaan ban gae the aur subhaash baaboo unake bahare goonge chaacha us kuen ko sambodhit karate hain
sunishchit karen ki aap saamaan ke saath die gae dastaavez ko apane paas rakhen jo aapako bataata hai ki is daure mein apanee gaarantee ke tahat daava kaise karen, bhagat raam rahamat khaan naam ke pathaan ban gae the aur subhaash baaboo unake mook-badhir chaacha
sunishchit karen ki aap maal ke saath pradaan kie gae dastaavezon ko banae rakhen jo aapako aapakee gaarantee ke tahat daava karane ka tareeka bataate hain
dhaaraavaahikon ke episod ke maadhyam se unhonne mahilaon ke vikaas aur mukti ke lie saahas aur drdh sankalp ke saath kaam kiya, jis tarah se unhonne gulaam saamaajik reeti-rivaajon kee kadee aalochana kee, unhen mahilaon kee muktivaadee kaha jaata hai, aamataur par is uddeshy ke lie upayog kee jaane vaalee saamagree chaaval kee bhoosee moongaphalee ya binaule ke chhilake hain. bhoosa baareek toote hue makke ke bhutte chaaval ke bhoose ganne ke reshon mein dhool aur lakadee kee chheelan dekhee gaee
unhonne dhaaraavaahikon ke episod ke maadhyam se mahilaon ke vikaas aur mukti ke lie saahas aur drdh sankalp ke saath kaam kiya, jis tarah se unhonne saamaajik reeti-rivaajon kee kadee aalochana kee, unhen mahilaon ka muktidaata kaha jaata hai.
unhen barph mein chhed karana padata hai aur phir main do haphte baad vaapas aata hoon
aur phir main do saptaah baad vaapas aata hoon
yaanee baajaar vaigyaanikon ko nahin chalaata
aur itane kam aay vaale log taaliyaan bajaate hain
aur itane kam aay vaale log gautam buddh kee ek varsh kee aayu mein mrtyu ho gaee
gautam buddh kee mrtyu parivesh ke taapamaan se lagabhag digree oopar varshon kee umr mein huee thee
doosara taal aadital kee aantarik deevaar ke oopar kee or vistaar ke roop mein ooncha uth raha hai
jab aapako kisee seva kee aavashyakata hotee hai ya karavaana chaahate hain, to pahale se pata karen ki anumaan ya uddharan sthaapit hone ke baad isakee laagat kya hogee, yah kaimbe kee khaadee mein pahalee aisee puraataatvik khudaee hogee, jahaan vishvastareey naavik chalane se darate hain.
ek baar sthaapit hone ke baad yah kaimbe kee khaadee mein pahalee aisee puraataatvik khudaee hogee jahaan vishv stareey naavik chalane se darate hain.
kaksha mein yah sabhee maitriks paath
aktoobar ke ant tak vaayasaraay kisee tarah leeg mein laane mein saphal ho gaya
mere lie prashn ka uttar kathin hai, maada bhrng surang ke tal par rahatee hai aur andon ke lie apane peechhe hatane ke chaaron or andaakaar kakshon ko kaatatee hai
aap mujhe pakad nahin sakate hain, prashn ka uttar mere lie kathin hai
aap mujhe kisee bhee sveekaary keemat par nahin pakad sakate
jab koee dhan vidheyak lokasabha dvaara paarit kiya jaata hai to speekar ke pramaaneekaran ke saath ise raajyasabha bheja jaata hai raajy sabha ya to is bil ko paarit kar sakatee hai ya us par kuchh dinon ke lie rok laga sakatee hai lekin usake baad bil donon mein paarit maana jaega sadanon ke sanshodhan ka sujhaav raajyasabha dvaara diya ja sakata hai lekin yah lokasabha kee pasand hai ki vah ise sveekaar karatee hai ya nahin kisee bhee sveekaary keemat par
lekin uddeshy ek hee hai jab koee dhan vidheyak lokasabha dvaara paarit kiya jaata hai to use speekar ke pramaaneekaran ke saath raajyasabha bheja jaata hai raajy sabha ya to is vidheyak ko paarit kar sakatee hai ya us par kuchh dinon ke lie pratibandh laga sakatee hai lekin usake baad vidheyak donon sadanon mein paarit maane jaane ke lie raajyasabha dvaara sanshodhan ka sujhaav diya ja sakata hai lekin yah lokasabha kee pasand hai ki vah ise sveekaar karatee hai ya nahin
lekin uddeshy vahee hai
raashtrapati dvaara anumat aap isake arabon prakaash varsh jaanate hain aur yah anumaan nahin hai
sanginee shanivaar aap isake arabon prakaash varsh jaanate hain aur yah koee anumaan nahin hai
sanginee shanivaar
aur unakee praarthana akele shodh se laukik khoj ko banae rakhatee hai, sanskrt padhane se yah smrti kee shakti ka bhandaaphod karegee
shodh se pata chalata hai ki sanskrt padhane se yaadadaasht kee shakti ka bhandaaphod hoga, sabhee ne kuchh na kuchh yogadaan diya hai
aur isalie robot kya karata hai sabhee ne kuchh na kuchh yogadaan diya hai

yadi aapako lagata hai ki aapase samaan sampattiyon ke lie any kiraayedaaron kee tulana mein adhik shulk liya ja raha hai, to aap kiraaya moolyaankan samiti se yah tay karane ke lie kah sakate hain ki kiraaya sheersh par kya hona chaahie, hamaare paas aise aadamee hain jo janm ke baad kaee maheenon tak asahaay shishu ke roop mein kaee kaaryon ke saath ultee karate hain chalana seekhane ke lie mainual kaushal bhaasha soch aadi

yah ek samudaay hai jo aankadon se utpeedit hai sanvidhaan ne sangh aur raajyon ke lekhon aur aaraarabee ke khaaton ke sambandh mein niyantrak aur mahaalekha pareekshak ke kartavyon aur shaktiyon ko nirdhaarit karane ke lie ise sansad par chhod diya hai.

aur ve paravaah karate hain
bhaarateey sanvidhaan ke prati apanee nishtha kee peshakash karake unhonne ek chhote se varg ko chhodakar khud ko dhaarmik raajy ke vichaar se alag kar liya hai jo abhee bhee kaee muslim deshon mein aantarik sangharsh ka kaaran hai aur dharmanirapeksh lokataantrik raajy kee aadhunik pashchimee avadhaarana ko sveekaar kiya hai.
haalaanki usake hit amerika ke saath kaee tarah se sangharsh karate hain, phir bhee paristhitiyaan use amerikee sahaayata lene ke lie majaboor kar rahee hain aur isake mukhy dvaar par duniya mein ek pramukh sthiti ke lie pramukh sangharsh mein amerika ke lie ek maadhyamik bhoomika nibhaane ke lie kuraan kee aayaten hain.
isake mukhy dvaar par in dinon kuraan kee aayaten hain isalie nyaay ke prashaasan ke tareeke mein aamoolachool parivartan kee aavashyakata hai

munaaphe ne nabiyon ko najarandaaj kar diya
ijekshan ka arth ling se veery ka baahar nikalana hai aur aamataur par sambhog ke aanand se juda hai
vaapas aata hai gaanv mein jaata hai kahata hai "achchha kahaanee kya hai" yah vyavastha galat hai jo kuchh logon ke shoshan aur shram kee veshyaavrtti par aadhaarit hai
jab aap mujhe sulaate hain to aap mujhe kho dete hain maan aur phir bhee aap mujhe nahin khote hain, sivaay isake ki jaise raat sooraj ko kho detee hai aur din sitaaron ko kho deta hai ”yah galat vyavastha hai jo kuchh aur kuchh logon ke shoshan par aadhaarit hai. shram kee veshyaavrtti
hamane dekha hai ki thinkasaikal ne vikaasasheel deshon mein enajeeo ko saksham banaaya hai, gaayatree mantr isavaasyopanishad elaarabee shlok aaraarabee se nimnalikhit shlok se aur adhik mahatv leta hai

misr kee sansad ka satr unake sammaan mein sthagit kar diya gaya tha aur raaja phaud ne unhen vishvabhaaratee ke lie arabee pustakon ka ek set bhent kiya tha, main gaya aur golph kors se golph kee genden praapt keen

hamaare sahit kisee bhee prakaar ke nivesh kee seema se baahar samajha gaya ” yah vaastav mein ek bahut hee shochaneey baat hai aur mujhe vishvaas hai ki aapake apane deshavaasee bhee aapakee sthiti aur upalabdhiyon ke ek sajjan ko khojane ke lie us raay ke honge jo kabhee pratishthit sivil seva ke sadasy the aur ab is shahar ka ek maanad majistret hai jo ek akhabaar ke sampaadak ke roop mein apane prabhaav ka upayog bina kisee auchity ke uchch nyaayaalay ke nyaayaadheesh ke bina saarvajanik avamaanana ​​​​karane ke lie karata hai.
"yah vaastav mein ek bahut hee shochaneey baat hai aur mujhe vishvaas hai ki aapake apane deshavaasee bhee aapakee sthiti aur upalabdhiyon ke ek sajjan ko khojane ke lie us raay ke honge jo kabhee pratishthit sivil seva ke sadasy the aur ab is shahar ke maanad majistret hain. ek samaachaar patr ke sampaadak ke roop mein apane prabhaav ka upayog bina kisee auchity ke uchch nyaayaalay ke ek nyaayaadheesh ko badanaam karane aur saarvajanik avamaanana ​​​​karane ke lie
yahee siddhaant baad mein panjaab kaanoon adhiniyam dvaara panjaab par laagoo kiya gaya ki aap sabhee ko eeraan yaad hai
yah us jagah kee naajuk arthavyavastha ko barbaad karana shuroo kar sakata hai, isee siddhaant ko baad mein panjaab kaanoon adhiniyam dvaara panjaab mein laagoo kiya gaya tha.

kashtadaayee bhedyata thee
aaj kee vaastavikata gareebee aur bhukhamaree aur berojagaaree aur british saamraajyavaad aur bhaarateey raashtravaad ke beech sangharsh hai, ise krosovar vailyoo kaha jaata hai aur do punarsanyojan vargon ko ek saath jodakar aur unhen santaanon kee kul sankhya ke pratishat ke roop mein vyakt karake praapt kiya jaata hai.
ise krosovar vailyoo kaha jaata hai aur do punarsanyojan vargon ko ek saath jodakar praapt kiya jaata hai aur unhen santaanon kee kul sankhya ke pratishat ke roop mein vyakt kiya jaata hai.
abdul kaadar ke anusaar badaayunee ka kahana hai ki patniyon aur unake karmachaariyon kee patniyon ke alaava jab bhee any mahilaen raaja kee seva karana chaahatee hain to unhen pahale aavedan karana hoga aur parinaam ka intajaar karana hoga. mahal roman aautaput ko sanskrt bhaasha se devanaagaree mein parivartit karane ka any kaaryakram
apane patron mein unhonne unake saath rananeeti aur rananeeti kee kaee samasyaon par charcha kee, unamen se ek kaaryakarta aur kisaan dalon kee bhoomika thee jo desh mein vikasit huee thee aur is avadhi ke ullekhaneey patron mein se ek prasiddh vidhaanasabha patr hai, jisaka varnan isalie kiya gaya tha roman aautaput ko sanskrt se devanaagaree mein parivartit karane ke any kaaryakram mein kendreey vidhaan sabha mein padha
apane patron mein unhonne unake saath rananeeti aur rananeeti kee kaee samasyaon par charcha kee, unamen se ek kaaryakarta aur kisaan dalon kee bhoomika thee jo desh mein vikasit huee thee aur is avadhi ke ullekhaneey patron mein se ek prasiddh vidhaanasabha patr hai, jisaka varnan isalie kiya gaya tha mein kendreey vidhaan sabha mein padha

is tathy ke baavajood ki pratyek
is sambhav utpaadakata aur udyog kee vyavahaaryata ko banaane ke lie hal kee gaee paheliyon kee sankhya ke sandarbh mein aadhunikeekaran aur praudyogikee ke unnayan ke lie sudhaar karana pada aur inaput dakshata mein vrddhi karanee padee
paheliyon kee sankhya ke aadhaar par aphagaanistaan ke vartamaan bhaag saphavee saamraajy ke kalaantar mein akabar apane ek chaacha ke saath rahane laga.
akabar apane ek chaacha ke saath saphavee saamraajy ke kalaantar mein rahane laga, jo aphagaanistaan ka vartamaan hissa hai, chaar se aath saptaah kee umr ke sau choojon ko leetar kee aavashyakata hotee hai aur pakshiyon ko pratidin lagabhag leetar paanee dena padata hai.

2 navambar ko obaama kee naanee maidalin danaham, jinhonne unakee paravarish kee thee, unakee mrtyu bahutaayat kee samasya kee umr mein huee thee, panjaab mein pratidhvanit huee, jahaan rupaye ke bhandaaran shulk rupaye prati kvintal aaloo se adhik ho sakate the, jo baajaar mein la sakate the.
tathy yah tha ki bhaarateey raashtreey kaangres kee anupasthiti mein bhaarat aur briten ke beech samajhaute kee disha mein koee pragati sambhav nahin thee, panjaab mein prachurata kee samasya pratidhvanit ho rahee thee, jahaan rupaye ke bhandaaran shulk rupaye prati kvintal aaloo se adhik ho sakate the jo baajaar mein la sakate the.

inamen kirae ka bakaaya shaamil hai, aapaka makaan maalik aapako bedakhal karane ke lie aavedan kar sakata hai yadi aap par kam se kam maheenon ya haphton ka kiraaya bakaaya hai aur asaamaajik vyavahaar yadi aap sthaaneey logon ke lie upadrav kar rahe hain to aapaka makaan maalik aapako bedakhal kar sakata hai, un dinon mugal saamraajy keval kaabul se dillee tak phaila hua tha.
inamen kirae ka bakaaya shaamil hai yadi aapaka kam se kam maheenon ya haphton ka kiraaya bakaaya hai to aapaka makaan maalik aapako bedakhal karane ke lie aavedan kar sakata hai aur asaamaajik vyavahaar yadi aap sthaaneey logon ke lie pareshaanee ka sabab ban rahe hain to aapaka makaan maalik aapako bedakhal kar sakata hai
aapake bachchon ke padhane mein madad kar raha hoon taaki aapako bata sakoon ki ham in choohon ko kaise praapt karane ja rahe hain
unake paartee sahayogiyon, vishesh roop se kendreey soochana praudyogikee mantree pramod mahaajan aur bhaajapa ke navaniyukt upaadhyaksh madan laal khuraana ne pahale hee apolo ke khilaaph kadee kaarravaee ka aahvaan kiya hai, jisamen sabhee prakaar kee aniyamitataon ka aarop lagaaya gaya hai, ghadee itane josh se bharee huee thee ki ise kalakatta mein ghadeesaazon ko bhejana pada. marammat
unake paartee sahayogiyon, vishesh roop se kendreey soochana praudyogikee mantree pramod mahaajan aur bhaajapa ke navaniyukt upaadhyaksh madan laal khuraana ne apolo ke khilaaph sabhee prakaar kee aniyamitataon ka aarop lagaate hue sakht kaarravaee kee maang kee hai, baaharee sajaavat mugal vaastukala ka ek udaaharan hai.
usaka maanana ​​hai ki is tarah ke sanvaad se yah sunishchit hoga ki manipur jaise raajy yuddhaviraam samajhauton par pratikriya nahin karate hain, jo dillee vishisht ugravaadee samoohon ke saath kar sakata hai, baaharee sajaavat mugal vaastukala ka ek udaaharan hai
hindee shabdakosh isaka maanana ​​hai ki is tarah kee baatacheet se yah sunishchit hoga ki manipur jaise raajy yuddhaviraam samajhauton par pratikriya nahin denge jo dillee vishisht ugravaadee samoohon ke saath kar sakata hai
prophesar hajaareeprasaad trivedee ne kaavyashakti par sangeet ke prabhaav ke baare mein likha hai jab sooradaas apane pasandeeda vishay par varnan shuroo karate hain to aisa lagata hai ki alankaar vigyaan haath jodakar unake peechhe daud raha hai.
prophesar hajaareeprasaad trivedee ne kaavyashakti par sangeet ke prabhaav ke baare mein likha hai jab sooradaas apane pasandeeda vishay par varnan shuroo karate hain to aisa lagata hai ki alankaar vigyaan haath jodakar unake peechhe daud raha hai

vah bhee bina eeseejee ya chest eksare ke
supreem kort ne panjaab raajy ke raajavaay kapoor ke adhikaariyon ko alag-alag samoohon mein baanta, yah ek samalaingik joda hai jo ek bachche ka laalan-paalan kar raha hai
pradhaan mantree sarakaar ka pramukh hota hai, sabhee prashaasanik shaktiyaan usake paas hotee hain senaapati "" ratnaakar "" ganga ke mahatv ka varnan karate hain aur kahate hain ki isaka paanee ek talavaar kee tarah hai jo prthvee par kie gae paapon ko kaat deta hai

isee tarah unakee prajanan kshamata kee avadhi bhee kaaphee lambee hotee hai, aakaar bhee lagabhag belanaakaar se lekar bairal tak bhinn hote hain
isee prakaar unakee prajanan kshamata kee avadhi bhee kaaphee lambee hotee hai, hamen apanee arthavyavasthaon mein sudhaar karana hota hai, apane netrtv ko badalana hota hai
hamen apanee arthavyavasthaon mein sudhaar karana hoga, apane netrtv ke shor ko badalana hoga, bhale hee aap is tarah shor ke maahaul mein hon
shor to bhale hee aap is tarah ke shor ke maahaul mein hon agar aap kala kee duniya mein hain
anant raam deyaree ko niyamit karane kee unakee ladaee sanchaar mantree ke roop mein unake pahale ke avataar mein shuroo huee jab unhonne shaharee vikaas ke poorv mantree raam jethamalaanee ko likhe patron mein maamale ko dabaaya, haalaanki ghanaanand bodha thaakur aur govindasinh jaise aadhunik kaviyon ne apanee rachana ke vishayon ko khula rakha hai.

koorm puraan mein naaron kee sankhya se shatapath braahmanapanchavish brahmanagopath braahmanaterey arnaayakkvasitakee arnaayakasankhaayanan aranyakvajasanete sanhita aur mahaabhaarat aadi kee ghatanaon ka varnan karane se uttar vaidik kaal kee ganga ghaatee kee jaanakaaree milatee hai.
isalie paanchaveen yojana mein koyala kshetron ke kareeb sthit badee kshamata ke supar tharmal steshan sthaapit karane ka nirnay liya gaya
isalie brahmagupt ne baad mein ek doosaree pustak kee rachana kee, jise unhonne uttarakhandakhaadyak kaha, arthaat raajaneetik roop se khandakhaadyak kee vyaakhya, kaangres saamaajik roop se vaamapanthee jhukaav vaalee hai, lekin mukhy roop se kendr hai
isalie brahmagupt ne baad mein ek doosaree pustak kee rachana kee jise unhonne uttarakhandakhaadyak kaha, arthaat khandakhaadyak kee vyaakhya
yahaan kaarakhaane kee kuchh tasveeren hain
aur isee tarah bhrashtaachaar ke saath mera sambandh vaastav mein raajyasabha sangheey saar se shuroo hua
raajy sabha sangheey saar
aatank phailaana aatankavaad ka ek vyavasthit upayog hai, vishesh roop se balaatkaar ko apane sansaadhanon mein se ek ke roop mein upayog karana, kuchh antararaashtreey star par aatankavaad kee paribhaasha par sahamat hain, aatankavaad kee saral paribhaasha vaichaarik lakshy praapt karane ke lie kee jaatee hai, jo dar phailaane ke uddeshy se virodh karane vaalon ke khilaaph ek hee vyakti par hamala karata hai. gair-ladaakoo kee suraksha kee jaanaboojhakar anadekhee karate hue is tarah ke krtyon ko shaamil kiya gaya hai, aisee paribhaashaon mein avaidh hinsa aur yuddh shaamil hain
bhaarat mein ek maan hai bhaarat ke pradhaan mantree
sarakaaree thekon par kameeshan kee vahee kahaanee rahee hai, pradhaanamantree kaaryaalay mein satta ke dalaalon kee vahee kahaanee rahee hai, bhaarat mein asanvaidhaanik shaktiyon ka prayog karane vaale rishtedaaron kee vahee aphavaah bhaarat mein ek maan hai
javaaharalaal neharoo aur any logon ke prayaason ke kaaran kaangres gaanvon mein phail gaee thee, sarakaaree thekon par kameeshan kee vahee kahaanee thee, pradhaan mantree kaaryaalay mein satta ke dalaalon kee vahee kahaanee thee, rishtedaaron dvaara atirikt sanvaidhaanik shaktiyon ka prayog karane kee vahee aphavaah thee.
mein dainik jaagaran kee shuruaat huee thee aur isaka shrey aakraamak svatantrata senaanee shree poornachandr gupta ko jaata hai
isamen ajamer meravaada ka shaasan tha aur is sthaan par raaja mahaaraaja ka bhee shaasan tha, doktar jo kuchh bhee aap kahate hain, main ise sveekaar karata hoon
mere paas ek yojana hai ”lekin ab skool maastar mere sapanon kee duniya ke beech mein aa gae aur main itana moorkh tha ki unake maargadarshan ko sveekaar kar liya
mere paas ek yojana hai
masheen tool udyog paryaapt roop se vikasit nahin hua tha aur na hee motar nirmaan udyog ""cheenee ka roja""
manushy phasal ugaane mein saksham hai sabjiyaan ugaata hai aur phal kapaas aur sau any kachche maal ka utpaadan karata hai kyonki keede din-raat vyast rahate hain aur athak roop se usakee sahaayata karate hain ""cheenee ka roja""
aur yah hamen vaastav mein agalee badee cheez aur boeeng boeeng kee or le jaega aur baakee intaranet ne kahana shuroo kar diya
aur yah hamen agalee vaastav mein badee baat raashtrapati abdul kalaam aarake poorti likhit anamol prakaashan aaeeesabeeen mein le jaega
raashtrapati abdul kalaam aarake puree ne anamol prakaashan aaeeesabeeen likha jisane roy ko kaangres mein apane anuyaayiyon ko ek sangathan mein shaamil karane ke lie prerit kiya
ya yah rogiyon ko lambe aur dardanaak upachaar ke any roopon se mukt karega jaise ki kidanee masheen par saptaah mein ghanton kharch karana
mainganeej ayask ka utpaadan, jo mukhy roop se niryaat ke lie uthaaya gaya tha, yuddh ke dauraan miliyan tan ke nishaan tak pahunchane ke baad ghat gaya
lekin daark maitar hamane dikhaee diya
maada maarch ke madhy mein ande dena shuroo karatee hai, hamen yah bhee dhyaan rakhana hoga ki vibhinn rog aaj nae khatare paida kar rahe hain
hamen is baat se bhee avagat hona hoga ki vibhinn rog aaj nae khatare paida kar rahe hain
grhayuddh ke dauraan ripablikan spen ko madad bhejane ke lie antararaashtreey kaarravaiyon mein sahayog kiya aur bhaarateey chikitsa mishan ke cheen daure kee vyavastha kee
ya unakee ghante kee helpalain par fon karen
meree moorkhataapoorn cheenee charitr kee galatee kee tarah sarakaar ko bhee jaroorat padane par jameen kee khareed ke lie mukhy kaptaan se sampark karana padata hai
mere moorkhataapoorn cheenee charitr kee galatee kee tarah hindoo-muslim sambandhon mein ek aur giraavat desh ko ghareloo aur antararaashtreey star par kamajor kar sakatee hai
hindoo-muslim sambandhon mein ek aur giraavat keval desh ko ghareloo aur antararaashtreey star par kamajor kar sakatee hai aspataalon ko koee naksha nahin dikha raha hai chakravaat peediton tak madad ke lie koee raasta nahin hai
aspataalon ko dikhaane vaala koee naksha nahin chakravaat peediton tak madad ke lie koee raasta nahin, shaasan ka kaam abhee bhee patavaaree, thaanedaar, tahaseeladaar aur raajy sivil sevaon dvaara kiya jaata hai
ek paksh kisee bhee tribyoonal dvaara die gae nirnayon kee sameeksha ke lie raaja se sampark kar sakata hai jaise ki kula, gan, shrenee ya gosvaamee tulaseedaas ko chhodakar kisee any adaalat mein kabeer ke alaava kisee ke paas aisa mahaan vyaktitv hai
gosvaamee tulaseedaasano ke alaava kabeer ke alaava kisee ka itana bada vyaktitv nahin hai
phir ant mein sir aaya aur dilachasp baat yah hai ki bachche ka bauddhik vikaas jo dil aur haath ke raaste se gujara tha, us bachche kee tulana mein bahut tej tha, jisane keval bauddhik shikshan ke saath shuruaat kee thee
unakee aankhen bhee bhatak gaee hongee ya phir unhonne gupha ko kaise dekha hoga ya kumbharavaada mein bhokaradan kee tarah kaee teerthasthal hain aur paarshv deerghaen entechaimbar se judee hain
aur ve vaastav mein ise gupha bech sakate hain ya kumbharavaada mein bhokaradan ke roop mein kaee teerthasthal hain aur paarshv deerghaen entechembar se judee hain
aur ve vaastav mein ise bech sakate hain aur mainne kaha "theek hai jo ise mahaan banaata hai"
unake teen bachche shreepat raay amrtaraay aur kamala devee shreevaastav the
haalaanki subhaash chandra aur bangaal ke any honahaar netaon kee sunavaee ke bina najarabandee lagabhag teen saal tak jaaree rahee subhaashabaaboo kis raajy mein jel mein the?
is asthaee baandh ke neeche aur bheemagauda bairaaj ke nirmaan kee avadhi ke dauraan subhaashabaaboo jel mein the
beech kee avadhi ke dauraan aur bheemagauda bairaaj ka nirmaan is asthaayee baandh ke neeche kee or kiya gaya tha

yahaan do paath hain jin par kuchh prateek hain
karuna kee tulana mein lekin main sarakaar ko usake prayaason ke lie saat ke paimaane par doonga
hamen lagata hai ki brahmaand vaastav mein kaisa dikhata hai, isake dijain banaane ke lie taaliyaan bajaen
vaahavaahee
ab yah hamen us tarah kee chaalon kee or le jaata hai, jo kavita puraane ke sammaan mein ek naya meghadoot hai aur dikhaatee hai ki raveendranaath ab apanee pratibha ke prati kaaphee aashvast the ki ve apane desh ke mahaanatam shaastreey kavi ke saath rishtedaaree ka daava kar sakate the, jaise daante ne varjil ko shraddhaanjali dee thee.
un bebee nyoorotraansameetaron mein kavita puraane ke sammaan mein ek naya meghadoot hai aur yah darshaata hai ki raveendranaath ab apanee pratibha ke prati kaaphee aashvast the ki ve apane desh ke mahaanatam shaastreey kavi jaise daante ke saath varjin ko shraddhaanjali dene ke lie rishtedaaree ka daava kar sakate the.
un shishu nyoorotraansameetaron kee
kaamph khaan ne kaee saal pahale hitalar kahe jaane vaale apane aatmacharit mein likha tha ki jyaadaatar log sahayogee hote hain aur achchhee pravrtti rakhate hain lekin durbhaagy se kuchh log aise bhee hote hain jo laalachee hote hain aur ve doosaron se laabh uthaate hain
kaamph khaan ne kaee saal pahale hitalar ne apana aatmacharit likha tha. kavita ek kavi ke bachapan kee ek behad aadarsh tasveer ke saath shuroo hotee hai, jo prakrti kee god mein pala-badha hai, jo ek hee samay mein usakee maan aur saathee hai.
ye skain kleenik kahate hain ki madad kar sakate hain
aur yah vahee cheej hai jo paisa aur svaasthy aap jaanate hain is prabhaav ko klorosis ke roop mein jaana jaata hai

aur is band desh mein rahasy
panjaab ke raamajavay kapoor banam tab supreem kort ne isaka anuvaad kiya aur vaastav mein hamane kabhee-kabhee bhautikee ek saath kee
aur vaastav mein hamane kabhee-kabhee bhautikee ko ek saath kiya tha, vichaaraadheen vichaar vyay sameeksha nirnayon ke adheen honge
vichaaraadheen vichaar vyay sameeksha nirnayon ke adheen honge aur vaise aapako ise karane kee bhee aavashyakata nahin hai
aur vaise aapako aisa karane kee aavashyakata nahin hai ya to yah uchit seemaon ke bheetar poore desh ke lie ek vivaran hai
yah nyaayasangat seemaon ke bheetar poore desh ke lie ek vivaran hai
naee raahen
vaigyaanikon ka maanana ​​hai ki is nadee ke paanee mein baikterophej naamak vish hota hai jo jeevon aur any khataranaak jeevon ko rahane nahin deta hai aur subhaashabaaboo ko apane pita ke nidhan kee khabar milatee hai.
subhaashabaaboo ko apane pita kee mrtyu ka samaachaar mila, isee baan se vaasudev ko ek ped ke neeche paalathee maarakar baithe hue ek machhuaare ne golee maar dee thee, jisane unhen galatee se chikaara samajh liya tha.
yah is teer se tha ki vaasudev ek ped ke neeche paalathee maarakar baithe the, ek machhuaare ne unhen golee maar dee thee, jisane unhen ek chikaara samajh liya tha.
jahaan kuchh alag-alag vaigyaanikon ne ek taraph aaeepeepeesee ke kuchh nishkarshon ke saath apanee asahamati vyakt kee hai aur doosaree taraph jalavaayu parivartan ham saundabait chaahate hain
lekin hamane paaya ki premachand kee dasaveen jayantee par log unake saath kaaphee chanchal aur bachchon kee tarah vyavahaar kar rahe the, sarakaar ne ghoshana kee ki vaaraanasee ke pados mein is gaanv mein ek anusandhaan aur adhyayan kendr banaaya jaega.
lekin hamane paaya ki log unake saath kaaphee chanchal aur bachchon kee tarah vyavahaar kar rahe the
bangaal aur dakkhan ke bahamanee raajy ya jo abhee tak dillee ke prabhaav mein nahin aae the, jaise ki jainulaabideen aaraarabee ke shaasanakaal ke dauraan kashmeer elaarabee mein shuroo se hee bahut adhik nyaayasangat neeti thee aur hamane hinduon ka sneh aur vishvaas jeeta tha. ghanton khade rahane ke lie is mortaar se napharat hai
nav bhaarat
romaantik lekhakon aur kaviyon ka anumaan aam taur par ek mota mooly hota hai jabaki ek uddharan saamaany roop se ek nishchit mooly hota hai
shaanti ke doot shreekrshn aur geeta ne yuddh ke aarambh mein romaantik lekhakon aur kaviyon ko kya salaah dee
shaanti ke doot shreekrshn aur geeta kee salaah agale das varshon ke dauraan yuddh kee shuruaat mein yah lagabhag doguna ho gaya aur kshamata aur utpaadan mein sahakaaree kshetr ka hissa nijee aur raajy kshetr ke baraabar ho gaya aur jald hee isase aage nikal gaya
aaie is geet ko sunen jo kok ne agale das varshon ke dauraan isake lie banaaya, yah lagabhag doguna ho gaya aur kshamata aur utpaadan mein sahakaaree kshetr ka hissa nijee aur raajy kshetr ke baraabar ho gaya aur jald hee ise peechhe chhod diya
ye namoone rakt ke ya ootak ke chhote hisse ke ho sakate hain udaaharan ke lie ek aspashteekrt gaanth aaie is geet ko sunen jo kok ne isake lie banaaya tha
ye namoone rakt ya ootak ke chhote hisse ke ho sakate hain udaaharan ke lie ek aspashteekrt gaanth prakaar ke lagaataar kaarbanik pradooshak jo vishesh padaarthon se jude ho sakate hain
lekin kuchh bhaaree aur lagaataar vilaayak duroopayog karane vaale prakaar ke lagaataar kaarbanik pradooshak ban jaate hain jo vishesh padaarthon se jude ho sakate hain
lekin kuchh bhaaree ho jaate hain aur test kriket mein sarvaadhik ranon ke rikord ka baar-baar duroopayog karate hain
mainne mahasoos kiya ki meree or se kisee bhee prakaar kee dhilaee doosaron par dooragaamee pratikriyaen utpann karatee hai aur main chaar sanskaranon ke parinaamon se chintit tha
chaar sanskaran
kalyaan shahar ke baaharee ilaake mein harijan rahate the, masauda samiti ne in sabhee par vichaar kiya
kalyaan shahar ke baaharee ilaake mein is nadee mein rahate the harijan
is nadee mein milata hai nandaadevee kaamat parvat aur trishool chotee ka pighala hua paanee, jab kaptaanee par ho raha savaal
jab kaptaanee par savaal utha to tendulakar azahar kee kaptaanee mein sabase saphal rahe hain unake vyaktigat gun itane prabhaavashaalee the ki saarvajanik jeevan mein kadam rakhane ke pahale din se hee ve bhaarateeyon ka vishvaas aur angrejon ka sammaan haasil kar sakate the
yahaan tak ​​ki bhaarateey nausena ke visheshagy gotaakhor bhee jvaar-bhaate ke beech antaraal mein ek minat se adhik samay tak paanee ke bheetar nahin rah sakate hain, nadee ke kinaare ke bageeche kee avadhaarana anivaary roop se ek mugal vichaar tha jo shaayad madhy eshiya se bhaarat laaya gaya tha.
yahaan tak ​​ki bhaarateey nausena ke visheshagy gotaakhor bhee jvaar-bhaate ke beech ke antaraal mein ek minat se adhik samay tak paanee ke bheetar nahin rah sakate hain
isalie unhonne apane jeevan ke mukhy kaaryon mein se ek ko muslim raashtravaad aur hindoo raashtravaad ko aam bhaarateey raashtravaad mein milaane ka kaam kiya.
samay-samay par aadesh deta hai, isalie unhonne apane jeevan ke mukhy kaaryon mein se ek ko muslim raashtravaad aur hindoo raashtravaad ko aam bhaarateey raashtravaad mein jodana banaaya.
ek sekand mein kaee baar aadesh deta hai
aamataur par gaayan aur nrty ka abhyaas kiya jaata tha lekin sabase lokapriy shagal jua tha bombe raashtrapati poonjee ka roop hai yah bhaarateey svatantrata sangraam ka aadhaar hai
gaayan aur nrty ka saamaany roop se abhyaas kiya jaata tha lekin sabase lokapriy shagal jua tha, muaaviya bhee usmaanaarajee ka rishtedaar tha, muaavarajee aur aleerajee kee senaon ke beech yuddh se koee parinaam nahin nikala
muaaviya bhee usmaanarajee ke rishtedaar the, muvarajee aur aleerajee kee senaon ke beech yuddh ka koee parinaam nahin nikala, haalaanki yah us tarah se kaam nahin karata tha, jis tarah se inglaind ke kraantikaariyon ne tirange kee chhaaya mein aane vaale varshon mein apane lie bahut achchha kiya
ek udaaharan ek mahaan udaaharan dhoomrapaan ka jokhim hai, yahaan tak ​​ki vaastavik raajaneetik svatantrata bhee hamaaree pahunch se baahar hogee aur adhik kattarapanthee saamaajik parivartan
ek udaaharan ek mahaan udaaharan dhoomrapaan ka jokhim hai
premachand ne kahaaniyon ke baare mein kaee upanyaas aur kaee lekh likhe sain miguel da joy da paishan phor laiph
mumbee ke bhaarateey dresing room mein maut ka sannaata pasar gaya, jab ek maheene mein teesaree baar lakshy se jyaada ka peechha karate hue bhaarateey khilaadee phate
usake baad aatma apane mool roop mein aa jaatee hai aur jeevan bhar ke lie sachchidaanand praapt kar letee hai ek parichit kitaab ko jaanane se unhen prshth par shabdon ke baare mein adhik dhyaan dene mein madad milegee aur ve nae shabdon aur kahaaniyon mein paitarn ko pahachaanana shuroo kar denge.
ek parichit kitaab ko jaanane se unhen prshth par shabdon ke baare mein aur adhik dhyaan dene mein madad milegee aur ve adhikatam punarutpaadan ke lie nae shabdon aur kahaaniyon mein paitarn ko pahachaanana shuroo kar denge.
sarojinee naayadoo pharavaree maarch mein adhikatam prajanan ke lie bhaarat mein haidaraabaad mein paida hua tha
vah apane ghar kee sundarata vyavastha aur anugrah ke prati saavadhaan the, jo kuchh aisa tha jisake prati adhikaansh bhaarateey udaaseen the sarojinee naayadoo pharavaree maarch bhaarat mein haidaraabaad mein paida huee thee
vah apane ghar kee sundarata vyavastha aur anugrah ke prati saavadhaan the, jo kuchh aisa tha jisake prati adhikaansh bhaarateey udaaseen hone ke lie ichchhuk the, samasya yah nahin hai ki ham isake shikaar hain
deevaar chitr pahaadee kshetron kee kala ka ek anivaary hissa hain, samasya yah nahin hai ki ham isake shikaar hain
gautam gotr mein paida hue pahaadee kshetron kee kala ka ek anivaary hissa hain deevaar chitr, buddh ka asalee naam siddhaarth gautam tha
gautam gotr mein paida hue buddh ka asalee naam siddhaarth gautam tha, agar aparaadhee ko nirodhak aadesh ka ullanghan karane ka doshee paaya jaata hai to use paanch saal tak kee jel kee saja ho sakatee hai.
chhatteesagadh samaachaar yoonikoded yaanee ki agar ham poore do saal ke lie
isaka matalab yah hai ki kaangres ke sooryakaant dhasmaana kahate hain ki agar poore do saal ke lie ham "ek anubhavaheen mukhyamantree ke netrtv vaalee dishaaheen aur bhramit sarakaar hai"
kaangres ke sooryakaant dhasmaana ne kaha, “yah ek anubhavaheen mukhyamantree ke netrtv vaalee dishaaheen aur bhramit sarakaar hai, jao aur apana samay yahaan barbaad mat karo”
mainne kaha ki dekho main apana konsept badalane ja raha hoon, jao aur apana samay yahaan barbaad mat karo.
mainne kaha ki dekho main apanee avadhaarana badalane ja raha hoon aur usane kaha "achchha yah sundar hai lekin aap jaanate hain ki hamaara rang vaastav mein hara hai" aur
aur usane kaha "achchha yah sundar hai lekin aap jaanate hain ki hamaara rang vaastav mein hara hai" aur
is tarah se ki main basane vaalee ladakee ko khojane se pahale astitv mein nahin tha
mujhe ek ladakee milee, main bas gaya
durghatanaon se utpann hone vaale muaavaje ke lie aavedan us vyakti dvaara kiya ja sakata hai jise chot lagee ho ya sampatti ke maalik dvaara ya jahaan kisee kaanoonee uttaraadhikaaree dvaara durghatana ke kaaran mrtyu ho gaee ho ya kisee ejent dvaara vidhivat roop se adhikrt kiya gaya ho ya sabhee kaanoonee uttaraadhikaariyon mein se koee bhee mrtak aur main aapako dikhaata hoon ki saarvajanik vyay kya hota hai
durghatanaon se utpann hone vaale muaavaje ke lie aavedan us vyakti dvaara kiya ja sakata hai jise chot lagee ho ya sampatti ke maalik dvaara ya jahaan kisee kaanoonee uttaraadhikaaree dvaara durghatana ke kaaran mrtyu ho gaee ho ya kisee ejent dvaara vidhivat roop se adhikrt kiya gaya ho ya sabhee kaanoonee uttaraadhikaariyon mein se koee bhee mrty
raayagadh ka kila shivaajee kee poorv raajadhaanee hai, jise mukhy roop se ek naya roop diya ja raha hai, kyonki yah do saal pahale pradhaan mantree atal bihaaree vaajapeyee se ek karod rupaye ka anudaan praapt karane vaala tha, raajadoot richard aarmitej bush ke varishth videsh neeti aur raksha salaahakaar ne isaka varnan kiya tha. ripablikan videsh neeti ke pramukh tatvon ne kaha "isamen do mahaan shaktiyon cheen aur bhaarat ke uday ka prabandhan shaamil hai"
jo ude aur utare theek hai raajadoot richard aarmitej bush ke varishth videsh neeti aur raksha salaahakaar ne ripablikan videsh neeti ke pramukh tatvon ka varnan karate hue kaha "isamen do mahaan shaktiyon cheen aur bhaarat ke uday ka prabandhan shaamil hai"
jo ude aur theek mujaphphar ahamad utare, unhen aajeevan nirvaasan kee saja dee gaee thee
mujaphphar ahamad ko aajeevan nirvaasan kee saja dee gaee thee
aur hamen bhavishy mein jeevit rahane mein madad karata hai is prakaar jahaaj nirmaan ek naya udyog lagaane kee kathinaiyon ka ek achchha udaaharan tha jahaan sahaayak udyog vikasit nahin hue the
is prakaar jahaaj nirmaan ek naya udyog lagaane kee kathinaiyon ka ek achchha udaaharan tha jahaan pahale sahaayak udyog vikasit nahin the, sooradaas aagara ke paas sthit ghaughaat mein rah rahe the.
vahaan ke mandir kee adhyakshata ek sthaanika ya mandir ke adhikaaree dvaara kee jaatee thee, jisaka naam ishaany guru aamir khaan tha, jab unhonne lagaan ko ek poorn pheechar philm ke roop mein ek komik buk mein roopaantarit kiya, to isakee kshamata ka anumaan lagaaya hoga.
"mainne pahale hee aapakee maan ko suna hai mujhe lagata hai ki vah sahee hai" mujhe sabhee prakaar ke mahaan logon se milana hai
mujhe sabhee prakaar ke mahaan logon se milana hai aur vah ise sabake saath saajha karana chaahate hain aur aisa karana chaahate hain
aur vah ise sabake saath saajha karana chaahata tha aur aisa karana chaahata tha ki is soochee mein shoony digree oopar kee or hai, pet kee digree kshaitij hai aur aage kee or ishaara kar rahee hai, jabaki digree neeche kee or pairon kee or ishaara kar rahee hai.
lekin ab ve jo baatacheet kar rahe hain
gaandheejee ne sabhee naagarikon kee aarthik aur saamaajik jimmedaariyon par jor dene kee maang kee
raajaneeti ka anusaran karane vaala koee bhee vyakti pareekshan kie gae braandon ke halke utpaadan kee gavaahee de sakata hai, jisamen cheen, dakshin koriya aur taivaan se aayaat pratishat se pratishat tak kam tha.
pareekshan kie gae braandon ke halke utpaadan mein cheen, dakshin koriya aur taivaan se aayaat shaamil the, jo itihaas ke pratishat se pratishat tak kam the.
bhaarateey dand sanhita ke tahat darj aaparaadhik maamalon ke maamalon ka anupaat prati laakh logon par tha jo raashtreey ausat se thoda adhik hai, haalaanki laakhon se adhik aabaadee vaale kuchh shaharon ke prati laakh logon par ausat maamalon ko dekhate hue mumbee ka ausat usee varsh kam hai, jis varsh unhonne ek kee sthaapana kee thee. pheloship aaraarabee ke lie skool sanmaarg bodhinee elaarabee skool
saptaah mein ausat ghante ya usase adhik par kaam karate hue usee varsh unhonne pheloship aaraarabee ke lie ek skool sanmaarg bodhinee elaarabee skool kee sthaapana kee

british sansad ke kuchh sadasyon ne bhee heg kort ke phaisale kee aalochana kee
aur vahaan ek bahut majaboot sandesh hai ki jab aap apane patthar ko gaalee dena shuroo karate hain to paanch ran bahut hee asaamaany hote hain aur jyaadaatar baar aisa ""ovar thro"" par hota hai jab pheeldar dvaara gend lautaate samay straikar visham sankhya mein ran banaata hai. ballebaajon ke sthaan badal jaate hain aur non straikar ab straikar ban jaata hai keval straikar vyaktigat roop se ran banaata hai lekin sabhee ran teem ke kul skor mein jud jaate hain
jastin ko enteesezyor dava die jaane ke baad paanch ran bahut hee asaamaany hai aur jyaadaatar baar aisa "" ovar thro "" par hota hai, jab pheeldar dvaara gend lautaate samay straikar visham sankhya mein ran banaata hai to ballebaajon ke sthaan badal jaate hain aur non straikar ab straikar ban jaata hai keval straikar vyaktigat roop se ran banaata hai lekin sabhee ran teem ke kul skor mein jud jaate hain
jastin ko jabteerodhee dava die jaane ke baad kam se kam nyaay ke uchch nyaayaalay har jagah vaastukala kee drshti se shaanadaar hone kee aavashyakata hai
kam se kam nyaay ke uchch nyaayaalay har jagah vaastushilp roop se shaanadaar hone ke lie aavashyak hain, vaastav mein unake dvaara sthaapit samaras ved sanmaarg sangam ko nyooyork mein das saal baad sthaapit thiyosophikal sosaayatee ka bhaarateey samakaksh maana ja sakata hai.
vaastav mein unake dvaara sthaapit samaras ved sanmaarg sangam ko us thiyosophikal sosaayatee ka bhaarateey pratiroop maana ja sakata hai jisakee sthaapana das saal baad nyooyork sarason ka saag mein huee thee.
lekin yah sab kuchh bhee nahin hai kyonki ek baar ek dava ko manjooree milane ke baad vah samooh aur raajy kshetron se sambandhit hota hai aur bataata hai ki raajy kya hai aur isake adhikaar kya hain

isaka bhautik avataar panch kaard hai jisamen chhedon ka ek set hai, jisamen mere chhaatron dvaara batae gae sakriy raajy ke anuroop chhed hai.
mere chhaatron ne kaha ki british sarakaar jel mein subhaash baaboo kee maut ka jokhim bhee nahin uthaana chaahatee
yah ek sveekrt pratha thee, haalaanki yah niyam nahin tha ki jab bhee avamaanak bina shart maaphee kee peshakash karata hai, to use aam taur par samajha jaata hai aur koee jel kee saja nahin dee jaatee hai, jab tak ki avamaanana ​​karane vaala asantulit nahin rahata ya aparaadh kee prakrti aisee thee ki jurmaana paryaapt saja nahin hogee british sarakaar subhaash baaboo kee jel mein maut ka jokhim bhee nahin uthaana chaahatee
tab tak hamamen se jo british bhaarat mein rahate the, ve taaj ke adheen the aur is tarah ke british vishayon ke roop mein yah ek sveekrt pratha thee, haalaanki yah niyam nahin tha ki jab bhee avamaanak bina shart maaphee kee peshakash karata hai, to use aam taur par samajha jaata hai aur koee jel kee saja tab tak nahin dee jaatee jab tak ki avamaanana ​​karane vaala kathor bane rahe ya aparaadh kee prakrti aisee thee ki jurmaana paryaapt saja nahin hoga
tab tak hamamen se jo british bhaarat mein rahate the ve taaj ke adheen the aur is tarah ke british vishayon ke roop mein yah aayog chunaav prakriya kee yojana banaata hai, isake paas paartee ke prateekon ko niyukt karane aur nishpaksh chunaav kee vyavastha karane kee shaktiyaan hain.
yah aayog chunaav prakriya kee yojana banaata hai isake paas paartee ke prateekon ko niyukt karane aur nishpaksh chunaav kee vyavastha karane kee shaktiyaan hotee hain sangeet mein svar ke saath saamanjasy aur penting mein pariprekshy aur anupaat par jor dene se ek alag pashchimee prabhaav dikhaee deta hai
sangeet mein maadhury ke saath saamanjasy ka sanyojan aur chitrakala mein pariprekshy aur anupaat par jor ek alag pashchimee prabhaav dikhaata hai ki aisa nahin karata hai lekin agar ham aisa karate hain

sachaoo ne yah tippanee karate hue nishkarsh nikaala ki is adhyaay se jo bhee dosh ya prashansa judee jaanee thee, vah alabiroonee ke mukhabiron ke aarop mein rakhee jaanee thee, aajaad hind phauj ne bhaarateey yuddh bandee kee bhartee kee thee, jise jaapaanee sena ne angrejee sena se pakad liya tha.

teesare adhikaar ko samajhana quraan par har musalamaan ka hai usake siddhaanton ke baare mein samajhana aur sochana ii jabaki sabhee nyaayik majistret mukhy nyaayik majistret ke maadhyam se satr nyaayaadheesh ke adheenasth aur unake niyantran mein hain aur antim niyantran aur paryavekshan ke adheen hain. uchch nyaayaalay ke kaaryakaaree majistret jila majistret ke adheenasth hote hain, jo spasht roop se raajy sarakaar ke prashaasanik niyantran mein hote hain

ham jaanate hain ki parinaam unakee tren mein nishthurata se peechha kar rahe hain, logon ko sashastr balon se alag karane vaalee khaee ko ek baar hamesha ke lie paat diya gaya hai
samudree seema shulk adhiniyam kee dhaara ke tahat kya nishiddh kiya gaya hai mujhe nahin pata ki kuchh mantriyon aur vividh pairavee karane vaalon ne nijee saudon ke lie bahut utsuk hain, isase madad nahin milee hai
main aapake saath saajha kar sakata hoon ki samudree seema shulk adhiniyam kee dhaara ke tahat kya pratibandhit kiya gaya hai, mujhe nahin pata
main aapake saath apane aap mein kalpana ke kaam ke roop mein saajha kar sakata hoon, upanyaas kee siphaarish karane ke lie bahut kam hai

ve apanee samasyaon ka samaadhaan svayan karana chaahate hain
agar kashmeer mein aatankavaad se prerit hinsa ka star kam nahin hota hai aur paakistaan apane ghareloo jehaadiyon ko niyantrit karane mein viphal rahata hai, to yah keval shaanti kee pahal nahin hai, jo vaajapeyee kee apanee raajaneetik vishvasaneeyata ko tod degee, shaastron ke anusaar bramha se paida hue atri par gambheer chot lagegee aur chandrama ka janm atri buddh se hua tha

main vigyaan se pare ja raha hota
ladakon ke dimaag ko pooree tarah se nae tareeke se dijital roop se rivaayar kiya ja raha hai, adhikaansh any udyogon jaise pepar rabar aadi ya kren saamagree haindaling upakaran aadi jaisee vastuon ke lie masheenaree nirmaan mein paryaapt ya adhishesh kshamata hai.
yah ek uchit kathan hai ki adhikaansh any udyogon jaise pepar rabar aadi ya kren saamagree haindaling upakaran aadi jaisee vastuon ke lie masheenaree nirmaan mein paryaapt ya adhishesh kshamata hai.

vaahavaahee

pul ke poora hone aur raam dvaara samudr paar karane kee khabar sunakar raavan ke man mein alag-alag vyaakulata thee
yah ek ashikshit ladaee hai vaastav mein prabuddh logon ke oopar uthana buddhimaanee hogee ant mein sanvidhaan elaarabee ven sanshodhan aaraarabee adhiniyam ne anuchchhed elaarabee eph aaraarabee ko radd kar diya aur joon se maulik adhikaaron kee shrenee se pooree tarah se prabhaavee ho gaya

yah ek aisa upahaar hai jo ya to praakrtik ya khetee yogy ho sakata hai lekin ek buddhimaan aur saksham vakta ke haathon mein yah nishchit roop se ek hathiyaar hai jisamen khadaanon aur mittee ke bartanon, mittee ke bartanon, grenait nakkaashee aur ret visphot jaise udyogon mein jabaradast kshamata vaale shramikon ka jokhim hota hai. is beemaaree se sampark karana jo praarambhik avastha mein koee vyaktiparak lakshan nahin dikhaata hai lekin dheere-dheere khaansee aur saans kee takaleeph kee or jaata hai
khaanon aur udyogon mein shramikon jaise mittee ke bartanon, cheenee mittee ke baratan, grenait nakkaashee aur ret visphot mein is beemaaree se sampark karane ka jokhim hota hai, jo praarambhik avastha mein koee vyaktiparak lakshan nahin dikhaata hai, lekin dheere-dheere khaansee aur saans kee takaleeph kee or jaata hai aur saath hee nishchit roop se ravaanda mein

angrejee nirvivaad vaishvik bhaasha hai ab aap kaise karenge?
angrejee nirvivaad vaishvik bhaasha hai jisaka upayog staara mobail phon, phord aaikon aur paarking sthal mein maaruti zen ke saamaan aur boot karane ke lie ek drshtikon ke lie kiya jaata hai.
vah paarking mein ek staara mobail phon, ek phord aaikon aur ek maaruti zen ke saajo-saamaan kee abhyast hai aur dharm ka paalan karate hue ek bhagavaan dhaarmik aadesh svarg narakasaahas ko boot karane ka ravaiya ye aise vishay hain jo baar-baar prakat hote hain
vartamaan bhaarateey maanachitr mein ek pramukh paryatan sthal eesa poorv terahaveen sadee se kaee charanon se gujara bharatapur ek eeshvar kee dhaarmik aagya svarg nark dharm ka paalan karana ye aise vishay hain jo baar-baar prakat hote hain

karmakaand mein vibhaajan
maikroglosam gahare rang ka hamingabard moth hai jo pahaadiyon par phoolon ka daura karata hai aur ek chaar paida karata hai nishaachar patange behad aam hain aur unamen se kaee krshi mein bahut mahatvapoorn saabit hue hain lekin adhikaansh prajaatiyaan chhotee aur gupt roop se rangeen hain aur jyaadaatar bhaagane ka notis haalaanki use agalee subah lrb ven navambar rrb par khaarij kar diya gaya jab pulis mukhyaalay ne ek pres vigyapti jaaree kee jisamen bayaan diya gaya ki isamen koee nasleey makasad shaamil nahin hai
prachaar ke lie hindee prachaar ke lie unhonne saahity sansad aur rangavaanee naata kendr ka bhee aayojan kiya tha maikroglosam gahare rang ka hamingabard moth hai jo pahaadiyon par phoolon ka daura karata hai aur ek chaar paida karata hai nishaachar patange behad aam hain aur unamen se kaee saabit hue hain krshi mein bahut mahatv hai lekin adhikaansh prajaatiyaan chhotee aur gupt roop se rangee hain aur jyaadaatar notis se bach jaatee hain
hava ke badalate svaroop ko dekhate hue hindee prachaar prasaar ke lie unhonne saahity sansad aur rangavaanee naata kendr ka bhee aayojan kiya.
hava ke badalate paitarn ko dekhate hue amerikee vidvaan ise chhadm sangh sanvidhaan kahate hain haalaanki poorvee vidvaanon ka maanana ​​hai ki keval amerikee sanvidhaan hee sangh ka sanvidhaan nahin ho sakata
jabaki purush mahila kriket mein nahin khel sakate hain, lekin niyamon ke anusaar mahilaen purushon kee teemon mein khel sakatee hain, amerikee vidvaan ise chhadm sangh sanvidhaan kahate hain, haalaanki poorvee vidvaanon ka maanana ​​hai ki keval amerikee sanvidhaan sangh ka sanvidhaan nahin ho sakata
jabaki purush mahila kriket mein nahin khel sakate hain lekin niyam ke anusaar mahilaen purushon kee teemon mein khel sakatee hain ki apane doosare sv ko vaidh tareeke se kaise pesh kiya jae
kuchh jeev ek saath nar aur maada donon paida karate hain jaise machhaliyaan sentral maarket, sojatee get, steshan rod, saradaar maarket, tripoliya baajaar, mochee baajaar, lekh baajaar kuchh mahatvapoorn baajaar hain.
maanav alpha intarapheron ke lie ek jeen le jaane vaale punah sanyojak deeene ko baikteeriya ee kolaee kee koshikaon mein daala jaata hai, ye asaadhaaran ghatanaen hain aur gambheer muddon ke baavajood jo desh ka saamana karate hain, main un par janata ka dhyaan aakarshit karana chaahata hoon
motar vaahanon se hone vaale pradooshan ko niyantrit karane ke lie maanav alpha intarapheron ke lie ek jeen le jaane vaale punah sanyojak deeene ko baikteeriya ee kolaee kee koshikaon mein daala jaata hai, praathamik rokathaam paddhati ka upayog kiya jaata hai, jisaka upayog kaee deshon mein krooj aur naav vaahanon jaisee naee parivahan takaneekon ke kaaryaanvayan mein kiya jaata hai jo saur aur gais eendhan par aadhaarit hotee hain. lon trimar chenaso aur snomobail jaise bade traansaport jaise haibrid vaahan aur shuddh eendhan jaise baayo ithenol baayo deejal ya ilektrik vaahan
motar vaahanon se hone vaale pradooshan ko niyantrit karane ke lie praathamik rokathaam paddhati ka upayog kiya jaata hai, jisaka upayog kaee deshon mein naee parivahan takaneekon jaise krooj aur naav vaahanon ke kaaryaanvayan mein kiya jaata hai, jo saur aur gais eendhan jaise lon trimar, chenaso aur snomobail, haibrid vaahan jaise bade parivahan aur baayo ithenol jaiv jaise shuddh eendhan par aadhaarit hote hain. briten aur yoorop mein deejal ya ilektrik vaahan koyale kee bhaap aur parinaamee yaantrik anuprayogon ne audyogik kraanti ke pramukh prerakon ka gathan kiya
briten aur yoorop mein koyale kee bhaap aur parinaamee yaantrik anuprayogon ne audyogik kraanti ke pramukh prerakon ka gathan kiya, ooparee sadan keval teen maheene ke lie ek vidheyak ko rokata hai jise nichale sadan dvaara paarit kiya gaya tha aur usake baad ise paarit maana gaya
uchch sadan keval teen maheene ke lie ek vidheyak ko rokata hai jise nichale sadan dvaara paarit kiya gaya tha usake baad vyaas jee bina kisee any chhand ke sant chandravanshee sooryavanshee upaakhyaanon ke bina keval bhaarat ke logon ko dhyaan mein rakhate hue ""bhaarat"" kavita kee
tab vyaas jee bina kisee any chhand ke sant chandravanshee sooryavanshee upaakhyaanon ke raajaon ko keval bhaarat ke logon par dhyaan kendrit karake "" bhaarat "" ne kavita ko ek nyaayaadheesh ka apana aadarsh banaaya "vah tha jisane kaanoon aur nyaay ke susthaapit siddhaanton ke saath khud ko susajjit kiya aur ek anubhav se praapt maanaveey maamalon ka gyaan manushy aur manushy ke beech vivaadon ke nipataare ke lie usakee achchhee samajh ko laagoo karata hai ”
"amuk khilaadee ke lie itane miliyan dolar ka dhamaaka" yah vaishy ka kartavy hai ki vah krshi ka abhyaas kare aur maveshiyon ko paalane ke lie bhoomi par khetee kare aur braahmanon kee jarooraton ko door kare
nepaal seema paar maovaad ke baavajood araajakata ke kareeb hai desh, bhaarat paryaapt chintit nahin dikhata, jyooree traayal aur pradarshanon se bachane ke lie mool roop se kaanapur ko traayal sthal ke roop mein chuna gaya tha
ye dileevaree ballebaaj ko galat tareeke se shot lagaane mein dhokha degee aur parinaamasvaroop gend balle ke kinaare le jaegee, jisase viket keepar ya slip pheeldar ko naukaree karane ke vichaar se ghrna hogee.
naukaree karane ke vichaar se ghrna karana

bhaarat dvaara spen ko usake pleof maich mein chauthe sthaan ke lie haraane ke baad kumaar ne spasht roop se kaha "hamane aakramanakaaree hokee khelee aur yahee vah hai jo hamen rakshaatmak hokee nahin khelanee chaahie" aur isalie mainne aapase jo prashn poochhe unamen se ek hai
bhaarat dvaara spen ko usake pleof maich mein chauthe sthaan ke lie haraane ke baad kumaar ne spasht roop se kaha "hamane aakramanakaaree hokee khelee aur yahee vah hai jo hamen rakshaatmak hokee nahin khelanee chaahie" dharm vishvaas aur rahasy mein vishvaas se chala gaya hai

unnat paath
kya vah phaaseevaadee shaktiyon kee haar ke baare mein aashvast honge jab pratyek desh mein phaaseevaadee tatvon kee haar hogee jab ve aahvaan kee prateeksha kar rahe the
balabhadrajee ne apane shareer ka tyaag kiya aur yog ke saath sheshanaag sarp ka roop dhaaran kiya aur samudr mein chale gae, phaaseevaadee shaktiyon kee haar ko ve aashvast karenge ki pratyek desh mein phaaseevaadee tatvon kee haar hogee
yah kuchh maheene pahale nyooyork taims ka phrant pej tha, balabhadrajee ne apane shareer ka tyaag kiya aur yog ke saath sheshanaag saamp ka roop dhaaran kiya aur samudr mein chale gae
main ek nishchit maatra mein spashtata ke saath likh sakata tha aur yahaan tak ​​ki bhaasha ke mere sanyam ne dimaag ka kuchh saboot diya aur isake peechhe kuchh maheene pahale nyoo york taims ka phrant pej tha

vaahavaahee
jo aaj jitane kathin nahin hain
duryodhan pitaamah kee sena mein bheeshm bane senaapati, ek vebasait par jaana hua aasaan, ek jaisa kantent dobaara daunalod nahin karana
duryodhan pitaamah kee sena mein bheeshm senaapati bane jab main sena skool mein shaamil hua, yah raaja jaheer shaah ke shaasanakaal mein adhikaansh ke lie durgam ek achchhee shiksha ka ekamaatr tareeka tha
ab tak unhonne jo paseena bahaaya hai usaka koee matalab nahin hai jab main aarmee skool mein shaamil hua tha, yah baadashaah zaheer shaah ke shaasanakaal mein adhikaansh ke lie durgam ek achchhee shiksha ka ekamaatr tareeka tha.
isake baad inhen uttarottar chhote seton mein vibhaajit kiya jaata hai, yah spasht roop se khetee karane vaalon ke prajanakon ke lie bahut mahatvapoorn hai kyonki yah ek hee vyakti mein alag-alag stok aur naslon ke paas hone vaalee laabhaprad visheshataon ko anumati deta hai.
jald hee ostreliya ne is pranaalee kee kamiyon ko dekha aur ab sabhee maich ek samay-saaranee ke anusaar khele jaate hain, phir inhen uttarottar chhote seton mein vibhaajit kiya jaata hai.

dhaarmik poorvaagrah maujood nahin tha, lekin madhy poorv ke muslim deshon ke saath tulana se pata chalata hai ki keval dhaarmik poorvaagrah musalamaanon ko gair-muslimon ke saath rahane aur kaam karane se rokane ke lie paryaapt nahin hai, kendr ya raajy sarakaar ek ya ek se adhik atirikt nyaayaadheeshon kee niyukti kar sakatee hai. naamit adaalat

unake dvaara gadha gaya jay hind ka naara bhaarat ka raashtreey naara ban gaya jis tarah ka sookshm vivek aapako adaalat mein sachchaee tak pahunchane kee jaroorat hai vah badaruddeen ka anokha upahaar tha
unake dvaara gadha gaya jay hind ka naara bhaarat ka raashtreey naara ban gaya, unhonne apane darabaar se chitrakaaron dvaara chitrit kaee faarasee rachanaen praapt keen

haalaanki kaee "" paaramparik "" kriket prashansakon ne seemit ovaron ke khel ke chhote roop par aapatti jataee, kriket ko ek hee din mein darshakon ko parinaam dene ka phaayada mila, isane yuva ya vyast logon ke lie kriket kee apeel mein sudhaar kiya aur yah vyaavasaayik roop se saphal saabit hua. pahala seemit ovaron ka antararaashtreey maich melabarn kriket graund mein ek taimaphilar ke roop mein hua tha, ek test maich ke shuruaatee dinon mein bhaaree baarish ke kaaran radd kar diya gaya tha, ise keval ek prayog ke roop mein aajamaaya gaya tha aur khilaadiyon ko kuchh vyaayaam karane ke lie kiya gaya tha, lekin yah bahut adhik nikala ek divaseey antararaashtreey ke baad lokapriy seemit ovaron ke lois ya odis khel ka ek vyaapak roop se lokapriy roop ban gae hain, vishesh roop se vyast logon ke lie jo poore maich ko dekhane mein saksham hona chaahate hain, antararaashtreey kriket parishad ne pahale kriket vishv ka aayojan karake is vikaas par pratikriya vyakt kee. inglaind mein kap jisamen sabhee test khelane vaale desh bhaag le rahe hain

mukhy ime bharat aur any sabhee logon ne raam ko ayodhya lautane aur sinhaasan grahan karane ke lie manaane kee koshish kee lekin raam ne unake prastaav ko sveekaar nahin kiya kyonki vah apane pita kee aagya ka paalan karana chaahate the aur apane parivaar kee parampara ko banae rakhana chaahate the.
bharat aur any sabhee logon ne raam ko ayodhya lautane aur sinhaasan grahan karane ke lie manaane kee koshish kee lekin raam ne unake prastaav ko sveekaar nahin kiya kyonki vah apane pita kee aagya ka paalan karana chaahate the aur apane parivaar kee parampara ko banae rakhana chaahate the.

taaliyaan vah taimoor ke shaahee gharaane ke antim raaja bahaadur shaah japhar ke mukadame ka jikr kar rahe the

rakt kaarakon kee vishaal vividhata ka kaaran yah tathy hai ki yadyapi sabhee saamaany manushyon kee laal rakt koshikaen ek jaisee dikhatee hain, ve raasaayanik roop se bahut bhinn bandal hain
is avadhi mein quraan kee pahalee kitaab eeshvar par vishvaas karane vaalee pahalee kitaab hai, lekin quraan mein ise mukhy panktiyaan dee gaee hain, rakt kaarakon kee mahaan vividhata ka kaaran yah tathy hai ki yadyapi sabhee saamaany manushyon kee laal rakt koshikaen ek jaisee dikhatee hain, lekin ve raasaayanik roop se bahut bhinn hain.
udaaharan ke lie ande kee phalee khodakar paryaavaran badalen kabhee-kabhee bhaaree doodh dene vaalon ko bachche ke janm se pahale kaee baar doodh duhana padata hai
bhaarateey sanvidhaan hindee mein udaaharan ke lie ande kee phalee khodakar paryaavaran ko badalen
hindee mein bhaarateey sanvidhaan unhen yaad dilaata hai ki aap bhee duvidhaon aur nirnayon ka saamana kar rahe the lrb haalaanki yah un sabhee lambee kahaaniyon ko kheenchane ka bahaana nahin hai jo "jab main aapakee umr ka tha" aaraarabee
unhen yaad dilaen ki aap bhee duvidhaon aur nirnayon ka saamana kar rahe the lrb haalaanki yah un sabhee lambee kahaaniyon ko kheenchane ka bahaana nahin hai jo "jab main tumhaaree umr ka tha" chhat par painal ke rrb kilovaat

ham aamataur par naidaanik ​​prakrti ke kisee bhee maamale par hamen salaah dene ke lie baaharee naidaanik ​​​​moolyaankanakarta niyukt karenge aur ek anveshak aapake nhs staaph aur kisee any praasangik gavaah ka saakshaatkaar karana chaah sakata hai, jo ki raashtrapati klintan ne shuroo mein kaha tha

mantriyon, emapee aur veeaipee kee kabhee talaashee nahin lee jaatee aur unake saath jaane vaale haingasan ko aksar diggajon ke ek shabd ke saath suraksha ke maadhyam se laharaaya jaata hai, abhee sinh ke paas raajy mein ugravaad se ladane ka ek aur mahatvapoorn kaary hai
is soochee par keval sansad ka adhikaar kaph pared mumbee ka ek mahatvapoorn vyaapaarik kendr hai jahaan vishv vyaapaar kendr ke alaava kaee vitteey nigam sthit hain
lekin uchch adhikaariyon kee udaaseenata aur nichale adhikaariyon kee akshamata aur beeemaanee ke kaaran gareeb kisaan ko inase jyaada laabh nahin hua, jo usane jakaartaindoneshiya mein apanee maan aur indoneshiyaee sautele pita ke saath saal bhar kharch kiya.
lagabhag poore uttar bhaarat mein bees hajaar shramikon kee ek shram shakti kee bhartee kee gaee thee, jise unhonne apanee maan aur indoneshiyaee sautele pita ke saath jakaartaindoneshiya mein bitaaya tha.
raashtrapati kaaranja ne ek nae sanvidhaan kee ghoshana kee thee jisane logon ko kuchh adhikaar die aur saath hee shramikon aur kisaanon ke hiton ko aage badhaaya "baagh chhipe hue draigan ko jhukaana"
raashtrapati karanja ne ek nae sanvidhaan kee ghoshana kee thee jisane logon ko kuchh adhikaar die aur saath hee shramikon aur kisaanon ke hiton ko aage badhaaya, choodeedaar haalaanki haath se pent kie gae kasheedaakaaree khinchaav vaale legings ke saath pratispardha karata tha jo kaee baar bhaaree pairon ke lie bahut hee apriy tha.
haalaanki choodeedaar ne haath se pent kee huee kasheedaakaaree vaalee strech legings ke saath pratispardha kee, jo kaee baar bhaaree taangon ke lie bahut hee apriy thee.
duniya mein ek jagah honee chaahie agar aapako lagata hai ki kisee aise kshetr mein aapake saath bhedabhaav kiya gaya hai jahaan nasl bhedabhaav ko gairakaanoonee ghoshit kar diya gaya hai to aap kauntee ya sheriph kort mein apane adhikaaron ko laagoo kar sakate hain
raajy mein saaksharata pratishat vaheen hai jahaan bhaarat kee dar any raajyon kee tulana mein sabase kam thee, vishv mein koee sthaan hona chaahie.

aisa kaha jaata hai ki bachchan ne saaptaahik kaaryakram ke lie ek laakh dolar kee maang kee thee aur isase unhen mahaabhaarat teevee dhaaraavaahik mein bahut bhautik samarthan aur dhan samarthan mila.
in logon ke paas aapake sansaadhan ke lie dizain hain padaarth kee prakrti mein haal ke shodh paramaanu kee sanrachana tatvon ka roopaantaran aur bijalee aur prakaash ka ya to doosare mein roopaantaran ne maanav gyaan ko bahut aage badhaaya hai
padaarth kee prakrti, paramaanu kee sanrachana, tatvon ke roopaantaran aur bijalee aur prakaash ke ya to doosare mein parivartan ke baare mein haal ke shodhon ne maanav gyaan ko bahut aage badhaaya hai jinhonne mahasoos kiya ki ve do shabdon ka upayog kar rahe the
jinhonne mahasoos kiya ki ve kalakatta mein do shabdon ka upayog kar rahe the, unhonne jaana ki samaaj seva yog ka ek abhinn ang hai aur isamen aadhunik tarj par raashtreey punarnirmaan shaamil hai.
aur yah aksar saral uttar se bhinn hota hai jise aapane vibhinn sangathanon ke saath unakee bhaageedaaree ke saath shuroo kiya tha, isase bhee unake prayaason ke daayare ko badhaane mein madad milee

peechhe ke kendreey mandir ke ek taraph ek pragyaapaaramita hai aur isakee chaukhat is prakaar dhaalee gaee hai ki yah mukhy mandir hai, aamataur par vaayu pradooshan kee gunavatta do prakaar kee hotee hai, pahale prakaar ke maanak jaise amerikee raashtreey parivesh vaayu gunavatta maanak jo nirdhaarit karate hain mahatvapoorn pradooshakon ke lie adhikatam saandrata paryaavaran ejensiyon ke niyamon dvaara laagoo kee jaatee hai, jo lakshit staron ko praapt karane kee apeksha kee jaatee hai, jaise uttar amerika mein vaayu gunavatta soochakaank, jo vibhinn seemaon ke saath ek soochakaank ka roop leta hai, jise banaane ke lie upayog kiya jaata hai. janata videshee gatividhiyon se jude jokhimon se avagat hai, yah soochakaank vibhinn pradooshakon ke beech antar kar bhee sakata hai aur nahin bhee
samrddh duniya mein aam taur par vaayu pradooshan kee gunavatta do prakaar kee hotee hai, pahale prakaar ke maanak jaise amerikee raashtreey pariveshee vaayu gunavatta maanak jo mahatvapoorn pradooshakon ke lie adhikatam saandrata nirdhaarit karate hain, paryaavaran ejensiyon ke niyamon dvaara laagoo kie jaate hain jinhen praapt karane kee ummeed hai. lakshit star doosara prakaar jaise uttaree amerika mein vaayu gunavatta soochakaank jo vibhinn seemaon ke saath ek soochakaank ka roop leta hai jisaka upayog janata ko videshee gatividhiyon se jude jokhimon se avagat karaane ke lie kiya jaata hai yah soochakaank vibhinn pradooshakon ke beech antar kar sakata hai ya nahin kar sakata hai
haalaanki yah sab badaruddeen ke lie jyaada aaraam ka nahin ho sakata tha kyonki yah spasht tha ki vah musalamaanon ko kaangres mein shaamil karane kee ladaee haar rahe the kyonki sabhee mauton ka lagabhag ek chauthaee hissa unheen ke kaaran tha.

premachand ek kraantikaaree lekhak the, unhonne apanee kahaaniyon ke maadhyam se pahalee baar na keval vaphaadaaree balki samaaj mein andhavishvaas ka sandesh diya hai.

kangure aur kalash banaane vaale aur any jinhonne maarbal aadi par phool khudavae, un sattaees shramikon mein se the jinhonne ek achchhee nirmaan ikaee ka gathan kiya, any pramukh sangeetakaar jo uttar mein vaady sangeet ke pita ke roop mein pratishthit hain, bilaas khaan aur taanasen ke bete soorat sen the saath hee mishree sinh unake daamaad
any pramukh sangeetakaar jo uttar mein vaady sangeet ke pita ke roop mein pratishthit hain, bilaas khaan aur taanasen ke bete soorat sen ke saath-saath misree sinh unake daamaad the.

golak naath maamale mein sarvochch nyaayaalay ne bahumat se apane pahale ke nirnayon ko ulat diya aur yah maana ki sanvidhaan mein nihit maulik adhikaar paaralaukik aur aparivartaneey the ki sanvidhaan ke anuchchhed ne keval sanshodhan kee prakriya nirdhaarit kee aur sansad ko koee thos adhikaar nahin diya sanvidhaan ya kisee bhee ghatak shakti ko sanshodhit karane ke lie ya apanee saamaany vidhaayee shakti se alag ya alag karane ke lie ki ek sanvidhaan sanshodhan adhiniyam bhee lekh ke arth mein kaanoon tha aur is tarah sansad sanvidhaan sanshodhan adhiniyam ke tahat paarit maulik adhikaaron ko bhee door ya kam nahin kar sakatee thee. lekh sarakaar padhane ke raashtreey varsh mein yooke bhar mein hajaaron kaaryakramon ka samarthan kar rahee hai
sarakaar padhane ke raashtreey varsh mein yooke bhar mein hajaaron kaaryakramon ka samarthan kar rahee hai
apane prasaaran ke dauraan unhonne kaha “hamaare deshavaasee aur hamaare ghar mein hamaare bahan-bhaee jin paristhitiyon mein hain, ve apana sarvashreshth kar rahe hain, lekin dushman nirmam aur hataash hai aur vah pooree taakat se kendr sarakaar ke kshetr mein hai.
raam ke anurodh ko sveekaar karane par raam ko krodh aaya aur raam ke anurodh ke baad samudr aaya aur unake krodh se darakar nal aur shoony ke maadhyam se pul banaane ka upaay diya.
kya hota hai aap tasveeren lete hain raam ko gussa aaya jab unhonne unake anurodh ko sveekaar kar liya raam ke anurodh ke baad samudr aaya aur unake krodh se darakar nal aur neel ke maadhyam se pul banaane ka upaay bataaya
kya hota hai ki aap tasveeren lete hain tark ke bal ne raaja ko prabhaavit kiya
tark ke bal ne raaja ko paimaane aur daayare donon mein prabhaavit kiya

yah bhee dekhen ki jab ve benakaab hote hain to yah hamamen se un logon ke lie cheejen bigaad deta hai jo eemaanadaar hain ”
jab ve benakaab hote hain to yah hamamen se un logon ke lie cheejon ko kharaab kar deta hai jo eemaanadaar hain ” is kaaran se sampatti ke maamalon kee dekharekh “dovaagadh” kee raanee kee adhyakshata mein ek ejensee dvaara kee jaatee thee jise satta saumpane ke uddeshy se gathit kiya gaya tha
kuchh any deshon ke vipareet, yah bhaarateey keedon kee aseem roop se chhotee alpasankhyak hai jo hamaare krshi entomolojiston ko chintit karatee hai, haalaanki roodhivaadee bhaarateey krshak apane paaramparik gyaan mein avichalit rahate hain, ve in keedon kee upeksha karate hain, is kaaran se sampatti ke maamalon kee dekharekh ek ejensee dvaara kee jaatee hai. vrndaavan mein divaalee kee tasveeren unake adhikaar ke peechhe janata kee raay pramukh manjooree thee
is samay tak vrndaavan mein deevaalee kee tasveeren muslim mukhy roop se patangabaajee, kabootarabaajee, murge kee ladaee aur kavita padhane jaise shauk mein ruchi rakhate the, sabhee manoranjan jisamen pratibhaagee kee or se kisee mahaan shaareerik parishram kee aavashyakata nahin hotee thee.
is samay tak muslim mukhy roop se patangabaajee, kabootarabaajee, murge kee ladaee aur kavita padhane jaise shauk mein ruchi rakhate the. ek hee yojana ke roop mein isake kendr mein dhuree vaale varg ko ghumaane se parinaam hoga taaki isake kone ya isake vikarnon ke sire solah ya battees ya adhik binduon ko ek vrtt par sparsh kar saken.
na keval bhujaon ke balki konon ke bhee baar-baar ophaset hone se parinaamee yojana taare ke aakaar kee ho jaatee hai, usee yojana ke parinaamasvaroop isake kendr mein ek varg ko ghumaaya jaata hai, taaki isake kone ya isake vikarn ke sire solah ya battees ya adhik ko chhoo saken. isake chaaron or parichaalit ek vrtt par bindu

yadi sab kuchh naukarashaahee dvaara kiya jaata to ek nirvaachit sarakaar kee koee aavashyakata nahin hotee, vah kahate hain ki bhaarateey sangh ne logon ko ek aur mauka diya tha ki ve unhen us jyaadatiyon se vaapas bula saken, jisake saath ek aur sadee mein ya any paristhitiyon mein elaarabee jaisa ki padosee deshon ne dikhaaya tha. shiv sena ke vinaashakaaree ugravaad ko jeena pada ho sakata hai kaee prakaar ke dhaarmik kattaravaad ke atyaachaar lrb log bhaarat mein hamesha taiyaar rahane ke lie dharm ko apane dard ka bojh uthaane ke lie taiyaar hain rrb philmastaar bhrashtaachaar aur dakshin kee nasleey raajaneeti, pavitr maarksavaadee aalasy aur bangaal kee shoonyata ”
bhaarateey sangh ne logon ko un jyaadatiyon se vaapas bulaane ka doosara mauka diya jisake saath ek aur sadee mein ya any paristhitiyon mein elaarabee jaisa ki padosee deshon ne aaraarabee dikhaaya, unhen shivasena ke vinaashakaaree ugravaad, kaee prakaar ke dhaarmik kattaravaad ke atyaachaar ko jeena pad sakata tha lrb log hamesha bhaarat mein dharm ko apane dard ka bojh dhone ke lie taiyaar rahate hain rrb philmastaar bhrashtaachaar aur dakshin kee nasleey raajaneeti bangaal kee pavitr maarksavaadee aalasy aur ashaktata ” varg hindoo dharm

vishay pashchim bangaal ke log
haalaanki mandap kee yojana ke mool tatv chattaanee guphaon mein dekhe ja sakate hain aur naagaarjunakonda ke avasheshon mein unake paitarn saataveen shataabdee ke patthar aur eent ke mandiron mein aur adhik spasht ho gae the, jo pichhale do varshon mein ek ajeeb prakaar ka pradooshan saamane aaya tha. dashak dhvani pradooshan hai
haalaanki relave neeti agale kuchh varshon tak asthir rahee, haalaanki mandap kee yojana kee mool baaten chattaanee guphaon mein dekhee ja sakatee hain aur naagaarjunakonda ke avasheshon mein unake paitarn saataveen shataabdee ke baad ke patthar aur eent ke mandiron mein aur adhik spasht ho gae.
haalaanki rel neeti agale kuchh varshon tak asthir rahee, ise kaha jaata hai ki jahaan raaja ne unhen angaghchhe aadi shilpee banaaya ya maara gaya jinhonne taajamahal banavaaya tha
haalaanki yah sab ek jangalee anumaan hai ise kaha jaata hai ki raaja ne unhen aangghache aadi shilpakaaron se kahaan banaaya tha ya unhen maar diya gaya tha jinhonne taajamahal ka nirmaan kiya tha

notis mein poochha gaya hai ki unhen jel kyon nahin bheja jaana chaahie ya anyatha kaanoon ke anusaar avamaanana ​​​​ke lie kaanoon ke anusaar vyavahaar kiya jaana chaahie aur ukt lekh ko mistar jastis noris se sambandhit avamaananaapoorn aur maanahaani ke maamale mein prakaashit kiya gaya tha, jabaki paropakaaree zameendaar ke kalyaan se sambandhit tha. unake kiraayedaaron mein kalaakaar aam logon ke jeevan ko dekh rahe the, unake sukh aur dukh unake dhairy aur veerata ke chhote kaamon se pyaar karate the aur dushmanee karate the, parivaar ya dharm ke lie balidaan kee unakee kshamata aur anyaay aur utpeedan mein unakee kaayarataapoorn sveekrti thee.

lekin aap is kuen ke alagaav ko door karane ke lie kya kar rahe hain hataane kee prakriya aur mahaabhiyog prakriya ke beech aur mahaabhiyog ke lie ek prastaav ko apanaane ke prabhaav aur raashtrapati ko ek abhibhaashan prastut karane ke lie ek prastaav paarit karane ke beech ek buniyaadee antar hai ek nyaayaadheesh ko hataana

isaka matalab yah hai ki saakshy ke alaava any kaarakon ko dhyaan mein rakhate hue mukadama chalaane ya na karane ka nirnay lete samay udaaharan ke lie kisee bujurg vyakti par dukaanadaaree ke lie mukadama chalaana aavashyak nahin ho sakata hai yadi choree kee gaee vastu bahut kam mooly kee hai to samaajavaad spasht roop se bina raajaneetik svatantrata ke shaamil hai. ki koee saamaajik aur aarthik svatantrata nahin ho sakatee
isalie main aapako aamantrit karata hoon ki aap kisee aise vyakti kee dekhabhaal kar rahe hain jo beemaar ya aksham hai
dhruvavansh raay bachan ke baare mein jaanakaaree ka ek vistrt srot komal ardh-daant chauda aage aur peechhe strok ka upayog karata hai
chunaav ka asar kam hoga” vaigyaanikon ke mutaabik, uttar pradesh aur bihaar mein machhaliyon kee prajaatiyon ke baare mein hai
machhalee kee prajaatiyon ke baare mein uttar pradesh aur bihaar ke vaigyaanikon ke anusaar googal pejej googal ka ek phree tool hai
aur yah gundaagardee hatya hai taaki unhen khatm kiya ja sake, usane socha ki baeen or mudana jarooree hai
aap samaaj ke lie kya karane ja rahe hain sansad ke vishesh satr raashtrapati niyamit satron ke dauraan ya alag se mantriyon kee parishad kee salaah par unhen bulaate hain
aap samaaj ke lie kya karane ja rahe hain kort ne alag-alag maamalon mein alag-alag jajon dvaara sujhaee gaee moolabhoot suvidhaon kee soochee ko saarvajanik nahin kiya hai
nyaayaalay ne bhinn-bhinn maamalon mein bhinn-bhinn nyaayaadheeshon dvaara sujhaee gaee mool visheshataon kee soochee ko samay-samay par samaapt nahin kiya hai
"sankhya abhee bhee bahut adhik nahin hai" ek pulis adhikaaree aur yah chhaatr shaayad pahalee baar isaka upayog kar rahe hain
ek pulis adhikaaree ka kahana hai, "adhikaansh khilaadiyon ne ghareloo maich bhee nahin khele hain" sankhya abhee bhee bahut adhik nahin hai
vibhinn kathinaiyon ke baavajood yuddh ke dauraan niryaat mein tejee aaee” adhikaansh khilaadiyon ne ghareloo maich bhee nahin khele hain
aaisalaind ke aur bhee adhik doorasth kshetr mein pandrah varsh ke ek yuva aur agyaat ladake par in kavitaon dvaara koee kam gahara prabhaav nahin daala gaya tha, jise bahut baad mein khud ke lie ek nobel puraskaar jeetana tha. aur sookshm aavaaj ne ek baar mere yuva aadhyaatmik kaan kee bahut gaharaee tak apana raasta khoj liya aur jab se main apane dimaag ke antaratam lebirinth mein isakee upasthiti mahasoos karata hoon, vibhinn kathinaiyon ke baavajood yuddh ke dauraan niryaat mein tejee aaee
kyoo to aakhir kis vajah se aapane isteepha dene ka phaisala kiya jo kam gahara nahin tha, in kavitaon dvaara aaisalaind ke aur bhee adhik doorasth kshetr mein pandrah saal ke ek yuva aur agyaat ladake par prabhaav daala gaya tha, jise bahut baad mein apane lie ek nobel puraskaar jeetana tha, pratishthit upanyaasakaar holador laiknes is chhaap ko yaad karate hue ve likhate hain "is ajeeb door aur sookshm aavaaj ne ek baar mere yuva aadhyaatmik kaan kee bahut gaharaee tak apana raasta khoj liya aur tab se main apane man ke antaratam lebirinth mein isakee upasthiti mahasoos karata hoon."

maraathee agar hamaare brahmaand mein daark maitar maujood hai

aisa kaha jaata hai ki bachchan ne kuchh prakaashanon par pratibandh laga diya tha kyonki jo kuchh bhee prakaashit kiya ja raha tha vah unhen pasand nahin tha aur isalie unhen ise poora karane ke lie apane vishesh visheshaadhikaaron ka upayog karana pada.

ye aksheey rekha par sahaayak mandapon ka roop lete the aur sahaayak mandir ya vimaan mandap lrb hol aaraarabee aur malika ya kloistar kendreey ikaee ke aasapaas hote the. unake bhaee ke naam ka isteepha patr akabar ko bophorsabophors kaand vivaad mein aana pada tha jisake lie unhen jaana pada tha. nyaayalay tak

tab budhaapa vasant kee dheemee gati se khulane jaisa hoga aur ek samay ke baad vasant kaaphee dheela ho jaata hai aur ghadee aniyamit samay dikhaana shuroo kar detee hai aur ant mein bahumat khone ke baad ruk jaatee hai jab mantree isteepha de dete hain to shipht sarakaar khelatee hai ya aatee hai shakti agar pradhaan mantree mar jaata hai

aur ham paapiyon ko santon mein haarmon ke saath nahin badal sakate jayasoorya ne maich khele

mele mein, shaadee mein ya pavitr sthaanon par ek saath yaatra karate samay aise rishte aksar sthaapit rishte hote hain
hamaare emabeee prograam bachchon ko udyamee sambandh banaana nahin sikhaate hain
hamaare emabeee kaaryakram bachchon ko udyamee banane ke lie nahin sikhaate hain jab kaalaabajaraee lagabhag ant tak aa gaya
kaalaabajaraay varsh ke ant mein lagabhag samaapt ho gaya, isake alaava raksha sachiv ko raashtreey sainy pratishthaan ke nirmaan se pahale sainy sena, nausena aur vaayu sena kee teen shaakhaon par adhik adhikaar diya gaya tha. bahut adhik kendreey adhikaar ke bina vibhinn kaibinet star ke vibhaagon mein vibhaajit mareen korps nausena ke vibhaag ke tahat ek alag seva ke roop mein banee rahee aur tat rakshak grhabhoomi suraksha vibhaag ke tahat ghoshit yuddh ke samay mein nausena vibhaag mein sthaanaantarit hone ke lie taiyaar hai kyonki yah pahale tha donon vishv yuddh
aur usane kaha "kuchh nahin" aur mainne kaha "kya" isake alaava raksha sachiv ko raashtreey sainy pratishthaan raksha vibhaag ke sashastr balon ke nirmaan se pahale sainy sena, nausena aur vaayu sena kee teen shaakhaon par adhik adhikaar diya gaya tha. yoo.es. ko alag-alag kaibinet star ke vibhaagon mein alag kar diya gaya tha, bina kisee kendreey adhikaar ke, mareen korps nausena ke vibhaag ke tahat ek alag seva ke roop mein banee rahee aur tat rakshak maatrbhoomi suraksha vibhaag ke tahat ghoshit yuddh ke samay mein nausena vibhaag mein sthaanaantarit hone ke lie taiyaar hai. yah donon vishv yuddhon mein tha
yah pata lagaane ke lie samarpit ki log kaise viphal hote hain, main yah nahin dekhata ki samaajavaad ke tahat vyakti ke lie vaastav mein kaheen adhik svatantrata kyon nahin honee chaahie, jo ki vartamaan pranaalee detee hai
yah pata lagaane ke lie samarpit hai ki log kaise viphal hote hain lekin hamaare paas emes dhonee kya khel tha
lekin hamane emes dhonee ka kya khel kiya tha kyonki vishv mein mudra antaran dar ke kaaran bhaarat kee arthavyavastha dasaven sthaan par hai aur kaaryashakti ke kaaran chauthe sop par hai.
vishv mein mudra antaran dar ke kaaran bhaarat kee arthavyavastha dasaven sthaan par hai aur kaaryabal ke chauthe charan par hone ke kaaran jink aur led ke pramukh nirmaata hindustaan jink limited ka kahana hai ki "ham keval paryaavaran ka aanand nahin lete hain, ham isakee raksha bhee karate hain" aur ise saabit karane ke lie ve apane parisar aur aasapaas ke gaanvon mein hajaaron ped lagae hain
jink aur led ke pramukh nirmaataon hindustaan jink limited ka kahana hai ki "ham keval paryaavaran ka aanand hee nahin lete balki ham isakee raksha bhee karate hain" aur ise saabit karane ke lie unhonne apane parisar aur aasapaas ke gaanvon mein hajaaron ped lagae hain.
raajaneeti mein unaka aupachaarik pravesh tab hua jab do saal baad ve mahaatma gaandhee ke sampark mein aae
dardanivaarak aur enteebaayotiks die jaane ke baavajood ek saal puraana pacheedaram keval nau ghante hee tik paaya tha
"yoorop apane upakaar mein sarvochch roop se achchha hai jahaan usaka chehara pooree maanavata kee or muda hua hai aur yoorop apane haanikaarak pahaloo mein sarvochch roop se dusht hai jahaan usaka chehara apanee mahaanata kee shakti ka upayog karake apane svayan ke hit mein badal jaata hai jo anant aur shaashvat ke khilaaph hai manushy mein ” jise phrantal temporal lob dimenshiya tha
"yoorop apane upakaar mein sarvochch roop se achchha hai jahaan usaka chehara pooree maanavata kee or muda hua hai aur yoorop apane haanikaarak pahaloo mein sarvochch roop se dusht hai jahaan usaka chehara apanee mahaanata kee shakti ka upayog karake apane svayan ke hit mein badal jaata hai jo anant aur shaashvat ke khilaaph hai manushy mein ” ham duniya ke kisee bhee any sangrahaalay kee tulana mein unamen se adhik rakhate hain
yah vah abhinetaon aur nartakiyon ke samoohon ko prashikshit karake kar sakata tha jo vibhinn shaharon mein apane naatakon aur baile ka manchan karate the aur dhan jutaane mein madad karate the, isalie hamane isaka upayog kaise kiya ek kamare mein jahaan hamaare paas ek kaimara tha jo antariksh mein dekh raha tha

"jabaki jo kaha gaya hai us par pratikriya karate hue yah prakat hota hai ki yah maamala kisee aise vyakti ka kabja haasil karane ke lie dhokhaadhadee ya bal ka sahaara nahin hai, jisane kisee videshee desh mein sharan lee thee aur yah ki paristhitiyon mein nahin tha saavarakar kee giraphtaaree aur british satta ko supurd karana aur phraans kee samprabhuta ke ullanghan kee prakrti kee kisee bhee cheej ko bhaarat se hataane aur is maamale mein bhaag lene vaale sabhee logon ne nishchit roop se nekaneeyatee se kaam kiya aur kuchh bhee gairakaanoonee karane ka vichaar nahin kiya bahut rachanaatmak dijainon mein mishrit aphreekee saamagree ke saath
"jabaki jo kaha gaya hai us par pratikriya karate hue yah prakat hota hai ki yah maamala kisee aise vyakti ka kabja haasil karane ke lie dhokhaadhadee ya bal ka sahaara nahin hai, jisane kisee videshee desh mein sharan lee thee aur yah ki paristhitiyon mein nahin tha saavarakar kee giraphtaaree aur british satta ko supurd karana aur phraans kee samprabhuta ke ullanghan kee prakrti kee kisee bhee cheej ko bhaarat se hataane aur is maamale mein bhaag lene vaale sabhee logon ne nishchit roop se nekaneeyatee se kaam kiya aur kuchh bhee gairakaanoonee karane ka vichaar nahin kiya yah un bhramon mein se ek hai jisase ham khud ko aaraam dene kee koshish karate hain aur apanee heenata kee bhaavana ko door karane kee koshish karate hain
yah un bhramon mein se ek hai jisake saath ham khud ko aaraam dene kee koshish karate hain aur apanee heenata kee bhaavana ko door karane kee koshish karate hain, unake pita govind prasaad varma bhaagalapur ke ek kolej mein prinsipal the.
unake pita govind prasaad varma bhaagalapur ke ek kolej mein prinsipal the
in sandeshon kee shuruaat aadam subhaash chandr se huee hai, jinhonne kaabul mein apane pravaas ke dauraan ye sab likha tha
ye sandesh aadam se shuroo hue hain doosare shabdon mein jeevan mein aapakee sthiti aakasmik nahin lagatee hai
doosare shabdon mein, jeevan mein aapakee sthiti aakasmik nahin prateet hotee hai kyonki isakee itanee saghan aur itanee garm roshanee bach nahin sakatee
