shaayad lagabhag saal peechhe
poorvee eeraan aur arabon kee janasankhya vrddhi par niyantran kiya ja raha tha
raashtrapati chunaav mein raajaneetik ummeedavaar abhiyaan ke lie yootyoob ka upayog kar rahe hain matadaata ummeedavaaron ke vichaar paitarn dekh sakate hain raashtrapati pad ke ummeedavaar udaaharan ke lie ron pol hilaree klintan aur jo biden veediyo sattaadhaaree paartee ya vipakshee paartee ke raashtrapati pad ke ummeedavaaron ke lie banae ja sakate hain teesare samooh ne yoo-tyoob udaaravaadee steev kubbee ke abhiyaan ke prachaar ka bhee istemaal kiya aur ek laghu enimeted philm kee shuruaat kee jisamen abhiyaan yogadaanakartaon ke chehare aur aavaazen theen, jinhonne sitambar ko yootyoob par isake utpaadan ko vittaposhit kiya tha. ripablikan seenetar jorj elen kee haar kyonki kathit nasleey tippaniyon kee veediyo klip ko abhiyaan ke dauraan youtubai darshakon ko dikhaaya gaya tha, jems kotekee jaise raajaneetik tippaneekaar bhee youtubai ke raajaneetik kshetr mein hain apane vichaaron ko prasaarit karane ke lie yootyoob, vartamaan mein phraans aur italee ke entoniyo di pietro jaise raajaneetik neta bhee is sait ko ostreliya ke eksapraim ministar jon haavard ke sangheey chunaavon mein badhat haasil karane ke lie apane abhiyaanon ka hissa bana rahe hain.
sambhavataya raashtrapati jail sinh ne postal bil ke maamale mein aur raashtrapati venkataraman ne sansad ke sadasyon ko sirph ek saal kee seva ke baad penshan dene vaale bil ke maamale mein kiya tha, unake baare mein anaginat gaane badhe aur us aadamee ne jo lokapriyata haasil kee vah thee kuchh adbhut ”
unake baare mein asankhy geet badhe aur us vyakti ne jo lokapriyata haasil kee vah aashcharyajanak thee ”briten ke paryaavaran khaady aur graameen maamalon ke vibhaag ne mukhy roop se sthaaneey sarakaar ke pratinidhiyon par kendrit vaayu gunavatta lakshyon ko nirdhaarit kiya jo shaharon ke vaayu gunavatta prabandhan ke lie jimmedaar hai. jahaan vaayu gunavatta prabandhan aavashyak hai vahaan briten ne vaayu gunavatta ka ek netavark sthaapit kiya hai jahaan nigaraanee kendron ne mukhy pradooshak ke star ko prakaashit kiya vishesh roop se oksaphord baath aur landan kee vaayu gunavatta ko kailor gais kampanee dvaara pradarshit kiya gaya aur gaarjiyan akhabaar mein prakaashit vivaadit adhyayan ko maana gaya ki oksaford mein ausat din mein chalana dhuen kee roshanee vaalee sigaret ke baraabar hai
briten ke paryaavaran khaady aur graameen maamalon ke vibhaag ne mukhy roop se sthaaneey sarakaar ke pratinidhiyon par kendrit vaayu gunavatta lakshyon ko nirdhaarit kiya hai jo un shaharon ke vaayu gunavatta prabandhan ke lie jimmedaar hai jahaan vaayu gunavatta prabandhan aavashyak hai briten ne vaayu gunavatta ka ek netavark sthaapit kiya hai jahaan nigaraanee kendron ne mukhy pradooshak ke star ko prakaashit kiya, vishesh roop se oksaford baath aur landan kee vaayu gunavatta kharaab hai, kailor gais kampanee dvaara pradarshit kiya gaya aur abhibhaavak samaachaar patr mein prakaashit vivaadit adhyayan ne maana ki oksaford mein ausat din chalana bhains ke dhuen vaalee sigaret ke baraabar hai gaay kee tulana mein ausatan lagabhag teen guna adhik doodh detee hai
bina charcha ke svadeshee ke niyam ka paalan karen jisaka pahala aadesh spin hai "bhains ausatan gaay kee tulana mein lagabhag teen guna adhik doodh detee hai"
phaavela mein sabhee ne mujhe haree battee dee
teeke jo adhik vyaapak roop se upayog kie gae the
kya saahity ke kshetr mein unaka yogadaan bhee mahatvapoorn hai
isalie bainkon ne kol sentar sthaapit karane mein laakhon rupaye ka nivesh kiya hai, jisase graahakon ko samasya hone par kisee se baat karane kee suvidha milatee hai
haalaanki ek adhyayan se pata chala hai ki aatmaghaatee aatankavaad is saamaany niyam ka ek apavaad ho sakata hai aatankavaad ke is vishesh tareeke ka saboot hai ki lokatantr mein har adhikaanik aatmaghaatee abhiyaan ka virodh karata hai, ek raajy mein kaaphee had tak raajaneetik svatantrata ko lakshit kiya jaata hai "" vah chintit hai ki kya anyaay hai hai""
"mere sainikon haalaanki ek adhyayan se pata chala hai ki aatmaghaatee aatankavaad is saamaany niyam ka ek apavaad ho sakata hai aatankavaad ke is vishesh tareeke ka saboot hai ki lokatantr mein pratyek adhikaaree aatmahatya abhiyaan ko kaaphee had tak raajaneetik svatantrata vaale raajy ko hee lakshit karata hai
“mere sainikon
to ye patthar ke khambhe
lekin mujhe vishvaas hai ki hamaaree apanee samasyaon ko dekhane ka ekamaatr sahee tareeka unhen ek vishv seting mein unake uchit sthaan par dekhana hai, jab koee doosara insaan kah raha hai "kya aap ise samajhate hain"

seeng kee kaliyon ko thodee see spirit se saaph kiya jaana chaahie aur kaastik potaash stik se ek ya do minat ke lie ek golaakaar gati mein ragadana chaahie jisase kachche laal rang ka ghera ban jae kyonki main isake saath aur adhik nahin rah sakata
kyonki main isake saath aur nahin rah sakata tha
haalaanki isamen shaamil doktar ko aapako aur aapake parivaar ko soochit karana chaahie, aksar rogee sabase pahale kuchh galat notis karata hai
bangaal mein subhaash chandr kee najarabandee se rihaee ke turant baad, kaangresiyon ne subhaash kaangres phand ke gathan kee ghoshana kee aur kalakatta mein kaangres haus banaane aur pichhale saal tedektiv baithane ke lie subhaash chandr ko phand pesh kiya.
shrenee pauraanik kathaon
aaj vah lokasabha mein saat saansadon ke ek chhote se giroh kee neta hain jisakee nishtha ka vah netrtv karane ka daava karatee hain
yahaan yah spasht hai ki shreekrshn hee heraakleez the, vidvaan unhen harikrshn kahate hain jo shreekrshn ke saath judate hain kyonki shreekrshn chandragupt se kaee peedhee pahale the isalie yadi ham ek peedhee ko varshon den to shreekrshn ka janm samay beesee ke roop mein aata hai isalie is aadhaar par mahaabhaarat yuddh mush hua hai.
kya yah maayane rakhata hai
lagabhag ek karod kee aabaadee ke saath na keval uttar pradesh bhaarat mein sabase adhik aabaadee vaala kshetr hai, balki duniya ka sabase adhik aabaadee vaala up raajaneetik kshetr bhee hai
gire hue raashtr chamatkaar ke bina nahin uthate hain, ve nishchit roop se cheejon kee shreniyaan hain, lekin unamen se keval saat hain
gire hue raashtr chamatkaar ke bina nahin uthate hain bhavishy mein bachche shahar ko vaapas de denge
bhavishy mein bachche shahar ko vaapas denge kaee mobail aur saitelait traanseevar ikaiyaan, hes kamaand ke vistaarit sanskaran ka upayog karake esemes bhejane aur praapt karane ka samarthan karatee hain, jo mool roop se hes smaartamodem bod modem ke lie vikasit ek vishisht kamaand bhaasha hai.
tendulakar ne test maich khele jisase unhonne ran banae isalie antararaashtreey kriket maichon mein unhonne ranon se adhik ran banae jisamen shatak shaamil hain kaee mobail aur saitelait traanseevar ikaiyaan esemes bhejane aur praapt karane ka samarthan karatee hain hes kamaand ke ek vistaarit sanskaran ka upayog karake mool roop se ek vishisht kamaand bhaasha set kee jaatee hai hes smaartamodem bod modem ke lie aavashyak uddharan mein vikasit kiya gaya
tendulakar ne test maich khele jisamen se unhonne ran banae isalie antararaashtreey kriket maichon mein unhonne ranon se adhik ran banae jisamen shatak shaamil hain
brahmaand ka mandir apane khoobasoorat udyaan galiyaaron aur sletagre aur neelee chattaan mein pradarshit "chhatariyon" ke lie bhee jaana jaata hai.
pahalee baar ke lie
aur phir chhah maheene ke baad samudr ke chaaron or majaboot kilebandee khatm ho gaee, vishesh roop se majaboot golee ke dibbe jo ek raashtr dvaara chhode gae smaarakon kee tarah hain jo aage badhane ke lie drdh hain.
aur phir chhah maheene poore hone ke baad sangharsh khatm ho gaya
aur vastuon ke saath baatacheet karen, sangharsh khatm ho gaya tha
aur vastuon ke saath baatacheet karen koee bhee kuchh bhee khareed ya bech nahin raha tha jo ho raha tha
hamaare adhikaansh kampyooting upakaranon ke vipareet jo ho raha tha use koee bhee khareed ya bech nahin raha tha

in dishaanirdeshon mein phit hone ke lie
gahan devanaagaree klark pyor taiping tool ek nae hindee remingatan aadhaarit yoonikod taiping tool ke lie vastunishth jaanch kee vaigyaanik paddhati in sabhee par laagoo nahin hotee hai aur jeevan mein bahut kuchh mahatvapoorn hai jo isake daayare se pare hai kala aur kavita ke prati sanvedanasheelata saundary kee bhaavana achchhaee kee aantarik pahachaan paida karata hai
saghan devanaagaree klark pyor taiping tool phor e nyoo hindee remingatan aadhaarit yoonikod taiping tool shakunee ne paandavon ko unake bachapan se lekar yuvaavastha tak kaee baar maarane kee koshish kee aur yudhishthir ko raajakumaar banaane ke baad unhonne phir se paandavon ko laakshaagrh bhejane ke lie unakee hatya karane kee koshish kee lekin ve laakshaagrh ko jalaane se baahar aa gae vidur kee madad se
ham mein se kaee logon ko dil ka daura ya strok aaraarabee jaise kaardiyovaiskular disordar elaarabee vikasit hone ka khatara hota hai lekin madhumeh hone se yah jokhim kaee baar badh jaata hai, shakuni ne paandavon ko bachapan se yuvaavastha tak kaee baar maarane kee koshish kee aur yudhishthir raajakumaar banaane ke baad unhonne phir se koshish kee paandavon kee hatya karane ke lie unhen laakaaghar bheja lekin ve vidur kee madad se jalate hue laakshaagrh se baahar aa gae

gotaakhor
likamapur kheeree shahar lekin sachche vaphaadaar baaharee logon se pare dekhane ke lie jaane jaate hain

aur kaaphee lambe samay tak
gaibriyal vah bhagavaan ka doot hai jisane praarthana ka siddhaant diya yah teem se milane ka samay hai
jilon yah teem se milane ka samay hai
jilon mein kuchh sanvaidhaanik kaary hain jinhen use sansad ke sambandh mein karana padata hai raashtrapati sansad ke donon sadanon ko samay-samay par milane ke lie bulaata hai
kuchh sanvaidhaanik kaary hain jinhen use sansad ke sambandh mein karana padata hai raashtrapati sansad ke donon sadanon ko samay-samay par milane ke lie bulaata hai yadi is tarah ghoshit raay ko phir se chunautee dee jaatee hai to adhyaksh nirdesh deta hai ki vot svachaalit roop se sanchaalit karake darj kie jaen vot rikordar ya sadan mein haan aur nahin parchee ka upayog karake ya sadasyon dvaara lobee mein jaakar
munshee mujaahideen ke sandarbh mein charcha aprail mein satta mein aaee aur main usee disambar mein bhaarat aaya
mujaahideen aprail mein satta mein aaya aur main bhaarat aaya ki disambar aur basava ham yahaan yaad kar sakate hain ki pahalee baar unhen pooja kee vaastavik prakrti par prabuddh kiya gaya tha
apane baare mein bahut adhik vistaar se aur basava ko ham yahaan yaad kar sakate hain ki pahalee baar unhen pooja kee vaastavik prakrti par prakaash daala gaya tha
lok sabha mein neharoo ne sanvidhaan ke chauthe sanshodhan par bolate hue apane baare mein bahut adhik vistaar se ghoshana kee ki raashtr kee aarthik aur saamaajik kalyaan neetiyon kee jimmedaaree sansad kee honee chaahie, na ki adaalaton kee.
padhane ka maza saajha karana bachchon aur vayaskon ke lie sabase achchha anubhav hai
unakee dekhabhaal ke lie sahee prathaon ko apanaane se asaadhaaran cheejon ke ghatit hone ke lie unake khaane kee aadaton mein vaanchhaneey parivartan laaya ja sakata hai
kyonki mobail phon vidyut chumbakeey vikiran phenkata hai, isalie jab lambee avadhi ke lie upayog kiya jaata hai to kainsar ke lie chinta paida hotee hai, vikiran gair-aayanakaaree hota hai, lekin vaigyaanik aur chikitsa samudaay kee garmee ko sthaaneeyakrt kiya ja sakata hai. unakee dekhabhaal ke lie abhyaas unake khaane kee aadaton mein vaanchhit parivartan la sakate hain
bahut-bahut dhanyavaad, ve ek smarph banaana chaahate hain, ve mikee maus banaana chaahate hain
bahut-bahut dhanyavaad satyajeet re ne apanee likhee kahaaniyon se do yaadagaar philmen banaeen
kaangres ke baare mein hamesha shankaalu unhonne aupachaarik roop se apanee paartee ke sanyukt morcha kaibinet mein shaamil hone ke vichaar ka virodh kiya, lekin bahumat kee maang ke kaaran satyajeet re ne unakee likhee kahaaniyon se do yaadagaar philmen banaeen
kaangres ke baare mein hamesha sandeh mein unhonne aupachaarik roop se apanee paartee ke samarthan ke saath sanyukt morcha kaibinet mein shaamil hone ke vichaar ka virodh kiya, lekin bahumat kee maang ke kaaran aaryon ne kisee bhee devee-devataon kee moortiyon ya mandiron ka nirmaan nahin kiya.
lekin unhen vaastav mein apane jeen ko likhane kee shailee se phailaane kee jaroorat hai, yah paanini se pahale hona chaahie
vyaktiyon kee sanak se
mahatvapoorn eeraan, paakistaan aur aphagaanistaan anubhaag ke prabhaaree sanyukt sachiv vivek kaatajoo pahale hee pad par paanch saal se adhik samay bita chuke hain aur ab keval myaammaar mein bhaarat ke raajadoot ke roop mein sooradaas ke roop mein aage badh rahe hain.
mahatvapoorn eeraan, paakistaan aur aphagaanistaan ke prabhaaree sanyukt sachiv vivek kaatajoo pahale hee pad par paanch saal se adhik samay bita chuke hain aur ab keval myaammaar mein bhaarat ke raajadoot ke roop mein aage badh rahe hain.
jin logon ko veeja kee aavashyakata hotee hai, unhen tves paramit jaaree hone kee taareekh se chhah maheene ke bheetar pravesh manjooree ke lie aavedan karane kee ummeed hai amitaabh bachchan deeobee aktoobar boleevud ke sabase lokapriy abhineta hain, unhonne boleevud udyog mein sabase adhik lokapriyata haasil kee aur sabase mahatvapoorn vyakti ban gae boleevud ke itihaas mein
amitaabh bachchan dob aktoobar boleevud ke sabase lokapriy abhineta hain jinhonne boleevud udyog mein sabase adhik lokapriyata haasil kee aur boleevud ke itihaas mein sabase mahatvapoorn vyakti ban gae
samaajavaadee paartee ne bhee kiya palatavaar kolakaata ke lalit aur suneeta jaalaan ne jaapaanee dijainar kenjo ke parsanal vordarob par kiya kaam
bairal lamba gahara aur achchhee tarah gol pair achchhee tarah se aanupaatik aur achchhee tarah se rakhe gae teets ke saath achchhe aakaar ke udar ko rakha gaya hai, samaajavaadee paartee ne bhee ek volt chehara kiya
hansee ka bairal lamba gahara aur achchhee tarah gol pair achchhee tarah se aanupaatik aur achchhee tarah se lagae gae teets ke saath achchhe aakaar ka udar rakha jaata hai
kahane ke lie "ve maujood hain" hansee
global vaarming ko nyoonatam seema tak seemit karane ke lie "ve maujood hain" kahane ke lie thos prayaason kee aavashyakata hai
global vaarming ko nyoonatam seema tak seemit karane ke lie thos prayaason kee aavashyakata hai jab vah mar gaee to usane pooree raat chhat par chahalakadamee karate hue bitaee aur sakht aadesh diya ki koee bhee use pareshaan na kare
ise kamar mein vaapas nahin kheencha ja sakata hai aur ausatan yah shareer ke vajan anupaat ke aadhaar par any jaanavaron kee tulana mein bhaaree hota hai jab vah mar jaatee hai to usane pooree raat chhat par chahalakadamee karate hue bitaee aur sakht aadesh diya ki koee bhee pareshaan na kare usaka
ise kamar mein vaapas nahin kheencha ja sakata hai aur ausatan yah shareer ke vajan anupaat ke aadhaar par any jaanavaron kee tulana mein bhaaree hai, yah paartee sabhee naagarikon aur pres ke lie khulee thee
yah paartee sabhee naagarikon aur pres ke lie khulee thee jisake chaaron or darshak ikattha hote hain
baaharee kariyaan baaharee shrrnkhala sanskrt sophtaveyar aur haardaveyar
kyonki mainne in graahakon ke saath sanskrt sophtaveyar aur haardaveyar ke saath kuchh any cheejen bhee kee hain
kyonki mainne in graahakon ke saath kuchh any cheezen bhee kee hain
ve un par bahas nahin karate hain kyonki kuchh baanjh kshetr ke nivaasee is par bahas nahin karate hain kyonki ve isamen paida hue hain aur kuchh aur nahin jaanate hain kyonki ve desh ko apanee janmabhoomi ke roop mein pyaar karate hain aur ise chhodana mushkil hai yah pustak pahalee baar prakaashit huee thee lekin saahity ke kshetr mein isakee mahatta tabhee dekhee ja sakatee hai jab is pustak ka pun: sanshodhit sanskaran prakaashit hua aur ise unake pote prabodh kumaar ne kriyaanvit kiya.
unhen ek mahaan shaanti puraskaar mila aur unhen bhaarat ka achchha naagarik puraskaar mila, ve un par bahas nahin karate kyonki kuchh baanjh kshetr ke nivaasee is par bahas nahin karate kyonki ve isamen paida hue the aur kuchh aur nahin jaanate kyonki ve desh se pyaar karate hain unakee janmabhoomi aur ise chhodana mushkil hai
unhen ek mahaan shaanti puraskaar mila aur unhen bhaarat ka achchha naagarik puraskaar mila
yah bachchon dvaara le liya jaata hai yah pata karen ki kya thekedaar kisee vyaapaar sangh se sambandhit hai aur kya yah aapake vaidhaanik adhikaaron ke alaava koee atirikt upabhokta sanrakshan elaarabee pradaan karata hai udaaharan ke lie sulah ya madhyasthata sevaen aaraarabee
keechad ka upayogee utpaadon mein roopaantaran apashishton ke upachaar se praapt keechad bhee ek samasya hai jise bachche apane haathon mein le lete hain
shaashvat khoj jeevan aur doktar avul pakir jainulaabadeen abdul kalaam ka samay schandrapentaagan prakaashakon dvaara likhit aaeeesabeeen keechad ko upayogee utpaadon mein parivartit karana, apashishton ke upachaar par praapt keechad bhee ek samasya hai
anant khoj jeevan aur doktar avul pakir jainulaabadeen abdul kalaam ka samay, jo ki chandrapentaagan prakaashak aaeeesabeeen dvaara likhit hai
svaadisht dikhata hai aur achchha svaad deta hai sangheey vidhaayika mein mahaamahim ka pratinidhitv gavarnar janaral dvaara kiya jaata hai aur do kakshon ko kramashah raajy parishad elaarabee ooparee kaksh aaraarabee aur vidhaanasabha sadan elaarabee nichale kaksh aaraarabee ke roop mein jaana jaata hai.
sangheey vidhaayika mein mahaamahim ka pratinidhitv gavarnar janaral dvaara kiya jaana tha aur do kakshon ko kramashah raajy kee parishad ke roop mein jaana jaata tha lrb ooparee kaksh rrb aur sabha ka sadan lrb nichala kaksh rrb akabar kee mrtyu ke varshon ke baad sinhaasan par baitha unake pita nasaruddeen muhammad humaayoon
is yuddh ke turant baad yahaan ek mukadama bhee chala tha jisamen bahaadur shaah japhar akabar apane pita nasaruddeen muhammad humaayoon kee mrtyu ke varshon baad gaddee par baithe the.
is yuddh ke turant baad yahaan bahaadur shaah japhar par ek kes bhee kiya gaya tha aur kaha tha "kyon na ham isamen se kuchh kregalist aur kijeejee par bechana shuroo karen"
aur kaha "kyon na ham inamen se kuchh ko kregalist aur kijeejee par bechana shuroo karen" vyaapaar karana ek aisa duhsvapn hai ki jyaadaatar videshee niveshak apana paisa poorvee eshiya mein le jaana pasand karate hain aur bhaarateey vyavasaayiyon ke lie keval ve hee bachate hain jo khel khelate hain
ab ham poornata praapt nahin kar sakate
raajy ke raajy ka pratinidhitv karane ke baraabar bhugataan nahin hota hai lekin amerika mein us alag raajy ke lie seenet mein do seeten praapt hotee hain bhaarat janasankhya ke aadhaar par seet ka aavantan sabase bada bhavishyadvakta aur doot jo aadhyaatmik path par jor dene ke lie aaya tha
youtubai ek veediyo saajha karane vaalee vebasait hai jahaan ek upayogakarta vebasait dekh sakata hai aur veediyo apalod kar sakata hai aur veediyo klip saajha kar sakata hai yadi aapako aay samarthan milata hai to yah kam ho jaega yadi aapakee ausat kamaee ek saptaah mein ek nishchit raashi se adhik hai
yootyoob ek veediyo saajha karane vaalee vebasait hai jahaan ek upayogakarta vebasait dekh sakata hai aur veediyo apalod kar sakata hai aur aapake baad hone vaalee cheejon ke veediyo klip nirdesh saajha kar sakata hai
aapake baad hone vaalee cheejon ke nirdesh
is kshetr mein unaka pahala vyaavahaarik prayog kisaanon ke laabh ke lie unakee paarivaarik jaageer vivaah sambandhon par kiya gaya
is kshetr mein unaka pahala vyaavahaarik prayog satta ke unake parivaar sampada siddhaant par kisaanon ke laabh ke lie kiya gaya tha
vaidik dhvani kee prakriya baad mein isaka anuvaad hua
bhaarat mein vaidik dhvani kee prakriya mein bahut adhik antarsaampradaayik tanaav aur sangharsh the
bhaarat mein bahut adhik antarsaampradaayik tanaav aur sangharsh the
any upayog ke lie dekhen aareses ke bhaashan, kahaaniyaan, naatak, anuvaad, bachchon kee kitaaben likhee gaee hain
any upayog ke lie aareses dekhen main nahin jaanata ki aap vahaan ek bade graahak ko alag kar rahe hain
kriketaarkaiv aur brahmaand kee saamagree ke baare mein
1 maee ek saamaany avakaash hai kyonki mahaaraashtr 1 maee ko banaaya gaya tha aur brahmaand kee saamagree ke baare mein
pahalee maee ek saamaany avakaash hai kyonki mahaaraashtr pahalee maee ko baaharee sambandhon ke lie banaaya gaya tha
aphagaanistaan duniya mein ham mein se bahut se baaharee sambandhon ke lie hai
aphagaanistaan duniya mein ham mein se kaee logon ke lie hai, deevaaron ke beech chhataree ke saath kiyosk hain, chhotee imaaraton mein chhataree prakaar kee sanrachana hai jo chaukeedaar ke sthaan ke roop mein istemaal kee ja sakatee hai lekin ab ve sangrahaalay hain
yadi aap kaarapet phit karava rahe hain to jaanch len ki rang aur dijain aapake dvaara chune gae namoone ke anuroop hai aur jab bichhaaya gaya kaaleen ka rol diya gaya hai to vah pheeka nahin padata hai ya deevaaron ke beech doshapoorn nahin hota hai, chhataree ke saath kiyosk hote hain, chhataree prakaar kee sanrachana vaalee chhotee imaaraten jo ho sakatee hain chaukeedaar ke sthaan ke roop mein upayog kiya jaata hai lekin ab ve sangrahaalay hain
yadi aap kaarapet phit karava rahe hain to jaanch len ki rang aur dijain aapake dvaara chune gae namoone ke anuroop hai aur yah ki jab bichhaaya gaya kaaleen ka rol pheeka ya doshapoorn nahin hai to isaka matalab hai ki ham soorataphes ko episod kahenge
phut chauda aur phut lamba hai bhagat sinh ne laahaur ke neshanal kolej mein padhaee chhod dee aur hindustaan soshalist ripablikan esosieshan naam ke ek kraantikaaree sangathan mein shaamil ho gae
bhagat sinh ne laahaur ke neshanal kolej mein apanee padhaee chhod dee aur hindustaan soshalist ripablikan esosieshan naamak ek kraantikaaree sangathan mein shaamil ho gae, hamane ek saampradaayik dange aur ek janasanhaar ke beech antar karana bhee nahin seekha hai
isaka mukhyaalay maunten vyoo kailiphorniya sanyukt raajy amerika videsh mantraalay mein hai
jo ise itana kathin banaate hain, yah tathy ka upahaas hai aur main in aaropon ka khandan aur khandan karata hoon
manu ke anusaar ek raaja ko ek vikalp elaarabee pratinidhi aaraarabee niyukt karane ka adhikaar tha jab vah khud ek adaalat kee adhyakshata nahin kar sakata tha aur is tarah niyukt adhikaaree ko raaja kee sabhee shaktiyon ka prayog karane ka adhikaar tha jo ise itana kathin bana deta tha
ven kaangres jalavaayu parivartan aatankavaad aur yuddh se amerikee sainikon kee vaapasee kee pairavee aur chunaavee vivaadon se sambandhit kaaryakramon ko vikasit karane mein sahayogee, yah paashaan yug ya prastaar yug ke janm aur vikaas ka pramaan hai
ye paashaan yug ya prastar yug ke janm aur vikaas ka pramaan hain
yah to bahut hee achchhee baat hai
boleevud kee muraadaabaad kee naee rananeeti, isase pahale ki aap kisee philm ko bechen, usake sheershak ko upayukt roop se sankshipt roop mein bechen
muraadaabaad mein aisee kaee cheejen hain jinaka ted mein pradarshan kiya ja raha hai
lekin main aapase daava karana chaahata hoon ki beech kee yah soochee vaastav mein bahut see cheejon ko poora karatee hai jinhen ted mein pradarshit kiya ja raha hai
lekin main aapase daava karana chaahata hoon ki beech mein yah soochee vaastav mein poorn hai
pichhale saal mainne doosaree peedhee ke sudhaaron ke lie rodamaip taiyaar kiya
is saal sitambar tak cheen ne miliyan tan aur bhaarat ne miliyan tan ka utpaadan kiya
ba haan yah vaastav mein kya kar raha hai khoj raha hai
usane bos ko bachaane ka aashvaasan diya lekin saphal nahin hua ham aapako jaanakaaree denge ki aap naukaree paane ke lie kya kar sakate hain aur madad ke lie ham kya kar sakate hain
unhonne bos ko bachaane ka aashvaasan diya, lekin saphal nahin hue, pachaas ke dashak ke dauraan kaagaj aur peparabord kee maang mein saalaana pratishat kee dar se vrddhi huee.
pachaas ke dashak ke dauraan pepar aur peparabord kee maang pratishat kee vaarshik dar se badhee, jo ki cheen mein har saal hone vaale arabon ephadeeaee ka lagabhag pratishat hai.
is kaam ke kaarobaariyon kee ooparee parat dvaara angrejee ko adhik mahatv diya jaata hai
miliyan paund se miliyan paund tak badhane ke baad yaarn ka niryaat angrejee mein miliyan paund aur miliyan paund tak gir gaya, jise kaarobaariyon kee ooparee parat dvaara adhik mahatv diya jaata hai
miliyan paund se miliyan paund mein badhane ke baad yaarn ka niryaat miliyan paund aur miliyan paund mein gir gaya
aur any sabhee prakaar kee sahaayata usaka sabase chhota beta samindr ek pyaara aur pratibhaashaalee ladaka jo shaayad apane pita kee tarah kuchh ban gaya ho achaanak usee din terah saal kee umr mein haije se mar gaya jis din usakee maan ka nidhan paanch saal pahale hua tha
joon ko yah nirnay liya gaya ki lokataantrik aur vipakshee pratham mahila hileree klintan ke lie obema kee aasha ne apane sabase chhote bete samindr ko ek pyaara aur pratibhaashaalee ladaka chhod diya, jo shaayad terah saal kee umr mein haije se achaanak apane pita kee mrtyu ho gaee thee. usee din jis din unakee maan ka paanch saal pahale nidhan ho gaya tha
joon ko yah nirnay liya gaya ki lokataantrik aur vipakshee pratham mahila hileree klintan ke lie obema kee aasha ne unake sahaayak ko chhod diya
unhonne uttaree aur madhy bhaarat ke kuchh hisson ko samekit karane aur apane daayare mein laane ke lie do dashakon ka samay liya, yah anumaan lagaaya gaya hai ki baikteeriya ee kolee mein lagabhag proteen hai
yah anumaan lagaaya gaya hai ki jeevaanu ee kolee mein proteen ke baare mein hai
kaee baar main apane jeevan se itana niraash ho jaata tha aur sabhee ek saath ibraaheem bhojan karate the
ek nijee sadasy dvaara shuroo kiya gaya ek sanvidhaan elaarabee sanshodhan aaraarabee bil ek nijee sadasy ke bil par laagoo hone vaale saamaany niyamon ke adheen hone ke alaava bhee jaanch kee jaanee chaahie aur nijee sadasyon ke bilon aur sankalpon par samiti dvaara sadan mein pesh karane kee siphaarish kee jaanee chaahie.
aur aaj hamaare paas jalavaayu sanrakshan ke lie gathabandhan kee shaayad sabase aakraamak paribhaasha hai
aur aaj hamaare paas vah hai jo shaayad hamaaree sabase aapattijanak paribhaasha hai
baabar taimoor samudaay se taalluk rakhata hai aur mangol neta changash khaan ka rishtedaar yaanee pita taimoor ling aur maan changesh khaan jayashankar prasaad dhaarana se taalluk rakhatee hai
jayashankar prasaad avishvasaneey roop se chatur pakshee hain
unhonne is dharm ke vikaas ke lie koee atirikt prayaas nahin kiya, sivaay isake ki unake band vaphaadaar anuyaayee avishvasaneey roop se smaart pakshee hain
unhonne apane band vaphaadaar anuyaayiyon mein ise phailaane ke alaava is dharm ke vikaas ke lie koee atirikt prayaas nahin kiya, haalaanki yah nirnay pooree tarah se aapaka hai ki kya aapake bachche ko atirikt vitaamin ke praapt hota hai aur yah kaise diya jaata hai.
haalaanki yah nirnay pooree tarah aapaka hai ki aapake bachche ko atirikt vitaamin ke milata hai ya nahin aur yah kaise diya jaata hai
haalaanki julaee mein kampanee ne ghoshana kee thee ki miliyan se adhik veediyo pratidin dekhe jaate hain aur maee mein dainik veediyo dekhe jaane vaale biliyan veediyo jode gae the aur julaee mein ise janavaree mein hee badha diya gaya tha, lagabhag biliyan upayogakartaon ne biliyan veediyo apalod kie hain, jo sthaaneey maraathee logon ke bheetar antarpravaah hai. ek aisee chinta jagaen jo apanee sanskrti vyaavasaayik bhaasha khone se aashankit the
teen joon kee raat sthaaneey maraathee logon ke bheetar antarpravaah ne ek chinta jaga dee hai jo apanee sanskrti vyavasaayik bhaasha khone se aashankit the.
joon kee raat ko yah raakshasee thee ki koee bhee vyakti ya vyaktiyon ka samooh bhaarateey logon se koee adhikaar praapt nahin karata hai aur kisee bhee tarah se unake lie jimmedaar nahin hai aur un par apanee ichchha thopata hai aur karodon bhaarat ko bina kisee sandarbh ke thopata hai ya unake pratinidhiyon ko ek shaktishaalee yuddh mein shaamil kiya jo unakee chaahat mein se koee nahin tha
advait vedaant bhagavad geetopanishad aur ved sabhee ek hee baat kahate hain ki eeshvar ek hee hai aur baakee sabhee usake alag-alag sanskaran hain
aaeeene prakaran aur haal hee mein royal indiyan eyar phors aur royal indiyan nevee ke hamalon ne desh kee bahut badee seva kee hai
yadi kisee vishesh seva ke lie sveekrt raashi us varsh ke prayojanon ke lie aparyaapt paee jaatee hai ya jab chaaloo vitteey varsh ke dauraan us varsh ke lie bajat mein vichaar nahin kee gaee kisee naee seva par poorak ya atirikt vyay ke lie aavashyakata utpann hotee hai sansad ke donon sadanon ke samaksh ek any vivaran anudaan kee anupoorak maangon ka vivaran jisamen us vyay kee anumaanit raashi darshaee gaee ho, maarbal ko chikana aur chamaka kar maikro dijain bhee uchit hai.
ya kya aap vyavasaay vyay ke roop mein ted kee pooree laagat ghata sakate hain
ye stambh hindee kavitaon ke sangrah taajamahal kee santulit prakrti ko darshaate hain
to chalie main aapako hindee kavitaon ke sangrah kee prakrti ke kuchh paitarn dikhaata hoon
bheemagoda bairaaj kee avadhi ke beech asthaee baandh ke nichale bhaag mein nirmaan kiya gaya tha
krshi mein kisee bhee sudhaar ya bhinnata ke desh kee arthavyavastha mein dooragaamee parinaam hote hain aksar poochhe jaane vaale prashn vebasait par kisee vishesh vishay ke baare mein prashn poochhe jaate hain
in jaanavaron ka ek madhyam aakaar ka sir aur ubhara hua maatha hota hai, krshi mein kisee bhee sudhaar ya badalaav ka desh kee arthavyavastha mein dooragaamee parinaam hota hai.
yah rahasyavaadee dvaara sahaj roop se mahasoos kiya ja sakata hai lekin daarshanik shrenee aagara dvaara saiddhaantik roop se kalpana nahin kee ja sakatee hai
aagara mein kaee behatareen modal kaitegaree hain
kaee behatareen modal hain
paryaavaran mein hone vaalee haal hee mein badhee huee kaarban daioksaid sah maasik sah maapon se pata chalata hai ki agar aapane poore saal dekha to mausamee badalaav chhote hote hain har saal paryaavaratan uttaree golaardh uttaree golaardh ke mausam mein uttaree golaardh ke ant mein aswh mein phasalen adhik ho gaee hain bajane ka samay paryaavaran ke parivartan par milata hai kyonki paudhe kuchh chaarj hataate hain, bajat pesh karane ke kuchh dinon baad charcha shuroo ho jaatee hai
bajat par charcha prastuti ke kuchh dinon ke baad shuroo hotee hai, tendulakar sthaaneey maidaanon par maichon mein ran banaane ke ausat se aur videshee maidaanon par ran banaane ke ausat se lekin vah tatasth sthaanon par adhik saphal hote hain jahaan maichon mein unhonne ran banae. aur usaka ausat hai
kaar mein phit hone vaale nae purjon ke baare mein kya grh mantree ka kadam ulta saabit hota hai, yah dekhana abhee baakee hai, lekin kaangres ne palatavaar karane ka phaisala kiya hai
isalie yah ek achchha vichaar tha ki yah kaar mein phit hone ke lie nae ghatakon ke baare mein bilkul kaam nahin karata tha
sanskrt mein sindhu ke lie do mukhy arth hain pahala sindhu maanasarovar se nikalata hai aur laddaakh aur paakistaan ke maadhyam se bahata hai aur arab saagar tak pahunchata hai doosara ek samudr ya jheel hai isalie yah ek mahaan vichaar tha jo bilkul kaam nahin karata tha yah uda diya
sanskrt mein sindhu ke lie do mukhy arth hain pahala sindhu maanasarovar se nikalakar laddaakh aur paakistaan se hokar bahata hai aur arab saagar tak pahunchata hai doosara samudr ya jheel hai jeees haardee ko sarakaar ne jaanch aur riport karane ke lie kaha tha
jeees haardee ko sarakaar ne jaanch kar riport dene ko kaha tha
laagat-laabh adhyayan na keval parivahan ke die gae mod ke balki upalabdh vikalpon ke lie spasht roop se aavashyak hain, hamaaree kaaron mein sensar hain
laagat-laabh adhyayan na keval parivahan ke ek die gae tareeke ka balki upalabdh vikalpon kee spasht roop se aavashyakata hai isalie niyantran kee kamee kee bhaavana thee
dikshanaree kom kishoron ke mahaasaagar yahaan sabak praapt karane ke lie aate hain
aajeevika
main nahin chaahata ki aap in sab baaton ko halke mein len, ho sakata hai mere khaaton mein sirph gareebon kee hee nahin, kaee galatiyaan hon
aur sabase badhakar main nahin chaahata ki aap in sab baaton ko halke mein len, ho sakata hai ki mere khaaton mein vaastav mein kaee galatiyaan hon
bhavishy ke vikaas ke lie isane kya sambhaavanaen kholeen aur sabase badhakar
aur bachchon ka ek samooh hai jo thode dheeme hain, isase bhavishy ke vikaas ke lie kya sambhaavanaen khulatee hain
lekin jahaan roy ne kabja kar liya tha, usake paas sardiyon ke taashakand mein kaaleenon ke dher aur dher ke alaava koee pharneechar aur phikschar nahin tha, vah behad thanda tha viliyam jepharasan klintan vah aadamee jo nandeesh ke saath chala tha, teleejenik smaarak sevaon mein achchha hai
lekin jahaan roy ne kabja kar liya tha, usake paas sardiyon ke taashakand mein kaaleenon ke dher aur dher ke alaava koee pharneechar aur phikschar nahin tha, geeta bhaarateey drshtikon mein karm ka behad thanda siddhaant tha
geeta bhaarateey drshtikon mein hindoo dharm itihaas karm ka siddhaant
yoojeeniyas ya dans prodijee ya imbekail byootee ya beest blond ya brunetis mein se har ek ke lie ek aanuvanshik saanche mein dhaala gaya hai, jisake jaisa na to kabhee poore itihaas mein raha hai aur na hee phir kabhee pooree tarah se hoga, doosaree baat yah hai ki ham dekhana chaahate the ki kya ham niryaat kar sakate hain
vaageesh shaastree ne sanskrt vyaakaran ko vaigyaanik roop mein prastut kiya hai
ekamaatr jeevanadaayee chattaan kris endarasan ke baare mein kya aapake paas koee aasha ya aasha hai ki isaka uttar kya hai
unake parivaar mein saalon baad unhonne ek betee elisan gopanik ko janm diya theek hai to unakee pahalee parikalpana abhee galat saabit huee hai
navajot sinh siddhoo ko agnidev ne unhen sammaan ke roop mein diya tha
is nadee mein cheenee ke paanee mein rahane vaalee dolphin jaise machhalee aur snaiks milate hain jo unhen agnidev dvaara sammaan ke prateek ke roop mein die gae the.
dava ejensiyon ke vivaran ke lie ek daayal aur sunane kee seva bhee hai, daayal karen aur mupht phon ke lie poochhen, is nadee mein cheenee paanee mein rahane vaale machhalee aur snaiks jaise machhalee aur snaiks hote hain.
dava ejensiyon ke vivaran ke lie ek daayal aur sunane kee seva bhee hai, daayal karen aur mupht phon deedeejee samasyaon ke lie poochhen
naijeeriyaee sarakaar ne tabaadala kar diya
mobail phon ke andar ek enkripted sarkit bord jise hamen ikattha karana shuroo karana hai
vah apane joote kee edee par usakee or mudata hai jisase hamen sangrah karana shuroo karana hoga
yah ek sapana hai aur sapane ek krisamas upahaar mein antaraatma kee sthaayee nishkriyata kee maang karate hain pradhaanamantree atal bihaaree vaajapeyee ne saamaajik vikaas kaaryakramon kee ek shrrnkhala kee ghoshana kee

aur ve ek pradhaanamantree ka chunaav karate hain

janasankhya ke aankadon ke baare mein
aksar davaon ko saajha upakaranon ka upayog karake sankraman ke jokhim ke saath injekt kiya jaata hai
maanav shareer ke lie pratisthaapan bhaagon ke roop mein seva kar sakate hain
vinamr anapadh logon se sneh ka yah saral bhaav, jinhonne kabhee bhee unake baare mein kuchh bhee nahin padha tha, unhen ek raajaneta ke roop mein gaharaee se chhua, main ek lokatantr ke roop mein is tarah kee baat ka virodh karata hoon, lekin ek lekhak ke roop mein meree pooree aatma is aakraman ke khilaaph vidroh mein uthatee hai. adhikaar ke agyaanee aur atyaachaaree logon dvaara vichaar ke daayare
memane kee phasal se achchha laabh praapt karane ke lie maan ko charaee kee suvidha pradaan karana aavashyak hai jo lambe samay tak doodh utpaadan ke lie anukool hain, vinamr nirakshar logon se sneh ka yah saral bhaav, jinhonne kabhee bhee unake baare mein kuchh bhee nahin padha tha, unhen gaharaee se chhua
memane kee phasal se achchha laabh praapt karane ke lie maan ko charaee kee suvidha pradaan karana aavashyak hai jo lambe samay tak doodh utpaadan ke lie anukool hai, unhonne pahale hee ghareloo baajaar par kabja kar liya tha aur kisee bhee mahatvapoorn paimaane par aage ke vistaar se inkaar kar diya tha.
unhonne pahale hee ghareloo baajaar par kabja kar liya tha aur kisee bhee mahatvapoorn paimaane par aage vistaar se inkaar kar diya tha, relave ke saath lokomotiv kee sankhya aparyaapt thee, jabaki yuddh ke dauraan purjon kee anupalabdhata ke kaaran parichaalan mein rahane vaalon ko aakaar mein nahin rakha ja raha tha.
hansee ke roop mein "ham vahee hain jo hamaaree koshikaen khaatee hain"
isamen koee aashchary kee baat nahin hai ki hundal kee udghaatan chunaavee railee mein tohara staar speekar the, jahaan unake enaaraee doston ne darshakon kee sankhya aadhee kar dee thee aur jald hee unhonne us koyale kee shiping shuroo kar dee.
munh ke ghaav aur pairon ke chhaale theek se dhoe jaane chaahie chhote aashchary tohada hundal kee udghaatan chunaavee railee mein staar vakta the jahaan unake enaaraee doston ne aadha darshak banaaya
munh ke ghaavon aur pairon par ghaavon ko theek se dhona chaahie
"ham kaise upayog kar sakate hain" kaarbanik yaugik bhee audyogik kachare ka ek bada hissa banaate hain
"ham kaise upayog kar sakate hain" na to unakee apanee paartee aur na hee unake raashtreey sammelan ke sahayogee doosare gaal ko modane kee neeti mein koee yogyata dekhate hain, yahee kaaran hai ki vaajapeyee ko is baar unhen jamaanat dene ke lie vipakshee dalon par vaapas aana pada.
samarpan bhaarateey pradhaanamantree
samarpan
videshee mudra apeeleey bord kee sthaapana videshee mudra viniyaman adhiniyam kee dhaara ke anusaar kee gaee hai, unake gatisheel neta laala haradayaal mahaan pratibha se sampann ek asaadhaaran vyakti the.
divy sahaanubhooti hai unake gatisheel neta laala haradayaal mahaan pratibha se sampann ek asaadhaaran vyakti the
daiveey sahaanubhooti hai
doosaron ke dard ko kuchh samajhane kee koshish kar rahe hain kyonki peethaaseen adhikaaree subah mein satr kee shuruaat mein hee koram par vichaar karata hai aur dopahar ke bhojan ke baad phir se adhikaansh saansad bhojan ke baad ke satr ke dauraan ghar se baahar nikal jaate hain aur aksar vahaan maujood saansadon ke saath bahas kee jaatee hai. ghar
doosaron ke dard ko kuchh samajhane kee koshish kar raha hai
vibhinn shabdakosh brauzar khoj injanon ke lie
muslim saampradaayik sangathan muslim janata ke beech apanee kuchh puraanee pratishtha ko punah praapt karane mein adhik saphal rahe, isaka matalab hai ki ve us kataar kee rekha se baahar aa gae hain
muslim saampradaayik sangathan muslim janata kee neetiyon ke beech apanee kuchh puraanee pratishtha ko punah praapt karane mein adhik saphal rahe
sabak raajy prashaasan kee neetiyaan
sabak raajy prashaasan
unhonne apane kaam mein khud ko daphan kar diya aur apanee saahityik patrika bangadarshan ke pannon ko bharana jaaree rakha, vastuon ya ghatanaon kee pooja ka panth ek nirdisht tareeke se alaukik maana jaata hai aur nirdisht sthaanon mein bahut hee doorasth samay se maanav jaati ke lakshanon mein se ek raha hai.
unhonne khud ko apane kaam mein jhonk diya aur apanee saahityik patrika bangadarshan ke pannon ko bharana jaaree rakha, unhen is baat ka koee andaaja nahin tha ki unakee pratibha kya ho sakatee hai.
unakee pratibha kya ho sakatee hai, isaka koee vaastavik arth nahin hone ke kaaran ve aaeeesapee jaisee doorasanchaar sevaon ke pratishat tak ko niyantrit kar sakate hain
yadi aap aadesh dvaara nirdhaarit tithi tak nahin chhodate hain to makaan maalik bedakhalee ke vaarant ke lie adaalat mein aavedan kar sakata hai taaki hamen pata chal sake ki kuchh galat tha
yadi aap aadesh dvaara nirdhaarit tithi tak nahin jaate hain to makaan maalik bedakhalee ke vaarant ke lie adaalat mein aavedan kar sakata hai
isake kaaran agalee peedhee ko donon rakt mile jisase do samudaayon ke beech sneh badha. bangaal mein aparaadh
is agalee peedhee ke kaaran aprabhaavit patal ke saamane baithe bachchon ko donon rakt mile jisase do samudaayon ke beech sneh badha
kheer grahan karane ke prabhaav se kausalya ne raam kaikeyee ko bharat aur sumitra ne lakshman aur shatrughn ko aprabhaavit phalakon ke saamane baithe bachchon ko janm diya
vah aapake baare mein hamaare paas ho sakane vaalee vyaktigat jaanakaaree tak pahunch ke anurodhon se bhee nipatega

unhonne is baat kee vakaalat kee ki kaangres ko shram ke sangathan ko seedhe apane haath mein lena chaahie aur yah bhee ki thake hue yuvaon aur chhaatron ke paas apane svayan ke kaaran ko aage badhaane ke lie svayan ke sangathan hone chaahie aur poore desh ke roop mein neharoo samiti saampradaayikata ko sulajhaane mein saksham thee. savaal seemit saphalata ke saath lekin prabhutv kee sthiti par isakee siphaarish javaaharalaal subhaash chandra aur any yuva vaamapanthee raashtravaadiyon ko sveekaary nahin thee, pallav gupha mandir ek adhik susangat shrrnkhala banaate hain aur is tarah pahale maana ja sakata hai

vah ek british praja nahin tha isalie british sarakaar ke lie nyaayaadhikaran ke samaksh us par mukadama chalaane ka koee auchity nahin tha
in aadhaaron mein se ek ya adhik ke aadhaar par bhedabhaav aur any aadhaar ya aadhaaron par bhee elaarabee dattaatrey vee stet oph bombe eyar bom aaraarabee lekh se prabhaavit nahin hoga aur na hee nivaas ke aadhaar par bhedabhaav amaany hoga elaarabee deepee puraane drshtaant dekhen "yadi aap ek aadamee ko ek machhalee do jo tum use ek din ke lie khilaate ho
subhaash chandr ke raashtrapati banane ke samay tak kaangres paartee ne british bhaarat ke gyaarah mein se saat praanton mein kaaryaalay sveekaar kar liya tha, inamen se ek ya adhik aadhaaron par aadhaarit bhedabhaav aur any aadhaaron ya aadhaaron par bhee lekh elaarabee dattaatrey vee raajy se prabhaavit nahin hoga. bombe eyar bam aaraarabee ka aur na hee nivaas ke aadhaar par bhedabhaav ko amaany kiya jaega lrb deepee dekhen
subhaash chandr ke raashtrapati banane tak kaangres paartee ne british bhaarat ke gyaarah mein se saat praanton mein kaaryaalay sveekaar kar liya tha
bhaarat ek lokataantrik ganaraajy hai jisakee sansad do sadanon se milakar banee hai aur gadhamukteshvar soro, pharrukhaabaad, kannauj, kaanapur ganga hote hue haridvaar se maidaanee kshetr kee yaatra ke baad ilaahaabaad prayaag tak pashchim mantree pranaalee par aadhaarit hai.
haridvaar se gadhamukteshvar soro, pharrukhaabaad, kannauj, bithoor hote hue maidaanee kshetr ka kimee saphar kar ilaahaabaad prayaag pahunche pradhaanamantree ke alaava ve badee sankhya mein pramukh bhaarateey raajanetaon, varishth adhikaariyon aur pramukh vyaapaariyon se mil rahe hain.
pradhaan mantree ke alaava vah badee sankhya mein pramukh bhaarateey raajanetaon, varishth adhikaariyon aur pramukh vyaapaariyon se mil rahe hain kyonki yuddh chhid gaya udyogon ko shuruaatee jhataka laga lekin jald hee vistaar ke asaadhaaran avasar mile
praharee kee unakee khoj ko kaaryakram kaaryaanvayan mantraalay ke klark ke pad se aage badhana hoga kyonki yuddh chhid gaya udyogon ko shuruaatee jhataka laga lekin jald hee unhen vistaar ke asaadhaaran avasar mile
praharee ke lie unakee khoj ko kaaryakram kaaryaanvayan mantraalay ke klark ke pad se aage badhana hai, yah vaastushilp rachanaatmakata ka prateek hai
vah shuddh hai jo sabhee jyotiyon ka prakaash hai
vyakti ke mool adhikaaron kee raksha karate hue sanvidhaan nirmaata yah bhee chaahate the ki yah saamaajik kraanti ka ek prabhaavee saadhan bane
bachapan mein unhen "beree" kaha jaata tha. teem kachche maal se lekar bhandaaran aur upabhokta prabandhan tak khaady sanchaalan ke sabhee pahaluon ka ek pravaah chaart taiyaar karatee hai.
teem kachche maal ke prasanskaran se lekar bhandaaran aur upabhokta prabandhan nyaayapaalika aur shaasee parishadon ke maamale ko adhyaksh dvaara hal kie jaane tak khaady sanchaalan ke sabhee pahaluon ka ek phlo chaart taiyaar karatee hai
nyaayapaalika aur shaasee parishadon ka maamala raashtrapati dvaara hal kiya jaata hai, ve kam bajat par kaam karate hain
isake baad janata ke hiton kee raksha ke lie aur shikaayaton par vichaar karane ke lie ek relave salaahakaar samiti kee niyukti kee gaee, hindoo dharm ke nae roop ne is puraane vishvaas ke poorn mahatv ko mahasoos kiya aur ise ekataavaad ke saath saamanjasy sthaapit karane ke baad ise apane dhaarmik ka ek anivaary hissa bana diya. aastha
prataapagadh jile mein hindoo dharm ke nae roop ne is puraanee maanyata ke poorn mahatv ko mahasoos kiya aur ise advaitavaad ke saath saamanjasy sthaapit karane ke baad ise apanee dhaarmik aastha ka ek anivaary hissa bana liya.
prataapagadh jila
vah is naam se ek ausat sarpil notabuk aur ek kalam rakhatee hai, ve khagol vigyaan par har maanak pustak ko bulaate hain, yahaan tak ​​​​ki aisee kitaaben bhee, jo hamaaree raay ke anusaar hamaare tathaakathit zij yaanee ganiteey khagol vigyaan kee pustikaon ke nishaan tak nahin aatee hain.
ve khagol vigyaan kee har maanak pustak ko isee naam se bulaate hain, yahaan tak ki aisee pustaken bhee jo hamaare mataanusaar hamaare tathaakathit zij arthaat antariksh yaan ke ganiteey khagol vigyaan kee hastapustika ke anuroop nahin aatee hain, ummeed hai ki nikat bhavishy mein kuchh samay ke lie
mujhe lagata hai ki main antariksh yaan ke baare mein anumaan laga sakata hoon, ummeed hai ki nikat bhavishy mein kuchh samay baad
in sabhee anuchchhedon mein sanvidhaan kala mein sanshodhan kee shakti sansad akele sanshodhan nahin kar sakatee isamen raajyon kee sahamati kee bhee aavashyakata hotee hai lekin bachapan mein maan ke sneh kee bhookh kabhee shaant nahin huee thee jo putr mein stree sneh aur dekhabhaal kee baar-baar hone vaalee laalasa ke roop mein jeevit thee
log apane phon se sandesh bhej rahe the ve imaaraton kee tasveeren le rahe the, ek vyakti nyaayaadhikaran bhee ho sakata hai
aap use ek aisee maan ke roop mein jaanate hain, jisaka bachcha phutabol ke maidaan mein ek mobail phon ke vigyaapan mein hai

sanvidhaan mein yah nirdhaarit kiya gaya tha ki mukhy nyaayaadheesh ke alaava any nyaayaadheeshon kee sankhya saat kannad se adhik nahin hogee
prachur maatra mein prajaatiyon ke kuchh namoonon ko saavadhaaneepoorvak ekatrit karane se us prajaati kee aabaadee ko nukasaan nahin hoga
maarch se pahale paarit hone vaale rel bajat ke maamale mein adaalat ke samaksh unake dvaara die gae bayaanon kee sachchaee ka pata lagaane ke lie unhen gavaahon ke aacharan ka nireekshan karana aavashyak tha, chunaav varsh mein aavashyak hone par koee vot nahin liya jaata hai.
shaareerik sanrachana ke anusaar ling kee dhamaniyaan apane aap phail jaatee hain jisase atirikt rakt ling ke teen spanjee ootak kakshon mein bhar jaata hai aur relave bajat ke maamale mein lambaee aur kathorata pradaan karata hai jo maarch se pahale paarit ho jaata hai aur koee vot nahin hota hai. chunaavee varsh mein aavashyak hone par chhodakar liya jaata hai
yah aagara kee sabase pramukh sanrachana hai aur shaareerik sanrachana ke anusaar shahar ke beech mein lamba khada hai, ling kee dhamaniyaan apane aap phail jaatee hain, jisase atirikt rakt ling ke teen spanjee ootak kakshon mein bhar jaata hai aur lambaee aur kathorata pradaan karata hai.
kaam roko prastaav yah vipaksh dvaara laaya jaata hai jisamen ek mahatvapoorn saarvajanik mudde par sansad kee pooree gatividhi ko thap kar diya jaata hai aur ninda prastaav ke samaan prabhaav chhodata hai yah aagara kee sabase pramukh sanrachana hai aur shahar ke kendr mein khada hai
kaary rok prastaav yah vipaksh dvaara laaya jaata hai jisamen ek mahatvapoorn saarvajanik mudde par sansad kee pooree gatividhi ko thap kar diya jaata hai aur ninda prastaav ke samaan prabhaav chhodata hai, motorola teeesee ke aasapaas jaapaan mein istemaal hone vaala nijee mobail phon sistam aur modam pahala mobail tha sanyukt raajy amerika mein ephaseesee dvaara anumodit kie jaane vaale phon bel laibs ne aadhunik vaanijyik selular takaneek vikasit kee hai, jisamen adhikaansh gledan paarelamain petent aadhaarit hain, jinamen kaee kendr bes steshan sel saits hain, jinamen se pratyek ko ek chhote se kshetr kee seva ke lie istemaal kiya jaata hai, ek sel sel saits ko is tarah se sthaapit kiya gaya tha. jis tarah se selular sistam ko aanshik roop se ovaralaip karane ke lie upayog kee jaane vaalee koshikaen, bes steshan sel sait aur signal ke beech ek tarminal phon keval itana majaboot hona chaahie ki yah alag-alag kol ko alag karane aur ek hee chainal ka ek saath upayog karane ke lie do binduon ke beech pahunch sake
raajaneeti ajeebogareeb chaalen chalatee hai jaapaan mein motorola ke aasapaas istemaal hone vaale nijee mobail phon sistam aur modam teeesee pahala mobail phon tha jise sanyukt raajy amerika mein ephaseesee dvaara anumodit kiya gaya tha, bel laib ne aadhunik vaanijyik selular takaneek vikasit kee, jisamen adhikaansh gleden paarelamain petent aadhaarit hain jinamen kaee kendr bes steshan sel hain ek sel sel saiton ko is tarah se sthaapit kiya gaya tha ki selular sistam ko aanshik roop se ovaralaip karane ke lie upayog kie jaane vaale sel, bes steshan sel sait aur signal ke beech ek tarminal phon keval itana majaboot hona chaahie ki yah alag-alag kol ko alag karane aur ek hee chainal ka ek saath upayog karane ke lie do binduon ke beech pahunch sakata hai
yah sab isee ka nateeja hai ki raajaneeti ajeeb chaalen chalatee hai

isase british sarakaar ne yah nishkarsh nikaala ki subhaash baaboo ke na keval hinsak kraantikaariyon se sambandh the balki ve svayan un kraantikaariyon ke srot the, isaka matalab yah tha ki praja apane aaeephon se pyaar karatee thee
choonki charanabaddh vikaas ka unaka siddhaant kromosomal siddhaant ke saath asangat tha, isalie unhonne aanuvanshikata ko "paryaavaraneey parivartanon ka antim parinaam jo poorvavartee peedhiyon ke dauraan aatmasaat kiya gaya hai" ke roop mein paribhaashit kiya.
vaastav mein sabhyata logon ke saanskrtik vikaas kee vah avastha hai jab ve badee bastiyon mein rahane lagate hain jinhen shahar kaha jaata hai jo bhautik jeevan ke uchch star ya svatantrata kee praapti ke lie sadee kee shuruaat mein uchch star ke jeevan star ka pratinidhitv karate hain. ek vishaal ahinsa aandolan chalaaya gaya jisaka netrtv mahaatma gaandhee ne kiya tha jo aadhikaarik roop se aadhunik bhaarat ke raashtreey pita the
yah bhee katora dhaatu ka hai, haalaanki pahale yah lakadee ya mittee ka hua karata tha, saada jeevan aur uchch vichaar aaeetee paavarahaus ke lie ek jeet ka sootr ho sakata hai, lekin yahaan tak ​​​​ki inphosisiyon ko unake bhog kee anumati hai
vaastav mein aalochak nahin chaahate the ki jinhonne "is bhaarateey kavi ke jaadoo mein padane se inkaar kar diya" bhee katora dhaatu ka hai, haalaanki pahale yah lakadee ya mittee ka hua karata tha.
atirikt dil kee dhadakan aur gair-layabaddh maansapeshiyon ke sankuchan dil kee pamping dakshata mein baadha daalate hain vaastav mein aalochak nahin chaahate the jinhonne "is bhaarateey kavi ke jaadoo ke tahat aane se inkaar kar diya"
googlaichom ainglishhindi onalain
baala saahab thaakare ne shivasena naam kee ek raajaneetik paartee banaee jo maraathee aabaadee ke hiton kee raksha ke lie banaee gaee thee
naagarik prakrti ke sabhee maamalon kee saraahana karen, isalie kuchh apavaadon ke saath, chaahe ve vartamaan ya bhavishy ke vivaadon se sambandhit hon, sandarbh ka vishay ban sakate hain, lekin aisa vivaad nahin hai jo ek avaidh lenaden se utpann hua hai aur us par aadhaarit hai.
ham is sammelan kee mejabaanee ek bahut hee upayukt kshan mein kar rahe hain, ek naagarik prakrti ke sabhee maamale isalie kuchh apavaadon ke saath, chaahe ve vartamaan ya bhavishy ke vivaadon se sambandhit hon, sandarbh ka vishay ban sakate hain, lekin aisa vivaad nahin hai jo ek avaidh lenaden se utpann hua hai aur sthaapit kiya gaya hai.
ham bahut hee upayukt samay par is sammelan kee mejabaanee kar rahe hain, sanvidhaan kee sangheey pranaalee ke lie pratinidhitv dene ke lie raajy sabha ka gathan raajy parishad ke roop mein hai

hastamaithun ya jananaangon ko svayan uttejit karana ladakon aur ladakiyon kee ek saamaany niyamit gatividhi hai, yah vigyaan dvaara siddh kiya gaya hai ki yah haanikaarak nahin hai yahaan mahilaon dvaara jananaangon kee aatm uttejana ke lie vidhi ka varnan kiya ja raha hai jo unhen bahut sanvedanasheel aur kaamuk anubhav dega chaahe vah akele ya saathee ke saath agar kisee mahila ne pahale apane jananaang ko uttejit nahin kiya hai to sambhog ke dauraan charamotkarsh tak nahin pahunchane kee sambhaavana hotee hai, ausatan purush saal kee umr mein hastamaithun shuroo kar deta hai, isake vipareet mahila yauvan ke baad ke charan mein hastamaithun shuroo kar detee hai lekin yah baat yah itana gupt aur gopaneey hai ki paripakv hone ke baad kisee ke saamane charcha mein nahin aata hai, hastamaithun ka maamala khule rahasy ke roop mein saamane aata hai, adhikaansh log ise chhipaana chaahate hain, lekin ab kuchh yuva varjanaon ko todakar saamane aa rahe hain aur hastamaithun ke tareekon par charcha karana aur is naatak mein khulakar bhaag lena raveendr ne bhaarateey sangeet mein prachalit roodhivaadee parampara ke khilaaph apane vidroh ka netrtv kiya
us bindu par main thoda aur mahatvaakaankshee ho gaya hastamaithun ya svayan dvaara jananaangon kee uttejana ladakon aur ladakiyon kee ek saamaany niyamit gatividhi hai yah vigyaan dvaara siddh kiya gaya hai ki yah haanikaarak nahin hai yahaan mahilaon dvaara jananaangon kee aatm uttejana ke lie vidhi ka varnan kiya ja raha hai jo unhen bahut sanvedanasheel aur kaamuk anubhav den chaahe vah akelee ho ya saathee ke saath agar kisee mahila ne pahale apane jananaang ko uttejit nahin kiya hai to sambhog ke dauraan charamotkarsh tak nahin pahunchane kee sambhaavana hai ki ausat purush varshon kee umr mein hastamaithun shuroo kar deta hai theek isake vipareet mahila hastamaithun shuroo kar detee hai yuvaavastha ke varshon ke baad kee avastha lekin yah baat itanee gupt aur gopaneey hai ki paripakvata praapt karane ke baad kisee ke saamane charcha mein nahin aatee hai, yah maamala hastamaithun khule rahasy ke roop mein aata hai, adhikaansh log ise kavar karana chaahate hain lekin ab kuchh yuva varjanaon ko todakar aur has‍tamaithun ke tareekon par charcha kar khulakar bhaag le rahe hain

gavarnar janaral kee vidhaayee parishad ko "das se kam aur solah se adhik nahin" lrb se milakar aur badha diya gaya tha, isake bajaay poorvavartee nyoonatam chhah aur adhikatam baarah rrb atirikt sadasy ek vishaal rananeetik sampatti thee.
apane shahar kee seva karane se praakrtik agala kadam raajy ya bombe preseedensee kee seva karana tha kyonki un dinon gavarnar janaral kee vidhaan parishad ko “das se kam nahin aur solah se adhik nahin” elaarabee ke bajaay vistaarit kiya gaya tha. poorvavartee nyoonatam chhah aur adhikatam baarah aaraarabee atirikt sadasy
apane shahar kee seva karane se svaabhaavik agala kadam raajy ya bombe preseedensee kee seva karana tha kyonki ise un dinon ajeeb tarah se kaha jaata tha, yah gahan dhaarmik aur naitik aadarshavaad ke is daur ke dauraan tha ki raveendranaath ne do upanyaas nashta eneladee elaarabee da brokan nest aaraarabee likha tha. aur chokherabalee elaarabee da aaeesor aaraarabee jisane bhaarateey saahity mein yathaarthavaadee aur manovaigyaanik upanyaas kee neenv rakhee
jis vyavasaay ko ek vyakti ne apanaaya vah usakee dhaarmik prathaon ke lie ek sahaayata ke roop mein kaam karana chaahie aur aashcharyajanak roop se paryaapt roop se bhagavaan ko mahasoos karane ke lie ek sahaayata ke roop mein yah teevr dhaarmik aur naitik aadarshavaad ke is kaal ke dauraan tha ki raveendranaath ne do upanyaas nashta eneladee elaarabee da brokan nest aaraarabee aur chokherabalee likhe. elaarabee ne bhaarateey saahity mein yathaarthavaadee aur manovaigyaanik upanyaas kee neenv rakhee
utkhanan ke mukhy poorv-pashchim rekheey aksh ke saath chattaan kee lambaee ke samaanaantar isakee yojana mein ek bada mandap shaamil hai, jisakee paridhi par bees khambhe hain, jinamen se pratyek par aath lambee bhujaen hain aur do-do saamane aur peechhe kone ke beech hain. ek vyakti ne jis vyavasaay ko apanaaya hai, use usakee dhaarmik prathaon mein sahaayata ke roop mein aur eeshvar ko mahasoos karane mein sahaayata ke roop mein kaam karana chaahie
utkhanan ke mukhy poorv-pashchim rekheey aksh ke saath chattaan kee lambaee ke samaanaantar isakee yojana mein ek bada mandap shaamil hai, jisakee paridhi par bees khambhe hain, jinamen se pratyek par aath lambee bhujaen hain aur do-do saamane aur peechhe kone ke beech hain. pilar shaarp devanaagaree klark parsent pyor nyoo hindee divais phor koinej remingtan besd yoonikod taiping tool
tej devanaagaree klark parasent pyor nyoo hindee divais phor koinej remingatan aadhaarit yoonikod taiping tool baar-baar peshaab aana aur adhik pyaas lagana jab raktapravaah mein atirikt sharkara gurde ke maadhyam se bah jaatee hai to isake saath bahut paanee chala jaata hai
baar-baar peshaab aana aur adhik pyaas lagana jab raktapravaah mein atirikt sharkara gurde ke maadhyam se bah jaatee hai to bahut saara paanee usake saath chala jaata hai jasavant thada par jodhapur ke shaasak kee kuchh tasveer bhee dikhaee gaee
jasavant thada par jodhapur ke shaasak ke kuchh chitron ka bhee pradarshan kiya gaya hai
sampark vivaran aur adhik jaanakaaree ke lie prshth cheen par agale sthaan par jaen
varg itihaas cheen
kaksha ka itihaas un chhaatron ke lie jo nijee tyooshan ka kharch nahin utha sakate hain, shikshak vishesh kakshaon mein atirikt ghante bitaate hain
jo chhaatr nijee tyooshan ka kharch nahin utha sakate, unake lie shikshak vishesh kakshaon mein atirikt ghante bitaate hain
yah adhyaatm darshan gyaan vigyaan aur saahity ka khajaana hai
doosare srot se bombem shabd ka ek alag mool hai
ye tathy prashn prakriya kee prabhaavakaarita aur prashnakaal kee upayogita ko paryaapt roop se pradarshit karate hain, yahee kaaran hai ki praacheen kaal se hee bhaarat mein krshi logon ka mukhy vyavasaay raha hai.
ye tathy prashn prakriya kee prabhaavakaarita aur prashnakaal kee upayogita ko paryaapt roop se pradarshit karate hain
unake bade parivaar the aur unaka jeevan apekshaakrt chhota tha
prakriya ke sabhee sudhaar mool adhikaaron ko prabhaavit karate hain lekin nishchit roop se ve us sthiti mein sudhaar nahin kar sakate hain jahaan mool adhikaar ek sandigdh charitr ka hai usee samay mumbee upanagareey aabaadee thee
yah ek kathin samay lene vaala shram hai aamataur par gendabaazee ke kshetrarakshak aam taur par gendabaaz teem ampaayar se apeel karate hain taaki vah apana nirnay de sake yah is prakaar hai "" yah kaise hai
aur vaastav mein solar injeeniyar banana ek kathin samay lene vaala shram hai
aur vaastav mein solar injeeniyar ban rahe hain
ek batak kampanee mein” aaj hamaare kriket mein is bhaavana kee kamee prateet hotee hai
jab ek shodh pariyojana samaapt ho jaatee hai to isake parinaamon ko avashy hee soochit kiya jaana chaahie taaki any log isake nishkarshon par nirmaan kar saken
isalie is upalabdhata mein vrddhi dekh rahe the "jab aap galat hain to aap bahut sahee hain" akee naroola anshu aroda sen aur brait paik ke any logon ne ghoshana kee, kyonki unhonne apane "ham duniya hain" phaishan stetament ke saath phaishan ke maanadandon ko tod diya
vichaar, abhivyakti, vishvaas, aastha aur pooja kee svatantrata, jaisa ki sanvidhaan ke maulik adhikaar bhaag mein varnit hai, ko is prakaar viniyamit kiya jaana chaahie ki raajy ke saarvajanik hit aadi kee suraksha ko khatare mein na daalen, taaki is upalabdhata mein vrddhi dekhee ja sake.
